verse_text: Aiki kitabu kya oshari lo Yesu Kristo ichu ai mana o Dawidi, ichu ai mana o Abrahamu.
Abrahamu alefee Isaki, Isaki kafee Yakobo, Yakobo kafee Yuda na wanawamae.
Na Yuda kafee Paresi na Sara ipfo ko Tamari. Na Paresi kafee Hesironyi, na Hesironyi kafee Aramu.
Na Aramu kafe Aminadabu, Aminadabu kafee Nahashonyi, Nahashonyi kafee Salmone.
Salmone kafee Boasi ifo ko Rahabu, Boasi kafee Obedi ipfo ko Ruti, Obedi kafee Yese.
Yese kafee mangi Dawidi, Dawidi kafee Solomon ipfo ko mka o Uria.
Na Solomon kafee Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu kafee Abia, Abia kafee Asa.
Asa kafee Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati kafee Yoramu, Yoramu kafee Usia.
Usia kafee Yotamu, Yotamu kafee Ahasi, Ahasi kafee Hezekia.
Hezekia kafee Manase, Manase kafee Amonyi, Amonyi kafee Yosia.
Yosia kafee Yekonyia na wanawamae mandi ha wupfungo wo Babilon.
Ili numa ya wupfungo wo Babilon Yekonyia kafee Shealtieli, na Shealtieli kafee Serubabeli.
Serubabeli kafee Abihudi, Abihudi kafee Eliakimu, Eliakimu kafee Asori.
Asori kafee Sadoki, Sadoki kafee Akimu, Akimu kafee Eliudi.
Eliudi kafee Eleasari, Eleasari kafee Matanyi, Matanyi kafee Yakobo.
Yakobo kafee Yosefu ai mii o Maria ichu mofee Yesu chu ai Kristo.

Nahong'u, marika halya hose kiwokia Abrahamu ushike Dawidi, nyi marika ikumi na haana; na kiwokia Dawidi shika wupfungo wo Babilon, nyi marika ikumi na haana; na kiwokia wupfungo wo Babilon, shika Kristo nyi marika ikumi na haana.
Na alya mafeonyi ha Yesu Kristo nyi kuwehendekie kuile: Maria ulya mae, lya mandi a-weikoso nyi Yosefu, indi walamesanzo, naalyo Maria kamanyika nyi ai mlemo kui pfinya ya Mumuyo Mwele,
Na ili tindi yake awei mndu o wusumhanyi, nalakunde imhutsia sonu, kahia kelekana nao kui kiṟika.

Ili awerie ado mdo̱nyi, adi aichu msu o Mndumii akulora nao kilodionyi kambia, “Iyo Yosefu, ui mana o Dawidi, ma kulahinge-hinge iduo tindi-i yapfo Maria kipfa iki ki-kimohe ipfo koke nyi kiwukie ko Mumuyo Mwele.
Nao nyekaa nafee mana, na rina lyake nomlahe nyi Yesu; kipfa nyio ekaa nakiṟe wandu madeko hawo!”
Na kimaduma kikashika kido nyi kundu kuhoye kilya ki-dede nyi Mndumii kui dumbu lya mwikimbi kehamba,
“A mbuya, kukae mana aikoso nakapike, nafee mana o womi, na rina lyake wamlahe nyi Imanueli.” Imanueli nyi cha ili ohamba: Ruwa ai naso.
Yosefu kekikure madonyi, kawewuta kilya alewawaso nyi msu o Mndumii; kaduo Maria kawa mka oke,
Indi Yosefu ma nalakuwashe nao itane afee mana o womi; kamlaha rina lyake nyi Yesu.
Yesu kekifeo kulya Betlehemu, fuwei mṟi fo Yudaya, mandi ha mangi Herode, wadi a-walya wandu walaanyi wacha na kulya Yerusalemu, wawuka kya kulya ora la ngamenyi, wakahamba,
“Mangi-i ya Wayuda ilefeo nyiku ikerimbo? Kipfa nyi lulewona wuṟingishi wo nyenyeri yake kulya kya ora lo ngamenyi, naso lukacha lumwindie-wo!”
Mangi Herode kekiicho ado, kawuko nyi madima, handu hamu na wandu wa Yerusalemu wose.
Kadumia wakohanyi wanene wache sanzia handu hamu wose, hamu na walaanyi wa shitabu wa kulya sangenyi, kawaso̱ra kundu Kristo echifeeyo.
Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi kulya Betlehemu ya kulya Yudaya, chakipfa nyi wudi mwikimbi ahambie,
‘Na iyo Betlehemu ukeri ya oruka lo Yuda, ukeri mtutu konyiia wamangi wo Yuda-pfo, kipfa kopfo iyo nyi kochikaa kuwuke mwitoṟi molisiṟa wandu wako Israeli!’ ”
Naho Herode kalaha walaanyi walya kui kirika kawasoṟa̱soṟa kiheri walewona nyenyeri iya.
Kawasama ke wahende Betlehemu kawawia, “Kehenda tumenyi mnu mbonyi tsa kimana kilya mutsiṟingishie; mukammaa ikiwona muwuye munjiwie mbehenda ikiindya.”
Kyasia wameicho kilya kya mangi wakakuhendia, na nyenyeri iya waleiwona kulya kya ora lo ngamenyi, wadi aiya yamecha iwasongoya ikatana yawashitsa alya handu mana akeri, ikatirimaho.
Wekiwona nyenyeri iya, wakachihio mnu.

Wakaida na mba, wakawona mana ulya akeri na mae Maria. Wakakuhutsa wanda na kyamu, wakampfiria ndi. Wakawuya wakapfunguo shindo shawo wawerie sha kisa, wakamwimaya nasho; nyi sahabu, na uvumba, na manemane.
Indi Ruwa, kawawawasa kui ndodo, wakawuya na kanyi, walakiide ko Herode.

Wekimaa-ihenda, wadi a-ichu msu o Mndumii kakulora na Yosefu kui ndodo kambia, “Kure, noire mana-chu na mae, nohende dichia kulya Misiri nokukaye-fo itane ngakuamtsa-se, nyi kifa Herode akundi iwaaha mana-chu.”
Nao kakure kadichiṟa mana na mae kui kio, kahenda kulya Misiri.
Kakaa Misiri itane Herode apfa. Nyi kundu kuhoye kilya ki-kihambe nyi Mndumii kui dumbu lya mwikimbi kehamba, “Nyi kulya Misiri njilahie-pfo mana ako!”

Kyasia Herode amewona ke amesolo nyi walaanyi walya, karihinyika mnu nyashi, kaduma kuwooho shiwana shoose sha kulya Betlehemu na sha kulya mṟasenyi kuitumanyi napfo, shilya shimaiye maka iwi na shilya shiwuuye numa ya kiheri kilya etuma walaanyi walya.
Nalyo kilya kiwei kidede nyi dumbu lya mwikimbi Yeremia kikawehoya kehamba,
“Kulya Rama kuleichio ṟu ofuho sa lunene na shilio, nyi Raheli akeri ikapia wana wake shilio, ma nalaidikie iwihiṟio moo, nyi kipfa walaiho-se.”
Kyasia Herode kekipfa, msu o Mndumii kacha ikulo̱ra na Yosefu kui ndodo kulya Misiri.
Kambia, “Kureng'u, noduo mana na mae, nohende kulya Israeli, kifa walya wawekeri itengetia mana-chu walemepfa!”
Nao kakure, kaweduo mana na mae, kahenda kulya oruken lo Israeli.
Indi kekiwio ke Arkelao nyi ai mangi ya Yudaya, handu ha ndee Herode, kaowuo ihenda-pfo. Indi Ruwa kambawasa kui ndodo, kahenda kulya shihongonyi sha Galilaya.
Kacha ilaa kulya m̱rinyi fo Nasareti, kundu kuhoye kilya ki-kidede kui dumbu lya mwikimbi, ke nyi echilaho nyi Mnasarayo.
Kyasia, mafiri na halya kukakure Yohane Mpatisi, kawa moongoya wandu mbonyi kulya nuka ya Yudaya.
Kehamba, “Dumbuyenyi, kyamba wumangi wo Ruwa womeafukia kufui!”
Nao nyi ichu a-mhambe nyi mwikimbi Yesaya, kehamba, “Ṟu lya moedia kundu ko nuka: -- Kesungusienyi njia ya Mndumii, muwetembecheṟa na njomongo tsake!”
Kyasia, na Yohane-chu nyi awekeṟaa nguwo tsa mafufuta ha ngamia, kawewa mokupfunga na okowa lo njonyi ipfo kitsinyi kyake; na shelya shake nyi nzihe na wuki wo mbakonyi.
Nalyo wandu wa Yerusalemu woose na wa oruka lo Yudaya na Yordanyi lose wakamchea.
Wakahenda ipatisio alya mṟingenyi fo Yordanyi wechitochia-ho njonyamaṟo tsawo.
Nao lyandi alewona Wafarisayo wafoi na Wasadukayo wechicha na wupatisonyi kawawia, “Nyo mui malea ha njoka, nyi mndu o ku alemlosha idicha nyashi iya iriiye icha?
Kekusumuhantsyenyi-ng'u mbuka njicha tsedumbuya!
Ma mulakusire wongo mrimenyi mochihamba, ‘A-chi luwode ndeadu nyio Abrahamu?’ Indi nyi ngambia, ‘Ma maho-ha Ruwa na echiidima yalutsia-ho Abrahamu luwa.’
A-lilya soka li-iwike tsindenyi ya ikidi, orio ikidi lyada lilakumbia ndunda, na lyi manyo lyikumbo modonyi.
Kyako inyi nyi njekepatisa na mṟinga kya idumbuya, indi ichu echicha numa yako, nao nyi anjing'anyie, njilasumhanyi ma iduo shadu shake, icho nyi echimpatisa na Mumuyo Mwele na modo.
Nyi awerie na kindo kyake kyeela na owoko loke, na-weahia na alya kiwuhehu kyake namae, mbeke-tso nasanyie alya kikumbinyi, indi muulu-fo nafuko̱re na modo fulechiruma.”
Nalyo Yesu kacha na alya nuka handu Yohane awei kulya wambaṟa ya Yordanyi, awuka kulya Galilaya akundi ipatiso nyio.
Yohane kamlehialehia kahamba, “Nyio inyi njiwechiwona njechipatiso nyi iyo, indi iyo kowuya icha na koko?”
Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Ikyo kudee wulalu, nyi wudo kiluwaṟi, kundu luawutsie mbon tsa wusumhanyi tsose.” Nalyo kakumdeea.
Kyasia Yesu amedima ipatiso, kado alya mṟingenyi. Naho kudi kulya ruwehu kukaṟuhuka; kawona Mumuyo o Ruwa kesoka akeri cha mbeta, ikakaa huyake.
Oweṟe ṟu likalaha liwuka ruwehu likahamba, “A-ichu mana oko a-mkunde ichu njii mchihie kyake.”
Nalyo Yesu kadao kundu ko nuka nyi Mumuyo, kundu nahende heshio-fo nyi Satana.
Kyasia ammaa ikuotoya mfiri makumi haana na shio makumi haana, kafurumia iwa̱do nyi njaa.
Mheshi kacha naho kammbia, “Kokoya na iyo Mana o Ruwa, kewia-ngu maho-ha hawe kando.”
Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Nyi ki-kiṟehie kyehamba: Kindo mndu echitawulia nakyo moo chi kando tupu̱pfo, shile nyi orio kidedo kyewuka dumbunyi lya Ruwa kyose.”
Na Satana kawuya kamduo kulya mṟinyi mwele, kacha mhoṟotsa alya owerihu lo hekalu, oo chunju.
Kambia, “Kokoya na ukeri Mana o Ruwa, kekuolotsenu iya, kipfa nyi ki-kiṟehie kyehamba: Nyi echiwawasa wasu wake kimaduma kyapfo wache kuambia na mahi, kundu ulawone koikapa ma kudende ihohu.”
Yesu kambia, “Na kiwei kiṟehie-se kyehamba: Ma ulawone ohesha Ruwa Mndumii opfo!”
Kyasia Satana kawuya kamduo kundu ko fumvu lileshe, kamloṟa masanga ha wuyana hose na wusuṟi woho.
Kambia, “Aiho, nyi njechikuinenga hose, komekekunjiolokya ndenyi na interewa.”
Nalyo Yesu kambia, “Wuka iya koko Satan, kifa nyi ki-kiṟehie kyehamba: Mndumii ofo Ruwa, nyio amonyi ochimwolokia ndenyi na imterewa.”
Naalyo mheshi kamda-ho, kudi wasu wa Ruwa wakacha ipfuṟukanya Yesu.
Kyasia ammaa iwio ke Yohane alemmaa ikumbo kipfungonyi, nao kahenda kuleshe kulya Galilaya.
Kawuka kulya Nasareti, kahenda kulya Kapernaumu, nyi kundu ko mawambao ha ipalipali, kulya shihongonyi sha Sebulon na Naftali.
Nyi kundu kuhoye kilya ki-kidede kui dumbu lya mwikimbi Yesaya.
Kyehamba, “Oruka lo Sebulon na lo Naftali kwidie njia ya ipalipali, na kulya mataya ya Yordanyi na Galilaya kui kundo ko mbaṟi njihenu.
Wandu wadamie memenyi wawona ngeela ing'anyi, na walya wadamie orukenyi lo maṟishe ha opfu, wawonekio nyi ngeela.”
Wokya mandi halya, Yesu kawooka yonguo kahamba: “Kedumbuyenyi, kyamba wumangi wo Ruwa nyi hafui wui.”

Kyasia kekichumia-chumia kulya mawambao ha ipalipali, kawona wana wa mka wawi, nyi Simon ewio Petro, na manomae nyi-we Andrea; nawo nyi wawekeri yolotsa mdeho fodeha makunga alya ipalipalinyi, kipfa nyi wawei wadehi.
Nao kawawia, “Kenjonyi muoshane na inyi njimtane wadehi wa wandu.”
Kudi wakada-ho mdeho iya, wakamwosha.
Nao kekihenda-henda, kawewona-se wana wa mka wawi, nyi Yakobo na Yohane, wai wana wa Sebedayo, wai ngalawenyi, na ndea-wo nyi aweipfuma mdeho iya yawo handu iwerandukie, kawalaha.
Nawo wakada-ho ngalawa iya, na ndeawo-da, wakamwosha.
Nao kawa moida-ida kulya Galilaya kose kelosha kulya sinagogenyi tsawo, na yonguo mbonyi tsa sia tsa wumangi, na ichiṟa orio ndaaṟe tsoose na wufari woose wui ipfo wandunyi.
Na kiṟumi kyake kikahenda dung'ana kulya Siria koose. Wakamwendie wandu waluo wose, walya wai warohie nyi ndaaṟe tsa orio mbaṟi kawachiṟa woose.
Kyasia wandu wakaduana nao mamwingi fung'anyi wawuka kulya Galilaya na Yudaya na kulya mataya Ya Yordanyi.
Kyasia nao ili alewona wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi, kado kundu ko fumvu-hu. Amiidima idamia, walya wa kiloshio kyake wakacha ihoṟoka handu ai.
Nao kairia ṟu kawalosha kahamba,
“Nanga iwo wai wakiwa kui mrima, cha kifa nyiwo wumangi wo ruwehu woiwa wowo.
Nanga iwo wawodo nyi fowa, cha kifa nyiwo wechika wawihiṟio moo.
Nanga iwo wai wahoo, cha kifa nyiwo wechikaa waku̱daae oruka luwawiie kyoṟa kyawo.
Nanga iwo wawodo nyi njaa na nyoda yelanga wusumhanyi, cha kipfa nyiwo wechika waihutso.
Nanga iwo wesaṟia, cha kipfa nyiwo weka wasaṟio.
Nanga iwo wai waharami kui mrima, cha kipfa nyiwo wechika wawone Ruwa.
Nanga iwo wechiitsa-pfo ofoṟo, cha kipfa nyiwo weka wasendo nyi wana wa Ruwa.
Nanga iwo wechiitso kiterengionyi kipfa kya wusumuhanyi, kyamba nyiwo wumangi wo Ruwa woiwa wowo.
Nanga nyo ili mochiwona wemruma na imwamtsia shiterengio na imdeda-deda orio kindo kiwicho kyoose kii kya wongo, indi kikawa kifa kyako inyi.
Kechihiyonyi mbekeseka, kipfa woṟunda wonu nyi wufoi kulya ruwehu, kifa na wudo waleweterengia waikimbi walya wa-wemsongoye.”
“Nyo nyi mui monyo fo wuyana, indi komkooya monyo fu-mporu, nyi wuda fochitanose monyo? Fuwode-se kindo fochiṟundapfo, shile nyi ikumbo na ichumo-chumo nyi wandu.
Nyo nyi mukeri sa ya wuyana, mri fumbike kundu ko fumvu-hu fochiwa iṟikishofo.
Ma kuipfo mndu echiatsa taa kaiwika shi-ya kisoṟopfo, indi nyi handu hehekia taa, nayo ikalimikia walya wai ipfo mmba woose.
Nyi wudo na sa yanu iwewaa oshangunyi lo wandu wose, wawuteho ikulesha mawuto hanu mecha, kundu wang'anyi she naho Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu.”
“Ma mlawone mochihamba ke kindo njicheye nyi ngaluko, ote; chi ngaluko njicheyepfo indi nyi yawutsia.
Kipfa nyi kya lohi ngambia, na kuwede kulya ruwehu kunyamaṟo na sanga, indi ipfo wuwawasonyi kochinyamaṟika-fo ma kichano kimu ma kimcharie kimupfo na shiwede shiinutsio shoose.
Kyasia-ng'u mawawaso-ho, ma iho matutu ya hoose ichu mopfuluo-ho ma limu kalosha ado wandu, nyi etano mtutu o woose o ipfo wumangi wo ruwehu.
Kipfa nyi ngamuwia, wusumuhanyi-wo wonu wukameda wulaida wo walosha wa wuwawaso na wo Wafarisayo-da, mochiwona wumangi wo Ruwa muide napfopfo!”
“Nyi muichi walya wa kacha nyi walewio, ma kulawahe, na orio mowaaha nyi mti, nyi mndu mohenda dao ko wachili wedumbuo kya wandu wanyamaṟie!
Indi inyi nyi ngambia, orio mndu ose moṟikia manomae nyashi mrimenyi nyi mndu mohenda dao ko wachili wedumbuo kya wandu wanyamaṟie!

Kyasia-ng'u ichu echiwia manomae, iyo nyi kichoi, mti, nyi mndu mohenda dao kulya ko wachili wanene wedumbuo kya wandu wanyamaṟie king'anyi. Na ichu echiwia manomae, nyi ui msese, mti; nyi mndu modao modonyi fo Gehena Kyasia-ng'u koshika yende kindo kyapfo kya odambiko na alya rasionyi ko Ruwa, kuiho kokumbuo manomayo awode mondu na iyo,
da-ho odambiko lulya lopfo oendie Ruwa, nokemmbooka ihenda-sanza na manomayo; numa njong'u udambike kindo kyafo!
Wa mndu moidikiana na mkituwa opfo owinyi ili mui kyaṟo-ki kya wanda-ii kundu nalache kudambikia mchili, na mchili nakudambikie watuuri nokumbo kipfungonyi.
Nkya lohi ngakuwia, ochikiwuka-se-hopfo, na itane otaa na njoko iya yemarisia.”
“Mmbeichi nyi kikihambe, ‘Ma kulaṟuhuye ma iṟuhuyo.’
Indi inyi nyi ngambia, ‘Orio mundu oose echiambuya mndu mka womlanga, nyi ama iruhuya nao mrimenyi.’
Indi iyo kowona ma riso lyafo lya kulyo lyechikuendie wusutsu, lituhuopfo, nolikumbe kuleshe, nanga ili odetsa kiwungo kyafo kimu, mbihu fopfo fukaashuka fulamkumbe Gehena.
Ma kokooya nyi kuwoko ko kulyo kuikuendie wusutsu, kudumbuo nokukumbe kuleshe; nanga iyo kodetsa kiwungo kyapfo kimu, mbihu fopfo fukaashuka fulamkumbe modonyi.”
“Na kingi-se nyi kiwei kihambe wai, ‘Mndu molekana na mka oke, namnenge baruo yemsama.’
Kyaindi inyi nyi ngambia ke, ‘Orio mndu molekana na mka oke kulawode kitewe kya isokombo, nyi amtana mokisokombo; na mndu kaalika ichu amde nyi aruhuya.’ ”
“Mbeichuo walya wa kacha nyi walewio, kulawone kochilya nyamu tsa wongo, indi kuwode kindo uteṟie Ruwa kui nyamu, wuta kudo tichi.
Kyaindi inyi nyi ngambia, ‘Ma mulalye nyamu ma nta muhambe, so ruwehu, kipfa nyipfo loṟika lo Ruwa lodamia.’
Ma so oruka, kipfa nyi kiteeyo kyehekia madende hake. Ma so Yerusalemu, kipfa nyi mṟi fo mangi ing'anyi.
Ma kulalye nyamu nohambe, so mdo foko, kipfa kulechiidima ihaluo ma ochui lumu luile ang'u luiwuo.
Indi kidedo kyanu kiwe nyi, ‘Ee, Ee,’ anu, ‘Ote, Ote!’ Kidie ikyo, nyi ko mbicho kicheye.”
“Muichi nyi ki-kihambe, ‘Riso litao na riso na heho litao na heho.’
Kyaindi inyi nyi ngambia, ma mularekiane na mndu ai mbicho! Kyaindi ichu echikukapa nguchu-yo ya kulyo, kewemhaluye iyo ya kumoso.
Na ichu akundi icha anduo na iyo kundu naduo nguwo yapfo, mdeye na iyo ya kawi.
Na ichu echikuitikia mchumie fo kenga kya saa, kuhendie nao saa yose!
Ichu mokuterewa, mnenge, na ichu mocha kuakuo, ma kulamkumbe mhongo!”
“Mbeichuo nyi kikihambe, ‘Kunda odoo, na mkituwa opfo msuo!’
Indi inyi nyi ngambia, Kekundenyi wakituwa wanu, na iwo wemterengia, kewaterewienyi!
Nanyo kundu mukuwie wana wa Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu, kipfa o nyi ekedosa mnengeṟi foke fukawaaya ichu mbicho na ichu mcha, na mvuo yake kaweolotsya ko ichu o wusumhanyi na ko ichu alai o wusumhanyi.
Kipfa kokooya mokunda walya wamkundi, na nyo nyi kiki mochiwona-ho kya woṟunda wonu? A wasanyi wa okamba cha wudo wekewuta?
Na wandu mochiiṟikiṟana nawo, kokooya nyi wanawamaanu tupu, kindo mowuta kya ngoseṟa nyi kiki? Ma wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu na wudo wekewuta!
Kyasia, wenyi wandu waholokie wucha, chando na Nde-anuo ipfo ruwehu aholokie wucha!”
“Kekuṟisenyi mulawone mochiwuta sha wusumuhanyi wonu oshangung'u lo wandu muwonyo nyiwo; mulakuṟise mudo, ma mochiwona-se kya woṟunda wonu ipfo ko Nde-anu o ruwehupfo!

Na iyo koshika ilekia shindo shapfo shesaṟia, ma kulakape ombe lukusongoye chando makulembetsere halya hekewuta wai ifo sinagogenyi ipfo kikumbuhananyonyi kya njia tsa mṟinyi nawo nyi kundu waṟumisho nyi wandu! Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wo walemmaa iduo kya woṟunda wowo!’
Kyaindi iyo koshika ilekia kindo kyesaṟia, ma kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso kulamanye ikyo ko kulyo kindo kukeri iwuta.
Kundu isho shapfo shesaṟia shiwe sha kiṟika; na Ndeo ichu echiwona kiṟikenyi nakutae amonyi.”

“Ma iterewa na wudo; ma mlawe cha makulembetseṟe halya! Wo nyi wakundi iterewa wahoṟoki ipfo sinagogenyi na alya kikumbuhananyo kya njia tsa mṟi kundu wakuloṟe na wandu. Nkyi lohi iki njiimbia wo walemmaa iduo kya woṟunda wowo!
Indi iyo koshika iterewa, ida na ipfo kiṟihenyi kyapfo kya kiidi uweshinga na mongo, notereweng'u Ndeo ui ipfo moowionyi; na Ndeo-chu echiwona na moowionyi na ekaa nakutae.
Ili mwiterewa, ma mulakape-kape ata kwi mbaṟi ya wahenu; kipfa nyi wakusaṟie kulako kindo wechiadanyio nyi maanuka yawo ya ata!
Ma mlafanane nawo! Kifa Ndeanu o ipfo ruwehu na aichi shilya muwuṟie ma ili mulamemterewa.
Indi terewenyi mule, ‘Nde-yadu ukeri ipfo ruwehu, Rina lyafo litano yele.
Wumangi wopfo wuche. Isho ukundi chando shekewutika kulya ruwehu, na kunu orukenyi shiwewa shido.
Kando kadu kalufoi uluinenge inu.
Uludeye sile tsa̱fo luwode, chaso luwedeya wasile wadu.
Ma ulaluduo kitewionyi indi ulukiṟe shindo shiwicho!
Kipfa komkoya nyo mokeho̱oria wandu, na Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu na echeemhoṟia nyo.
Indi nyo mkada mlahoṟia wandu shilya walemdekio, ma Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu echimhoo̱ṟia-nyofo.’ ”

“Nanyo mkashika ikuotoya, ma mulakufananyishe na makulembetseṟe-ho hekesuruwanyisha masineeri kipfa nyi wekeshimbiṟa shamu kundu wakuloṟe na wandu. Nyi kya lohi ngambia, wo walemmaa iduo kya woṟunda wowo.
Indi koshika ikuotoya, shia mdo-fo mafuda, na oshangu lopfo nowesanja!
Indi, ma kulakuloṟe na wandu ili ukuotoye shile na ko Ndeo o kiṟikenyi na Ndeo-chu echiwona sha kiṟika na ekaa nakutae.”
“Ma mulakusuṟumie shisa shanu kunu wuyana kundu mui handu kiwiro na ngama shechinyamaṟa kuwewode na manyinyi heiwa.
Kyaindi surumenyi shisa shanu kulya ruwehu kundu kulawode shiwiro ma ngama, ma manyinyi halechiidima iiwa.
Kundu handu uṟikie kisa kyapfo, na mrima fuwekaa-ho.”
“Kiinengie mbihu sa nyi riso; na riso komkoya nyi licha, na mbihu fose nyi fochiwa sa.
Kyaindi komkooya riso liiwicho, mbihu da na fochiwada meema foose. Kyasia na sai ii na iyo kommbona yamhaluka meema, apa ṟimbaha lya ime̱ma lilemie.”

“Kwipfo mndu echi̱idima ifuṟukanya wanene wawipfo; kipfa kumu nyi echisuo ulya umu, nakunde ulya o kawi; ang'u nahalukie ichu, nainyale ulya ungi. Ma mochiidima isanza mupfuṟukanye Ruwa hamu na Mamonapfo.”

“Kyasia, kyamba nyi wudo na inyi nyi ngambia, ‘Ma mulawado nyi makusaṟo kya moo yanu kya kindo mochilya, anu kya mbihu yanu kindo mochiṟaa Aka moo chi fung'anyi fukaida kando; na mbihu cha fuweidie nguwo?
Keṟisenyi ma shilehe sha ruwehu shilekekumba mbeu ma isanya shikumbinyi indi nyi Nde-anu ipfo ruwehu ekeshiinenga shelya; aka nyo chi mushing'anyie.
Ale? Kunu konu nyiu aipfo echidima yengeṟa wuku woke wuengeṟeke handu ha oweṟe lo mkonu fumu ma ikusaṟa ikyo?’
A nguwo tseraa nyi kiili muwodo mudo nyi makusaṟo kyatso? Kyeṟisenyi ipfo shiwaṟonyi sha mbaṟi tsoose sha manjawuhenyi; shekewina na iyoka nguwofo.
Indi nyi ngambia ke, ma Solomon na wusuṟi woke woose awemṟike chasho ma kimu-hopfo!
Kyasia, komkooya ma̱ra ha njawuhenyi hakeri-ho inu na ngama hakahenda ikoṟio mawiwenyi, komkooya Ruwa nyi ahachopie ado, aka nyo mui mudo na kiidikio kitutu, kyanu chi kikiengere?
Ori muwado nyi makusaṟo muhambe, a kindo lochikulia ang'u kindo lochikunyooya nyi kiki; ma kya mbihu yanu kindo mochikuṟaaya.
Kifa isho shoose nyi wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wekeshilalakia; indi Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu na aichi ke nyi kimuwaṟi ishiwona.
Kyaindi songuonyi ilalakia wumangi wo Ruwa na wusumuhanyi wowo, na shingi nyi mochiinengo cha shannga.
Kyasia, ma mulawado nyi makusaṟo ha kya ngama, kipfa ngama nyi yesaṟa kyayo injenyi Orio mkonu nyi fui na kyafo nahong'u.”
“Ma muladumbuo kyewonya mndu owingo muwone na kyanu kyedumbuo kido; kifa mdumbuye fulya modumbuo, na kyanu na wudo kyechudumbuo!
Na wudo kiheo kilya moheshia wengi, na wudo na kyanu.
Aiyo, nki ili okeambuya kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo na iyo kulawonyi mriti risonyi lyapfo iyo?
Anu nyi wuda ochi̱idima iwia manomayo, keleka njikueke iwuta kinana risonyi lyafo, ate na iyo aifo mriti risonyi lyapfo?
Lyo mkulembetseṟi, kemesonguo ikuwuta mriti risonyi lyafo nomanyeng'u yambuo nowute kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo!
Ikyo kii-kyele ma mlakumbie makite, na mṟao fonu fo kiweṟe ma mlakumbie nguwe fuchumo-chumo nyi madende hatso numa tsifurumie ihaluka tsimtufuo-tufuo.”
“Keterewenyi, nyi mochiinengo kepfulenyi nyi mochiwona, hekapekapenyi mongo nyi mochifunguyo.
Kifa moterewa nyi einengo, na mopfula kawewona, na mokapakapa mongo kawepfunguyo.
Ang'u kunu kidi kyanu nyiu aipfo mana kamterewa kando nao namnenge iho?
Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, namnenge njoka?
Kyasia nyo mui wawicho kokooya na mochiidima iinenga shiwana shanu shiinengo shicha, aka-wo Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu chi echiengeṟa imwinenga shicha ili momterewa?
Kyasia orio kindo kyoose chando mukundi muwutio nyi wandu, nanyo kewewutienyi mudo, cha kifa nyiho mapfundo ha wuwawaso na waikimbi.”
“Keidenyi alya kichuminyi ki kisise, kifa nyi kuipfo kichumi kikualiye na njia yakyo njilandari, kitsitsionyi kyayo nyi kidekionyi, na weida napfo nyi wafoi.
Na wudo kuipfo kichumi kya kiṟoṟowo na njia nyi njisise, nayo nyi yekooya moonyi na wandu wechiiwona nyi-sa waangu.”
“Kekuṟisenyi na waikimbi wa wongo weecha na konu waṟee makata ha machoondi indi ipfo kidi nyi wai mashite ha ngeṟenyi malang'a.
Nyi mkao yawo mochiwamanya nayo, Alae na ochi̱idimma ihaa ndunda tsa msabibu oshehu, na nduonyi na ochidima ihaa ho makuyu heloda?
Nyi wudo mdi mcha nyi fechikumbia ndunda njicha, na mdi mbicho fukawekumbia ndunda njiwicho.
Ma kuifo ikidi licha lyechiidima ikumbia ndunda njiwichopfo, ma ikidi lyiwicho lyechiidima ikumbia ndunda njichapfo.
Orio ikidi lyoose lyada lilakumbia ndunda njicha, nyi lyechimanyo na ihenda ikumbo modonyi.
Kyasia nyi wudo kii, nyi mawuto hawo mochiwamanya naho.”
“Ma chi orio mndu ose monjiwia, ‘Mndumii Mndumii echiida wumanginyi wo Ruwapfo, shile nyi ichu mowuta shichihianyi na Wande o ifo ruwehu!’

Kipfa mfiri fulya nyi kochikaapfo wafoi wenjiwesa wehamba, ‘A Mndumii, Mndumii, chi lulehamba shisuku kui rina lyafo, na rina lyafo lukawefuna nalyo waṟufu wawicho, na rina lyafo lukavetana nalyo maṟunda manene?’
Indi inyi nyi njechiwawia na pata njihambe, ‘Njilememmanye-nyofo, kenyiwukenyi mui wandu muwutie sha mkika!’ ”
“Kyasia, mndu akeri-pfo ma o ku ma o ku, ichu echiadanya madedo hako na ihawuta kawehawuta, nyi afananyi na mndu awode wuṟango wucha alewika mba yake kundu kukualie iho.
Naho mwuo ikaoloka, mamṟinga hakasoka, njotanu tsikakuma tsikakapa mba iya ilaho, kipfa lyandi iwenjiilike handu hakualye iho.
Kyasia na ichu aipfo ma o ku ma o ku moadanya madedo hako kada alahawuta, nyi afananyi na mndu tondo alewika mba yake ko teri ya kimamile.
Naho mvuo ikacha, mamṟinga hakasoka, na njotanu tsikakuma tsikakapa mba iya, nayo ikawunduka wundu, na mbundukie foyo fukawa fo kiṟiha.”
Yesu ammaa ideda madedo-ha, mamwingi fulya fo wandu fuwekeri-ho fukawuko nyi madima kifa kya mloshie fulya foke, chando aweilosha.
Kikawa cha mndu awode pfinya, kilawe cha kya walosha wa wuwawaso.
Kyasia kekisoka kulya fumvuhu wandu wakaduana nao mamingi sa fufoi.
Naho adi a ulya mndu awodo nyi saka amcha naho kamolokya ndenyi kambia, “Mndumii kokukundya na ochiidima inyiheṟemtsa!”
Naho Yesu kahoṟwo owoko kampaya, kahamba, “Na ngakunda keheṟemka!” Naalyo li yenyi kaheṟemka saka iya imbode.
Yesu kambia, “Ambuya, kulawie ma mndu ma kindo! Kya indi uhende ikuloṟa alya ko mkohanyi nowewika na mwano chando Mose awawasye kiwe kiṟingishyo kyawo.”
Kyasia amiida na kulya Kapernaumu, kukacha napfo mchili mnene o siṟi ya wasikari ihana.
Kamfuhya wukiwa kehamba, “Hoi Mndumii, msoṟo oko alee kulya kanyi atiliwanyi shiwungo-sho aiwawyo mnu iki kiwicho-wicho.”
Nao kambia, “Leka njiche njimchiṟe!”
Mchili ulya kamhaluo kambia, “Alewo Mndumii! Njii o wusumuhanyi notane oida ipfo shia mhamba ya kai lyakofo. Kya indi kuhambie-ho idedo tupu, na msoṟo cho oko nechichia!

Kipfa na inyi nyi nji mndu nji mwitoṟye nyi wuchili, indi na inyi na njiwode wasikari wai shi-ako. Na inyi njechiwia-ho ichu, ‘Henda!’ Nao kahenda. Ngawia ichu ungi, ‘Kenjo!’ Nao kacha. Ngawia na isinga lyako, ‘Henda wuta wuliwe!’ Nao kawewuta!”
Yesu amiicho a̱do kaṟihio, kawia walya ahendesanyi nawo, “Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Ma kunu ko Waisraeli ndemewone iidikya linanyi lidipfo.’ Kya indi inyi ngambia,
‘Kukae kuche napfo wafoi wawuka kya kulya ora lo ngamenyi na kya kulya ora lo kyukanyi, wache damya kiliyonyi kya choonga na Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa.
Kya indi wana wa wumangi wedao nja wahende kumbo kulya memenyi fo kulya nja. Napfo kukae pfo ilia na iimadya ngamru.’ ”
Na Yesu kawia mchili ulya, “Kuhendye na chando oveidikya na wudo ochiwona!” Na msoro ulya oke kachia saa na iya.
Kyasia Yesu amcha na ipfo mba ko Petro kawona mamka oke amlaṟe awodo nyi modo.
Nao kambada owoko, modo fukambuka. Kakure alyando avei mlaṟe, kawafurukanya.
Kyasia komshika ili kyukanyi wakamendye wafoi wawodo nyi mṟufu mbicho. Nao kafuna mṟufu mbicho na kidedo kya dumbu lyake. Na walya waiwawyo kawewakiṟa wose.
Nyi kundu kishike kilya kiwei kidede nyi mwikimbi Yesaya kahamba, “Nyio aleduo wunyonge wodu, kawekudika na mawawyo hadu.”
Kyasia Yesu amewona wandu wache ikuwumbia nao mamwingi sa fung'anyi kawawasa wakiloshyonyi kyake wahende ambadya kya kulya ora lo kawi lo ipalipali.
Naho kukacha nafo mlosha o mawawaso umu kambia, “Marya, njeoshana na iyo kundu omekuhendya kose!”
Na Yesu kambia, “Mapaara nyi hawode mruma na shilehe sha ruwehu shikawewada sungu tsasho, kya indi Manomndu awode ma handu heonyonyia-pfo.”
Kyasia mndu o kiloshyo ungi kacha imbia, “Mndumii, kennenga momu fokuhendya iṟika mnying'a fo wande!”
Nao kambia, “Nde nooshane na inyi node wapfu wakuṟikye wapfu wawo.”
Kyasia amiidima idoya alya ngalawehu, wa kiloshyonyi kyake waka-mosha-pfo.
Naho wadi ailu owira sa lwapfinya lukaida kulya ipalipalihu na ngalawa iya ikatana yashikyo nyi masinanu halya. Nao alee mado.
Nawo wakacha horoka oo handu ai wakahamba, “Keluletse-wo hoi Mndumii, nyarisika lui!”
Nao kawawia, “Nyi kili mui mudi waowu mui wandu wa idikya lyitutu?” Naho kakure katukya otanu na ipalipali kukahutsa olele wyaa.
Wandu walya wakaṟihio wakahamba, “Nyi mndu ada ichu, otanu na ipalipali shikatana shamidikya?”

Kyasia amambadya kulya mataya kulya orukenyi lo Wagadara kawona wandu wawi wawodo nyi mṟufu mbicho wecha imkumbuhana wawuka mbangenyi kundu wapfu weṟiko wai walang'a mnu, ma mndu nalakarie iida na njia iya.
Naho wakakalahatsa wakahamba, “Nyi kiki kyadu na iyo Mana o Ruwa? A nyi ucheye naho kiheri kyandu kilamshika kyehenda tuuro?”
Kyasia kukeri-fo poo lya nguwe sa tsifoi tsikeri kuleshe na kundu wakeri tsechilya mara.
Kyasia mṟufu iya mbicho ikamterewa-terewa ikahamba, “Kolufuna uludume-wo luhende lukwidye ipfo kiidi kya poo lyo lya nguwe!”

Nao kawawia, “Kuhendyenyi!” Naho kudi mṟufu iya ikawuka-fo, ikahenda ikaida kiidi kya poo lilya lya nguwe. Oweṟe cha ili, aili poo lyapufukaho pufu lyose likasoka na msaṟi fulya likakwolotsa kulya ipalipalinyi likapfa kulya mṟingenyi.
Kyasia walisi walya wakadicha, wakahenda kulya mṟinyi, wakaongwo-pfo mbonyi tsilya tsose, na tsa wandu wawodo nyi mṟufu mbicho.
Naho kudi awalya wandu wakakure mṟi fulya fose, wakahenda kumbuhana Yesu. Wamembona wakamterewa nawuke kulya mṟasenyi kowo.
Naho kadoya alya ngalawenyi kaambada kacha na mrinyi koke.
Nao keambuya wakacha meendye mndu a muumu shiwungo a mlaṟe kitaṟenyi Na Yesu ambona kiidikyo kyawo kawia mndu ulya a muumu shiwungo, “Kewuyo nyi moo mana oko, madeko hapfo nyi hamewuto-ho.”
Naho kudi walosha wa wuwawaso walya maata wakadeda na mrima yawo wehamba, “Ichu nyi aruma Ruwa!”
Naho ili Yesu kewona mahio hawo kawawia, “Nyi kyaki muihia kiwicho mrimenyi konu?
Kipfa iki kii kyangu ihamba nyi kihya, ngesa nyi ihamba, ‘Madeko hapfo hamewuto-ho,’ anu nyi ihamba, ‘Kure uhende?’
Kya indi kundu muidime imanya kee Mana o mndu nyi awode pfinya kunu orukenyi yehooṟia madeko.” Amshika iya kawia ulya muumu shiwungo, “Kekure-ng'u uire kitaṟa kyapfo nohende kanyi kopfo!”
Nao kahoṟoka chimu, kahenda kulya mba koke.
Kyasia wandu walya wakeri-ho mamwingi wamewona wado wakaowuo wakang'anyisha Ruwa ainengye wandu pfinya ing'anyi ido.
Kyasia Yesu amewuka alya kaida mbele kawona mndu adamye alya kisanyonyi kya okamba, ewio nyi Matayo. Nao kambia, “Kenjo nooshane na inyi!” Nao kakure kahenda oshana nao.
Kikashika ili adamie kelya shelya ipfo mba, adi a iwa wasanyi wa okamba sa wafoi na wandu wanyamaṟi wakacha napfo wakadamya na Yesu na wa-kiloshyonyi kyake alya kilionyi kya shelya.
Naho Wafarisayo wamewona wado wakacha iwia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “A nyi kili mlosha onu alya shelya na wesana okamba na wetehya?”
Kyasia ameicho wededa wado, nao kahamba, “Iwo wai wecha chiwo wawode weshiha mhangapfo, chila na iwo waluo.
Kekumbuonyi mutawuke imanya nyi kiki iki kii kihambe, Kindo njikundi nyi isaṟya ma chi idasapfo. Kipfa wandu njicheye ilaha ma chi iwo wa wusumuhanyipfo, chila na wandu wanyamaṟye.”
Nalyo wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wakacha na handu ai wakahamba, “Nkyili so lochekekwotoya na Wafarisayo, kya indi wa kiloshyonyi kyafo wakada walakwotoya?”
Na Yesu kawawia, “A wandu wa walinyi waidime iwado nyi fowa ili menyi-wali akeri nawo? Na kukae kushike mafiri iliindi menyi wali echiondwo kowo, nyilyo wechikwotoya.
Ma kuwode mndu echipfumya kidami kya nguwo njihya nakisanze na nguwo ya kachapfo, kipfa kilya kihya kyewuta-ho ikyo kiku na handu harandukye hakaengeṟa ing'ana.

Ma kwipfo mndu echiwika mvinyo fo kipfuo selelenyi njikupfo, kipfa kokoya awika-pfo selela-tso nyi tsechidwika na mvinyo fukapusukya wanda na selelatso tsikanyamaṟika. Indi mvinyo mhya nyi wefuletsya selelenyi njihya nasho shikakia shi shiwi.”
Ili kewawia ado adi aichu mndu o wuitoṟi kacha naho kamolokya ndenyi kahamba, “Mana oko o waka wulalu anenuka. Indi ukucheye-wo nomhekye owoko lopfo naho nyi echiwada moo!”
Na Yesu kakure-ho wakaduana nao na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
Naho adi a ichu mka aluo iwuka samu kusiie-ho maaka ikumi na iwi, kimatsika amewoko. Kacha kya numa kapaya mambo ya nguwo yake.
Nyi ili alehia mrimenyi foke kahamba, “Ma ngapaya nguwo yake tupu na njechichia!”
Kyasia Yesu kaindukya numa kambia, “Kewuyo nyi moo manoko, kidikyo kyapfo kyamekukiṟa.” Naho mka ulya kachia kiwokya saa na iya.
Naho Yesu amshika kulya mmba ko mchili ulya amewona-pfo na walya wekapa mtoṟiṟo na mamingi fo wandu fofahya, kahamba, “Kekurenyi-ho, mana chu o waka ma chi apfiepfo, nyi alee mado.”
Nawo wakamseka.
Kyasia wandu walya wamidima ifuno, kaida na mba kambada owoko. Naho mana ulya o waka kahoṟoka.
Na mbonyi tsilya tsikahenda dung'ana kulya orukenyi kose.
Kyasia Yesu ambuka alya naho wandu wawi wakacha numa yake, wai wapfu meso, wakairya ṟu wakahamba, “Kelusaṟye-wo wukiwa wodu iyo Mana o Dawidi!”
Kyasia amiida na mba walya wapfu meso wakacha na handu ai. Na Yesu kawawia, “Na muweidikye ke na njechiidima iwuta iki?” Wakambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii!”
Nalyo kapaya meso hawo kahamba, “Kiidikyo kyanu chando mwidikye na wudo mochiwona!”
Meso hawo hakatambaṟuka. Na Yesu kawakekedya kahamba, “Ambuyenyi ma kulakae ma mndu echimanya ma umu!”
Kyasia nawo wakawuka-pfo wakahenda mduo ṟamba kulya orukenyi koose.
Kyasia walya wechihenda kudi wakamendye mndu ai pipi awodo nyi mṟufu mbicho.
Naho mṟufu fulya mbicho fomefuno, ulya ai pipi kawuya ideda. Na wandu walya wakeri-ho mwamwingi wakaṟihio wakahamba, “Kunu kidi kya Israeli kulemewoneke kindo kidopfo.”
Kya indi Wafarisayo wakahamba, “Nyi mnene o mṟufu mbicho nyio awa mofuna nao mṟufu mbicho.”
Na Yesu kawa motengetatengeta kelosha kulya sinagogenyi tsawo kyechionguo mbonyi tsa sia tsa wumangi wo Ruwa kekiṟa na orio ndaṟe yose na wunyonge wose.
Kya indi ili kewona wandu walya mamwingi nao kawalilia makulili nyi ili wai warohye wai wahutse wanda cha machondi halawode mlisi.
Nalyo kawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Shesambuo nyi shifoi indi weṟunda wakanyia-ho,
Keterewenying'u Mndumii o kisanyionyi nadume waṟundi wafoi alya kisanyionyi kyake.”
Naho kalaha wa kiloshiyonyi walya ikumi na wawi kawainengya pfinya yeng'anya mrufu mbicho kundu wechiifuna na ikiṟa ndaṟe tsose na wunyonge wose.
Na wasu walya marina hawo nyiho iha, o kuwoka nyi Simon ewio nyi Petro na Andrea manomae, na Yakobo ai mana o Sebedayo, na Yohane ai manomae.
Filipo na Bartolomayo, Toma na Matayo ichu awei msanyi o okamba, Yakobo ai mana o Alifayo na Lebayo,
Simon o kulya ya Kana na Yuda Iskariote nyio ichu alemṟingya.
Iwa ikumi na wawi nyiwo Yesu alewaduma kawawawasa kahamba, “Manya mlahende ko wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu, ma mrinyi ko Wasamaria mlaide napfo.
Indi mwengeṟe ihendya machondi hadekye ha mba ya Israeli.
Kya indi ili muihenda keongwonyi muhambe, ‘Dumbuyenyi kyamba wumangi wo ruwehu womeafukya kufui!’
Kiṟenyi iwo waluo, ṟutsenyi iwo wapfu, heṟemtsenyi iwo wawodo nyi iwawe, funenyi mṟufu mbicho. Nyi mleambya kya wulya, keveinengyenyi kya wulya.
Ma mlakuwonye sahabu na shilingi ma pesa sheṟika ipfo kikuchunyi kya ngowa mukupfungye natso.
Ma kichoṟe kya kyaṟo ma kanzu tsiwi ma shadu ma kidi kechumia. Kipfa moṟunda nyi asumuhanye na shelya shake.
Kya indi mṟinyi ko wandu wafoi kundu momeida napfo mṟinyi ko wandu watutu ketumenyipfo mndu akeri-ho asumuhanyi Napfondo mochikukaya mtane mokure muhende kungi.
Indi mukaanga mba ya mndu keiṟikiṟenyi!
Na mba-yo kokoya nyi isumuhanyi na ofoṟo lonu luisokye huye yayo. Kya indi ikada ilasumuhana na ofoṟo lo luwembuuya nyo.
Na mndu alamondwo na kanyi koke alaadanye ma madedo hanu, nanyo mkashika wuka kulya mba ang'u mṟinyi kekutekutenyi madende kiluli-kyo kiwuke-pfo.
Na kya lohi ngambia, kilya kya oruka lo Sodoma na Gomora nyi kyechyiangwo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kya mṟifo.”
“Ambuyenyi inyi njiimduma cha machondi hai kiidi kya makite ha ngeṟenyi Kyasia-ng'u kekaenyiho mui na wuṟango cha njoka mlai na mtambo mui cha mbeta.
Kya indi kuṟisenyi na wandu Kipfa nyi wechihenda mduo kulya mba wededya shama shawo na kulya sinagogenyi tsawo wawemkapa na ngowa-tso tsii njitochye msha.
Na oshangunyi lo wachili na wamangi muwedao kipfa kyako, kiwe nyi kya kiṟingishyo kyawo na wa mbaṟi njihenu.
Indi mkamkoya wehenda mdambika wado, nanyo ma mlawado nyi makusaṟo chando mochideda-ho ke nyi wuda anu ke nyiki, cha kifa saa iya nyi mochinengyo ishi shehamba-ho.
Nyi ili wededa-ho chi nyofo, nyi Mumuyo o Ndeyanu ededa ai nanyo.
Kya indi kukae manomae o wandu nadambike manomae kya opfu na ndee o mndu nawedambika mana, na wana wa wandu waamkye iwo wawafeye na ihenda iwashihiya ofu!
Nanyo muwe nyi mochisukya wandu wose kipfa kya rina lyako. Kya indi ichu mokarishya-ho kaweda kushike ili masiyonyi echikiṟo.
Kya indi mkamkoya wemterengya kunu mṟinyi ifu kedichyenyi fulya fungi. Kifa nyi kya lohi ngambia ma mochimaa mamṟi ha Israeli Manomndu alachapfo.
Molosho neida moloshapfo, ma isinga lyekaa huye ya Mndumii olyopfo.
Nyi kyashika molosho ili awa cha mlosha oke, na isinga ili lyawa cha mndumii olyo. Wamtana wamlaha menyi nyi Belsebuli, a wana wa kanyi koke kyawo chi kya wue̱ra?”
“Kyasiang'u manya mulawone mochiwaowuo. Kipfa kwipfo kindo kii kipfinyike kide kilapfunuka numapfo, ma kindo kii kiṟike kide kilapfunuka numapfo, ma kindo kii kirike kide kilamanyikapfo.
Iki ngambia meemenyi kekihambenyi senyi na kindo moicho mowewedyo madunyi kekyongwonyi na pata.
Nanyo ma mlaowuo walya wewaha mbihu kya indi mrima-fo walaidime ifuwaha. Keengeṟenyi yowuo ichu moidima idetsa na mrima na mbihu handu hamu ii iwi idekye kulya Gehena.
A njoṟiwu tsiwi chi tsekekumbo senti imu? Natso ma imu-ho yemanya iho wanda kulawode Ndeyanu akundipfo.
Ma njui tsa kunu mdonyi konu na tsiwenjiitale tsose.
Kyasia-ng'u ma mlaowuo, na nyo chi mung'anyi kota njoṟiwu ma tsikafo chi muweng'anyi nyo?”
“Nahonu orio mndu ose ichu echinjihamba oshangunyi lo wandu, na inyi mbemhamba oshangunyi lo Wande o ipfo ruvehu.
Kya indi orio mndu ose ichu echinjikana oshangunyi lo wandu, na inyi mbemkana oshangungi lo Wande o ipfo ruwehu.”
“Ma mlawone mochihamba kindo njicheye iwika kunu masangenyi nyi ofoṟo. Chi ofoṟo njicheye yende napfopfo, nyi oshu.
Nyi njicheye njiletsane mndu na ndee, na mana o waka na mae, na mali o mana na mamii oke.
Na wakituwa wa mndu kiwe nyiwo wana wa kanyi koke.
Ulya akundi ndee ang'u mae kawakunda kota inyi, nanjiwaṟi-pfo. Na ulya akundi mana o womi anu o waka kawakunda kota inyi nanjiwaṟipfo.
Na mndu ada alakudika msalaba foke na icha oshana na inyi kunu numaako nanjiwaṟipfo.
Na mndu mowona moo foke nyi echiwuya ifudetsa; na mndu modetsa moo foke kikawa nyi kipfa kyako inyi nyi echiwuya ifuwona.”
“Mndu echimuambya ipfo kanyi koke nyi inyi anjiambya. Na monjijambya inyi nyi aambya ichu anjidumye.

Mndu echambya mwikimbi kikawa nyi kya rina lya mwikimbi, nyi echiwona kya woṟunda wo waikimbi. Na ichu echiambya mndu o wusumuhanyi, kikawa nyi kya rina lya mndu o wusumuhanyi nyi ewona kya woṟunda wo mndu o wusumuhanyi.

Na ichu echirutsa iwa watutu ya wose ma umu-ho kamrutsa na mṟinga mcheleri na kirahu kimu, kikawa nyi kya rina lya mndu o kiloshyonyi na kya lohi ngambia mndu-cho kyake kya woṟunda ma kyekaa kidekesepfo.”
Naho kikashika Yesu amidima iwawasa walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake ikumi na wawi, nao kakure kulya kundo akeri kahenda losha na yonguo kulya mamṟinyi hawo.
Kyasia Yohane nyi kulya kipfungonyi avekeri kaicho mawuto ha Kristo, kamdumya wa kiloshyo kyake kambia,
“Nyio iyo ichu a mhambe nekaa nache ang'u luwedye ungi?”
Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Hendenyi mushitsye Yohane mbonyi tso moicho na iwona.
Wapfu meso a-iwang'u waiwona, na shiricheche aiwa waihenda. Na waluo saka waiheremka, wapfu madu a iwa waicho, na wapfu nyi waṟuka, na wakiwa a iwa waiongoyo mbonyi tsa sia.
Nanga ulya alesukyo nyi inyi.”
Kyasia walya wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wahenda Yesu kawoka iwia wandu walya mamwingi mbonyi tsa Yohane kahamba, “A nyi kiki mulehenda ambuya kulya nuka? Ngesa nyi iṟeṟe lisingitso-singitso nyi otanu?
A nyi kiki mlehenda ambuyawo? Ngesa nyi mndu aṟee nguwo tsa kimamile? Walya waṟee nguwo tsa kimamile a walya wai mbenyi tsa wamangi.
A kilawe nyi kiki kilemnenga ihenda-pfo? Nyi kundu mochiwona mwikimbi ngesa? Ee ngambia na kota mwikimbi.
Kifa nyio amṟehye kyehamba kyake, ‘Ambuya na njekaa njidume msu oko mosonguo oshangu lopfo nao nakweke achikya njia yapfo ipfo mbele yapfo.’
Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Kiidi kya iwa wa wafee nyi mka kulemekure mndu ang'anyiye Yohane Mpatisipfo. Indi ichu a mtutu o wose ipfo wumangi wo Ruwa nyi ang'anyi kota o.
Kiwokya mafiri halya ha Yohane Mpatisi koshika wulalu wumangi wo ruvehu nyi wokewado na pfinya, na waafinya nyiwo wewurakwo-ho.
Kipfa waikimbi wose nyi walehamba shisuku na wuwawaso, nawo wakashika Yohane.
Na kokoya nyi mochikunda iidikya, o nyiong'u Elia ichu a mhambe nache.
Mndu awode madu headanya naweadanya.’
‘A nyi mfanano fo iki njewika mbaṟi i ya wandu?’ Nyi wafanana na shiwana shidamye tumo shechilaha wodoyawo shikahamba,
‘A ili lowemkapya mtoṟiṟo, nanyo ma mlashine. Nyi lomekapa shilio, nanyo ma mlafuhe?’
Nyi kulecha napfo Yohane mpatisi, ai mndu alelya, ma inyo, nawo wakahamba, ‘Nyi awodo nji mṟufu mbicho.’

Kukakaa kukacha napfo Mano-mndu, ai mndu echilya, na inyo, nawo wakahamba, ‘A ichu ai makilya na makinyo mvinyo, nyi mbuya ya wesana okamba na wenyamaṟa.’ Na wuṟango wo Ruwa wukaṟingishyo ilyi wuiṟunda.”
Nalyo Yesu kawooka dedya mamṟi halya kundo kuwutikye shilya shake awutye sha kiṟiha shifoi kipfa lyandi walaledumbuya kahamba,

“Ochia lopfo iyo Korasinyi ochia lopfo iyo Betisaida! Nokoe nyi kulya Tiro na Sidon kulewutika shindo sha kiṟiha cha isho shiwutikye kunu kiidi kyanu nawo nyi wawechidumbuya wunyamaṟi wowo lya kacha wakuṟaaye na shisaṟa sha wukiwa na ifu iloṟa idumbuya.
Kya indi nyi ngambia, kilya kya Tiro na Sidon nyi kyechianguo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kyanu.

Na iyo Kapernaumu, chi kuwemdosye kokoya ruvehu? Nyi ochikaa noolotso ushike Gehena. Kipfa kulya Sodoma nokoye nyi kulewutika-ho shindo sha kiṟiha cha isho shiwutikye kidi kyapfo, na mṟi fulya nokoe fuledeo-pfo fushike mfiri fo inu.
Nahonu ngamuwia, Kilya kya Sodoma nyi kyechianguo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kyapfo iyo.”
Kyasia mandi na halya Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Ngakuana, hoi Wande, kui mnene o ruwehu na oruka, kipfa ili mbonyi tsi utsiṟikye iwo waṟango na iwo waamtsu kowuya idambuya shikoku.
Na wudo kikeri-wo, hoi Wande, nyi kipfa kiwekuchihie kihende kido.
Shindo shose njiledambikyo nyi Wande. Ma kuipfo aichi Manapfo chila na Wande, ma kuipfo aichi Wandepfo chila na Mana na ichu Mana echikunda imdambuya.
Kekucheenyi na koko nyo, mukeri iwina muwei walemye nyi maṟio malemeri; na inyi njimuwihiṟye moo.
Kekudikenyi ngada njioke nyi inyi muche kuloshyo nyi inyi! Kyamba inyi nyi mhoo njikeri na mokunyinyiṟa kui mrima. Naho mochiwona koonyonya ko mrima yanu.
Nyi ili ngada njioke nyi inyi nyi nyioloṟu na iṟio lyako likaanguo.”
Mandi halya Yesu aleida kidi kya mdemi ya ngano ili mfiri fo Sabato. Kyasia walya wa kiloshyo wawodo nyi njaa naho wakawoka itowa mahaa wakalya.
Kyasia Wafarisayo wamewona wado wakacha imbia, “Ambuya wa kiloshyon kyapfo nyi wawuta kindo kilakiwikye momu kiwuto ili mkonu fo Sabato.”
Nao kawawia, “Nyimlasomye kilya Dawidi alewuta lyandi wawodo nyi njaa na walya wavekeri nao?
Chando aleida na mba ya Ruwa wakalya mkate iya yeṟihichya oshangunyi lo Ruwa, ilanjiwikye momu ilio ma nyio ma walya wakeri nao chila na wakohanyi wawenyi.
Ag'nu nyi mulasomye ipfo mawawasonyi, kya wakohanyi ke nyi vekewichuṟa mfiri fo Sabato nawo ma walawute-ho owingo?
Kya indi ngambia, ‘Ke iya na hawode ang'anyie hekalu.’
Kya indi kidedo kilya kyehamba ke, ‘Kindo njikundi nyi isaṟya, ma chi idasa.’ Nokoe muwekiichi ke nyiki, ma iwa walanyamaṟye kindo muwechiwahutsya owingofo.
Cha kifa Mana o mndu nyi akeri mnene na o Sabato.”
Naho kakure alyando awekeri kahenda-henda kashika ipfo sinagogenyi yawo. Naho adi aichu mndu akeri-fo o owoko luumu.
Nawo wakambesa wakahamba, “Nawo kiwesumuhanyi ikiṟa mndu ili mfiri fo Sabato ngesa?” Nawo nyi kundu wawone mwaanya fo mkumba.
Nao kawawia, “Kunu konu nyi o ku awode ichondi lyake limu. Kakoya liolokye ṟungunyi ili mfiri fo Sabato. Nao nade alacha iliwada na ilidosapfo?
Ashika-ng'u-wo mndu kyake mwidime ihamba nyi aidye ichondi kashika hanga? Kyasia kyamba nyi wudo ki na kiwesumhanyi iwuta sha wuoloṟu ili lya Sabato.”
Nalyo kawia mndu ulya, “Kehoṟuo owoko lofo!” Nao kaluhoṟuo lukawuya ichia lukawa cha lulya lungi.
Kyasia Wafarisayo wakahenda nja wakamdedya kyama kundu wambahe.
Yesu kekimanya, kakure-pfo kahenda kuleshe. Wandu wakaduana nao mamwingi sa funganyi Nao kawakiṟa wose.
Nao kawakekedya walahende imduo ṟamba.
Nyi kundu kushike kii kidede nyi mwikimbi Yesaya kehamba:
“A ichu msoṟo oko ndesambuṟa, a mkunde nyi inyi, ichu mrima foko fu mchihie nyio. Njechimbikya Mumuyo oko nakae huye yake nao nahende ongoya wandu wa masangenyi mbonyi tsa wusumuhanyi.
Echiloya ma ifahyafo. Ma kochikaapfo mndu echiicho ru̱ lyake kulya njienyi tsekyama mṟinyipfo.
Iṟeṟe likonoki echilifunjafo, ma orusu lo taa lui kenga echilurumishafo. Na natane aduo mbonyi tsa wusumuhanyi tsido-ho tsiwinshye.
Na rina lyake nyi lyo wandu wa masanga wawekusihya nalyo.”
Naho kaendyo mndu awodo nyi mṟufu mbicho a mpfu meso kavewa na pipi. Nao kamkiṟa. Ulya ai pipi kaidima ideda na yambuo.
Wandu walya wawekeri-fo mamwingi wakauma mkahai wakahamba, “Alae ichu chio mana o Dawidi?”
Kyasia Wafarisayo wamicho kihambo kido wakahamba, “Ichu nyi aifuna mṟufu mbicho kui pfinya ya Belsebuli ichu ai mnene o mṟufu mbicho.”
Kyasia Yesu amemanya mahio halya hawo kawawia, “Orio oruka lose ilu lulekanyi wenyi na wenyi nyi lochihaluka mrapu.
Na kokoya Satan kefuna Satan chi awa nyi alekanyi nao amonyi.
Na inyi kokoya nyi ngafuna mṟufu mbicho kui Belsebuli, ashika wana-wo wanu nyi kiki wefuna nakyo? A wumangi woke wuidime iwanga? Nahonu kyamba nyi wudo nyi nawo wechiwa nyi wemuwonya owingo.
Na inyi kokoya nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa nyefuna nao mṟufu mbicho, aiwung'u wumangi wo Ruwa womidima imuchea.
Ang'u ipfo mba ko mapfinya, njii wuda mndu echida napfo na iduo-pfo nzohoṟa tsake na pfinya, kulawode nyi echiwoka ipfunga mafinya cho? Lyondi echiiduo shindo sha kulya mba koke.
Mndu alakeri na inyi nyi asuanyi na inyi, na moda alasanya na inyi nyi erahanja.
Kyasiang'u nkyondo ngambia, ‘Orio wunyamaṟi wose wo mndu echehoṟyo na orio kirumo kyose, kya indi kirumo kyeruma Mumuyo Mwele kyakyo echihoṟyofo.

Na mndu echideda dedo kya isuana na Manomndu nechihoṟyo kyakyo. Kya indi mndu echideda dedo kya isuana na Mumuyo Mwele nechihoṟyo kyalyopfo ma ili akeri kunu wuyana wu, ma kashika wulya wochikaa wuche.’ ”
“Kokoya mowaya mdi fo ndunda njicha, na ndunda na njicha mochiwona. Anu mkawaya mdi fo ndunda njiporu, kyasia na ndunda tsafo na njiporu. Cha kipfa orio ikidi nyi lyechimanyika kui ndunda-tso tsalyo.
Nyo mui malea ha njoka, mumanye ideda kindo kicha, mui wawicho? Kifa ikyo kiichuo mrimenyi na dumbu lyo nakyo lyechihamba.
Mndu cho ai mcha ipfo kisenyi aṟikye kii kicha nyi echiendepfo kicha, na mndu chu mbicho ipfo kisenyi aṟikye ki kiwicho kawende-fo shindo shiwicho.
Kya indi inyi ngambia, ‘Ke orio mbonyi njiwicho iyo wandu wechideda nyi wekaa wawuwuyo ili mfiri fo mondu.
Kipfa ili madedo hapfo nyiho ochiwutaho iwiko wusumhanyi, na madedo hapfo nyiho ochiwuta-ho iwonyo owingo.’ ”
Walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo, maataho wakahalwo wakahamba, “Maarya, lukundi iwona kiṟingishyo kopfo iyo!”
Nao kahalwo kawawia, “Mbaṟi-i ya wandu i mbicho idahye na iṟuhuya nyi ipfula kiṟingishyo. Nayo ma yechinengyo kiṟingishyopfo chila na kiṟingishyo kya mwikimbi Yona.
Cha kipfa Yona chando awekeri kulya ndewunyi ya mkunga fulya handu ha mfiri iṟaṟu na shio shiṟaṟu, na Manomndu na wudo echikaa wusunyi wo oruka handu ha mfiri iṟaṟu na shio shiṟaṟu.

Nyi wandu wa kulya Niniwe wechikaa wahoṟoke alya kya moondu fofurumya kyanduyonyi handu hamu na mbaṟi i ya wandu waweiwutya owingo kipfa lyandi waledumbuya weongoyo nyi Yona. Na iki kii iya nyikinene kikaida Yona.

Nyi mangi mka ulya awukye kulya kya ora lo nuka echika̱a nahoṟoke alya kyanduyonyi kya mondu fofurumya, nahoṟoke-pfo handu hamu na mbaṟi i ya wandu naweiwutya na owingo, kipfa lilyaindi alecha awuka kishingonyi kya oruka, nache yadanya wuṟango wo Solomon. Na iya kuiho ang'anyie Solomon.”
“Kyasia iliindi mṟufu mbicho fochiwuka mndu nyi fochiida handu kuhadutsu, koonyonya fulawone.
Naho fokehamba, ‘Keleka njikuwuye na mba koko kundu ngawuka! Ili fochicha naho nyi fokoya kulawode menyi indi nyi kundo kui kwahye kui kusungusie.

Nalyo fukahenda fukaonduo mṟufu mbicho ingi mfungade i mbicho ikafuida fo fumenyi fukacha fuirie, ikasamya-ho ikakaa-ho. Naho mbonyi tsefurumya tsa mndu ulya tsikawa nyi mbicho kota na tsa kuwoka. Na mbaṟi i ya wandu i mbicho ido kyayo na wudo yehenda.’ ”
Kyasia kechideda ado na wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi, adi a ulya mae na wanawamae wahoṟoki kulya nja wakundi ideda nao.
Kyasia mndu umu kambia, “A walya mayo na wanawamayo wahoṟoki nja wakundi ideda na iyo.”
Nao kahalwo kawia ichu amongoya kahamba, “Nyi ohamba wama nyi wu? Na wanawawama nyi ohamba nyi waki?”
Kahoṟoya mawoko hake kya alya huye ya wa kiloshyonyi kyake kahamba, “A iwa wanawawama!
Kipfa mowuta shechihia Wande kulya ruwehu, nyi-ong'u anjikerye manowama na mshiki ang'u wama.”
Kyasia mfiri fukeri na fulya Yesu kawuka ipfo mba, kahenda damya alya hambehu lya ipalipali.
Naho wandu wakacha kuwumbya nao mamwingi sa funanyi Katana adoya alya ngalawehu kadamya-ho. Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu fuhoṟoki kulya hambehu.
Nao kadeda nawo mbonyi tsifoi tsikeri tsa mfanano kahamba, “Ambuya mndu mbaai alehenda waya mbeu.
Na ili kewaya tsilya maata tsikaoloka oo mbai ya njia Na shilehe shikacha shikatsimaa-ho.
Tsingi tsikaoloka hando hawode maho naho tsilawone-ho teri imoṟi. Natso kudi tsikakambiṟa ido owinyi kifa lya tsilawode teri ifo wanda.
Mnengeṟi fomedo tsikahya mu, natso kyamba tsilasotsye mri tsikauma.
Kya indi tsingi tsikaoloka kiidi kya msha. Na msha iya ikado ikatsipfumba.
Kya indi tsingi tsikaoloka ifo terinyi njicha. Tsikakumbya kilimu. Iya imu ikakumbaya ihana, iya ingi makumi haṟandaṟu, na iya ingi nyi makumi haṟaṟu.
Ichu awode madu headanya naweadanya!”
Walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakacha na hando ai wakambia, “Nyi kili odeda nawo kui mbonyi tsa mfanano?”
Nao kawavia, “Wandu wa wainengye imanya mbonyi tsa wumangi wo ruvehu tsii njiṟike nyiwo nyo, kya indi walya wa wanengyepfo.
Kipfa ichu awode nyi echinengo na yengeṟa kaveengeṟyo-engeṟyo. Kya indi ichu alawode na shilya awode echisoko da.
Nkyondo ngadedya nawo ku mbonyi tsa mfanano, kyamba nyi wechiambuya na meso walechiwona, nyi vechileshya-ho na madu walechiicho ma itawuka.
Nyi kundu kuhoye ipfo kowo kisuku kilya Yesaya ahambye kehamba, ‘Kya iicho mochiicho, mlemanya ma kindo, na yambuo mochiambuo mlewona ma kindo.

Nyi ili mrima ya wandu wa oruka-lu ii mumiṟe. Na madu hawo hakawa nyi malemeri yadanya Na meso hawo nyi watsingiṟi. Nawo kundo walewona na meso ma iicho na madu, ma imanya kindo na mrima wawone wewuya na numa, na inyi njiche iwakiṟa.’
Kya indi sia na yanu nyo meso hanu, kyamba nyi haiwona ishi mokewona na madu hanu hakaicho ishi mokeicho.
Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Kuwepfo waikimbi wafoi na wandu wa wusumuhanyi wailanga iwona ishi mokewona, nawo na ma walawone, na iicho ishi mokeicho, nawo ma walaicho.’ ”
“Keadanyenyi ng'u nyo mbonyitsi tsa mfanano tsa mndu mbaai o mbeu.
Orio mndu ose ili ekeicho dedo-lyo lya mbonyi tsa wumangi nalamanye, nyi ichu mbicho acha napfo karakuo-ho kilya kii kiwaaye ipfo mrimenyi koke Nyio ichu ambaye oo mbarinyi ya njia.
Na ichu ambaaye handu hawode maho nyio ichu echiadanya dedo lilya naho kakambiṟa iliidikya na sia.
Kya indi alawode mri asotsye ipfo kiidi kyake, nyi akeri nyi mokaa-ho oweṟe. Indi kambona kuiho wukiwa na iterengyo kipfa kya idedo-lyo nahonu kakambiṟa isukyo owinyi.
Na ichu a mbaaye kiidi kya msha nyio ichu echiadanya idedo-lyo. Kukakaa-pfo mawina ha kunu orukenyi na wulembi wolembo nyi masaa shikapfumba idedo-lyo lilakikumbye-se kilimu.
Kya indi ichu a-mbaaye ipfo terinyi njicha nyio ichu echiadanya idedo-lyo na ilimanya naho kahenda ikumbya kilimu. Ichu umu kawika ihana, na ichu ungi makumi haṟandaṟu, na ichu ungi makumi haṟaṟu.”
Kawuya kawaloṟa mbonyi tsingi tsa mfanano kahamba, “Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mndu alekumba mbeu njicha ipfo demehu lyake.
Ili wandu walee mado kukacha napfo mkituwa oke, kaengeṟa ikumbapfo mbeu tsa mambuṟo ipfo kiidi kya mbeke tsilya. Kakuhendya.
Kyasia mbeke tsamedo na ikumbya mahaa naho mamburo̱ hakawewoneka.
Kyasia masinga ha menyi kanyi hakacha naho hakambia, ‘Akashika-wo Mndumii, chi ulewekumba mbeu njicha kulya demehu lyafo. A nyiku-se lyawada-se mamburo?’
Nao kawawia, ‘Nyi mndu mkituwa aletana ado.’ Masinga halya hakambia, ‘Ngesa nyi ukundi luhende luhakuṟuo?’
Nao kahamba, ‘Ote,’ ili muikuṟuo mambuṟo-ho nyi mochiwona mokuṟuo na mbeke tso mutsisanze naho.

Kelekenyi shing'anyishane shi shiwi shishike iya mawehyenyi Komshika iya masanyonyi na inyi njiwie walya wesana, ‘Kesongwonyi isanya mambuṟo-ho muhafunge na shikonde kundu mochihakoṟa, kya indi mbeketso muhende itsisanya ipfo kikumbinyi kyako.’ ”
Kawuya kawaloṟa mbonyi tsa mfanano tsingi kahamba, “Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mbeu ya haradali iwekeri-fo. Mndu kaiduo kaiwaya kulya demehu lyake.

Nayo ii njitutu ikaida mbeu tsingi tsose. Kya indi kombona yamedo ikang'ana ikaida huye ya shindo shii shiwaye kulya demehu shose isho shitutu-tutu. Ikawa mdi fung'anyi. Na shilehe sha ruwehu shikatana shacha shikalaa marambenyi hayo.”
Kawuya kawaongoya mbonyi tsa mfanano tsingi, “Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mdi foshimbiṟa mso. Mka kafuduo kafusanganya msonyi ipongo kaṟaṟu. Fukatana fotarang'a fose piu.”
Mbonyi-tsi Yesu alededa ku mfanano tsose. Ma naladede nawo ma kindo kulawode nyi mbonyi tsa mfanano.
Nyi kundu kuinukye kilya ki kidede nyi mwikimbi Yesaya kehamba, “Njechitambaṟuo dumbu lyako kui mbonyi tsa mfanano, njechyedya shilya shiwei shirike kiwokya oruka lombiko.”

Nalyo Yesu kasama wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi. Kahenda ipfo mba koke. Walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakacha na handu ai wakahamba, “Kelutambahaluye-wo mbonyi tso tsa mfanano tsa mambuṟo ha alya demehu!”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Ichu mowaya mbeu njicha nyi Manomndu.
Na dema nyi wuyana-wu. Na mambuṟo-ho nyi wana wa ichu mbicho.
Na mkituwa aletsiwaya nyi Satana. Na ili masanyonyi nyi iya masiyonyi ha wuyana. Na iwo wesana nyi wasu wa Ruwa.
Nahong'u chando mambuṟo hekesanyo na ihenda ikoṟo na modo na ili kochishika iya masiyonyi ha wuyana kiwe nyi wudong'u.
Manomndu nadume wasu wake ipfo wumanginyi woke wasanye mando haendye wusutsu hose na iwo wawutye sha mkika wawewasanya.
Wahende iwakumba kulya nungunyi ya modo Napfo kukae-pfo nyi ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.
Walya wa wusumuhanyi wawewaa ngeela cha mnengeṟi ipfo wumanginyi wo Nde-awo. Ichu awode madu naveadanya.”

“Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na kisa kya shindo sha wuitoṟi kiwei kiṟike wanda demenyi Mndu kakiwona kahenda kakiṟika. Nao lyandi awodo nyi sia kahenda kumba shilya awode shose piu, kacha ihuṟa dema lilya.”
“Kingi-se wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mndu mokapa mbucha echipfula lulu njicha.
Kyasia amewona lulu imu iwode mnu wuhuru wung'anyi, kahenda, kakumba shilya awode shose, kacha kaihuṟa.”
“Kingi-se wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na kindo kyedeha makunga kyeolotso alya ipalipalinyi kikadeha orio mbaṟi yose.
Kyameichuo wakakikuruya hambehu. Wakadamya-ho. Halya mecha wakahawiluya ipfo matelenyi. Na halya mawicho wakahakumba kuleshe.
Ili koshika masiyo ha wuyana na wudong'u Nyi wasu wa Ruwa wechicha wahende waweletsana iwo wawicho na iwo wa wusumhanyi.
Iwo wawicho wawehenda ikumba kulya nungunyi ya modo. Napfo kukae-pfo ifuha na imadya ngamru.”
Yesu kawawesa, “Ngesa nawo mowemanya mbonyi-tso tsose?” Wakambia, “Ee!”
Nao kawawia, “Kyasiang'u orio mlosha o mawawaso ose ichu a mloshe kya wumangi wo ruwehu nyi afananyi na mndu menyi kanyi awode kisa kyake aṟikye kawa moende-ho shindo shihya na sha kacha.”
Naho kikashika Yesu amidima ilosha mbonyi tsilya tsa mfanano tsose kakure kulya-ndo akeri.
Kacha na kulya mṟinyi kundu awukye. Kawaloshia kulya mba kundo wekumbuhananyia. Wakatana wawa mkahai. Wakahamba, “A mndu-chu kundu awutye wurango-wu na mawuto-ho ha finya nku?
Ichu chi mana o ichu mopacha shidi? Na Mae chi ewio nyi Maria na wanawamae chi Yakobo na Yosefu na Simon na Yuda?
Na washiki wake chi hondo wakeri wose kunu kodu? Alae mbonyi tso nku tsimbukya ngesa?”
Wakasukyo nyio. Na Yesu kawawia, “Nyi kipfa kuwode kundu mwikimbi amenekye-menekyepfo kulawode na kulya mṟinyi kundu awukye na kulya kanyi koke.”
Nao ma alawute mawuto ha pfinya hafoi kulya kipfa lyaindi walaidikye.
Kyasia mandi halya kuwepfo mangi tsa oruka tsiina, ulya umu-ho nyi Herode. Eleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu tseehambo wandunyi.
Kawia wasoṟo walya wake, “Ichu nyio Yohane Mpatisi. Nyi aleṟuka awuka ko wapfu wai! Nkyo kyainenga pfinya tsing'anyi tsikawoneka ipfo koke.”
Nyi kipfa Herode amewada Yohane kampfunga kamshingya mba ya wapfungo kipfa kya Herodia ai mka o manomae Filipo.
Kipfa lyandi Yohane alewa mombia, “Kikusumuhanye imduofo.”
Nao kakunda imbaha, kawuya yowuo wandu kipfa lyaindi waichi nyi ai mwikimbi.
Kyasia komeshika mfiri fokumbuo alya mafeonyi ha Herode, naho mana o Herodia o waka kahomia makidi hawi ha wandu. Katana achihiṟa mnu Herode.
Nakyo kikamnenga kambia kye nyi echimnenga kindo amekuterewya kelia-ho nyamu.
Nao kahenda kuloshyo nyi mae kahamba, “Ngaterewa ukunnengye mdo fo Yohane Mpatisi na ipalu!”
Na mangi kawado nyi fowa, kya indi nyi kipfa kya nyamu tsilya na wandu wadamye nao kimu kilionyi kya choonga nkyo kyamnenga kawawasa nainengo.
Naho kaduma mndu kahenda idumbuo Yohane mdo kulya kipfungyonyi.
Naho mdo foke fukaendo naho furio nyi ipalu. Fukainengyo mana ulya. Nao kahenda fudaya mae.
Na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakacha ira mnying'a fulya, wakafuṟika. Wakahenda wakaongoya Yesu mbonyi tsilya.
Yesu kaicho kakure pfo kahenda airo nyi ngalawa kahenda ikaa olele kuleshe na wandu. Wandu wakammanya wakambingya wechumia wawuka mṟinyi iya.
Kawuka-se kundu avei kawona mamwingi fulya kawaichyo wukiwa kachira wanyonge wawo.
Kyasia komshika iila walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na handu ai wakahamba, “Kundu ku nyi nuka na kiheri kyameidya Kesama-ng'u mamingi fu fo wandu, wahende kulya mamṟinyi wakuhuṟye-pfo shelya!”
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Wahende wada? Kewainenge shelya nyo muwenyi.”
Nawo wakambia, “Luwode kindo iyapfo chila na mkate itanu, na makunga hawi.”
Nao kahamba. “Njiendye-nyi na iya handu njii!”

Naho kawawasa wandu walya mamwingi wadamye alya maṟenyi. Kaira mkate iya itanu na makunga hawi. Kaambuya ruwehu kaidapfuma Ruwa. Kaifunja shifunjo kainengya walya wa kiloshyonyi mkate iya, Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakainengya wandu.
Wakalya handu hamu wose wakaihuda. Wakasanya mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu shilya wakaichuṟa shikunja ikumi na shiwi shiichuo pacha.
Na walya walelya wawefoi cha kufui na womi tupu shiku shitanu kulaipfo waka ma wana.
Naho kaitikya walya wa kiloshyon waide na alya ngalawenyi wahende ambadya kya kulya wamsongoe natane asama wandu walya mamwingi.
Nao amidima isama wandu walya mamwingi kado na kulya fumwuhu kui kuleshe na wandu nyi kundu naterewe. Kyasia komshika iila kakaapfo amonyi.
Na ngalawa iya ishikye kulya makidi hawi ha ipalipali ihataṟo mnu nyi masinanu kipfa lyaindi otanu luwasumuhanye oshangunyi.
Kyasia kuipfo iringa lya kamba lya kaana lya kio lyamshika nalyo kacha na kundu wai kechumia huya-ipalipali.
Wamembona kechumia huya-ipalipali wakaangalala wakahamba, “Nyi kiṟishe!” Wakafihiṟa kipfa kya wowu wulya.
Wadi Yesu kadeda nawo kahamba, “Kewuyonyi moo nyio inyi ma mlaowuo!”
Kyasia Petro kamhaluo kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, kokoya nyi iyo kewawasa njiche na handu ui njiide kulya mṟingenyi!”
Nao kahamba, “Kucheye!” Na Petro kasoka kulya ngalawehu kachumia huyamṟinga kacha na handu Yesu ai.
Ili kewona otanu lulya kawuya yowuo kawoka isoṟowya mṟingenyi kafihira kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii kenletsa-wo!”
Nalyo liyenyi Yesu kahoṟuo owoko kambada kambia, “Ui mndu moidikya kitutu tupu! Nyi ki ili owuya iwado nyi mkeukeu?”
Kyasia wamdoya alya ngalawehu, naho otanu lukatsia.
Kyasia walya wa kulya ngalawenyi wakamolokya wanda wakahamba, “Na lohi na ukeri Mana o Ruwa!”
Naho wakaambadya kya kulya ora lo kawi wakaduo ngalawa mbarinyi ya oruka kulya Genesareti.
Kyasia na wasoṟo wa kundu kulya wamidima imanya wakaduma wasu kulya orukenyi kundu kutengye kose. Wakamendye wandu waiwawyo wose.
Na iterewa wakawa nyi imterewaterewa wapaye ma mambo tsa nguwo yake. Na walya wepaya wakawechia woose.
Naho kulya ko Mndumii Yesu kukacha napfo Wafarisayo na walosha wa wuwawaso wawuka kulya Yerusalemu wakahamba,
“Nyi kili wa kiloshyonyi kyafo wekeumbuya mbonyi luwadeye nyi waku? Kili welekesamba mawoko ili washika ilya mkate.”
Nao kawahaluo, “A kyanu nyo nyi kiili mokeumbuya iwawaso lya Ruwa kipfa kya mbonyi tsanu mu wadee tsa kacha?”
Cha kipfa Ruwa nyi awawasye kahamba, “India ndeo na mayo na moruma ndee anu mae nyi opfu napfe.”
Nanyo mukahamba kya ichu echiwia ndee ang'u mae, “Nyi kindo kehenda dasa ikyo muwechiwona koko.”
Kyake nyi mokehamba ke nalawone keindya-se nakyo ma ndee ma mae. Kikawa nyi mupfuluye iwawaso lya Ruwa kipfa kya mbonyi tsanu muwade tsa kacha.
Mui makulembetseṟe, na kicha kilya Yesaya alededa kyanu kehamba kisuku kahamba,
“Wandu wa oruka-lu nyi wekenjindya na madumbu hawo kya indi ngoo tsawo tsikahenda kuleshe na inyi.
Nyi wekenjio-lokyaolokya kya maai waipfunda njopfundo tsii mawawaso ha wandu.”
Nalyo kalaha wandu walya waiho mamwingi na ipfo koke kawawia, “Keadanyenyi imanya mumanye!
Kiteṟefutsie mndu wuwicho chi iki kehenda dumbunyipfo, nyi iki kyawuka dumbunyi nkyo kindo keterefutsa mndu wuwicho!”
Naho walya wa kiloshionyi wakacha na hando ai wakambia, “Na oichi ke Wafarisayo nyi wasukyo nyi idedo lyo waicho wado.”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Orio kindo ki kidonge kulawode nyi Wande o ruwehu akidongye na kekuṟuo.
Lekanenyi nawo! Nyi wasongoru wai wapfu meso waisongoya wapfu meso. Kya indi mpfu-meso kasongoya mpfu meso njia nyi wechioloka ṟungunyi wa wawi.”
Kyasia Petro kahaluo kambia, “Kelutambahuye-wo mbonyi-tso tsa mfanano!”
Nao kahamba, “Ate na nyo momanya kindo?
Nyi mlaichi orio kindo kyose kyaida na dumbunyi nyi kehenda ndeunyi kikahenda wiko ṟungunyi kundu kovika mando?
Kya indi ishi sheuka dumbunyi nyi shekecha shiuka mrimenyi nasho nyisho shewikya mndu wuwicho.
Cha kipfa ipfo kiidi kya mrima nyi kokedo-pfo mahio mawicho na wuwahi na mbonyi tsa iṟuhuya na tsa wulala na wuiwi na madedo ha wongo hewonya mndu owingo na shirumo.
Nyi sho-ng'u shindo shewikya mndu wuwicho. Kya indi kolya kulasambie mawoko chikyo kyawikya mndu wuwichopfo.”
Naho Yesu kakure kulya kundu akeri kahenda kuleshe kulya shihongonyi sha Tiro na Sidon.

Naho adi a ulya mka o Wakananyia kacha napfo auka kulya mṟasenyi iya kakoṟoṟoma ilaha kahamba, “Kensaṟya-wo wukiwa woko hoi Mndumii ui Mana o Dawidi! Mana oko o waka aituro mnu nyi mṟufu mbicho fumbode.”
Nao ma nalahaluo ma kindo ma kimu. Naho wa kiloshionyi wakacha na hando ai wakamterewa wakahamba, “Kemsame-wo nyi aifihiṟa kunu numa-du.”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Njii mdume kundupfo chila na ko machondi hadekye ha mba ya Israeli.”
Nao kacha naho kamwolokia ndenyi kahamba. “Hoi na hoi Mndumii njitarama-wo!”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Chi kindo kisumuhanyi kosoka shiwana kando kokumbya makitepfo.”
Nao kahamba, “Ee-wo Mndumii. Kya indi ma makite na hekekuliya shipeṟengu sheoloka kitaṟenyi kya wenyi-sho.”
Nalyo Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Ee mka kiidikyo kyapfo nawo king'anyi. Na chando uwekundi nakyo kiwekushikya kido.” Naho mana ulya oke o waka kachia kiwokya saa na iya.
Kyasia na Yesu kawuka kulyando akeri kahenda kungi kashika kulya mawambao ha ipalipali lya Galilaya. Naho kado na kulya fumwunyi kadamia-ho.
Na wandu wakacha na hando ai mamwingi sa fung'anyi warie wandu wai shiricheche na wai ngokoṟo na wapfu meso na wai pipi na wengi wafoi. Wakawaleṟya oo madedenyi hake. Nao kawakiṟa.

Itane wandu walya wakeri-ho mamwingi waṟihio ili wawona walya wai pipi wewuya ideda na walya watiliwanyi maungo wakachia na walya wai shiricheche wakawuya ichumia na wapfu meso wakawuya yambuo. Nawo wakaidapfuma Ruwa o Israeli.

Kyasia Yesu kalaha wa kiloshionyi kyake na ipfo koke kahamba, “Ngasaṟa wukiwa wo mamwingi fo wandu-wa kyamba wamtsinda kunu koko mfiri iṟaṟu ma walawona kindo kelya. Na isama njikundi wasama walasusuopfo. Nyi wewona wearisikya njienyi.”
Na walya wa kiloshionyi wakambia, “A nku lochiwuta kando kafoi kadi kunu nuka wandu-wa wafoi wadi watane waihuda wose?”
Na Yesu kawawia, “Nyi mkate inga muwode?” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi mfungade na shikunga shitutu.”
Nalyo kawawasa mamwingi fulya fo wandu wadamie wanda.
Kaira mkate iya mfungade na shikunga shilya. Kaana Ruwa. Kafunja-funja kainengya walya wa kiloshionyi. Na wa kiloshionyi wakainengya mamwingi fulya fo wandu.
Wakalya wakadung'ana wose wakaihuda. Na mtsuhaṟo fulya-fo shipeṟengu shilya wakadoduo. Shikunja mfungade shikaichuo.
Kya indi walya welya-ho nyi wasoṟo washikye shiku shiina, kouta wana na waka.
Naho kasama mamwingi fulya fo wandu. Kadoya kulya ngalawenyi. Kashika kulya mambatsana na kulya Magadanyi.
Kyasia kukacha napfo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo wecha mhesha wembesa nawaloṟe kiṟingishio kiwuka ruwehu.
Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Ili koila nyi mokehamba, ‘Ngama nyi kochiwaa kipfa ili ipfo ruwehu kofana samu.’
Na ngamenyi mukahamba, ‘Inu nlya nzinde nyi ili ipfo ruwehu kofana samu kukaṟiṟimaa fana ya ipfo ruwehu kyayo mukaidima iletsana, kya indi shiṟingishio sha maheri kyasho mulamanye.
Mbaṟi i ya wandu ii mbicho idahye na wameluki nyi ishiha kiṟingishio. Nayo ma yechiinengo kiṟingishioyo, chi kokoya nyi kiṟingishio kya Yona.’ ” Nalyo kawada-ho kahenda.
Naho walya wa kiloshionyi wakaambadya oruka lo kulya mbele ya ipalipali wahadimye iduo mkate.
Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Keambuyenyi mukuṟise mdi foshimbiṟa mkate ifu fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo.”
Nawo wakadeda-deda na mrima yawo injenyi wehamba, “Nyi kipfa ili luladuo mkate.”
Kyasia Yesu kekimanya kahamba, “Nyi ki ili mwideda na mrima yanu mui wandu wa iidikya litutu.
Nyi mulametawuka imanya ma mlakumburie mkate iya itanu ya wandu walya washikye shiku shitanu na mkunja iya muleiraho chando iwefoi?
Ma mulakumburie ma mkate iya mfungade ya wandu walya washikye shiku shiina na shikunja shilya muleira-se chando shiwefoi?
A nyi wuda kii-se ili mulakunda ma imanya ke chi kya mkate ngadeda nanyopfo. Kya indi kekuṟisenyi mdi foshimbiṟa mkate fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo.”
Nalyo wakamanya kilya awawia wakuṟise ke nyi kilakeri kya mdi fo mkate fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo chila na kya mloshie fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo.
Kyasia Yesu kashika kulya shihongonyi sha kulya Kaisaria ya Filipo. Kawesa wa kiloshionyi kyake kahamba, “A wandu wekededa wada kya Manomndu nyi akeri nyi wu?”
Nawo wakahamba, “Iwo wengi nyi Elia na iwo wengi nyi Yeremia ang'u nyi o waikimbi umu-ho.”
Kawawia, “A kyanu nyo mokehamba njikeri nyi wu?”
Naho Simon Petro kahaluo kahamba, “Iyo nyi ukeri Kristo Mana o Ruwa ichu menyi moo.”
Kyasia Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Ungusu iyo Simon Petro, kipfa manya chi nyama ma samu shakudambuya ishipfo chila na Wande o ipfo ruwehu.”
Kyasia na inyi ngakuwia, “Iyo nyi Petro (mndu ai iho) na iho nyilyo njechilihekya siṟi yako. Nayo na shichumi sha Gehena shechiidima ifoyapfo.
Njechikuinengya njopfunguo tsa wumangi wo ruwehu, na kindo opfunga kunu orukenyi kyoose kiwekaa kikipfunge; na orio kindo omepfunguo kunu orukenyi kyoose na kulya ruwehu na kyekaa kiwei kipfunguo.”
Nalyo kakekedya walya wa kiloshionyi walawie ma mndu ke nyi akeri Kristo.

Nalyo kiwokya-lyo Yesu kawoka iloṟa wa kiloshionyi kyake kye na nahende kulya Yerusalemu na ihenda iliso wukiwa wunyanyi nyi wasongoru wa wandu na Wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa mawawaso na imbaha wawembaha na ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu naṟuke.
Na Petro kamonduo na ndenyi koke kawoka imdedya kahamba, “Kyakyo Ruwa nakiitse kuleshe Mndumii, kiti kindo kido kechikuhoya!”
Nao kainduka kawia Petro, “Kewuya na numaa-ko, Satana, nyi onjiendye wusutsu. Nyi kipfa chando uihia chi kya Ruwapfo nyi kya wandu.”
Nalyo Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Ichu echikunda icha na inyi iya num-ko naa nakukane amonyi nakudike na msalaba foke nache oshana na inyi.
Kipfa ichu echikunda iletsa moo foke kikawa nyi kipfa kyako inyii nyi echifuwona.
Kipfa iki mndu echiira-ho kya wowina woke nyi kiki kokoya nyi awinyia wuyana wose kawuwona kadetsya-ho moo foke? Ang'u kindo mndu echiwika kiwe ndalai ya moo foke nyi kiki?
Kipfa nyi kochikaa Manomndu nache ai wusuṟinyi wo Nde arianyi na wasu wake wa ruwehu. Nalyo nainengye orio mndu ose kyake kimsumhanye ipfo mawutyenyi hake.
Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wandu-wa wahoṟoki iya kuwepfo sa waangu-ho wekaa walasaha opfu na watane wawona Manomndu kecha ai na wumangi woke.’ ”
Kyasia komida-ho mfiri iṟandaṟu nalyo Yesu kaduo-ho Petro na Yakobo na manomae Yohane. Kahenda nawo kado kundo ko fumwuhu lii lileshe hando ha kisekenyi.
Nalyo kailachika kawada fana ya sa wawonyi. Kyamu kyake kikawa ngeela cha mnengeṟi na nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu cha sa.
Naho kudi a walya Mose na Elia wakakuloṟa nawo wechiongoyana nao mbonyi.
Kyasia Petro kahaluo kawia Yesu, “Ale Mndumii. Iya nyi haluchihia hekukaya. Komkunda na inyi njiwike mahema haṟaṟu kunu, limu nyi lyapfo na limu nyi lya Mose na limu nyi lya Elia.”
Kededa kudi a ili ipuchi liwode ngela likacha wawikya maṟishe, nalyo a lilya na ṟu lyawuka alya kiidi kya ipuchi likahamba, “Aichu Manoko a mkunde ichu njii mchihie nyio! Nyio mochimwadanya.”
na walya wa kiloshionyi wameicho wado wakaho wanda na kyamu wakaowuo mnu muowoe ingi.
Nalyo Yesu kacha na hando wai kawapaya kahamba, “Kekurenyi ma mlaowuo!”
Wakairia meso hawo naho walakiwone-se ma mndu na Yesu amonyi.
Kyasia ili walesoka kulya fumvunyi Yesu kawatutuma kahamba, “Ma mlawone mochihamba kiwonesyo kyo na muwede Mana o mndu natane aṟuka awuka ko wafu.”
Nalyo walya wa kiloshionyi wakambesa wakahamba, “Kikeri-ng'u kida ili walosha wa mawawaso wehamba ke Elia na nasonguo icha kuwoka?”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Macheenyi ha Elia na ekaa nache nawihiṟe shindo shose wuhya.
Kyaindi inyi ngambia, ‘Elia nyi alemecha, na wandu walamanye indi wakamtana chando wawekundi. Na Manomndu na wudo nawekaa naliso wukiwa nyiwo.’ ”
Nalyo walya wa kiloshionyi wakatawuka imanya ke nyi aideda nawo kya Yohane mpatisi.
Kyasia ili walekoya mamwingi fulya fo wandu naho mndu kacha napfo kampfirya-ndi.
Kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, kesaṟya mana oko wukiwa, nyi awodo nyi osuko lo meri kawawio mnu iki kiwicho-wicho. Nyi kifa kafoi awa moho modonyi na kafoi nyi mṟingenyi.
Na inyi ngamende na ko iwo wa kiloshionyi kyapfo nawo walaidime ma imchiṟa.”
Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Mui mbaṟi ya wandu ilawode iidikya muhendye na mkika, akashika njekaa nanyo njishike indi? A njimduo njishike indi? Mendenyi na handu njii!”
Na Yesu kamdedya kya imwowesha nalyo mṟufu fulya mbicho fukambuka. Na mana ulya kachia kiwokya saa na iya.
Nalyo walya wa kiloshionyi wakacha na hando Yesu ai kundu kulai wandu wakahamba, “Nkyili so lulaidima ifufuna?”

Nao kawawia, “Nkipfa ili muwode mudo kiidikyo kyangu. Kifa nkya lohi ngambia, ‘Kokoya nyi muwode idikya ling'anyi cha mbeu ya haradali na mochiwia fumvu li, kure aa hando ukeri uhende alya. Nalyo na lyeteshuka. Naho ma kulekikaa-se ho kindo mlechiidima.’ [
Kyamba mbaṟi ii ya mṟufu mbicho yewukayo chila nyi kui pfinya ya iterewa na ikwotoya.]”
Kyasia wakeri iida-iida kulya Galilaya warianyi handu hamu wose nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Manomndu akeri ihenda idambikyo mawokonyi ha wandu.
Nawo iwaha wambahe, indi ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu naṟuke.” Nawo wakasokyo mnu nyi fowa ing'anyi.
Kyasia ili washika kulya Kapernaumu, nalyo walya wesana shilingi iya ya okamba lo hekalu wakachea Petro wakahamba, “Alae mlosha onu nekelekya shilingi ya okamba lo hekalu ngesa?”

Kahamba, “Na echiwika.” Kyasia amida na mba nalyo Yesu kasonguo imbesa kahamba, “Nyi uihia-ho kuda Simon? Wamangi wa masanga wandu wekewawesa njokamba na kodi nyi waki? Ngesa nyi wana wa kanyi kowo ang'u nyi iwo wa kundu kungi ngesa?”
Ili ahaluo, “Na iwo wa kundu kungi.” Yesu kambia, “Nahong'u wana wakawa-ng'u nyi wai wawute-pfo.

Kya indi nyi kundu lulawaendye wusutsu kehenda-ng'u kulya ipalipalinyi ukumbe kimenya kedeha makunga. Na ikunga-lyo lyechisonguo ido uliwade. Nalyo kotambaṟuo dumbu lyalyo nyi ochiwonaho fesa. Nayo uduo uhende iwainengya handu hako na iyo.”
Kyasia saa na iya walya wa kiloshionyi wakacha na handu Yesu ai wakahamba, “Alewo mnene o wodoe ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu nyi o ku?”
Nao kalaha naho kimana kakiwika oo kidi kyawo.
Kahamba, “Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Mukada mulahaluka’ mukawa cha shiwana ma mochikoya wumangi wo ruwehu muide naho-pfo.
Kyasia-ng'u ichu mokunyinyiṟa amonyi kawada mbaṟi ya kimana-ki nyio awa mnene o wodoe ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu.
Na kimana kidi cha iki mndu kakyambya ipfo kanyi koke kikawa nyi kipfa kya rina lyako nyio inyi anjiumbya.”

“Na iwa watutu wakusirye koko inyi ma ichu umuho mndu kamendye wusutsu kyake iki kichakicha-ho nyi wei ihenda ipfungyo iseo nzingonyi nahende olotso kulya ipalipalinyi makidi hawi kundo kuṟungukye kukahenda wanda.
Ochia nyi lo wuyana kipfa kya mbonyi tsiendye wusutsu tsikeri-ho. Nyi kipfa mbonyi tsiendye wusutsu icha na tsiche. Kyaindi ochia nyi lo mndu-chu mbonyi tsa wusutsu tsechicha nao.

Kikuendye wusutsu kokoya nyi kuwoko kopfo ang'u kudende kopfo kumanye ukukumbe aleshe. Nanga iyo koida ipfo kwenyi moo kui kileta ang'u kui kiricheche kota ili owode mawoko hawi na madende hawi kohenda kumbo kulya modonyi fo mlungana.
Na kikuendye wusutsu kokoya nyi riso lyapfo likuṟuo nolikumbe aleshe. Nanga iyo koida na ipfo kwenyi moo kui njeche kota ili owode meso hawi kohenda kumbo kulya modonyi foaka mlungana.”
“Ambuyenyi ma mulamine iwa watutu ma ichu umu-ho. Kipfa ngambia, ‘Wasu wawo wa ipfo ruwehu nyi wailungana iwona kyamu kya Wande o ipfo rewehu. [
Nyi kipfa mana o mndu nyi achee nakiṟe iki kidekye.]
Nyi mwihia-ho muda? Kokoya ma mndu awode machondi ihana kawona limu lideka-ho chi echida-ho halya makumi kenda na kenda kulya shitonyohu kahenda pfula lilya lidekye?
Kokoya keliwona, na kya lohi ngambia kyalyo echiengeṟa ichihio kota na kya halya makumi kenda na kenda haladekye.
Na wudo kindo kilakikunde nyi Wande o ipfo ruwehu nyi iwa watutu kudekye-ho ma ichu umuho.’ ”
“Indi kokoya manomayo akunyamaṟye na iyo uhende umhoṟye deko lyake mukeri-ho nyo nao muwawi. Kokoya kekwadanya hoo nyi okuwonya manomayo.
Indi kada alakwadanya iyo uhende onduo mndu umu uche nao ang'u wawi, na orio kidedo kededo-ho kyose kundu kehoṟoka kiwange kui dumbu lya wakaṟa wawi ang'u waṟaṟu.
Indi kada alaadanya iwo nohende ikyongoya siṟi. Kada alaadanya siṟi naho nakuwie cha o mbaṟi njihenu na msanyi o okamba.”
“Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, ‘Orio kyose momepfunga kunu orukenyi na ipfo ruwehu na kikae-ho kiwei kipfunge. Na orio kindo kyose momepfunguo kunu orukenyi na ipfo ruwehu kekaa-ho kiwei kipfunguo.’
Na kingi-se ngambia, ‘Nyo mui wawi ang'u waṟaṟu-ho kombona wamidikyana kimu kya kindo ma kida ma kida wakiterewa na wechikiwona wainengo nyi Wande o ipfo ruwehu.
Cha kipfa kundu komsanza wawi ang'u waṟaṟu kuirina lyako inyi napfondo mbei ipfo kiidi kyawo.’ ”
Nalyo Petro kacha naho kammbesa, “Ale Mndumii! Manowama nyi echinjinyamaṟya-nyamaṟya nashike indii na inyi njimhooṟie shilya anyamaṟie?
Ngesa njishike kamfungade naho-ngu?”

Yesu kambia “Ngakuwia manya chi mfungade ochishikapfo shila nyi makumi mfungade ka mfungade.” Kyasia-ng'u kyamba nyi wudo kii wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wafananyi na mndu mangi awekundi itala na masinga hake sile tsake hawode.
Kewoka itala nao kaendyo mndu awode sile yake ya talanta shiku ikumi.
Nao alawode ketaa Mndumii ulya kawawasa wahende kumbo wuhuru na mka na wana na shose awode kuwoneke shetaa.
Kyasia msoṟo ulya kakuhutsa wanda kamolokya ndenyi kahamba, “Kenjile-heṟuo-leheṟuo-wo na inyi njikutae shose.”
Kyasia Mndumii ulya kalia isinga lilya makulili kalilekya katana amdea na sile iya piu.
Kyasia isinga lilya lyekihenda ipfo nja kawona msinga wodoe lilya limu-ho liwode sile yake ya dinari ihana. Kamchinga oṟoo kambia, “Njitaa sile yako uwode!”
Isinga lilya odoe likakuhutsa wanda na kyamu likamterewaterewa likahamba, “Kenji-leheṟuo-leheṟuo-wo na njekaa njikutae.”
Nalakunde. Kahenda kamkumba kulya kipfungonyi na namtae sile iya awode.
Kyasia masinga halya wodoe hekiwona kiwe kido naho hakasokyo mnu nyi fowa ing'anyi. Hakahenda ongoya Mndumii ulya oho kilya kyawa kido kyose.
Nalyo Mndumii oke kamlaha kambia, “Kui isinga iwicho. Sile iya yako uwewode na inyi ngakudea yose piu kipfa lyandi onterewa.
A iyo chi kiwewekusumuhanye isaṟya isinga odoo na chando inyi ngawekusaṟya iyo?
Na Mndumii oke karihinyika nyashi kamdambikya walya wetu̱ura na natane ataa sile iya yake awode yose.
Na Wande o ipfo ruwehu na wudo echimbika nyo mkada mlahoṟyana kui mrima mndu na odoe shilya mnyamaṟyanyi.”
Kyasia Yesu amemaa ideda madedo halya kakure awuka kulya Galilaya kashika kulya shihongonyi sha Yuda kulya mataya ya Yordanyi.
Na wandu wakaduana nao mamwingi fung'anyi. Nao kawachiṟa akeri kundu kulya.
Nalyo Wafarisayo wakacha napfo wecha mhesha wakahamba, “Nawo kisumhanyi ngesa mndu nalekane na mka oke ma kokoya nyi kipfa kya iki ma iki ngesa?”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Ma mlasomie ke ichu awawumbye nyi alewawumba wakawa nyi mndu msoṟo na mka?”
Kahamba, “Nkyondo kechiinenga mndu nalekane na ndee na mae na isanza na mka. Nawo wa wawi wawe nyi nyama imu.
Nahong'u walakiwe-se nyi wawi, nyi wai nyama imu. Kyasia-ng'u ikyo Ruwa alesangana amonyi ma mndu nalakiletsane.”
Wakambia, “Kikeri-ng'u kida ili Mose awawasie wandu wainengye mka baruo yemsama naho-ng'u wamsame-ng'u?”
Kawawia, “Mose nyi kipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanu nkyondo alembikya momu folekana na waka wanu. Manya chi wudo kiwekeri kiwokya lya mbokopfo.
Kyasia na inyi ngambia, ‘Ichu molekana na mka oke kulawode nyi kipfa kya wumbafu kahenda yalika mka ungi nyi ahaluka mbafu amonyi.’ ”
Walya wa kiloshionyi wakambia, “Mbonyi tsesungusia kya msoṟo na mka kokoya na wudo tsii nahong'u kichihiyese mndu naalikepfo.”
Kawawia, “Chi wose wechiidima iwada dedolipfo shila na iwa wa wainengye wechiliwada.

Cha kipfa nyi kuwode wasoṟo wai wahumba kui ifeo nyi mawo. Kukawekaa-pfo sa wai wahumba wa wawike wuhumba nyi wandu. Kukawekaa pfo sa wakuwikye wuhumba wawenyinyi kipfa kya wumangi wo Ruwa wawuwone. Moidima ikiwada nawekiwada.”
Nalyo wakamendie shiwana shitutu nashihekye owoko na ishiterewya. Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi wakawaima.
Yesu kawawia, “Kelekenyi shiwana shi ma mlashiime shecha na koko. Cha kipfa wandu wai wado chasho nyiwo wumangi wo ruwehu woewa wowo.”
Nalyo Kashihekya owoko kawuya kakure alya kahenda.
Naho adi aichu mndu kacha na handu ai kahamba, “Maarya, nyi kiki kicha njechiwuta njiwone moo fo mlungana?”
Nao kambia, “Nkyi ili ombesa kya iki kii kicha? Ichu a mcha nyi aiho umu tupu. Indi kokunda ida alya kwenyi moo kemanya mawawaso nohahendelye.”
Kahamba, “Maki?” Yesu kahamba, “Nyi iha, ma kulawahe ma kulaṟuhuye ma ulakunde iṟuhuyo ma kulaiwe ma kulahambe-ho shewonya odoo owingo lo wongo.
Indya ndeyo na mayo, nowekunda ma odoo chando ukundi moo fopfo kumonyi.”
Mndu ulya mleu kambia, “Kyasho na njileweshiinutsya. Aikyo njitsiheṟe nyi kiki-se-wo?”
Yesu kambia, “Kokunda uwe mndu moholotsya shose kehenda kumba shilya uwode ushiinenge wandu wakiwa naho ochiwada kisa kya shindo shifoi ipfo ruwe hu. Komeidima uche oshana na inyi.”
Kyasia mndu ulya mleu ameicho ado kahenda awodo nyi fowa. Nyi ili awode shichoṟe shake shifoi.
Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Mndu msuṟi nyi alemye ishika ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu.’
Na kingi-se ngambia, ‘Kyangu-ho nyi ngamia iide na ṟochenyi lya sindano kota mndu msuṟi naide na ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu.’ ”
Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wekiicho wado wakawuko nyi madima wakahamba, “Kokoya na wudo a nyi wu-se echiidima ikiṟo.”
Nalyo Yesu kawaambuya kahamba, “Kindo-kyo kunu ko wandu kechiwa iwutapfo, kya indi ipfo ko Ruwa shindo shose na shechiwutika tupu.”
Nalyo Petro kahaluo kambia, “Ambuya so nyi ludeye shindo shose lukakwituma iya numaa-pfo kyadu lochiwona-ho nyi kiki-wo?”

Yesu kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Nyo mui wandu weoshana na inyi ili koeshika iya mafeyonyi hewihiṟyo wuhya ilindi Mana o mndu echidamya loṟikehu lo wusuṟi woke nanyo mbedamya lorike-hu tsilya ikumi na tsiwi na idumbuo mondu ya mbaṟi tsa Israeli itsi ikumi na tsiwi.’

Na orio mndu ose ma oku ma oku ichu adeye ma wana wamae ma washiki wake ma ndee ma mae ma wana ma mhunda ma mba kikawa nyi kipfa kya rina lyako inyi orio kindo adee naweengeṟyo shipfoi naweoṟa na moo fokaa mlungana.
Kya indi kiwe wafoi wa wasongoru nyi wehaluka wafurumi na iwo wafurumi wawewa wasongoru.”
Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wafananyi na mndu menyi kanyi elelawa ikure kanyi ngamenyi nahende kushihya waṟundi weṟundya pesa wa kulya demehu lyake likeri lya msabibu.
Kyasia wamidikyana kimu na waṟundi walya kya dinari iwe nyi kya woṟunda wo mfiri fumu kawaduma kulya demehu lyake lya msabibu.
Kawuya kakure-se lingi kushikye kufui na saa ya kaṟaṟu. Kawona wengi wahoṟoki alya tumo walawode kindo wechiwuta.
Kawewia na wandu walya, “Kewehendenyi nanyo kulya demehu lya msabibu. Na kindo sa kisumuhanyi njechimwinenga.”
Nawo wakakuhendya. Kawuya kakure-se lingi kanyi kukeri kufui na saa ya kaṟandaṟu na saa kenda kawewuta ado.
Kushikye kufui na saa ikumi na imu kakure kanyi kawona wengi wahoṟoki-ho. Kawawia, “Nkyi ili motsinda muhoṟoki iya mlawode ma kindo mochiwuta?”
Wakambia, “Nyi ili lulawona molupfula kya iṟunda.” Kawawia, “Kewehendenyi nanyo alya demehu lya msabibu.”
Kyasia komshika iila menyi dema lya msabibu kalaha ulya mokalya-ho, “Henda lahang'u waṟundi wo nowewainenga kya woṟunda wowo uwoke iwo wafurumyeho ushike iwo wasongoe.”
Walya wacha kufui na saa ikumi na imu wakacha naho wakaambya orio mndu na dinari.
Kyasia walya wasongoe wamcha wakahamba kulako nyi wechyambya kya wueṟa. Nawo wakaweambya orio mndu na dinari mndu na dinari yake wose.
Wekyambya wakanunuwya menyi kanyi ulya.
