Wakahamba, “Ashika-wo iwo wafurumya na saa imu tupu waṟundaho. Na iyo kowuya iwang'ang'anyisha naso. Natso nyi lotsinda lichikarishya mawina ha mfiri puti na mu fo.”
Nao kahaluo kawia ulya umu-ho, “Mbuya yako manya chi ngakuwia kilai kya sumhanapfo. Chi loweidikyana kimu kya dinari.
Kekudae iki kyapfo nokuhendye; na ngakukundya iinenga ichu afurumya kyake kifoyanyi na kyapfo.
Ngesa ishi shako nyi ohamba nyi kilanjisumuhanye iwuta nasho chando ngakunda? Ang'u nyi onjiambuya kinyeeri ili njii njido mwoloru?
Nyi wudong'u iwo wafurumya wechiwa wasongoru na iwo wesonguo wawe wafurumi.”
Kyasia Yesu kechido na kulya Yerusalemu, nalyo kaduo walya ikumi na wawi handu ha kiseekenyi. Wechihenda kawawia,
“Ambuyenyi lukeri-ng'u ihenda ido na kulya Yerusalemu. Na Manomndu nahende dambikyo wakohanyi wo wanene na walosha wa mawawaso. Nawo wambutye owingo lo opfu.
Wawehenda mdambikya na wandu wo wa mbaṟi njihenu kundo wechimtaluo na imkapa na ngowa tso tsii ntochye msha, wawembambya na msalabe-hu. Na ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu naṟuke.”
Nalyo mae o wana wa Sebedayo kacha na handu ai arianyi na wana walya wake. Kamolokya nndenyi kamterewa kindo nainengo nyio.
Nao kammbesa, “Nyi kiki uiterewa?” Mka ulya kambia, “Hamba ke wana wa wako wawi wadamye ichu ungi ora lo kulyo na ichu umu ora lo kumoso ipfo wumanginyi wopfo.”
Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Momanya iki muiterewapfo. Nyimochiidima inyo kirahunyi iki njikeri inyoya inyi?” Wakambia, “Na lochiidima.”
Kawawia, “Kirahunyi kyako na mochinyoya-ho. Kya indi idamya ora loko lo kulyo ma lo kumoso kyalyo chi kyako kyeinenga mndupfo. Nyi lyawa lya walya wai wasuṟumye nyi Wande.”
Kyasia walya ikumi na wawi wamicho wado wakapfuluko kya wana walya wa mka wa wawi.
Yesu kawalaha na hando hamu kawawia, “Muichi ke wamangi wa wandu wa masangenyi nyi wawaitoṟye na iwo wanene wakawaapfinya.
Kya indi kunu kiidi kyanu kilawe kido. Shile na orio mndu ose ichu echikunda iwa mnene kunu konu nawe nyi mompfuṟukanya.
Na ichu echikunda iwa mndu msongoru kunu konu nawe nyi isinga lyanu.
Na chando Mana o mndu alalecha kunu kepfuṟukanyo, nyi kundu o napfuṟukane-ho naweinengya-ho na moo foke fuwe ndalai yetalaa wafoi.”
Kyasia ili wewuka kulya Yeriko wandu wakamituma numa yake mamwingi sa fung'anyi.
Nalyo adi a walya wandu wapfu meso wawi wadamye oo mamba na njia. Wekiicho Yesu aida-ho wakakoṟoṟoma ilaha wehamba, “Kelusaṟye-wo wukiwa iyo Mana o Dawidi!”
Kyasia mamwingi fulya fukawatoloma kundu watsie. Nawo wakaengeṟa iirya ṟu wehamba, “Hoi Mndumii kelusaṟye-wo wukiwa kui Mana o Dawidi!”
Na Yesu katirima-ho kainduka kahamba, “A nyi kiki mokunda; ke njimbike njida?”
Wakambia, “Nyi kundu meso hadu hatambaṟuke.”
Yesu kawalilia makulili kapaya meso hawo. Nalyo wadi wakawuya ambuo. Wakaoshana nao.
Kyasia waiyafukya kufui na kulya Yerusalemu ili washika kulya Betifage kulya fumwunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu, nalyo Yesu kaduma wakiloshionyi wawi.
Kawawia, “Hendenyi alya mṟinyi fukeri mambatsana na iya hando mui. Mukeripfo mudi mochiwona nzoi ii njipfunge na ihache lya nzoi lii hamu nayo. Muipfunguo-ho munjiendye.
Na kokoya mndu kembia kindo muhambe, ‘Nyi Mndumii awode kindo aitsipfulya.’ Nalyondi echitsidika.”
Nakyo kikahenda kido kyose nyi kundu kuhoe kilya kii kidede nyi mwikimbi kehamba, “Henda-wienyi mana-chu Sionyi,
Ambuya, mangi yapfo nyi ikuchea na kopfo ai, amoloru ambawe nyi nzoi na ihache lii imana lya indo lyekudika.”
Walya wa-kiloshionyi wakahenda wakawewuta wado chando Yesu awewawasye.
Wakaende nzoi iya na ihache lilya lya nzoi. Na huye yatso wakahekya-ho nguwo tsawo tsilya tsa huye. Wakamdamiṟa-ho.
Kyasia mamwingi fulya fo wandu fung'anyi fukaala nguwo tsawo ipfo njiehu, tsilya tsa huye. Wengi wakamanya maṟamba alya makidihu wakahaanjaṟa alya njiehu.
Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu wasonguo na walya waituma numa wakakoṟoṟoma ilaha wehamba, “Hosana Mana o Dawidi. Ona nyi lo ichu acha kui rina lya Mndumii! Hosana kulya huye.”
Wamidima iida na kulya Yerusalemu mṟi fulya fukafuluka-fuluka fose. Wandu wakahamba, “A ichu nyiu?”
Na wandu walya mamwingi wakahamba, “Ichu nyi mwikimbi nyi Yesu awukye kulya Nasareti ya kulya Galilaya.”
Na Yesu kaida na ipfo hekalunyi lya Ruwa kafunapfo wekumba na wehuṟa wose wai ipfo hekalunyi. Kapfuluo na shitaṟa sha weilacha pesa na shidi shedamya sha wekumba mbeta.
Kawawia, “Mba yako nyi yewio nyi mba yeterewya, nanyo mukawuya ihaluo opanga lo weala njia loowa!”
Na ili akeri ado kulya hekalunyi, kukacha napfo wandu wa wapfu meso na wai shiricheche. Nao kawachira.
Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wakeri-pfo na walosha na wa mawawaso wamewona mawuto halya ha kiṟiha awuta na shiwana shechilaha ipfo hekalunyi shehamba, “Hosana Mana o Dawidi, nawo wakawichuyo.”
Wakahamba, “Na omeicho kindo iwa waihamba?” Yesu kawawia, “Ee, a mlasomye ke nyi madumbunyi ha shiwana na wakoku hoondo kukusungusie-ho kiṟumi kyafo keṟumisho?”
Nalyo kawadaho. Kawuka kulya mṟinyi kashika kulya Betanyia. Kalaa-pfo kio kilya.
Ili lya ngama kewuya naide na ipfo mṟinyi kaicho njaa.
Nalyo kawona mkuyu fukeri mamba na njia kacha na handu fudoe ma nalawone-ho ndunda, na mambale tupu. Kafuwia, “ma kulakumbie-se ndunda tsiwuka kunu kopfo!” Nalyo kudi mkuyu fulya fukauma ng'aa.
Na walya wa kiloshionyi wamewona wado wakaṟihio wakahamba, “Nyi wuda mkuyu-fu fouma fudi owinyii.”

Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, kokoya muwode idikya mkada mlawado nyi mkeu-keu ma chi ikyo kya mkuyu tupu mochiwutapfo. Indi ma kokoya nyi fumwu li nyi mochiliwia, kuṟuka ukumbo kulya ipalipalinyi, na kewutika kido.
Na orio kindo kyose mokipfula kiterewyonyi kui iidikya na mochi-kiwona.”
Kyasia amidima iida na ipfo hekalunyi wakohanyi walya wanene wakacha na handu ai na wasongoru wa wandunyi wakahamba, “A pfinya owuta nayo sindo-sho nyi ida? Na ichu akuwikye finya-yo nyiwu?”
Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Na inyi njimbesa kidedo kimu; mukamenjiwia mbembia pfinya ngawuta nayo shindo-shi ke nyi ida.

A wupatiso wo Yohane nyiku wuwewukye ngesa? Nyi ruwehu ngesa ang'u nyi wandunyi? Wakahaluyana-haluyana mrimenyi kowo wa wenyi wehamba, ‘Lukahamba nyi ruwehu nao naluwie, nyi kyawang'u kida ili mlamidikya.’
Ang'u lukahamba, ‘Nyi wandunyi nyi luwode lochiowuo wandu. Nyi kipfa wose waichi Yohane nyi mwikimbi.’
Nalyo wakahaluo Yesu wakambia, ‘Lomanyapfo.’ Nao kawewawia, ‘Ma inyi njembia pfinya ngawuta nayo shindo-sho ke nyi idapfo.’ ”
“A nyi muhie-ho muda? Mang'anya awewode wana wawi, kahendya ichu msongoru kambia, ‘Inu ochihenda uṟunde alya demehu lya msabibu.’
Nao kahaluo kahamba ngaleha, ‘Ili numa kawuya iwado nyi machenyede kakuhendya.’
Kawuya kahendya ulya ungi kawembia ado. Nao kahaluo kahamba, ‘Ee naakyo Mndumii.’ Ma nalahende.

A walya wawi ichu awekeri-ho kewuta shechihia ndee nyi uhya ngesa? Wakahamba, ‘Nyi ulya mosongoru.’ Yesu kawawia, Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wesana okamba nyi wechishika ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa na waka wameluki wamsongoe nyo.
Nyi kipfa Yohane alecha na konu kui njia ya wusumuhanyi nanyo ma mlamidikye, wesana okamba nyiwo welemidikya ili numa na waka wameluki. Nanyo mkakiwona ma mladumbuye lyandi mulelemidikya.’ ”

“Keadanyenyi mbonyi tsa mfanano tsingi. Kuwekeri-pfo mndu menyi kanyi, kadonga dema lya msabibu. Kaliiṟihya na oṟiho. Kasuma-ho na handu hekamya mpfinyo ipfo makidi hawi. Kawika-pfo mba yeringya idoe huye. Dema lilya kaliinengya wademi kilimu kilya nainengo-ho kyake wateṟyanyi nawo. Kawuya kahenda kyaṟo oruka lo kuleshe.
Komshika kufui na kiheri kekumbya ndunda kaduma masinga halya hake kulya ko wademi walya hahende inengyo nunda tsalyo.
Na wademi walya wakaduo masinga halya hake. Ichu umu wakamkapa, ichu ungi wakambaha, ichu ungi wakamkumbya maho.
Kawuya kaduma-se masinga hengi hafoi kota na halya ha kuwoka. Nawo wakawewawika wado.
Kafurumia iwadumya mana ulya oke o womi kehamba, ‘Mana-chu oko nyio wechimidikya.
Kyasia wademi walya wekiwona mana ulya wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi wehamba, ichu nyio muoṟi mooṟa-ho. Lanye ndenyi lumbahe luwade na kyoṟa kyake.
Nalyo wakamduo-pfo. Wakamkumbalya kulya mbele ya dema lya msabibu, wakambaaha.
Ashika mnene o dema lilya lya msabibu ilindi echicha napfo nyi kiki echiwutya wademi walya?’
Wakahamba, ‘Wandu walya wewuta wado owicho na wadetso iki kiwichowicho. Na dema lya msabibu nawelinengya wademi wengi wembutya ndunda tsilya ili tsishikye shiheri shatso shekumbya.’

Kyasia Yesu kawawia, ‘A ipfo shiṟehyonyi mlelemanyeho iki kii kihambe-ho ke iho lilya wewika mba waminye lyo nyi lyambuya iwa iho lya ndumba. Dedo-lyi nyi licheye liwuka ipfo ko Mndumii. Likawa nyi lya kiṟiha lya kunu mesonyi hadu.’
Kyasia-ng'u kyamba nyi wudo kii na inyi ngambia, ‘Wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wochikaa wuwuto kunu konu na inengyo oruka lochikumbya ndunda tsawo.’ [
Na moho huya iho li nyefunjika-funjika. Na mohoyo nyi iho li nyi lyemmamiṟa.]”
Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wameicho mbonyi tsilya tsa mfanano na Wafarisayo wakatawuka imanya nyi adeda kyawo wa wenyi.
Wakashika maanya chando wempfunga. Wakawuya yowuo wandu walya mamwingi kipfa lilyandi waichi nyi mwikimbi.
Na Yesu kahaluo kawawia se lingi mbonyi tsa mfanano kahamba,
“Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mndu mangi alealikya mana oke wali.
Kaduma masinga halya hake hahende ilaha wai walahe na kulya walinyi. Nawo walakunde icha.

Kawuya kaduma masinga hengi kahamba, ‘Kehenda wienyi iwo wai walahe, ambuyenyi ngammaa isungusia shelya shako. Pung'a tsako tsamba ishinja na shuma sho shiike. Shose shammba. Kekucheenyi-ng'u na walinyi.’
Nawo wakammina. Wakahenda kundo kowo, umu owo kahenda demehu lyake, na ulya ungi kiṟundyonyi kyake.
Walya wadeo-ho wakawada masinga halya wakawalisa wukiwa, wakawawaha.
Kyasia mangi karihinyika nyashi. Kaduma siṟi tsake tsa shidenyi. Kaarisya wawahi walya wanda. Na mṟi fulya fowo kakoṟa na modo.
Nalyo kawia masinga halya hake, ‘Wali na wuwemewa, kyaindi nyi ili wandu wa walaheho walasumuhanyi-ho.
Kehendenyi kulya njienyi kundu tsitsahanyi, na chando mochiwona wandu muwewalaha na kunu walinyi woose.’
Na masinga halya hakahenda kulya njiehu hakaende napfo wandu wawona woose. Na ichu mbicho na ichu mcha. Mba iya yelia wali ikaichuo wahenu.
Kyasia mangi kekiida napfo nache yambuya wahenu walya, kawona-pfo mndu alaṟee nguo ya walinyi.
Nao kambia, ‘Mbuya yako, nyi wuda oida na kunu ulaṟee ma nguwo ya walinyi?’ Nao katsia ndiṟi.
Naho mangi kawia walya wepfuṟu-kanyiaho, ‘Kempfungenyi madende-ho na mawokoho. Mumkumbe ipfo meemenyi fushingie ipfo nja. Napfo nyi kochika-pfo ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.
Nyi kipfa wandu walahe nyi wafoi, kyaindi iwo wawasambuṟe wakatitya.’ ”
Nalyo Wafarisayo wakahenda ideda kyama chando wemdeha na kidedo.

Wakamdumya wa kiloshyonyi kyawo warianyi na wa Herode wakahamba, “Maarya, na luweichi nyi ukeri mohamba sha lohi, na njia ya Ruwa kowelosha ya lohi, ma okesaṟa mndupfo, nyi kipfa ulekeambuya fana ya mndu ke nyi ida na ida.
Keluwieng'u-wo, nyi ohie-ho kuda. Iwikya Kaisari okamba na kindo kiwesumuhanyi ngesa ang'u ote?”
Kyasia Yesu aichi wuwicho wulya wowo kahamba, “Nkyi ili mocha inseenga mui makulembetseṟe!
Kenjiloṟenyi kindo ki kewika okamba!” Wakamendye dinari.
Na Yesu kawawesa, “A sanamu i ikeri-ho nyi yawu na kiṟehyo-ki?”
Wakahamba, “Na sha Kaisari.” Nalyo kawawia, “Kewikyenyi-ng'u Kaisari iki kii kya Kaisari. Mbewikya na Ruwa iki kii kya Ruwa.”
Wekiicho wado wakaṟihio. Wakamdaho wakahenda.
Kyasia mfiri na fulya Wasadukayo wakamchea. Nyi wandu wekehamba ke nyi kulaipfo iṟuka lya wandu wapfu. Wakambesa kya keleluo.
Wakahamba, “A lewo maarya, Mose nyi ahambye mndu kapfa alawode wana nyi manomae echialika mka oke nawedosya na mana o mae oshari.
Kyasia kunu kodu kuwekeri-pfo wanawamka mfungade. Na ulya msongoru kaalika mka kawuya kapfa. Nao ili alawode oshari kadea manomae mka ulya oke.
Na ulya o kawi na wudo na o kaṟaṟu. Wakatana wasia wose mfungade.
Nawo woose mndu mofurumya-ho ipfa nyi mka ulya.
Aka shika-ng'u-wo ili kochishika iya maṟukyonyi ha wapfu nyi echiwa nyi mka o wu o ipfo kidi kya walya mfugadde. Chi wawemrie wose?”
Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Nyi modeko kipfa ili mulaichi ma ishi shii shiṟehye ma pfinya ya Ruwa.
Nyi kipfa ili kochishika iya maṟukyonyi ha wandu wapfu ma kochikaa-se wealika na wealikopfo. Nyi wechiwa cha wamalaika wa ruwehu.
Kyaindi kya ipfo maṟukyonyi ha wandu wapfu nyi mulasomye iki muwawie nyi Ruwa kehamba,
‘Inyi nyio Ruwa o Abrahamu na Ruwa o Isaki na Ruwa o Yakobo.’ Ruwa chi akeri o wapfupfo shila na o iwo wai na moo.”
Kyasia na mamwingi fulya fo wandu wamwicho wado wakawuko nyi madima kipfa kya mbonyi tsilya tsake alosha ado.
Kyasia Wafarisayo wameicho nyi ahaluo Wasadukayo ndiṟi, nawo wakasanza handu hamu.
Nawo ulya umu-ho akeri mndu aichi mawawaso kacha imbesa kemseenga kahamba,
“Maarya na iwawaso inene ipfo kiidi kya mbonyi tsii njiwawase nyi lya iki ngesa?”
Nao kambia, “Nyi ochikunda Mndumii opfo Ruwa, umkunde na ngoo yapfo handu hamu yose, na mrima fopfo fose na mahio hapfo hose.
Nlyo iwawaso lisongoe hoose.
Na lya kawi lifananyi nalyo nyi likeri li-ile, kunda odoo chando ukukundi moo fopfo kumonyi.
Mawawaso-ho hawi ipfo kiidi kyaho nyi harie-ho mbonyi tsii njiwawase tsose na waikimbi.”
Kyasia ili Wafarisayo wasanzie kundu kumu, Yesu kawawesa mbonyi.
Kahamba, “A iki kya Kristo nyi muhie-ho muda? Nyi akeri mana o wu?” Wakahamba, “Nyi o Dawidi.”
Kawawia, “A ili Dawidi amlahye nyi Mndumii kededa kui Mumuyo kehamba,
Mndumii alewia Mndumii oko, ‘Kedamya kunu ora loko lo kulyo na inyi njitane ngawika wakituwa wapfo ipfo shia madende hapfo.’
Kyasia-ng'u komkoya Dawidi amlahye nyi Mndumii namanye-se iwa mana oke ada?”
Naho ma kulakikae-pfo mndu moidima imhaluo ma kindo ma mokarya imbesa kindo kuwokya mfiri fulya.
Nalyo Yesu kadeda na wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
Kahamba, “Ipfo loṟike-hu lo Mose loloshya nyi kudamyepfo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo.
Kyasia-ng'u orio shindo wamembia shoose mbeshiwuta na ishihendelya. Kyaindi ipfo mawutyonyi hawo mulawute musumuhane naho.
Nawo nyi wekepfunga maṟio malemeri wakahadika wandu makosohu. Kyaindi wo wawenyi walakunde ihapaanya manya na kimnyo kyo.
Mawuto hawo hose wakahawuta kundu wawono nyi wandu. Nyi ili wekelandaṟa shingowa shi sha ngumbu sheterewa nasho wakalesha na mambo tso tsa nguwo tsawo.
Wakakunda handu hedamya ha kusonguo ili wai walahye shelya nyi mndu na shidi shedamya isho shisongoru ipfo sinagoginyi.
Na shiiṟikiṟo sheiṟikiṟo nyi wandu handu halya halandari ha mṟinyi. Na ilaho nyi wandu wawalahe nyi Rabi.
Kyaindi nyo mulalekye wandu wamulahe nyi Rabi nyi kipfa nyi umu akeriho ai mlosha onu. Na nyo mukawa nyi wanawamka moose.
Ma mulawie ma wandu nyi wande wa kunu orukenyi. Nyi kipfa nyi umu akeripfo ai ndeyanu, nyi ichu o ipfo ruwehu.
Ma mlalekye wandu wamlahe nyi wasongoru wa njia. Nyi kipfa ichu ai msongoru onu nyi umu, nyi Kristo.
Kyaindi ichu ai mnene konu nawe nyi mopfuṟukanya.
Na mokudosa amonyi nyi echikaa nanyiiro. Na mokunyiiṟa amonyi nyi echikaa nadoso.”

“Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe. Nyi ilindi mokepfunga mongo fo wumangi wo ruwehu sumhana na oshangunyi lo wandu. Nanyo ma mlechiida napfo ma wandu wawechiida napfo mlawalekye waide napfo. [

Ochia na lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe. Nyii ilindi mokelya mmba tsa waka wakusu mkamaa naho mukalembetseṟa-ho na madedo hafoi heterewa. Kyamekaa kido nanyo mukae muwone owingo luumu-umu.]

Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe! Nyi ilindi moketengeta mukakyama ipalipali na oruka luhadutsu kundu mochikuwonya mndu umu mokunda idikya. Na kombona amba, mukawuya imhaluo mana o kulya Gehena mbicho kamwida nyo kawi.
Ochia lonu mui wasongoru wa njia wapfu meso. Nyi muhambye, ke mndu molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So hekalu lya Ruwa, chi kindopfo.’ Indi molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So sahabu ya ipfo hekalunyi nyio awodo-ho.’
Mui matondo muwei na wapfu meso. Nyi kipfa iki kineneho nyi kiki ngesa, nyi sahabu-yo ang'u nyi hekalu lyo lya Ruwa linengye sahabu yo ikawa njiele?
Na molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So kitaṟa kedasya chi kindofo.’ Kyaindi molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So kindo kyedasa kii huyakyo nyio awodo nyi nyamu yake.’
Mui wandu wapfu meso. A iki kineneho nyi kiki? Ngesa nyi kilya kedasa ang'u nyi kitaṟa kedasya ikyo kiinengye kindo kedasa kikawa kyele?
Kyasia nyi kikeri-ng'u ichu molya nyamu kehamba, so kitaṟa kyedasya nyi alya nyamu nakyo na shilya shii shihekye huyakyo kawelya nasho nyamu-ḏa.
Na molya nyamu na hekalu lya Ruwa nyi alya nyamu nalyo na ichu awodepfo handu hake hekukaya kawelya nao nyamuda.
Na molya nyamu na ruwehu nyi alya nyamu na loṟika lo Ruwa lodamya na ichu adamye huyalo kawelya nao nyamu daa.”

“Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe, nyi kyailyi mokewesa wandu okamba lo shindo shilawaṟi mukada mawawaso ha wulohi, isaṟia na mwidikye, isho nsho shiwaṟi mushiwade mulechihadima isho shingi.
Mui wasongoru wa njia ya wapfu meso, mokeshishina-ho shipanu mukawuya imeṟa ngamia.

Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo makulembetseṟe, nyi ilindi mokesanya ora lo kya nja lo kirahu na kitela, kyaindi ipfo kiidi kikaichuo shindo shii shisoke sha pfinya na shii shyole sha wuseṟeṟi.
Iyo Mfarisayo kui mndu a mpfu meso! Kesonguo isanja sha ipfo kiidi kya kirahu na kitela na ora lo patehu kundu luwewa nyi luusanje.

Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe, nyi ilindi mufananyi na shipfu kundo mnying'a yeṟiko shichope shikawada kiweṟe kyeambuya ipfo kya nja. Kyaindi ipfo kiidi shikaichuo mafuo ha mnying'a na shindo shiendye tsung'a orio mbaṟi yose.
Nanyo na wudo iya kya nja nyi mokeloṟa wandu fana cha nyi mui wa wusumuhanyi, kyaindi ipfo kiidi mukaichuo ikulembetseṟa na orio wunyamaṟi wose.”

“Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe. Nyi ilindi mokewika handu heṟika mnying'a ya waikimbi mukawechopa na shipfu sha wandu wa wusumuhanyi kundu mnying'a yawo imṟike yende kiweṟe.
Mkahamba, ‘A kima lulekaawo mandi halya ha waku wadu nyi-ki?’ Nokoe so luwechisanza nawo lilyandi weola samu ya waikimbi walyapfo.
Mukatana mokuwutya owingo muwenyi ke na mukeri wana wa wewaha waikimbi walya.
Nahong'u keichuṟenying'u kiheo kya waku wanu!
Mui manjoka, mui malea ha njoka muidime muda idicha mude mulahutsio owingo lo Gehena?

Kyasia kyamba nyi wudo kii na inyi njiwe moduma konu waikimbi na wandu walaanyi na walosha wa mawawaso. Nanyo iwo maata muwawahe na iwawambia msalabenyi, na walya wengi muwakape na ngowa tsii njitochie msha ipfo kya mba kundo mokumbuhananya na iterengya mbewaterengya wawuke kunu mṟinyi ifu wadichye fulya fungi.

Nanyo kundu mochicheo nyi samu yose ii nyiole kunu masangenyi ya wandu walawode kindo wanyamaṟye, iche huye yanu iwokya samu ya mndu ulya o wusumuhanyi Abeli ukoe samu iya ya Sakaria ai mana o Barakia ulya mulewaha o makiidi hawi ha hekalu lya Ruwa na kitaṟa kyedasia.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Ikyo kyose nyi kekaa kiche huye ya rika-li lya wandu.’ ”

“Iyo Yerusalemu, iyo Yerusalemu, kui mowaha waikimbi na iwo wai wadume kopfo kowakumbya maho, na sa kafoi da mbekundi isanya shiwana shapfo na chando nguku yekesanya malea hayo ipfo shi ya makungo hayo nanyo ma malakunde.
Aii mba yanu momeideyo ilawode kindo.
Nyi kipfa ngambia, ‘Kuwokya wulalu mochikiwonana-se na inyipfo na mtane mohamba, ona nyi lo ichu mocha kui rina lya Mndumii.’ ”
Na Yesu kawuka ipfo hekalunyi kahendahenda mbele. Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na handu ai wakundi imloṟa mammba halya ha hekalu.
Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Nyi mulawonyi iho hose? Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Iya handu hakeri nyi koekaa kuleedeoho ma iho likuhekye huye ya iho lingi liḏe lilawunduo-hopfo.’ ”

Kyasia adamye alya fumwu-hu lya mashidi ha msinepfu naho walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na alyando awei hai handu ha kisekenyi wakahamba, “Keluwie-wo mbonyi tso tsekaa tsishike indi? Na kiṟingishyo kyeṟingishya ili koshika iya macheenyi hapfo na masiyonyi ha wuyana nyi kiki-wo?”
Na Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Kekuṟisenyi mulawone mndu kechimlemba.
Cha kipfa nyi kochikaa kuche sa wafoi wache kui rina lyako wahambe, ‘Inyi nyio Kristo. Wadetse wandu sa wafoi.’
Kyaindi nyi mochiicho shida na mbonyi tsihambo tsa shida. Ambuyenyi ma mulakangaṟike. Cha kipfa ma kikaki na kihende kido. Kyaindi kikamshika oo komkoya iya masiyonyipfo.
Nyi kipfa oruka lu lochiamkya oruka lungi. Na wumangi wuweamkya wumangi wungi. Kuwewada-ho na njaa na shiding'ashi shiweida-pfo kui handu kui handu.
Na shindo shi shose shikamewoneka nyi mawokyonyi ha mawukiwa halya.
Nalyo wahende imdambika wamiitse shiwirenyi na imbaha wawembaha. Nanyo mukoe musuikyo ko wandu wa masanga hose kipfa kya rina lyako.
Nalyo kukaepfo wandu sa wafoi wesukyo na iṟingyana na isuana.
Na waikimbi wehamba sha wongo wawekurepfo wafoi waduo wandu wafoi ipfo kidekyonyi.
Na ili wunyamaṟi wochipfumbuka wudo nkyo kechiinenga ikunda lya wandu wafoi lisie yololya.
Kyaindi ichu mokarishya-ho kaweda nashike ili masiyonyi nyio echikiṟo.
Na ndumi ii ya sia ya wumangi iweongoyo idung'ane kunu orukenyi kose kiwe nyi kiṟingishyo kya wandu wa masangenyi. Nalyo kushike iya masiyonyi.”
“Kyasia-ng'u kiwi kilya kya orumatso kii kihambe nyi mwikimbi ulya Danyieli ili mandi mochiwona-ng'u kiche ihoṟoka kundu kui kwele ichu mosoma namanye.
Nalyo walya wai kunu Yudaya wahende dichya kulya mafumvu-hu.
Na ichu echikoyo akeri ipfo mmbe-hu ma nalasokepfo nahende yonduo nzohoṟa tsa ipfo mba.
Na ichu echikoyo nyi ai alya demenyi ma nalawuye na numa nahende yonduo nguo yake ya huye.
Kya indi ochia nyi lo walya wekoyo wai wanene wapfe mana na walya weonza mafiri-ho.
Kyaindi terewenyi Ruwa ilindi mochidicha kilawe nyi ili kiheri kya mbeo ma ili mfiri fo Sabato.
Cha kipfa kukamshika mandi nalyo kuche shiwira sa shiingi sa shilalemewoneke kiwokya lilya mawokionyi ha wuyana itane mandi ha ha wulalu. Ma ili numa shechiwonekase shidopfo.

Na mafiri halya nokoe halawechiwihiṟowihiṟo numa hanyienyie, ma orio kindo kii na mbihu kyose kiwechiwona-se handu kechikiṟyopfo. Kyaindi nyi kipfa kya iwo wai wasambuṟe nyi kyondo mafiri halya hechiwihiṟyo-wihiṟiyo numa.”
“Nalyo mukakoya ma mndu ambia, ‘Kristo aichu kunu! Ang'u a ulya alya! Nanyo ma mlamwidikye.’
Nyi kipfa kochikurepfo Wakristo wa wongo na waikimbi wa wongo. Waweloṟa-ho na mawuto manene ha kiṟingishyo na ha kiṟiha. Nyi kundu watewe na iwo wai wasambuṟe nokoe nyi kiwechiwa.
Ambuyenyi nyi ngawoka imtutuma.
Kyasiang'u mkamkoya wembia, ‘A ulya kulya nuka! Nanyo ma mulawuke kanyi muhende-pfo. Acho ipfo shiṟihenyi sha mba sha kiidi, nanyo ma mlaidikye.’
Nyi kipfa chando mbawa yewaṟuka kulya ora lo ruwehu lo ngamenyi lukawaṟuka waṟu fukakoya kulya ora lo kiukanyi, na ili kochishika iya macheyenyi ha Mana o mndu nyi wudo kechewa.
Handu hai mnying'a na mamtonyi napfondo hekekuwumbia.”

“Indi kombona shiwiira shilya sha mafiri halya shamiida kukae handu hatutu nalyo mnengeṟi fuhaluke meema na meeri fulechikiloṟa-se ngela yafo na nyenyeri tsioloke tsiwuke ipfo ruwehu. Na pfinya tsi tsiirye alya ruwehu tsiwekupaya -- paya.

Mandi nalyo kiṟingishyo kya Mana o mndu kikuloṟe alya ruwehu. Na mbaṟi tsa wandu wa kunu orukenyi tsiwefihiṟa tsose. Nawo wawone Mana o mndu kecha akeri huya mapuchi ha ruwehu ai na pfinya ing'anyi na wusuṟi.

Nao naweduma wasu wake wa ruwehu wahende na ṟu ling'anyi lya membe na iwo wake akusambuṟye wawewasanya kundu kumu, wawawute kundu ko njotanu tso tsi tsiina wawoke ora lu lo ruwehu kundu lutsitsye washike lulya lungi kundu lutsitsye.”
“Kyaindi mkuyu-fu mukuloshe nafo mfanano kindo kifananyi nafo. Mkamkoya oṟuwe lofo luwiriwiri nanyo mukakuwutya-ho imanya ke nyi ipaṟika-ng'u kui.
Nanyo na wudo, mukamewona mbonyi tso tsiwe tsido tsoose nanyo mumanye ke amshika kufui na oo mongo.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia, mbaṟi ii ya wandu ikeri-ho yechisiapfo na kutane mbonyi tso tsawutika tsido tsose.
Kulya ruwehu kukae kunyamaṟike na kunu orukenyi, kyaindi madedo hako hawode mandi hechinyamarṟikapfo.”
“Kyaindi kya mfiri na saa iya kuipfo mndu aichi mbonyi tsayopfo ma wasu wa kulya ruwehu, manya o Mana shile na Wande amonyi.
Indi chando kiwekeri mandi halya ha Noe na ili kochishika iya macheyenyi ha Mana o mndu na wudo kechiwa.
Nyi kipfa chando wawekeripfo mafiri halya mbele ya mfu fulya fo mṟinga wechilya shelya na inyo, na ikualikia na ikualikio, washika mfiri lilyandi Noe keida na kulya isandukunyi linene.
Ma walamanye kindo mfu fulya fung'anyi fo mṟinga fukatana focha fukawakombetsa wose, na ili mandi kochishika iya macheyenyi ha Mana o mndu na wudo kechihenda iwa kido.
Nalyo wawi wakoye nyi wai alya demehu ichu umu nairo-ho na ichu ungi nadeo.
Waka wawi wakoe nyi waisa mso na iseo, ichu umu nairoho na ichu ungi nadeo.
Kelaenyi-ng'u dembo, kipfa mulaichi mkonu fulya Mndumii echicha.
Kindo mochikumbuo nyi le, mndu menyi kanyi nokoe nyi aweichi ke kamba lyeringa kio ke nyi lya indi mwiwi echicha nalyo nyi awechilaa dembo ma awechilekya mba yake isumopfo.
Kyasia kyamba nyi wudo kii nawo kewekaenyi-ho mukusungusye. Nyi kipfa Mana o mndu echicha na saa ilindi mle̱chikumbuo.”
“A nyi wu akeri-ho ai isinga lihendeli akeri na mṟango chu Mndumii ambikye mnene mokalya kulya kanyi koke nainengye na masinga wodoe shelya ili kiheri kishikye?
Sia na ya isinga lilya lyechikoya Mndumii olyo ache kambona kewuta ado.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia nyi echimbika mnene mokalya shichoṟe shake shose.
Kyaindi isinga lilya liwicho kokoya nyi lyechideda mrimenyi kolyo likahamba, ‘Mndumii nyi akeleo.’
Naho likawelya na ikapa masinga wodoe, likalya na shelya na inyo ashanganyi na iwo wananzi.
Na Mndumii o isinga lilya nyi echicha na mfiri ilindi alakumbuo na saa ilindi alaichi.
Na ipaṟa nawempaṟa makiidi hawi na ohawi loke nawemnenga namsanze na wandu wo wai makulembetseṟe. Napfo nyi kochikaa-pfo ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.”
“Nalyo wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na wana wa waka ikumi walewuka kanyi wahende yambya mndu menyi wali warie na taa tsawo.
Na iwo watanu-ho nyi matondo, na watanu-ho nyi waṟango.
Nyi kipfa lilyandi walya wai matondo waleduo taa tsawo, walahende warie mafuda.
Na walya waṟango wakaduo mafuda ipfo shihienyi shawo wawerie na ipho taenyi tsawo.
Kyasia wamkoya menyi wali akeleo wakahombya wakalaa mado handu hamu wose.
Ili kio makiidi hawi kukaamka oṟenje kye menyi walyi a ulya alya kekurenyi mhende imaambya.
Nalyo wana walya wa waka wakakure madonyi handu hamu wose wakasungusya taa tsawo.
Walya wai matondo wakawia walya waṟango, ‘Mafuda-ho muwode, keluinengenyi-ho-wo, taa tsadu nyi iruma tsii.’
Walya waṟango wakahamba, ‘Ote nyi lowona halalushikye so na nyo. Kicha-kicha-ho nyi ihenda ko wekumba shindo mukuhuṟye-pfo hanu.’
Wahendye kihuṟyonyi menyi wali kacha na walya wakusungusie wakahenda warianyi nao wakaing'anya kulya walinyi. Mongo fukapfungo.
Ili numa numa wana wa waka walya wengi wakawecha naho wakahamba, ‘Hoi Mndumii, hoi Mndumii, kelufunguye-wo mongo.’
Nao kahaluo kawawia, ‘Njimwichi nyopfo.’
Kyasia-ng'u kelaenyi-ng'u dembo kipfa ili mulaichi mfiri fo ma saayo.”
“Nyi kipfa kyawa cha kya mndu alehenda kyaṟo. Kawoka ilaha masinga halya hake kahainenga shilya awode washikalie.
Ichu kamnengia talanta tsitanu na icho ungi tsiwi na icho ungi imu. Orio mndu ose kamnengia chando kisumuhanyi na pfinya yake. Naho kahenda kyaṟo.
Ulya aambia talanta tsitanu adi kakambiṟa ihenda owinyi. Kakapakapa natso mbucha. Kawona-ho tsingi tsitanu tsa mbucha.
Na ulya o tsilya tsiwi kawewona-ho tsingi tsiwi tsa mbucha.
Kyasia ulya aduo iya imu kahenda. Kasumasuma ipfo wanda. Kaṟika fesa iya ya mndumii oke.
Kyasia mndumii o masinga halya kakaapfo kiheri kileshe katana acha. Kahamba wamwitalie shindo shilya.”
Ulya adae talanta tsilya tsitanu kacha naho kaende talanta tsingi tsitanu. Kahamba, “Mndumii, nyi talanta tsitanu unnengye. A itsi talanta tsingi tsitanu njilewona tsa mbucha.”
Mndumii oke kambia, “Nyi kulewuta necha kui isinga sa licha lihendeli. Nyi uwekeri mnene o shindo shitutu koweshihendelya. Njekuwika mnene o shindo shifoi. Henda kuidye na sienyi ya Mndumii opfo.”
Na ulya o talanta tsilya tsiwi kawecha napfo kahamba, “Hoi mndumii, nyi talanta tsiwi ulenjinenga, a itsi-se tsingi tsiwi-se njilewona tsa mbucha.”

Mndumii ulya oke kambia, “Nyi ulewuta mecha kui isinga icha sa lihendeli. Nyi uwekeri mnene o shindo sa shitutu koweshihe-ndelia. Njekuwika mnene o shindo shifoi. Henda kuidye na sienyi ya Mndumii opfo.”
Kyasia na ulya aambie talanta iya imu kawecha napfo kahamba, “Mndumii, njiwekuichi nyi ui mndu muumu nokesambuo handu kulawaye-ho, kosana handu kulakumbie-ho mbeu.
Na inyi ngaowuo ngahenda iṟika talanta iya yapfof̱o wanda. A iki kindo kyapfo okiwadang'u wulalu.”
Na mndumii oke kamhaluo kambia, “Iyo ui isinga liwicho kowewa na mdoko ili uweichi njekesambuo handu njilawaye-ho ngawesana na handu njilakumbie ho mbeu.
Aka shika-ng'u-wo chi kiwekusumuhanyi-wo ihenda kumba rupia tsako ko weilacha rupia. Na inyi ili njecha kokoya nyi njiwechiende-pfo iki kyako kii kiengerye-ho na kyako kya woakuya.
Kemsokenyi-ng'u talantayo. Muinengie ichu awode talanta ikumi.
Nyi kipfa orio mndu ose ichu awode nyi echiinengo na yengeṟyo kawengeṟyo-engeṟyo. Kyaindi ichu alawode na ikyo awode kawesoko.
Na isinga li lya maai likumbenyi ipfo meemenyi fushingye ipfo nja. Napfo kukae-pfo ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.”
“Kyaindi ilindi Manomndu echicha ai na wusumuhanyi woke arianyi na wasu wake wa kulya ruwehu wo wose, nalyo echidamya ipfo loṟike-hu lo wusuṟi woke.
Na ifo sumuhana na oshangu loke kuche sanyo-ho wandu wa masanga hose. Nao nawaletsane chando mlisi ekeletsana machondi na oṟo.
Na machondi halya nahawike ora loke lo kulyo na oṟo tsilya natsiwike ipfo ora loke lo kumoso.
Nalyo mangi echiwia walya wakeri ora loke lo kulyo, ‘Kenjonyi mui wawikei ona nyi Wande oko. Kehenda kaenyi kyoṟenyi kya wumangi kyanu muwasuṟumiye kuwokya masanga hambiko.
Nyi kipfa njiwewodo nyi njaa mukannenga shelya. Mbei mangari mukanjirutsa mṟinga. Mbei mhenu mukanjionduo na konu.
Mbekeri kitaṟe mukanṟika nguwo. Mbeluo mukacha njisahia. Mbei mbike ipfo mba ko wapfungo mkanjichyea.’
Nalyo wandu walya wa wusumuhanyi wechimhaluo wahambe, ‘Hoi Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona kuwodo nyi njaa lukakuinenga kando keihuda? Ang'u kui mangari lukakurutsa mṟinga?
A nyi indi lulekuwona kui mhenu lukakuonduo na kodu? Ang'u kui kitaṟe lkakuṟika nguwo?
A nyi indi lulekuwona kuluo ang'u kumbike ipfo mba ya ko wapfungo lukakucheya?’
Na mangi nahaluo nawawie, nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Orio kindo kyose chando mulewutya wanawawama wako iwo watutu ya wose ma ichu umu-ho nyio inyi mulenjiwutya.’ ”
“Nalyo mangi echiwia na walya wa ora lo kumoso nahambe, ‘Njiwukenyi nyo mui wasese, muhende ipfo modonyi foekaa mulangana ifo fui fusungusye fo Satan na wasu walya wake.
Na kipfa njiwewodo nyi njaa ma mlannenge shelya. Mbei mangari ma mlanrutse mṟinga.
Mbei mhenu ma mlanjionduo na kanyi konu. Na kitaṟe ma mlanjiṟike nguwo. Njiweluo mbei mbike na ipfo mba ko wapfungo ma mlache nsahya.’
Nalyo na wudo wechihaluo wahambe, ‘A Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona kuwodo nyi njaa ang'u kui mhenu ang'u kui kitaṟe ang'u kuluo ang'u kumkumbe ipfo mba ko wapfungo naso lukada lulakufuṟukanya?’
Nalyo echiwahaluo nahambe, ‘Nyi kya lohi ngambia, orio kindo kyose chando muleda mulawutya iwo watutu ya wose ma ichu umu-ho nyio inyi muleda mulanjiwutya.’
Nawo wahende malisyonyi ha wukiwa wokaa mlungana na walya wa wusumuhanyi wawehenda ipfo kiidi kya moo fo mlungana.”
Kikawa Yesu ammaa ideda madedo halya hose naho kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake,
“Na muweichi ke komtiṟa-se kawi ili lya kaṟaṟu nyi lyelya Pasaka. Na Manomndu nadambiko nahende wa-mbyo msalabenyi.”
Nalyo wakohanyi walya wanene wakasanza handu hamu na wasongoru wa ipfo wandunyi wakasanzia alya osehu lo mkohanyi mnene ulya ewio nyi Kayafa.
Wakadeda kyama chando wechiwada Yesu kui mtambo na imbaha wambahe.
Wakahamba, “Ma chi ili lya mfiri mnenepfo kuwone kochiamka kituṟu wandunyi.”
Kyasia Yesu akeri kulya Betanyia ipfo mba ko Simon ulya awewodo nyi iwawe.
O handu ai kukacha napfo mka arie chupa ya Alabasiteronyi iwode mafuda ha wuhuru wung'anyi. Kacha kampusuya oo mdonyi adamie ipfo kilionyi kya shelya.
Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi wekiwona kiwe kido wakasuo wakahamba, “A kindo-ki kyadetsyo kido wanda nyi kyaki?
Nakyo nyi kiwechiḏima ihenda ikumbo kya wuhuru wung'anyi na iinenga wandu wakiwa.”
Yesu kamanya nyi waihamba wado kawawia, “Itane mowinyisha-winyisha mkachu nyi ki? Nyi kipfa nyi kindo kicha anjiwutia.
Wandu wakiwa nyi mochikaa nawo mfiri yose, kyaindi kyako inyi mochikaa na inyi mfiri yosepfo.
Nyi kipfa ili anjipusuya mafuda-ha kunu mbihunyi koko nyi anjiwutia kya ihenda ṟiko.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Orio handu hose komeongoyo ndumi ii ya sia kunu orukenyi na kyake anjiwutie napfondo kyehambo kundu nakumbuo-pfo.’ ”
Nalyo umu akeri o ipfo kiidi kya walya ikumi na wawi ewio rina lyake nyi Yuda Iskariote kahenda ipfo ko wakohanyi walya wanene.
Kahamba, “Nyi kiki mokunda injiinenga na inyi njimueke imdambika konu?” Wakamteṟya-ho kiheo kya rupia makumi haṟaṟu.
Kuwokya-lyo kawa mopfula mwaanya chando echimdambika.
Kyasia ili kushikie mafiri halya helya mkate ilamtarang'ashe ili lya kuwoka nalyo walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na alyando Yesu ai wakahamba, “Nyi ku ukundi luhende ikusungusya shelya sha Pasaka?”
Nao kahamba, “Kehendenyi ipfo mṟinyi ko mang'anya. Mumbie, Maaria akuwia, ‘Kiheri kyako kyamshika kufui.’ Nyi kunu kopfo njewuta mṟumo fo Pasaka na iwo wa kiloshyonyi kyako.”
Na walya wa kiloshyonyi wakahenda iwuta chando Mndumii awawasye. Wakasungusia Pasaka.
Kyukanyi komeila wakacha damya kilionyi kya shelya na walya ikumi na wawi wa kiloshyonyi.
Wechilya shelya kahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, umu o kunu kiidi kyanu echinjidambika-ho.”
Nawo wakasokyo mnu nyi fowa ing'anyi wakadeda nao kui umu kui umu wehamba, “A ngesa nyi inyi Mndumii?”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Nyi icho njechisotsya nao owoko ipfo kitelenyi nyio echinjidambika-ho.
Mana o mndu ihenda na ahende chando kiwei kiṟehye kyake. Kyaindi ochia nyi lo mndu ulya echidambika-ho Manomndu. Iki nyi kiwei kicha-ho nokoe mndu ulya alalefeo.”
Kyasia mṟingi ulya oke Yuda kamhaluo kahamba, “A ngesa nyio inyi, Maaria?” Yesu kamhaluo, “Nawo ohamba.”
Kyasia ili welya shelya Yesu kaira-ho mkate kaidapfuma Ruwa kafufunja shifunjo kainengya walya wa kiloshyonyi kahamba, “Ngenyi mlye. Iki nyi mbihu foko.”
Kawuya kawewada na kirahu kaidapfuma Ruwa kawainengya kahamba, “Nyonyi-ho mose.
Iki nyi samu yako ya mkundano mhya ikeri yolo kipfa kya wandu wafoi kya ihoṟyo nyonjamaṟo.
Na inyi ngambia. Kuwokya wulalu njechikinyo-se iki kiwukye kilimunyi kii kya msabibupfo, na njitane ngashika mfiri ili njechinyoya-ho wuhya njii nanyo ipfo wumanginyi wo Wande.”
Wamshika wakaimba shiimbo shilya wakawuka mba wakashika kulya fumwunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu.
Nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Kio-ki nyi mochikoya moendyo wusutsu nyi inyi moose. Nyi kipfa ili kii kiṟehye ke nyi njechikapa mlisi na machondi ha ipfo iponyi hawerahanyikya ipfo na ipfo.
Kya indi ili numa ngammaa njecha imusongoya njihende kulya Galilaya.”
Kyasia Petro kahamhaluo kambia, “Manya wakusukyo nyi iyo wose, inyi njechisukyo nyi iyo ma ngashika indi ma indifo.”
Yesu kambia, “Nyi kya lohi ngakuwia, kio na iki olong'onyi lulamekapa na iyo nyi ochinjikana kaṟaṟu.”
Petro kambia, “Kiti njikukane na njipfe njisanzo na iyo!” Na walya wa kiloshyonyi wakawehamba wado wose.
Nalyo Yesu kahenda nawo kashika alya kyungunyi kii kiiṟihye kundu kui kulahe nyi Getisemane. Kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi, “Kedamyenyi aa njitane ngashika ipfo njiterewe.”
Nao kahenda arie Petro na wana walya wa Sebedayo wa wawi kawoka isokyo nyi fowa na iṟeweṟewe.
Nalyo kawawia, “Mrima foko nyi fuwodo mnu nyi fowa fukatana fokoya opfu. Kaenyi iya mlae dembo na inyi.”

Kahenda-henda sa hatutu kaho wanda na kyamu kechiterewa kahamba, “Hoi Wande, kokoya na kechikuw̱ia kirahu ki kiide mbele yako kinjihyame. Kya indi ma kilawe nyi chando inyi ngakunda indi kiwe chando okunda iyo.”
Kacha na alyando wa kiloshyonyi wawei, kakoya wamelaa mado. Kawia Petro, “Nyi mlaidima ilaa na inyi dembo mushike ma saa imu?
Kelaenyi dembo na iterewa muterewe Ruwa mulawone mochiolokya handu ha kiheshyonyi. Ngoo yo kyayo nyi ii njilalutsu kya indi mbihu fo fukalehela.”
Kawuya kahenda lya kawi iterewa kahamba “Hoi Wande, kokoya kilechikuw̱iia kya kirahuki kiide kinjihyame ngamda ndamaa nyo-ho nahong'u kikuwiie chando ukundi iyo.”
Kacha-pfo kawekoya-se wamlaa mado lya kawi. Nyi kipfa ili meso hawo hawei malemeri.
Kawada-ho kahenda lingi-se katerewa lya kaṟaṟu. Na madedo ahamba na halya ha kuwoka.
Nao kacha na alyando wa kiloshyonyi wai kawawia, “Na mowekaa mochilaa mado na isiya moo? Aii saa yameshika Mana o mndu nahende dambikyo ipfo mawokonyi ha wandu wanyamaṟi.
Kekurenyi luhende. Mndu monjidambika-ho amcha.”

Ili aideda ado alamhutsya adi a ulya Yuda ai umu o ipfo kiidi kya walya ikumi na wawi. Kacha warianyi na wandu wafoi warie njoshu na shiṟeta wa wadume nyi wakohanyi walya wanene na wasongoru wa ipfo wandunyi.
Na ulya momdambikaho nyi awewateṟie kiṟingishyo kahamba, “Icho njemhekya momu nyio-ng'u. Nyio mndu mochimbada!”
Adi kakambiṟa ihenda alyando Yesu ai kahamba, “Ngakuiṟikiṟa Maarya!” Kawuya kamhekia momu.
Yesu kambia, “Mbuya yako a kimaduma kocha naa nyi kiki?” Nalyo wakacha naho wakaleshya Yesu mawoko wakambada.
Nalyo adi a ichu umu o ipfo kiidi walya wai na Yesu kahoṟuo owoko kasomuo oshu lulya loke kamanya nalo isinga lya mkohanyi ulya mnene kamdumbuo kudu.
Nalyo Yesu kambia, “Kewihiṟa oshu lopfo na ipfo kiṟandenyi. Kipfa orio wandu wewada oshu wose, na oshu wechidetso nalo.
A ngesa nyi ohamba njilawechiidima iwesa Wande nao nanjiwutye wasu wa ruwehu wafoi kota siṟi ikumi na tsiwi.
Kokoya nyi wudo a shilya shii shiṟehye nyi wuda shiwechiidima-se iyawukya ke na kihende kido?”

Saa na iya Yesu kawia mamwingi fulya fo wandu, “Nyi mowuka kanyi mui cha nyi ko mndu moala njia muihenda murie njoshu na shiṟeta muche injiwada. A ili njilewa modamya ipfo hekalunyi lya Ruwa mafiri hose njelosha nanyo ma mlanjiwade.
Nakyo kyose kimaduma kikahenda kido nyi shilya shii shiṟehye nyi waikimbi kundu shechiinukya.” Nalyo walya wa kiloshyonyi wakamda wakadicha wose.
Kyasia na walya walewada Yesu wakamduo kulya ko mkohanyi ulya mnene Kayafa. Na walosha walya wa mawawaso napfondo wasanzie na wandu walya wasongoru.
Na Petro kacha numa ai kuleshe katana ashika alya osehu ko mkohanyi ulya mnene kaida napfo. Kadamya handu hamu na wapfurukanyi wakeri-pfo naambuye handu kyeshika.
Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wasanganyi na wanjama wa kyamenyi kya Sinedrio wose wakashihya Yesu owingo lo wongo kundu wambonye opfu.
Ma walawone, na wehamba-ho njowingo tsa wongo wawehoṟoki-ho sa wafoi. Ili numa kukacha naho wawi.
Wakahamba, “Mndu-chu nyi elehamba, njechiidima isanja hekalu lya Ruwa njiliwike lya kawi mfiri iṟaṟu njimae.”
Na mkohanyi ulya mnene kahoṟoka kambia, “A nyi kulahamba ma shehaluo ishi sha wandu-wa waihamba-ho shekuwinga?”
Na Yesu katsia sau. Na mkohanyi ulya mnene kahaluo kambia, “Ngakulisa-ng'u nyamu so Ruwa chu menyi moo uluwie kokoya na ukeri Kristo kui Mana o Ruwa!”
Yesu kambia, “Naakyo ohamba. Na inyi ngambia, wokya wulalu mochiwona Mana o mndu adamye ipfo ora lo kulyo lo pfinya-ii itoṟye akeri icha ai huyaa mapuchi ha ruwehu.”
Nalyo mkohanyi ulya mnene karanduo nguwo tsake tsilya tsa huye kahamba, “Nyi aruma Ruwa! Nyi kiki luwode-se lochishiha wehamba-ho shewinga mondu foke. A iki-ng'u momiicho kirumo kyake kyeruma Ruwa.
Nyi muhiye-ho muda?” Nawo wakahaluo wakahamba, “Kindo kimsumuhanye na opfu!”
Nalyo wakamiselya mnyeri oshangunyi loke wakamkapa na nzina. Walya wengi wakamkapa na shidi.
Wakahamba, “kui Kristo malasha nyiu akukapa?”
Kyasia Petro kadamya ipfo nja alya osehu. Na mka isinga kacha na alyando ai kahamba, “Ne iyo na uwekeri na Yesu ichu o kulya Galilaya!”
Nao kakana wandu walya waiho woose kahamba, “Njichi ma ikyo ohambapfo.”
Kyasia akeri iwuka-ho nashike oo kichuminyi mka isinga ungi kambona-ho, kawia walya wakeripfo, “Mndu-chu nyi awekeri na Yesu-chu kulya Nasareti.”
Nao kakana lingi kelia-ho na nyamu kehamba, “Manya njichi mndu-chu inyipfo.”
Oweṟe kitutu walya wahoṟoki-ho wakacha naho wakawia Petro, “Na lohi na iyo nyi mndu o ipfo kiidi kyawo. Nyi kipfa kindo kyakuhamba nyi mdedye fopfo.”
Nalyo kawoka ikusesa na ilya nyamu kehamba, “Manya njichi mndu-chupfo.” naho adi olong'onyi lukakapa.
Na Petro kakumbuo kidedo kilya Yesu ambie ke olong'onyi lulamkapa nyi ochinjikana kaṟaṟu. Naho kawuka-ho kahenda kulya nja kalia kaingelea.
Kyasia komshika ngamenyi wakohanyi wanene wakadeda kyama wose na wandu wasongoru wa oruka kya Yesu chando wechimbutya opfu.
Wakampfunga wakamduo wakamdambikya ipfo ko mchili ulya o oruka Pontio Pilato.
Na Yuda ulya amdambikye-ho ili ambona nyi ambutyo owingo, nalyo kawuya iwado nyi mchenyede. Rupia tsilya makumi haṟaṟu awemnenge katsiwihiṟya wakohanyi walya wanene na wandu walya wasongoru.
Kahamba, “Ngamnyamaṟa lyandi njiledambika-ho samu ilai na mti.” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi kii-se kida naso? Ambuya iyo kumonyi.”
Nao kakumba rupia tsilya kulya hekalunyi. Kasheṟuka-pfo. Kahenda ikuotsuo.
Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wakaira rupia tsilya wakahamba, “Chi kisumuhanyi lutsiwike ipfo kisenyi keṟika shindo sheinenga Ruwapfo kyamba nyi wuhuru wo samu.”
Wakadeda kyama wakahuṟa natso dema lilya liweho lya mndu mowumba nungu. Wakalihuṟa lyeṟika mnying'a ya wahenu.
Nakyo kikainenga dema lilya likadeo rina nyi dema lya samu itane inu.

Nalyo kilya kii kidede nyi mwikimbi Yeremia kikahoya-ho kido kehamba, “Nyi waleduo rupia tsilya makumi haṟaṟu tsii wuhuru wohuṟa ichu amambie wuhuru woke chando wushikye ichu wana wa Israeli waleambuya wuhuru chando ashikye.
Wakatsiwika tsehuṟa dema lya mndu mowumba nungu na chando Mndumii awenjiwawasye.”
Kyasia na Yesu awehoṟoki ipfo oshangunyi lo mchili moitoṟya oruka. Na mchili kambesa kahamba, “Iyo nyi mangi ya Wayuda?” Yesu kahamba, “Nakyo ohamba.”
Na ili kekumbo nyi wakohanyi walya wanene na wandu wasongoru ma nalahaluo kindo.
Nalyo Pilato kambia, “A nyi kulaichuo ishi waikukumba-ho nasho sa shifoi?”
Nao ma nalamhaluo ma kidedo ma kimu.
Itane mchili ulya moitoṟya oṟuka arihio mnu kyasia kya mchili ulya moitoṟia oruka ilyi kui mfiri mnene nyi echipfunguya wandu mndu ampfunge umu-ho ichu wechimkunda-ho.
Na mandi halya kuwewode mndu mpfunge umu ahendye ṟamba, ewio rina lyake nyi Baraba.
Kyasia wamidima isanza kundu kumu Pilato kawawia, “Nyi uhya mokunda njimfunguye, ngesa nyi Baraba a ngesa nyi Yesu chu ewio nyi Kristo?”
Nyi kifa lyandi aichi ke kindo wacha mdambikya-ho na wunyenyi.

Kyasia ili adamye alya loṟike-hu lodumbuya mondu, mka ulya oke kamdumya ndumi kahamba, “Ma kulawone kochilungyaho kyapfo na mndu chu o wusumuhanyi. Nyi kifa ngawona wukiwa wufoi inu kilodyonyi kipfa kyake.”
Na wakohanyi walya wanene wasanganyi na wandu wasongoru wakahaaya wandu kundu wechi-terewya Baraba, na Yesu wamdetse.
Kyasia mchili ulya moitoṟya oruka kahaluo kahamba “A wandu-wa wawi nyi uhya-ho mokunda njimfunguye?” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi Baraba!”
Pilato kawawia, “A Yesu, ichu amhambe nyi Kristo kyake njimbike-ng'u njida?” Wakahamba handu hamu wose, “Nawambyo msalabehu!”
Nao kahamba, “A nkiki kiwicho alewuta?” Wakaengeṟa ifahya wakahamba, “Nawambyo msalabehu!”
Kyasia ili Pilato alewona alaidima iwuta-ho kindo na kitohyo kya wandu nyi ihenda keng'ana mnu kii, nao kahamba, “Inyi njii mharami na samu ya mndu-chu o wusumuhanyi. Ambuyenyi kyanu nyo!”
Naho wandu wakahaluo mhaluye fumu wose wakahamba, “Samu yake na ilusokye so na wana wadu.”
Nalyo kawapfunguya Baraba. Na Yesu kasonguo imkapa na ngowa itso tsii njitochye msha. Kawuya kamdambika-ho nahende wambyo msalabe-hu.
Nalyo wasikari wa mchili ulya moitoṟya oruka wakaduo Yesu mṟinyi kundo wasikari wekekaa. Na siṟi ya wasikari ikacha ikuwumbya nao yose.
Wakambuta nguwo. Wakawuya wakamṟika nguwo ya mawoko ifanyi king'aring'ari.
Wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakamṟika ipfo mdonyi koke. Wakamnengia na iṟeṟe ipfo owokonyi loke lo kulyo.
Wakampfirya ndi wakamtaluo wehamba, “Lokuiṟikiṟi iyo mangi ya Wayuda.”
Wakamiselya mnyeri. Wakawada iṟeṟe lilya wakamkapa nalyo ipfo mdonyi foke. Wakamduo nahende wambyo msalabehu.
Warie njia yehenda wakawona mndu awuka kulya Kirene ewio nyi Simon. Nawo wakamitikya nakudike msalaba fulya foke.
Wamidima shika kulyando kui kulahe nyi Goligota nakyo nyi kimu na ihamba nyi mbuonyi.
Wakamnenga mwinyo fumsangane na mṟinga fo nduu nanyo. Amefusaha nalakunde inyo.
Wameidima imbambya msalabehu wakahawana nguwo tsilya tsake wewika kuṟu kuhya.
Wakadamya-ho wemringa.
Na oo huyaa mdo foke wakaṟehya-ho kya owingo loke. Ke ichu nyio Yesu ai mangi ya Wayuda.
Nalyo kuiho weala njia wawi wakawawambya msalabehu handu hamu nao. Ulya umu kakaa oo ora lo kulyo na ungi kakaa oo ora lo kumoso.
Na walya waida-ho wakamruma wesingitsa-singitsa mdo yawo.
Wakahamba, “Kui mosanja hekalu koliwika lya kawi mfiri iṟaṟu likawa kekukiṟe-ng'u kumonyi; kokoya na uwekeri Mana o Ruwa kesoka-ng'u kunu msalabehu!”
Na wakohanyi walya wanene warianyi na walosha wa mawawaso na wandu wasongoru na wudo wakawemtaluo wakahamba, “A lyandi alekiṟa wengi nalaidime ma ikukiṟa-ng'u amonyi.
Chi ai mangi ya Israeli nakesokang'u kunu msalabehu naso lumidikye!
Nyi awekusirye na Ruwa nakemashuong'u-ho kokoya nyi amkundi. Nao nyi alehamba nyi ai Mana o Ruwa?”
Na walya weala njia walya wai wawambye msalabenyi handu hamu nao wakawemruma wado.
Kyasia kuwokya saa ya kaṟandaṟu kukaho meema kulya orukenyi kose fukashika saa kenda.
Kukeri kufui na saa kenda Yesu kalaha na ṟu ling'anyi kehamba, “Eli Eli lama sabakitanyi?” Kii cha ili kehambo, “Ruwa oko, Ruwa oko, nkili onjidea?”
Na wandu wahoṟokia-ho walya mata wameicho kechihamba ado wakahamba, “Nyi ailaha Elia.”
Naho kudi ulya umu-ho kahenda kedicha, kaende kindo keonga mṟinga. Kakiichuṟa mṟinga fotarang'aa. Kawika iwale-hu kamrutsa nalyo.
Na walya wengi wakahamba, “Leka luambuye Elia kokoya na echicha nache imkira.”
Kyasia Yesu amidima ilaha lya kawi na ṟu ling'anyi-se nalyo kalekya moo.
Nalyo ambuya, isulia lilya lyeshingya ipfo hekalunyi likaranduka ipfo makiidi hawi liwuka tsindenyi likapahukya mdonyi. Na wanda ikadedema na maho-ho manene hakapaṟika.
Na ipfo mbangenyi kundu mnying'a imṟike kukaṟuhuka. Na mbihu ya wandu waele wafoi walemepfa kacha ikaṟuka.
Wakakure kulya mbangenyi kundo wawei waṟike. Na ili numa amidima iṟuka wakacha na kulya mṟinyi mwele wakakuloṟa na wandu wafoi.

Kyasia mchili ulya o siṟi ya ihana wakeri-pfo na walya weringa Yesu wamidima iwona kiding'ashi kilya kyaida-ho na shindo shilya shawutika wakaowuo mnu wakahamba, “Na lohi ichu nyi awekeri mana o Ruwa.”
Kyaindi nyi kukeri-ho na waka sa wafoi wechiambuya-ho wai kuleshe. Nyi walya wechioshana na Yesu wawuka kulya Galilaya kundu wempfuṟukanya.
Na ipfo kiidi kyawo nyi kukeri-pfo Maria o kulya Magidala na Maria chu mae o Yakobo na Yosefu, na mae o wana wa Sebedayo.
Kyasia ili kushikye kyukanyi kukacha napfo mndu msuṟi awuka kulya Arimatia, ewio rina lyake nyi Yosefu. Nao nyi awekeri mndu o kiloshyonyi kya Yesu.
Nyio alehenda kulya ko Pilato kamterewa mnying'a fulya fo Yesu. Nalyo Pilato kawawasa nahende fuinengyo.
Na Yosefu kaduo mnying'a fulya. Kafuorowia nguwonyi tsa owiṟo tsikengemae.
Kahenda fuṟika rungunyi lyake lihya lilya atorongochye kulya ihonyi. Amiidima ipiṟimitsya iho sa inene oo momu-hu fo rungu lilya kakuhendya.
Indi alya kuweiho Maria o kulya Magidala warianyi na Maria ulya ungi wadamie oo sumuhana na rungu lilya.
Kyasia ili ngamenyi ya ili lya ngama lyeituma mfiri fulya foṟeheṟa kukasangana wakohanyi walya wanene na Wafarisayo ipfo ko Pilato.
Wakahamba, “Mndumii, lombuya ikumbuo mlembi ulya, lyandi i na moo, ke nyi alehamba, njetiṟa mfiri iṟaṟu njiwuye iṟuka.

Kewawasa-ng'u-wo opanga lulya luhende iringo itane mfiri fo kaṟaṟu. Walya wa kilsohyonyi walawone wechicha imiiwa-ho. Wawie na wandu, ke nyi amṟuka awuka ko wapfu. Na wulembi wo wofurumya wuwone wochiwichuo wuide na wulya wo kuwoka.”
Pilato kawawia, “Kiringo kyeringa-ho na mochiwona. Kekuhendyenyi muteesye-ho chando mbeichi muwenyi.”
Wakahenda wakateesya opanga lulya wakawika kiṟingishyo kiwode ofano lowo alya ihohu kukeri-pfo na kiringo kilya.
Kyasia mfiri fo Sabato fomiida ili kokya kushikye mfiri fo kuwoka fo mfungade nalyo Maria o kulya Magidala wakacha na Maria ulya ungi wakahenda sahia opanga lulya.
Naho kudi a iki kiding'ashi kyaida-ho sa kiapfinya. Nyi kipfa msu o Mndumii alesoka awuka ipfo ruwehu.
Na fana yake kafana cha mbawa, na nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu cha makuṟeṟa.
Na kipfa kya wowu, walya weringa-ho wakadosa mtara wakawa cha wapfie.
Kyasia msu ulya o Ruwa kahaluo kawia waka walya, “Ma mlawone mochiowuo. Na njichi nyi mukeri ipfula Yesu ichu awei mbambye msalabehu.
Nakeri iyapfo. Nyi amṟuka na chando alewehamba. Njonyi muambuye na handu awemlaṟe.
Na ihenda mkambiṟe ihenda owinyi mkewia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake ke nyi amṟuka awuka ko wapfu. Ambuyenyi nyi echimsongoya nahende kulya Galilaya. Mpfondo mochimbona. A ikyo-ng'u ngambia-ng'u.”
Nawo wakakambiṟa ikure owinyi alya opangenyi wawodo nyi wuowu wusanganyi na sia. Wakadicha wakahenda yongoya walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
Naho wadi a ichu Yesu acha wakumbuhana kehamba, “ngamwiṟikiṟa.” Wakacha naho wakambada madende wakamolokya ndenyi.
Nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Ma mlaowuo! Kehenda ongoyenyi wanawawama wahende kulya Galilaya. Mpfondo wechinjiwona.”
Kyasia warie njia yehenda kudi a walya wandu wa kiringo maata-ho wakacha na kulya mṟinyi. Wakahenda yongoya wakohanyi walya wanene shindo shilya shawutika shido shose.
Wakasanza handu hamu na wasongoru wakadeda kyama. Wakainenga wasikari walya rupia tsingiki.
Wakahamba, “Hambenyi nyi walya wa kiloshyonyi wacha na kio wakamiwa-ho lulee mado.
Nakyo kokoya kemanyikya ma ipfo ko mchili moitoṟya oruka na lochimanjaṟya-nja-ṟya luwembonya ikukaya kipuo.”
Nawo wakaduo rupia tsilya wakahenda wuta chando waa waloshe. Na idedo li likahambo ipfo kiidi kya Wayuda likadung'anana likashika itane inu.
Kyasia walya ikumi na umu wa kiloshyonyi wakahenda kulya Galilaya kulya fumvunyi kundu Yesu awewawawasye.
Wakambona wakamolokya wanda na walya maata wawodo nyi mkeukeu.
Na Yesu kacha na alyando wai kadeda nawo kahamba, “Nyi njimnengye pfinya yose ya ipfo ruwehu na ya kunu wuyana.
Kyasia kehendenying'u mukehaluo mkambo ya wandu yose wawe wa kiloshyonyi kyako muwewapatisya rina lya Wande na Mana na Mumuyo Mwele.
Mbewalosha wakae na mbonyi tsilya njimbawasye tsose. Nahong'u ambuyenyi njii nanyo mafiri hose na kuwede kushike ili masiyonyi ha wuyana.”
Mawookyenyi ha Ndumi ya Sia ya Yesu Kristo Mana o Ruwa.
Chando ki kiṟehye ko mwikimbi Yesaya, “Ambuya njekaa njidume msu oko mosonguo oshangunyi lopfo, nao nakuekye sungusia njia yapfo.”
Ṟu lya mndu moedia kundo ko nuka, “Keachikyenyi njia ya Mndumii mbedamiṟa na njomongo tsake.”
Kulewoneka Yohane Mpatisi kechipatisa kundo ko nuka na ionguo wupatiso wodumbuya, kundu Ruwa nawahoṟie njonyamaṟo tsawo.
Wakamhendia wandu woose wa isangenyi lyose lya Yudaya na Wa Yerusalemu wose wakapatiso nyio alya medenyi fo Yordanyi, wechitocha njonyamaṟo tsawo.
Nao Yohane aweṟee nguwo ya mafafuta ha ngamia na ngometa ya njonyi oo kitsinyi kyake, echilya nzihe na wuki wo mbakonyi.
Kaonguo kahamba, “Kuicha mndu numa yako sa anjing'anye, sa njilasumuhanye njiarame ipfunguo ngowa tsa shadu shakye.
Inyi njilemupatisa na mṟinga, kya indi o nyi echimupatisa na Mumuyo Mwele.”
Kyasia na mfiri iya Yesu kacha awuka kulya Nasareti ya kulya Galilaya kapatiso nyi Yohane medenyi fo Yordanyi.
Nalyo liyenyi kechido alya mṟingenyi, kawona ruwehu kochiṟuhuka, nao Mumuyo kechimsokya cha mbeta.
Ṟu likacha ruwehu likahamba, “Iyo nyi ui manoko mkunde, sa ngachihyo kyake.”
Naho kudi Mumuyo kamduo kundo ko nuka.
Kakaa kulya nuka mkonu makumi haana, kechihesho nyi Satana, akeri-pfo na mando ha nuka, wamalaika wakawa mompfuṟukanya.
Kyasia Yohane amhenda ikumbo kipfungonyi, Yesu kacha na Galilaya, kechionguo Mbonyi Njicha ya Ruwa.
Kahamba, “Kye kiheri kyamcha, na wumangi wo Ruwa womeafukya kufui. Kedumbuyenyi mbeidikya Mbonyi tso Njicha.”
Kyasia kyechiida mawambao ha nduwa ya lya Galilaya kawona wadehi wawi, Simon na Andrea manomae wechiolotsa mdeho wadehe makunga.
Yesu kawawia, “Kyenjonyi, mche ioshana na inyi na inyi mbemhaluo muwe wadehi wedeha wandu.”
Wadi wakadaho mdeho iya yawo wakaoshana nao.
Naho kahendahenda kitutu kawewona Yakobo na Yohane; wana wa Sebedayo, wakeri alya ngalawenyi yawo, wechisungusia mdeho iya yawo.
Nalyo kudi Yesu kawalaha; wakada ndeeyawo Sebedayo, ai ipfo ngalawenyi handu hamu na waekelei wakawuka-pfo wakaoshana nao.
Wakashika mṟinyi fo Kapernaumu; nalyo liyenyi kawoka ilosha mfiri fo Sabato ipfo sinagogenyi.
Wandu wose waimwadanyia wakawa mkahai kya mloshye fulya fokye; kipfa, chando ailosha, kikawa cha kya mndu awode chila, kilawe cha kya walosha wa wuwawaso.
Nalyo liyenyi kukacha naho mndu awodo nyi mṟufu o ngafu acha na sinagogenyi yawo kafihiṟa.
Kahamba, “Uwode-ki naso iyo, Yesu Mnasareti? Nyi ucheye nolurumatse? Lukuichi iyo nyio u, nyi ui Mwele o Ruwa.”
Yesu kamtoloma, “Tsia-ng'u, nombuke mundu-chu!”
Mṟufu fulya fo ngafu fukamrakwo-rakwo kafihiṟa na ṟu ling'anyi fukambuka.
Wandu wose wakaṟihyo wewesana wechihamba, “Ikyo nyi kiki? A ifu mloshye mhya? Mndu-chu nawode pfinya! Na waṟufu wa ngafu awawawasa, nawo wakamwidikya.”
Nahong'u mbonyi tsa Yesu tsikadung'ana owinyi kulya orukenyi lo Galilaya kose.
Wamewuka ipfo sinagogenyi wadi wakahenda ipfo mba ko Simon na Andrea warianyi na Yakobo na Yohane.
Kyasia mamka o Simon awelee kitaṟenyi awodo nyi modo, wadi wakambia kyake.
Yesu katikiria afui kamhoṟotsa kechimbada owoko, modo fukamlekya kawapfuṟukanya.
Kyasia ili kyukanyi mnengeṟi fochiolokya, wakamendye Yesu wandu wose wakeri iwawyo na sa wawodo nyi waṟufu wawicho.
Wandu wose wa mṟi fulya wakakuumbia alya mongonyi.
Yesu kachiṟa wafoi waweluo ndaṟe tsifoi kafuna waṟufu wawicho wafoi, nalawalekye wededa, nyi kipfa wawemwichi kye nyiu.
Kyasia ili lya ngama ngamenyi kilahala kilamedo kawuka-pfo kahenda handu ha kiseekenyi katerewia-pfo.
Simon hamu na wodoe walya wengi wakamwosha.
Wekimbona wakambia, “Orio mndu naikupfula.”
Yesu kawawia, “Ndenyi luhende mṟinyi ingi ya ipfo mṟasenyi kundu njiwe moonguo pfo mbonyi, cha kipfa kindo kienengye ngacha na ikyo.”
Nahong'u kacha na Galilaya kechionguo ipfo masinagonyi hawo hose na ifuna waṟufu wawicho.
Mndu umu awodo nyi iwawe kachea Yesu kamterewa kechimolokya ndenyi kambia, “Kokukundya, nochiidima njiheṟemtsa.”
Yesu Kamichyo wukiwa kahoṟuo owoko loke kampaya kahamba, “Na njikundi, heṟemka-ng'u!”
Nalyo liyenyi iwawe lilya lyikambuka kaheṟemtso.
Yesu kamkekedya adi kamfuna kambawasa,
“Ambuya kalawie ma mndu ma kindo, kya indi henda kuloṟe kulya ko mkohanyi nowewika mwano kya iheṟemtso lyapfo chando Mose awawasie shiwe kiṟingishyo kowo kye omechia.”

Kya indi mndu ulya kawuka-pfo kawoka yonguo kafoi na idung'anyitsa mbonyi tso, orio handu, Yesu alaidime-se iida na mṟinyi na pata, kya indi kakaa hando ha nuka. Ma kudo wandu wakacha na hando ai wakuwukye njora tsose.
Mfiri njiangu yamesia, Yesu kawuya-se na Kapernaumu, wandu wakaicho kye ipfo mba ai.
Wandu wafoi mnu wakakuumbia-pfo kulakeri-se handu ma oo mongo Yesu kawaoongoya mbonyi tsake,
wakacha wechimendye mndu a muumu shiwungo ariyo nyi wandu waana.

Walaidime imshitsa o handu Yesu ai kipfa kya mamingi fulya fo wandu. Wakahenda yatuoatuo mba iya alya huye ipfo sumhana na handu Yesu ai. Wakasanja-ho wakasotsya-pfo kitaṟa kilya, kirie mndu ulya a muumu shiwungo.
Yesu kekiwona kidikyo kyawo, kawia mndu ulya a muumu shiwungo, “Manoko, omehoṟio njonyamaṟo tsapfo.”
Kyasia kuwekeriho walosha wa wuwawaso maata wadamye-ho wechihiahia ipfo mrimenyi yawo,
“Nyi ki ili ichu akaria ideda ado? Nyi aruma Ruwa. Kuipfo mndu echiidima iwuta njonyamaṟo pfo shila na Ruwa amonyi.”
Nalyo Yesu kamanya makusaro hawo kawawia, Nkyi ili mukeṟi ihia mudo ipfo mrimenyiyi yanu?
Ikyi kii kyangu nyi kihya, ngesa nyi iwia mndu-chu muumu shiwungo. Njonyamaṟo tsapfo tsamewuto ang'u nyi imbia, “Kure noire kitaṟa kyapfo nokuhendye?
Kya indi njikundi mumanye, ke Mana o Mndu nyi awode pfinya kunu orukenyi yehoṟia wandu nyonyamaṟo.” Kawia mndu ulya amuumu shiwungo.
“Ngakuwia, kyekure noire kitaṟa kyapfo nokuhendye kanyi kopfo.”
Oweṟe kakure kaira kitaṟa kyake kawuka-pfo, wandu wawonyi wose. Wandu woose wakauma mkahai wakang'anyisha Ruwa wechihamba ke, “Lulembone shindo cha ishi manyale-pfo!”
Yesu kahendase kulya mawambayo ha nduwa. Mamingi fulya fose fo wandu fukacha na hando ai nao kawalosha.
Kechiida-ho, kawona Lewi mana o Alifayo adamye alya kisanyonyi kya okamba. Yesu kambia, “Kenjo nooshane na inyi.” Lewi kakure kahenda ioshana nao.
Lya ifurumia Yesu adamye kilionyi kya shelya ipfo mba ko Lewi, na Wasanyi wa okamba wafoi wawedamye na Yesu na wanyamaṟi handu hamu nao na wa kiloshyonyi kyake. Kipfa kuweipfo wafoi waweoshana nao.

Na wudo na walosha maata wa Mawawaso wawei Wafarisayo, wekiwona kye Yesu nyi ailya hamu na wasanyi wa okamba na wandu wanyamaṟi, wakawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Nkyi ili ailya na inyo handu hamu na wasanyi wa okamba na wandu wanyamaṟye?”
Na Yesu kekiwaicho ado kawawia, “Iwo wawode oru chiwo wasaṟye mhangapfo, shila na iwo waluo. Wandu njicheye iwalaha chi iwo wasumuhanyipfo, shila na wandu wanyamaṟye.”

Kiheri kyimu wa kiloshionyi kya Yohane na wa kiloshionyi kya Wafarisayo wawekyekuotoya. Wandu wakacha iwesa Yesu, “Nyikili wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wechekekwotoya na wa kiloshyonyi kya Wafarisayo, kya indi wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo welekyekuotoya?”
Yesu kawawia, “A wandu wa walinyi weidima ikwotoya mandi-ho menyi wali akeri nawo ngesa? Kiheri-ki kyose wakeri na menyi wali, weidima ikwotoyapfo.
Na kukae kushike kiheri iliindi menyi wali echiwuto kowo, ili wekoyo kiheṟi-kyo nlyondi wechikwotoya.”
“Kuwode mndu echipfumya nguwo njiku kidami kya nguwo njihyapfo; na koka awuta ado, kilya kihya kyewuka o nguwonyi njiku, na handu halya harandukye hakaengeṟa ing'ana.
Ma kuwode mndu echiwika mpfinyo fo kipfuo selelenyi njikupfo, kipfa kawuta ado mpfinyo fochiduitsa selela tso, mpfinyo fo na selela-tso shenyamaṟika Mpfinyo fo kipfuo fokewiko selelenyi njihya.”
Naho Yesu kechiida ipfo mademenyi ha nganu mkonu fo sabato, na wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakawoka itufuo mahaa halya ha nganu.
Wafarisayo wakambia, “Ambuya nykili wawuta kindo kilakiwikye momu mkonu fo sabato?”
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Ngesa mlalemesome kilya Dawidi alewuta lyandi walewuṟa kelya wakawado njaa na walya wawekeri nao?

Chando aleida na Mmba ya Ruwa, kiheri kilya Abiatari akeri mkohanyi mnene, kalya mkate iya yeṟihichya oo oshangunyi lo Ruwa, kyayo kulakeri mndu a mbikye momu fo ilya, shila na wakohanyi tupu. Dawidi aleilya kaenengya na walya wawei nao?”
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Mkonu fo Sabato fu mbike kipfa kya kiira kya mndu, ma chi mndu kipfa kya mkonu fo sabatopfo.
Ikyo kikaenenga. Mana o Mndu kawa na Mnene o Sabato.”
Yesu kaida-se na sinagogenyi, na kuwekeripfo mndu akachukye owoko.
Wandu waweiho Wakambikya meso, waambuye koka nyi echimchiṟa mfiri fo sabato, kundu wawonye Yesu owingo.
Nao Yesu kawia mndu ulya akachukye owoko, “Kure nokucheie na a makidi hawi.”
Kawayesa, “Ngesa kindo kisumuhanyi iwuta mkonu fo Sabato nyi iwuta kicha ang'u nyi iwuta kiwicho, nyi ikiṟa moo ang'u nyi iwaha?” Nawo wakatsia.
Kekiwaṟengutsya meso kawaichyo nyashi, akuinadie kya wuumu wo ngoo tsawo. Kawia mndu ulya, “Hoṟuo owoko-lopfo.” Kahoṟwo, owoko loke lukachia-se.
Kyasia Wafarisayo wamewuka-pfo wakakambia ideda kyama kyakye hamu na walya wa ko Herode, kundu wechirumatsa Yesu.
Kyasia Yesu kakusheṟwo na wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakahenda mawambayonyi ha nduwa, mamingi fung'anyi fo wandu fukaoshana nawo, Wacheye wauka Galilaya na Yudaya.
Na Yerusalemu na Idumaya na mataya ya meda fo Yordanyi na oruka lo kulya Tiro na Sidon. Nyi mamingi fung'anyi; wekiicho shilya Yesu alewuta, wakacha na koke.
Nao Yesu kawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, wamteseherie kingalawa kipfa kya kituṟu kya wandu kyembeda, kundu walampeṟehetse.
Kipfa walya alewachiṟa wawefoi; wandu waluo wakatana wamwolokya, kundu wampaye.
Wandu wawodo waṟufu wa ngafu wekimbona, wakamwolokya ndenyi wakafihiṟa wechihamba, “Iyo nyi ukeri Mana o Ruwa.”
Indi Yesu kawadedya kya pfinya, kundu walaongoye wandu.
Kyasia Yesu kado ifumvuhu kakulahya sa alekunda amonyi, wakahenda kokye.
Kasambuṟa wandu ikumi na wawi, kawadumbuya rina nyi “Wasu” kundu wakukaye nao na kundu nawadume wahende yongwo mbonyi,
na ihenda wawode pfinya yefuna waṟufu wawicho.
Walya ikumi na wawi alewasambuṟa nyiwo, Simon (rina lyingi nyi Petro.)
Yakobo na Yohane wana wa Sebedayo (Yesu kawadumbuya rina nyi Boanerge, nakyo kyahamba, wana wa ikuṟuṟuma.)
Andrea na Filipo na Bartolomayo, na Matayo, Toma Yakobo, mana o Alifayo, na Tadayo na Simon Mkananayo.
Na Yuda iskariote, nyi ulya aleṟingya Yesu.
Kyasia Yesu kaida na mba Kukasanzia-seho na kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu walawone mwanya folya kyela.
Walya wa kanyi kokye wekiicho wado, wakahenda imwonduo; cha kipfa walehamba nyi awodo nyi oṟuuṟe.
Nahong'u walosha wa wuwawaso wawewukye Yerusalemu wakasoka napfo wakahamba, “Nawodo Belsebuli na kui pfinya ya mnene chu o waṟufu wawicho nakeri ifuna waṟufu wawicho.”
Kyasia Yesu kawalaha kawawia ku mafanano, “Nyi wuda Satana aidima ifuna Satana ngesa?
Na kokoya wumangi wupaṟakanyi wenyi na wenyi, oruka ludo loidima iwangapfo.
Na kokoya Wandu wa mmba imu wapaṟakanyi wo wenyi kowenyi wechirumara.
Na kokoya Satana akuamkya amonyi apaṟakanyi, manya aidima iwangapfo, indi nyi echiarisika nakamu.
“Ma kuwode mndu echiidima iida na ipfo mba ya mwapfinya na iduo-ho nzohoṟa tsake alawoka ipfunga mwapfinya ulyai-pfo, kamma, nyi echitsiduo.
“Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wandu wechihoṟio njonyamaṟo na shirumo shawo shoose wairuma nasho Ruwa.
Kya indi mndu karuma Mumuyo Mwele, echiwona ihooṟyo manya indipfo, kya indi na wunyamaṟi woke wochimbonyia owingo lo mlungana.’ ” (
Yesu nalehamba ado kipfa welehamba, “Ai na mṟufu o ngafu.”)
Mae o Yesu wakacha naho na wanawamae wakahoṟoka ipfo nja wakaduma mndu kokye wechimlaha.
Kuwedamye-pfo kituṟu kya wandu wakamṟingichia kiidi wakambia, “Ambuya mayo wakeri ipfo nja na wana wa mayo na washiki wapfo, wechikupfula.”
Nao Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Wama oko na wana wa wama wako nyi wu?”
Kawaṟengutsya meso walya wawedamyeho wawembikye kiidi kahamba, “Aiwa wama oko na wana wa wama wako.
Msa awuta shilya Ruwa akundi, nyio ai manowama oko na mshiki na wama.”

Yesu kawoka-se ilosha-se ai ohambehu lya nduwa. Kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu wakakuwumbia ipfo koke, katana aida na ngalawenyi kadamya alya nduwenyi, na kituṟu kilya kyose kikakaa kifui na nduwa hambehu.
Kawalosha shifoi kui mafanano, na ipfo kiloshyonyi kyake kawawia,
“Adanyienyi! Mndu mokumba mbeu alehenda kumba mbeu.
Na ili awekumba maata tsikaoloka mbai ya njia shilehe shikacha shikatsitola-ho.
Tsingi tsikaoloka hando hawode maho, naho tsilawoneho teri imoṟi. Natso kudi tsikakambiṟa ido owinyi, kipfa llyandi tsilawode teri ipfo wanda.
Mnengeṟi fomedo, tsikahya mu, kyamba tsilasotsye mri, tsikauma.
Tsingi-se tsikaoloka kiidi kya msha. Na masha iya ikado ikatsishingya tsilakikumbye kilimu.
Tsingi-se tsikaoloka ipfo terinyi njicha tsikado wanda tsikang'ana tsikakumbya imu ikakumbya makumi haṟaṟu na ingi makumi haṟandaṟu na ingi ihana.”
Kiidima kahamba, “Ichu awode madu headanya naweadanya!”
Kiheri Yesu awekeri amonyi, walya walemwadanyia warianyi na walya ikumi na wawi wakambesa kya mafanano iya.
Nao kawawia, “Nyo mu wainenge imanya mbonyi tsa Wumangi wo Ruwa tsi njiṟike, kyaindi walya wa nja wawio shose ku mafanano.
Kundu yambuya waambuye ma walawone, na yadanya waadanye ma walamanye, chila wudo wechihalukya Ruwa nao nawahorie.”
Yesu kawawesa, “Momanya ma ifananolipfo, Nyi wuda mochimanya mafanano ho hose?
Ulya mowaya awaya idedo lya Ruwa.
Walya wa mbai ya njia hando idedo lyawayo nyi walya wamicho, satana kacha owinyi kawuta idedo lyo li liwaye kiidi kyawo.
Wandu wengi nyi cha mbeu tsilya tsinjiwaye mahonyi. Nyi walya wekeicho idedo, wakakambiṟa iliambya na sia.
Kyaindi idedolyo lyilawade mri ipfo kiidi kyawo, kyaindi wakakaa-ho oweṟe. Nahong'u kiheri kocha wukiwa na iterengyo kipfa kya idedo lyo, wakahutsa macha.
Na wengi nyi cha mbeu tsilya tsileoloka ipfo kiidi kya msha. Nyi wo weadanya idedo lyo.
Kukaida-ho mawina ha kunu orukenyi na wulembi wolembo nyi masaa na lango tsa shindo shingi shikapfumba idedo lyo lilakumbye ndunda.
Kyaindi wengi nyi cha tsilya tsinjiwaye terinyi njicha. Nyi iwo wekeadanyia idedo lyo na iidikya wakakumbya ndunda; wengi makumi haṟaṟu, na wengi makumi haṟandaṟu na wengi ihana.”
Yesu kawawia, “Ngesa wandu wekeatsa mchumaa kundu fupfinyikyo kisoṟonyi ang'u fuwiko shia kitaṟa? Chi kundu fuhekyo handu ha huye?
Kipfa orio kindo ki kiṟike, kyechimanyika na kindo kya moowyonyi, kechiwono na pata.
Adanyienying'u kokoya na muwode madu!”
Kawawia, “Adanyienyi na mrima fose kindo mukicho! Kiheṟo ikyo chando mokeheṟia wandu wengi nkyo Ruwa echimuheṟya nakyo, nakyo mochiheṟyo nyo na yengeṟyo-se.
Kipfa ichu awode kindo nyi echienengo ngoseṟa; na ichu alawode, na kilya awode nyi echisoko.”
Yesu kaengeṟa kahamba, “Wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wukeri, cha ili mndu ahenda kumba mbeu terinyi.
Kio kahenda ilaa na yamka mfiri, kiherikyo mbeu ikatoluo na ing'ana alaichi, chando kii.
Kipfa teri yekeng'anyisha kilimu i njenyi, ikasongoṟa iṟa, ikaling'anyisha mbuwa, ikaiichuṟa mbeke ipfo mbuwenyi.
Kyilimu kyikambiṟa mnducho echikambiṟa ilesha kimndo, kipfa kiheri kyeweha kyamshika.”
Yesu Kahambase, “Lochifananyisha wumangi wo Ruwa na kyikii ang'u mfanano fo iki lochiwuwika?
Nyi wukeri cha mbeu ya karadali, mndu kaiwaya terinyi, nayo i ntutu kota mbeu tsingi tsose tsa kunu orukenyi.
Ikamewayo, ikado ikang'ana ikaida huye ya mashidi hoose ikakapa mbaha tsing'anyi, shilehe sha ruwehu shikatana shacha iwikapfo sungu na ilaa pfo mṟishenyi foyo.”
Kyasia Yesu na kui mfanano ifoi ido alewalosha nayo idedo lyake chando weleidima yadanya.
Alededa nawo kindo kyoosepfo chila kui mfanano tupu, kya indi walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake o kawa mowatambahaluya shose kyanya.
Mfiri fulya fulya komeila Yesu kawia wa kiloshionyi, “Luhende yambadya kya kulya.”
Wakada kituṟu kilya kya wandu, wakamduo Yesu, na ngalawa iya awekeri, kuwekeriho na ngalawa tsingi-da.
Kukaamka owira lo otanu lung'anyi, masinanu hakaolokya kulya ngalawenyi, ngalawa iya ikahenda yechiichuo mṟinga.
Nao Yesu nawekeri ngalawenyi alya numa nawelee mado kehekya mdo gondoṟonyi. Wa kiloshionyi wakamwamtsa wakambia, “Mlosha, nyi ulasaṟa-wo, ili luiiarisika?”
Kapang'uka katukya otanu lulya kawia masinanu ha nduwa, “Tsia, ukae kui ndiṟi!” Otanu lukahutsa kukaho olele wyaa.
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Nkyili mui mdi waowu? Nyiki ili mlawode idikya?”
Wakaowuo wuowu wung'anyi wakawiana mndu na odoye “Nyi u ichung'u-wo ili na otanu na masinanu shamidikya?”
Wakaambadya kya kulya mataya ya nduwa orukenyi lo Wageraseno.
Oweṟe lulya Yesu ambuka ngalawenyi, mndu awodo nyi mṟufu o ngafu kakambiṟa imkumbuhana acha awuka maṟungunyi ha wapfu.
Nao mndu cho nawekekaa maṟungunyi ha wapfu, ma kuipfo mndu aleidima impfunga manya na mshe-pfo.
Kipfa kafoi nawempfungie matima na ipfungo na mshe kadawuo mshe iya kawefunja na matima halya, ma mndu alaidime imlamiria.
Mfiri na kio echikaa maṟungunyi na mafumvunyi kyechipoṟohoṟa kechikukapa na maho.
Amewona Yesu ai kuleshe kakambya kamhoya ndenyi.
Kafihiṟa na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Nyikiki kyako na iyo, Yesu ui Mana o Ruwa, Mwitoṟi? So hoi Ruwa ulanjiture.” (
Cha kipfa Yesu awemehamba, “Lekana na mndu chu iyo mṟufu o ngafu!”)
Nao Yesu kambesa, “Rina lyapfo nyi u?” Kambia, “Rina lyako nyi itorito (Legionyi,) kipfa lui wafoi.”
Kamterewa mnu, Yesu kundu nalawafune wawuke kulya orukenyi.
Kyasia na alya fumvunyi kukeri iliso ipoo lying'anyi lya nguwe.
Waṟufu walya wakamterewa wakahamba, “Keludume alya nguwenyi kundu luide na kiidi kyatso.”

Kawainenga momu. Waṟufu walya wa ngafu wakawuka-ho wakaida na kiidi kya nguwe. Ipoo lyo lya nguwe likapufukya msaṟihu likakwolotsa kulya nduwenyi tsikapufuka, na tsiweshikie cha shiku shiwi tsikapfumbikya kulya mringenyi.
Walya wetsilisa wakadicha wakashitsa mbonyi kulya mṟinyi na mhundenyi ya wandu; wandu wakacha iwona kilya kiwutikye.
Wakachea Yesu wakawona-ho mndu ulya awewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho, adamye aṟee nguwo amṟamtsu, wakaowuo.
Walya walewona mbonytso wakawaongoya wengi chando mndu ulya awewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho ambutyo na kya nguwe tsilya.
Wakawoka imterewa, nawuke kulya orukyenyi lowo.
Nahong'u Yesu kyechiida na ngalawenyi, mndu ulya awewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho kamterewa nahende nao.
Indi Yesu kamlehia, kya indi alembia, “Henda kanyi kopfo, ko wandu wapfo, nowaongoye chando Mndumii akuwutya shindo shing'anyi kakusaṟya.”
Nao mndu ulya kakuhendya kawoka yonguo kulya Dekapoli (mṟinyi ikeripfo ikumi,) chando Yesu ambutye shing'anyi wandu, woose wakaṟihio.
Kyasia Yesu amambadya kya kulya na ngalawa, Kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu kikakuwumbya kokye, akeri alya mbarinyi ya nduwa.
Kukacha mnene umuho o walya weambuya sinagoge, rina lyake nyi Yairo, Ambona Yesu kakuhutsa wanda madendenyi hake.
Kamterewa mnu kechihamba. “Manowaka oko nyi ineuka ai, Hoi kekuchee umhekye mawoko hapfo, kundu nachie nakae na moo!”
Kyasia Yesu kakure nao, Wandu wakaoshana nao kituṟu king'anyi wakampeṟehetsa.
Umu-ho nyi mndu mka awewoda nndaṟe kechiwuka samu maka ikumi na iwi.
Mka-cho awemlya mnu wukiwa wung'anyi wo wahanga wafoi. Amaiye masaa awewode hose, alawone achia, kya indi kawona, kechiengeṟa iwichwowichwo.
Awemiicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, kacha numa yake kakupeṟehetsia ipfo kituṟunyi kya wandu kapaya nguwo yake.
Kipfa nyi alehamba mrimenyi, “Ma kokoya njechipaya nguwo tsake tupu, na njechichia.”
Oweṟe mra fo samu yake ikauma, kakuicho ipfo mbihu kokye, kye amechia ndaṟe iya iwembonde.
Yesu kamanya mrimenyi fokye, kye ambuko nyi pfinya, kaindukya kituṟu kilya kya wandu kahamba, “Nyiu anjipaya ṟao lyako?”
Wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakambia, “Uwonyi, kituṟu-kyo kya wandu kechikupeṟehetsa, kohamba, nyi u anjipaya?”
Yesu kaing'uṟung'uṟu iwona nyiu ambutia ado.
Nahong'u mka ulya ambona ambutyo ado, kacha, ikuloṟa kechiowuo na idedema, kaolokya Yesu ndenyi kambia shose sha sungusihu.
Nao Yesu kambia, “Manoko o waka, iidikya lyapfo lyamekukiṟa, kuhendie na kipuo nowechia na ndaṟe i iwekuwode.”
Yesu kyechideda ado wakacha wa kulya ko mnene ulya moambuya shinagoge wakambia, “Manopfo o waka ampfa, Nyikise owinyisha mlosha?”
Na Yesu nalasaṟe kilya amicho kihambo kido kawia mnene ulya moambuya sinagoge, “Kulaowuo kewekuidekye tupu.”
Alalekye mndu nahende nao shila Petro na Yakobo na Yohane, monomae o Yakobo.
Wakashika kanyi ko mnene ulya moambuya sinagoge Yesu kaicho kitohyo na ilia wechilia na ifihiṟa mnu.
Kaida-na mba kawawia, “Nyiki ili muitohya na ilia? Mana chu chi ampfapfo, nyi alee tupu.”
Kyaindi wo wakamseka. Nao kafunya wose nja kahenda warianyi na ndee o mana na mae na walya wa kiloshionyi wakaida napfo, alyando mana ulya akeri.
Kyasia kawada mana ulya owoko kambia, “Talita kumi,” ikyo nyi kihaluo, “Manoko o waka ngakuwia kure.”
Nalyo liyenyi mana ulya o waka kakure kachumya; (kipfa nyi aweshitsye maka ikumi na iwi.) Wadi wandu wakauma mkahi dang'a.
Yesu kawawawasa mnu, waladung'antse mbonyitso ko mndu, ma mndu nalakimanye, Kahamba mana-cho o waka nainengo kyela.
Yesu kakureho kahenda kulya mṟinyi kundu awukye, arianyi na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.

Mfiri fo sabato fomshika kawoka ilosha ipfo sinagogenyi. Na walya wafoi waleadanya wakaṟihyo wechihamba, “Mndu chu kundu awutye ishi nyiku? Na wuṟango wu awode nyi woku? Na mawuto hado ha finya hawuto ku mawoko hake?
Ichu chi ulya motsana shidi, ai mana o Maria na manomae o Yakobo na o Yose na o Yuda na o Simon? Na washiki wake chi wakeri iya kodu?” Wakawa kiṟuma ṟuma kipfa kyakye.
Yesu kawawia, “Kuwode kundu mwikimbi amenekyemenekyepfo, chila na kulya mṟinyi kokye na ko washari wakye na kulya kanyi kokye.”
Nao ma alaidime iwutia-pfo ṟiho shile wandu waluo maata alewahekya mawoko kawachiṟa.
Kaṟihio mnu kyawo, ili wai wado wandu walaidikye. Nao Yesu kawa motengetatengeta kulya mṟinyi ya kufui kechilosha.
Kalaha walya wa kiloshinyi ikumi na wawi kawoka iwaduma wawi wawi. Kawaenenga pfinya yefuna waṟufu wa ngafu.
Kawawasa, “Muladuo kindo njienyi shila ndichi tupu. Ma mkate ma kichoṟe ma mapesa ipfo shikuchunyi shanu.
Ṟaenyi shadu. Manya mlaṟae nguwo tsiwi tsa wanda.”
Kawawia-se, “Kokoya moambio na mba ko mndu, mkukaye-ho mtane mokure-pfo.
Mkakoya kundu walechimwambia ma imwadanya, wukyenyi-ho na itukatuka kululi kyii shia madende hanu, kiwe kiṟingishyo kowo.”
Wakakuhendya wakaongoya wandu wadumbuye.
Wakafuna waṟufu wawicho wafoi wakashia wandu wai mtengeṟi mafuda wakawachiṟa.
Kyasia mangi Herode kaicho isho shoose kiṟumi kya Yesu kiledung'ana orio handu. Wandu maata wawekehamba, “Yohane Mpatisi ameṟuka awuka ko wapfu, nkyo kitewe pfinya tsa ṟiho tsiṟunda kiidi kyakye.”
Wengi wakahamba, “ Mndu-chu nyio Elia.” Wengi wakahamba, “Nyi umuho o waikimbi walya.”
Herode ameicho mbonyitsi kahamba, “Ichu nyi Yohane! Njilemdumbuo mdo, nyio ichu aṟuka.”
Nyi ili Herode awedumie iwada Yohane na imshingya kipfungyonyi kipfa kya Herodia, mka o manomae o Filipo, nao amwalikie.
Kipfa Yohane alewia Herode, “Kikusumuhanye ukae na mka o manomayopfo.”
Kyasia Herodia kawadia Yohane kirumbo kakunda imbaha, nalaidime.
Nyi kipfa Herode nyaweowoe Yohane kammanya, ke nyi mndu o wusumhanyi na mndu mwele, kamringa. Herode kakunda iadanya Yohane; kawa morohio mnu mrimenyi kiheri amemwadanyia.
Nahong'u kukacha mfiri fokumbuo ifeo lya Herode, Herode kasungusia mfuho kalaha wanjama wake, na wasoṟo wa shidenyi na wanene walya wa Galilaya mfiri fokumbwo ifeo lyake.
Mana o Herodia o waka kaida-ho kashinyia-ho kachihiṟa Herode na walya waiho welya shelya. Mangi kawia mana ulya o waka, “Kenterewa kindo kyose okundi na njechikuinenga.”
Kamlia nyamu kambia, “Kindo amenjiterewa na njekuinenga, ma kokoya kishikie ma kifunjo kya wumangi woko.”
Mana ulya o waka kahenda ipfo nja kawia mae, “Nyikiki njechimterewa?” Nao kambia, “Na mdo fo Yohane Mpatisi.”
Mana ulya o waka kakambiṟa iwuya na ko mangi kamterewa kyehamba, “Njikundi mdo fo Yohane icho Mpatisi njiwikyo oo ipaluhu wulalu kudi.”
Mangi kawado mnu nyi fowa, alakikunde imlehya kipfa kya nyamu iya na wandu walya waiho welya shelya.
Mangi kakambiṟa iduma wasikari wake umu-ho kawawasa, kuendo mdo fo Yohane. Msikari kahenda kadumbuo mdo fo Yohane ipfo kipfungyonyi
kaende mdo fokye na ipalu kainengya mana ulya o waka na mana ulya o waka kainengya mae.
Wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wameicho mbonyitso, wakacha wakaira mnying'a foke wakafuṟika ṟungunyi.
Nahong'u wasu walya wakawuya wakakusanza ko Yesu wakambia mbonyi tsa shilya walewuta shose na ilosha.
Wandu wafoi wawekecha na ko Yesu na iwuya tane Yesu na wa kiloshianyi kyakye wawuṟa ma mweke folya kyelya. Yesu kawia wa kiloshionyi kyakye, “Nndenyi luhende handu ha kyaanya lusie ho moo kituntu.”
Wakakuhendya wawenyi kundu ko kisekyenyi wario nyi ngalawa, wakashika kundu ku kuleshe na wandu.
Wandu wafoi wakawawona wechihenda, wakawamanya wakawaituma na madende wa mṟi yose wakawasongoya ishika kulya kundu Yesu na wakiloshionyi waihenda.
Nawo wameshika, Yesu, kawona kituṟu kya wandu king'anyi kawaichio wukiwa, cha kipfa wakeri cha machondi halawode mlisi, kawoka iwalosha shifoi.
Mfiri fomeela, naho-ng'u wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakamchea wakambia “Iya nyi nuka na wulalu mfiri fomeela.
Kewasame, kundu wakuhendye ipfo mndenyi na ipfo mamṟinyi ha mṟasenyi, wakuhuṟye-pfo kindo kyekulia.”
Nao Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Wainengenyi nyo shelya.” Nawo wakambia, “Ngesa luhende ihuṟa mkate ya dinari mahana hawi, luwainenge kyekulia?”
Yesu kawawesa, “Mkate inga muwode? Hendenyi yambuya.” Wamemanya, wakahamba, “Nyi itanu na makunga hawi.”
Yesu kawawasa wakiloshionyi wadamiṟe wandu wose kui madembo ipfo maṟenyi hadoe-pfo.
Wakadamia wanda kui makamba, kui ihana ku ihana na makumi hatanu makumi hatanu.

Nahong'u Yesu kaira mkate iya itanu na makunga halya hawi kaambuya huye ruwehu kaidapfuma Ruwa kafunja mkate yo shifunjo kainengya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, kundu wawadaye, na wudo makunga halya hawi kawahawya wose.
Wandu wose wakalya wakaihuda.
Wakadodwo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu sha mkate na samaki wakaichuṟa shikunja ikumi na shiwi shiichwo pacha.
Na walya walelya mkate iya, waweshikye wasoṟo shiku shitanu.
Yesu kakambiṟa iitikya walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, waide na ngalawenyi, wamsongoye yambadya kya kulya Betisaida mataya ya nduwa, natane asama wandu walya wa mamwingi.
Amsamana nawo, kahenda ipfo ifumvuhu iteṟewa.
Komshika iila, ngalawa ikeri ipfo makidi hawi ha nduwa, nao ai handu hahadutsu amonyi.
Kyasia kekiwona wa kiloshionyi kyakye wahataṟo wekuruo ngalawa iya, kipfa otanu luwasumhyanye oshangunyi. Kufui na aheṟa Yesu kawahendya kechichumia huya mṟinga. Kakunda ikwidya mbele yawo.
Indi walembona, kechumia huya mṟinga, wakakusaṟa nyi kiṟishe wakafihiṟa.
Kipfa walya wawembonyi wose waleangalala. Wadi Yesu kadeda nawo kawawia, “Kewuyonyi nyi moo, nyio inyi Mlaowuo!”
Kadoya ipfo ngalawenyi kundu wawei, otanu lukahuma; wakauma mnu mkahai dang'a ipfo kidi kyawo.
Nyi ili mbonyi tsilya tsa mkate iya tsilawemewatambalukie na mrima yawo iwei nlemeri.
Wamambadya kya kulya mbai ya nduwa, wakashika kulya orukyenyi lo Genesareti wakapfungya-ho ngalawa iya.
Kyasia wambuka ipfo ngalawenyi oweṟe wandu, wakammanya Yesu.
Cha ili wakatengeta orukenyi lulya lose wakawoka yende walya wakeri iwawyo wario na shitaṟa na orio handu Yesu ai, kipfa waleicho kye nyi akyeri-ho.
Orio handu Yesu amehenda mrinyi ing'anyi ang'u ntutu, ang'u mndenyi wandu wakaende naho wandu waluo wakamterewa wapaye ma mambo tsa nguo yake. Na walya wose waletsipaya walechia.
Wakakusanza ipfo ko Yesu Wafarisayo na walosha wa wuwawaso maata-ho walewuka Yerusalemu.
Wakawona wa kiloshyonyi kyake maata wechilya mkate na mawoko hateṟefukye, nakyo nyi ili walawesanjie mawoko.
Kipfa Wafarisayo na Wayuda wose wekyelya walasamba mawoko-pfo, wekeringa mnu kido kya waku wawo.
Na wekyelya kindo wahuṟa tumo-shile wakisanjapfo. Kuwode na shingi shifoi waambye shelindia, na kya isanja shirahu na shiṟambo na shitela.
Wafarisayo na walosha wa uwawaso wakawesa Yesu, “Nyikili wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo walaiwuta kisumhanyi na shilya lui wadeye nyi waku wadu, wakalya shelya na mawoko hateṟefukye?”

Yesu kawawia, “Nyo makulembetseṟe na kilya Yesaya alededa kya lohi kyehamba kisuku kyanu, chando kii kiṟehye kyehamba, ‘Mbaṟi ii ya wandu; Ruwa ahamba, yecha injindya kui madedo ha wulya, kyaindi ngoo tsawo tsikeri kuleshe na inyi.
Ili wekenjiichika kya mai, ili waipfunda njopfundo tsii mawawaso ha wandu.’
Momda iwawaso lya Ruwa mkahenda iwada shilya mui wadeye nyi wandu.”
Yesu kaengeṟa ihamba, “Nyi wudo-ng'u, Mawawaso ha Ruwa nyi mutahachye kui wuṟango, mkawada shilya mui wadeye nyi waku wanu.
Kipfa Mose alehamba, ‘Keindya ndeo na mayo,’ na, ‘Moruma ndee ang'u mae, nyi opfu napfe.’
Kyaindi nyo mokyelosha, kokoya mndu awode kindo awechiidima itarama nakyo nde ang'u mae indi kahamba kye kindokyo nyi Korbanyi (kidaso ko Ruwa).
Kimbaṟi natarame-se wafee wakye-pfo.
Nyi wudong'u mokyepiṟa idedo lya Ruwa kipfa kya shilya shanu muiwadeye mkadeya. Na wudo na shindo shifoi shido mokewuta.”
Yesu kalaha-se kituṟu kilya kya wandu na handu ai kawawia, “Munjiadanye mose na imanya.
Kuwode kindo kii ipfo nja ya mndu kyechiida na ipfo kiidi kyake kechiidima imteṟefutsapfo. Kyaindi shilya shawuka ipfo kiidi kya mndu nyisho shii sheteṟefutsa.” [
“Ichu awode madu headanya naweadanya.”]
Kiheri amida na mba, awuka kulya kituṟunyi kya wandu, wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakambesa kya mfanano fulya.
Nao kawawia, “Nanyo na wudo-ng'u mlamanya kindo? A mlaichi, ke shose sha nja sheida na ipfo kiidi kya mndu shechiidima imteṟefutsapfo.
Nyi kipfa shilechiida na ngoonyi yakye, shila nyi ndewunyi yake shechiida napfo shikakuwukya-ho shewiko ṟungunyi kundu kowika mando. (Ili Yesu alehamba ado nyi aleharamisha shelya shoose.)”
Kaengeṟa ihamba, “Kilya kyekyeuka ipfo kiidi kya mndu, nkyo kyekyeteṟefutsa mndu.
Kipfa kyekyeuka ipfo ngoonyi ya mndu nyisho mahio mawicho; isokomba na isokombo; wuiwi na wuwahi.
Na iṟuhuya na iṟuhuyo; wununyi na wuwicho; ngeṟo na mpuria; riso linenyi na shirumo na ikushela na wutondo.
Shiwicho sho shose shekewuka ipfo kiidi kya mndu shikateṟefutsa mndu.”
Yesu kakure-pfo kahenda ipfo mṟasenyi ya Tiro. Kaida na mba kiṟika ma mndu nalamanye, indi nalaidime ikuowya-ho.
Oweṟe lulya mndu mka umu, kimana kyake kya waka kiwodo nyi mṟufu o ngafu kaicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, kaida-ho kamolokya ndenyi.
Na mka ulya awekeri mndu Mgriki o ipfo mbaṟinyi ya Wafoenyike wa Kisiria. Katerewa Yesu kye nafune mṟufu ulya o ngafu nauke mana-cho oke o waka.
Nao Yesu kambia, “Kyeleka shiwana shiihutso kuwoka; kipfa chi kicha osoke shiwana kando nokumbye mashitepfo.”
