Indi mkacho kahaluo kambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii; kyaindi ma shite shekaa shia mesa shekyekulia na shipeṟengu sheolotso-olotso-ho nyi shiwana.”
Nao Yesu kambia, “Omtana omhamba kudo, kuhendye, Mṟufu cho ambuka mana chu opfo o waka.”
Amekuhendya kanyi kokye, kakoya manokye a mlaṟe ipfo kitaṟenyi, ambuko nyi mṟufu ulya.
Yesu ambukase ipfo mṟasenyi ya Tiro, kaida Sidon kashika kulya nduwenyi ya Galilaya, echiida makidi hawi ha mṟasa ya mṟi iya ikumi (Dekapoli).
Wakamendye mndu a mpfu madu apfungikye na olimi, wakamterewa, namhekye mawoko.
Yesu kambuta o kituṟunyi kya wandu kamduo kyanya kamhekya shimnyo kulya madunyi hake kapaya olimi loke kechipuchia mada.
Kaambuya ruwehu kasumukya kambia, “Efata”, ikyo nyi “Tambaṟuka!”
Oweṟe madu hake hakatambaṟuka, cha ili olimi loke lupfungikye lukatambahaluka, kawoka ideda necha.
Yesu kawawawasa walawie ma mndu mbonyi tso. Kyaindi chando alewawasa, nyi wudo nawo waleengeṟa yonguo.
Wandu wakawa mkahai dang'a, wechihamba, “Shose ashiwutye necha, katarama walya wapfu madu iicho, na walya walaideda kawainenga ideda.”
Mfiri iya kuwei-se ho kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu, walawode kindo kyela, Yesu kalaha wa kiloshyonyi kyake Wasanzye oo hando ai kawawia,
“Ngakusaṟa wukiwa wo wandu-wa, kyamba wamtsinda kunu koko mfiri iṟaṟu, ma walawode kindo kyelya.
Na kokoya ngawasama, wahende kanyi kowo, walasusuo, wechiariskya njienyi; nawo maata-ho wacheye wawuka kuleshe.”
Wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakamhaluo wakahamba, “A nyku mndu echiidima iwuta mkate yechiwaihutsa woose iya nuka.”
Yesu kawawesa, “Nyi mkate inga mbode?” Wakahamba, “Nyi mfungade.”
Kawawasa kituṟu kilya kya wandu wadamie wanda; Nahong'u kaira mkate iya mfungade kaana Ruwa kafunjafunja kaenengya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, kundu wawadaye; nawo wakadaya kituṟu kilya.
Wawode na shikunga shitutu; Yesu kaidapfuma Ruwa kawawasa shidaayo wandu.
Wandu wakalya wakaihuda Wakadodwo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu shikunja mfungade.
Na wandu walelya waweshikie cha shiku shiina; Yesu kawasama.
Nalyo lienyi kaida na ngalawenyi handu hamu na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakahenda wambaṟa ya Dalmanuta.
Wafarisayo wakacha, wakawoka iwesana na Yesu kui imhesha wakakunda nawawutie ṟiho iwe kiṟingishio kye nawode pfinya iwukie ruwehu.
Yesu kasokyo nyi fowa mrimenyi foke kahamba, “A nkyi ili mbaṟi ii ikundi kiṟingishyo? Nyi kya lohi ngambia, mbaṟi ii yechiloṟo kiringishio manyale-pfo.”
Kawada kaida-se na ngalawenyi kaambadya kya kulya mataya ya nduwa.
Wakiloshionyi wakahadima iduo mkate, nyi mkate fumu tupu wawerie ipfo ngalawenyi.
Yesu kawawawasa kechihamba, “Keambuyenyi mkuṟise mtarang'ao fo Wafarisayo na fo Herode.”
Wa kiloshionyi wakakusaṟa wo wenyi na wenyi. Nyi ahamba ado kipfa lulawode mkate.
Yesu kamanya kawawia, “Nyi kili muiwesana kya ili mlawode mkate? Nyi mlametawuka imanya ma mlamewada wuṟango? Na ngoo tso tsanu tsiwei ntumhari?
Nyi muwode meso, mlawone? Mbewode madu, mlaicho manya mlakumbuo?
Mukumburie lyilya njilefunjyafunjya shiku shitanu mkate itanu? Muledoduo mtsuhaṟo shipeṟengu shechiichuṟa shikunja shinga?” Wakambia, “Nyi ikumi na shiwi.”
“Na ili njilefunjyafunjya walya shiku shiina mkate iya mfungade, mledoduo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu sha shikunja shinga?” Wakahamba, “Nya mfungade.”
Nao kawawia, “Na mrasa wulalu. Mulamemanya?”
Yesu na wa kiloshionyi kyakye wakacha na Betisaida. Wandu wakamendye mndu a mpfu meso wakamterewa, kye nampaye.
Yesu kawada ulya mpfu meso kuwoko kambuta kulya mṟinyi kamduo nja ya mṟi fulya kamshia mada ipfo mesonyi hake na imhekya mawoko kambesa, oidima iwona kindo?
Kipfupfuṟe kechiambuo kahamba, “Njiwonyi wandu wechumya, njiwawonyi wai cha mashidi haichumia.”
Nahong'u Yesu kawuya imhekya se mawoko mesonyi hake, kawanza iambuo kawuya iwona, pfinya yake yeambuo ikamchea, kawona shoose necha.
Yesu kamduma nahende kanyi kokye, kechimbawasa, “Ma kulawuye na kulya mṟinyi.”
Yesu na wa kiloshionyi kyakye wakahenda mṟinyi ya Kaisaria Filipi. Wachihenda Yesu kawesa wa kiloshionyi, “A wandu wekededa wada kyako, ke inyi nyi wu?”
Wakambia “Wengi wekehamba iyo nyi Yohane Mpatisi, na wengi, nyi Elia, na wengi, nyi umu o waikimbi.”
Nao kawawesa, “A nyo mohamba kye inyi nyi u?” Petro kahaluo kambia, “Iyo nyi ukeri Kristo.”
Yesu kawakekedya, ma walawie mndu oose mbonyi tsake.
Yesu kawoka ilosha wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Mana o mndu, kimbaṟi naliso wukiwa wung'anyi na imino nyi wasongoru wa wandu na wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso Nechiwoho, na ili lya kaṟaṟu naṟuke.”
Yesu kawawia ado na pata. Petro kamduo kyaanya kawoka imdedya.
Nao Yesu aminduka, kechiambuya wa kiloshyonyi kyake kadedya Petro kahamba, “Kewuya na numa yako Satana, nyi kipfa chando uihia chi ha Ruwapfo, nyi ha kiwandu.”
Numa Kalaha kituṟu kya wandu handu hamu na wa kiloshyonyi kyake kawawia, “Kokoya mndu akunda oshana na inyi, kimbaṟi nakukane amonyi, nakudike na msalaba fokye, naoshane na inyi.
Kipfa mndu echikunda letsa moo fokye amonyi, nyechifudetsa. Na mndu echidetsa moo foke kipfa kyako inyi na kipfa kya Mbonyi tso Njicha nyi echifuletsa.
Kipfa kiira kiiho nyi kiki, ili mndu awinya wuyana wuwose, wukawa wokye, kadetsya-pfo moo fokye?
Ang'u kindo mndu echiwika kiwe ndalai ya moo foke nyikiki?

Mndu oose monjiwadia sonu inyi na madedo ha hako kunu kiidi kya mbaṟi ya wanyamaṟi na walasaṟie Ruwa, na Manomndu nyi echimbadia sonu ili echikaa nache na wusuṟi wo Nde handu hamu na wamalaika waele.”
Yesu kaengera iwawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, wandu wa wahoṟoki iya kukeri-ho maata-ho wekaa walasaha opfu, na watane wawona wumangi wo Ruwa wochicha na pfinya.”

Kyasia komida-ho mfiri iṟandaṟu, nao Yesu kaduo-ho Petro na Yakobo na Yohane kahenda nawo wawenyi kado kundu ko fumvu-hu li ileshe handu ha kisekenyi. Waipfo wechimwambuya, Yesu kailachika fana wawonyi,
nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu, kota chando mndu mosanja nguwo o iya orukenyi eketsiilisha.
Na Elia na Mose wakakuloṟa nawo, wechideda na Yesu.
Kyasia Petro kawia Yesu, “Mlosha, iya nyi handu haluchihie ikaa-ho. Nanga luwike-ho matengo haṟaṟu limu lyafo, na limu lya Mose na limu lya Elia.”
O na wodoye waleowuo mnu alamanye ma kindo aihamba.
Kyasia ipuchi lilya likacha lyikawashikia, ṟu likacha alya kiidi kya ipuchi lyehamba, “Ichu nyi ai Mana oko mkunde, kemwadanyenyi!”
Naho peṟeseng'u wa kiloshionyi wekiambuya-se, walakiwone-se ma mndu shila na Yesu amonyi nawo.
Kyasia ili wesoka kulya fumvuhu, Yesu kawawawasa, walaongoye ma mndu shilya waleshiwona, na mtano Manomndu aṟuka awuka wapfunyi.
Nahong'u wakaiṟicha iwawaso-lyo indi wakawa wechiwesana wo wenyi na wenyi, kilya kya iṟuka wapfunyi nyi kiki?
Wakawesa Yesu, “Nyiki ili Wafarisayo na walosha wa wuwawaso wahamba, ke Elia kimsumhanyi nasonguo icha?”
Nao kawahaluo, “Ee-da, Elia na echisonguo icha, naachikie shindo shose. Na kya Manomndu nyi wuda ki kiṟehye kyake ipfo Shitapunyi Shiele kye Mana o Mndu nechiliso wukiwa wufoi na iilo?
Kyaindi ngambia, ke Elia alemcha, nawo wakambutya shose, chando walekunda, chando ki kiṟehye kyake.”
Naho wekicha na ko wa kiloshyonyi kyake walya wengi. Wakawona-ho kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu kiiho. Na walosha wa wuwawaso, wechiwesana nawo.
Nalyo lienyi kituṟu kilya kya wandu wekimbona, woose wakawuko nyi madima wakambingya wakamiṟikiṟa.
Yesu kawawesa, “Kindo muiwesana nawo nyi kiki?”
Umu-ho o kituṟu kilya kya wandu kahaluo, “Mlosha, ngaende manoko o womi na kopfo, awodo nyi mṟufu aladeda.
Na kiheri amembada, kamduka na imwolotsa wanda, naidosa mawuruwuru kalya mkongoṟo kaoṟomoka. Ngaterewa wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo wafune mrufu fo walaidime.”
Yesu kawahaluo kahamba, “Nyo Mui mbaṟi ya wandu ilawode idikya, Njikae nanyo njishike indii? A njimpfirilie njishike indii? Mwendenyi na iya hando njikeri.”
Wakamendye na kokye. Mṟufu-fo fokiwona Yesu fukasingitsa mana ulya, kaho wanda kakuhalihatsa, kechidosa mawuruwuru. Nao Yesu kawesa ndeye,
“Kiheri kida ambokye ado?” Ndeye kahamba, “Wokya ututu wokye.
Na kafoi mṟufufo fokyemkumba modonyi na mṟingenyi, kundu namrumatse; Kyaindi koka kochiidima kindo kelutarame kochilusaṟya.”
Yesu kambia, “Kye wai, koka kochiidima! Shose shedimikya ko ulya aidikye.”
Adi ndee o mana ulya kafihiṟa naṟu lying'anyi kahamba, “Ngaidikya! Kyenjitarama iidikya lyako lilitutu.”

Yesu kekiwona, kye kituṟu kya wandu kyechikuwumbya ho, katoloma mṟufu ulya o ngafu kambia, “Aiyo mṟufu utewie mana-chu alaidima deda; ma iicho inyi ngakuwawasa. Wuka mana-chu, ma ulawuye-se na kokye.”
Mṟufu fulya fukakoṟoṟoma naṟu, fukamrakwo mnu fukamwolotsa wanda fukambuka; kawa cha ili apfie katana wafoi wahamba, “Ampfa!”
Kyaindi Yesu kambada owoko kamhoṟotsa, nao kahoṟoka.
Yesu amiida na mba, wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakambesya kisekenyi, “Nyiki ili so lulaidima imfuna?”
Nao Kawawia, “Waṟufu wa mbaṟi i wewa ifunopfo shila kui iterewa tupu.”
Yesu na wa kiloshionyi kyakye wekiwuka-ho, wakakuhendya waida Galilaya. Yesu alakunde wandu wamanye handu ai.
Kipfa nyi awelosha wa kiloshyonyi kyake Kawawia, “Manomndu echidambiko mawokonyi ha wandu wechimbaha, nao kamboho mfiri iṟaṟu nyi yechisia naṟuke.”
Wakiloshionyi walamanye, ili awawia ado, wakaowuo imbesa.
Wakacha na Kapernaumu. Akeri ipfo mba kawawesa, “Kindo muwei. Wesana kyakyo nyi kiki kulya njienyi?”
Nawo wakatsia, kipfa waweiwesana kya msa echiwa msongoru o wengi kiidi kyawo.
Yesu amdamia kalaha walya ikumi na wawi kawawia, “Mndu kakunda iwa msongoru, kimbaṟi nawe mfurumi nawewa mpfuṟukanyi o wose.”
Kaira kimana kitutu kambika ipfo makiidi hawi hawo kamchunguṟya kawawia,
“Msa echiambia mana cha ichu kui rina lyako, nyio inyi anjambya; mndu kanjiambya inyi chio inyi anjambyapfo, nyi aambia ichu anjidumye.”
Yohane kambia, “Mlosha, lulewona mndu kechifuna waṟufu wawicho ku rina lyapfo, alaioshana naso, lukamima, kipfa alaluosha.”
Yesu kahamba, “Mlamime; kipfa kuipfo mndu echiwuta ṟiho kui rina lyako naidime ideda owicho kyakopfo.
Kipfa sa alasuanyi naso, nyi aduanyi naso.
Kipfa mndu oose echimrutsa mringa fonyo na kirahu kui rina lyako, kipfa mui wa Kristo, nyi kya lohi ngambia, mndu chu echiwuṟa woṟunda wokyepfo.
“Na mndu ose echitewa iwa wanjiidikye ma ichu mtutu umu-ho nawute wunyamari, kyakye kiwei kichakicha-ho nyi ipfungyo iho lya iseo lying'anyi oo nzingonyi nahende kumbo ipalipalinyi.
Na kokoya kuwoko kopfo kukokudekesha kyekudumbuo-ho! Nanga iyo koida na ipfo kiidi kya moo kui kikonu, kota ili uwode mawoko hapfo hahawi koida na Gehena ipfo modonyi fulechiruma. [
Mpfo kundo kiwiro kyewawiṟa kilechitsia na modo fowakoṟa fulechiruma.]
Na koka kudende kopfo kokudekesha, kyekudumbwo-ho! Nanga iyo koida na ipfo kiidi kya moo, kui kiricheche, kota ili uwode madende hapfo hahawi kokumbo ipfo Gehenenyi. [
Mpfo kundo kiwiro kyewawiṟa kilechitsia na modo fowakoṟa fulechiruma.]
Na kokoya riso lyapfo lyakudekesha, kyelitufu-ho! Nanga iyo koida na wumanginyi wo Ruwa kui njeche kota ili uwode meso hawi kokumbo ipfo modonyi fo Gehenenyi.
Mpfondo mashinu haiipfo helekepfa, manya modo fulekerumisho manyale.
Kipfa orio mndu echiwikyo monyo na modo.
Monyo nyi kindo kicha, kyaindi monyo fukommba ifinda fochikoṟa-se ki? Wadenyi monyo ipfo kiidi kyanu mbekukaya na ofoṟo nyo wenyi na wenyi.”
Nahong'u Yesu kakure-ho kacha na kulya shihongonyi sha Yudaya na kulya mataya ya meda fo Yordanyi. Kituṟu kya wandu kikamchease kawalosha, chando aweichiwie.
Wafarisayo wakacha na kokye wakambesa, wechimhesha, “Na kisumhanyi mndu nalekane na mka okye?”
Yesu kawahalwo kawawia, “Kilya Mose amuwawasye nyi kiki?”
Nawo wakahamba, “Mose aleinenga momu mndu msoṟo nalekane na mka okye na imṟehia baruo yemsama.”
Yesu kawawia, “Mose alemuinenga iwawaso lyo kipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanu.
Kya indi wokya mawokyonyi, Ruwa nalewumba mndu msoṟo na mndu mka.
Ko ikyo msoṟo nechilekana na ndee na mae, nalungane na mka okye,
nawo wawawi wechiwa mbihu fumu. Wechiwa-se wawi-pfo indi nyi mbihu fumu.
Kyasia-ng'u ikyo Ruwa amekisanza, mndu o wandu nalakiletsane.”
Wameidase na ipfo mba walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambesa kya kindo kyo.
Nao kawawia, “Ichu alekana na mkokye kaalika ungi, nyi aṟuhuya kamdekyo.
Na mka kalekana na mii okye kahenda yaliko nyi uingi nyi aṟuhuyo.”
Kyasia wandu wakaende shiwana na ko Yesu, kundu nashipaye. Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakatukya walya washirie.
Yesu kekiwona ado, kasungulula kawawia, “Kelekenyi shiwana shikucheye na koko, ma mlashiime; cha kipfa wandu wado chasho nyiwo Wumangi wo Ruwa woewa wowo.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia. Mndu ada alaambya wumangi wo Ruwa ai cha kimana, echiida naho-pfo.”
Kawachunguṟya kawahekia mawoko kawawikya ona.
Kyasia Yesu ambuka-pfo ashikie njienyi, mndu kakambia na kokye kampfirya ndi kambesa, “Ui mlosha mcha, kindo njechiwuta, kundu njioṟe moo fo mlungana nyi kiki?”
Na Yesu kambia, “Nyikili onjilaha njii mcha? Kuwode mchapfo shila umu, nyi Ruwa amonyi.
Mawawaso na uhaichi, Kulaṟuhuye, Kulawahe, Kulaiwe, Kulairie mndu sha wongo, Kulasoke mndu kya pfinya, India ndeo na mayo.”
Nao kambia, “Mlosha, kyaho hose njihainutsie wokya wututu woko.”
Yesu kamambuya kamkunda kambia, “Utsuheṟe kindo kyimu, kehenda nokumbe isho uwode noenengye wakiwa, naho ochiwada kisa kya shindo shifoi ipfo ruwehu. Komidima, uche oshana na inyi.”
Nao ameicho ado kakuinadia kakuhendya awodo nyi fowa kipfa awewode masaa hafoi.
Yesu kaṟengutsya meso kaambuya njora tsose kewia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Ambuyenyi, chando kilemye, wasuṟi waide na ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa!”
Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakaṟihyo kya madedo halya hakye. Na Yesu kawawia-se, “Wana wako nkikiumu mnu iida na ipfo Wumanginyi wo Ruwa.
Kyangu-ho nyi ngamia ide na ṟochenyi lya sindano, kota mndu msuṟi naide na ipfo Wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
Wakiloshionyi kyakye wakaṟihio mnu wakawesana wo wenyi na wenyi, “A mndu echiidima ikiṟo nyi u?”
Yesu kawahaluya meso kawawia, “Kunu ko wandu nyi kindo kilechiidimika kyaindi ko Ruwa chi wudopfo, kipfa ko Ruwa shose shechiidimika.”
Petro kambia, “A so nyi wuda? Ludeye shose lukaoshana na iyo.”
Yesu kahamba, “Na kya lohi ngambia, orio mndu adeye ma mba ma wana wa mae ma washiki, ma mae, ma ndeye, ma mdemi kipfa kyako na kipfa kya Mbonyi tso Njicha.
Kiheri kyi kya wulalu elekaa nawihiṟyo ka ihana ngoseṟa mba na wana wa mae, na washiki, na mae, na mdemi, na wana, handu hamu na matuuro, na mfiri yechicha nawewona moo fo mlungana.
Kyaindi wafoi wasonguo nyi wechiwa wafurumi na iwo wafurumi wawewa wasongoru.”

Naho wakeri njienyi wechido na Yerusalemu, nao Yesu nawewasongoye Wa kiloshionyi kyakye wawewaowu, wandu wakamituma wechiowuo. Yesu kaduose kyanya walya ikumi na wawi, kawoka iwawia shilya shekaa shimhoye,
“Adanyienyi, Lukeri ido na Yerusalemu, na Manomndu echidambikyo wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso, nawo wambutye owingo lo opfu wawehenda mdambikya ko wandu wa mbaṟi njiehenu.
Nawo wamtaluo na imselya mnyeri wawemkapa na ngowa tsi ntochye msha, na iwaha, wechimbaha. Na ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu nyi echiṟuka.”
Yakobo na Yohane wana wa Sebedayo wakamsembelya kufui wakambia, “Mlosha, lukundi uluwutye, chando lochikuterewa.”
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Kindo mokunda njimbutye nyi kiki?”
Wakambia, “Uluenenge, momu ludamie umu ora lopfo lo kulyo na ungi ora lopfo lo kumoso ipfo wusuṟinyi wopfo.”
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Muichi kindo muiterewapfo. Ngesa lohi na moidima inyo kirahu kya matuuro njechikunyoya inyi ang'u ipatiso chandu inyi; njechipatiso?”
Wakambia, “Na loidima.” Yesu kawawia, “Kirahu ikyo njechinyo inyi, nanyo mochinyo, na mochipatiso chandu inyi njilepatiso.
Kyaindi idamya ora loko lo kulyo na lo kumoso kyalyo chi iṟunda lyako inyi lyeinenga mndupfo, kyaindi weinengo walya wai wateseheṟye.”
Naho walya ikumi wekiicho isho wakawoka ipfuluko kya Yakobo na Yohane.
Yesu kawalaha kawawia, “Muichi, kye walya watano mangi tsa wandu wa masanga nyi wawaitoṟye kui wuapfinya na iwo wanene wakawaapfinyia.
Kyaindi kunu konu kilawe kido. Indi sa akundi iwa mnene kidi kyanu, kimbaṟi nawe mṟundi onu.
Na msa akundi iwa mosongoru kiidi kyanu, nyi kimbaṟi nawe isinga lya wose.
Kipfa na Manomndu acheye ipfuṟukanyopfo, kyaindi kundu napfuṟukane nawelekia moo foke fuwe ndalai yetalaa wandu wafoi.”
Wakashika Yeriko. Na ili wewuka kulya Yeriko Yesu na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye na kituṟu kya wandu king'anyi; kipfupfuṟe Bartimayo mana o Timayo adamye oo mbai ya njia, echyeṟeṟya wandu.
Kyekiicho nyi Yesu o Nasareti aiida-ho kawoka ikoṟoṟoma na ihamba, “Yesu u Mana o Dawidi, Kenjisaṟia-wo!”
Wandu wafoi wakamdedya kundu nakutsie; kyaindi o kaengeṟa mnu ikoṟoṟoma, “Mana o Dawidi, kenjisaṟyawo!”
Yesu katirima-ho kahamba, “Kemlahenyi.” Wakalaha kipfupfuṟe ulya wechimbia, “Kyewuuyo nyi moo! Kure, nyi akulaha.”
Nao kakumba nguwo tsake tsa huye katsung'tsuwuka kachea Yesu.
Yesu kambesa, “Kindo ukundi njikwutye nyi iki?” Kipfupfuṟe ulya kambia, “Mlosha ngaterewa njiidime-se iambuo.”
Nao Yesu kambia, “Kuhendye, idikya lyapfo lyamekukiṟa.” Nalyo liyenyi kaambwo kaitumana na Yesu orio handu.
Kyasia wekiafukya kufui na kulya Yerusalemu waleshika Betifage na Betanyia, kukeri alya Fumvunyi lya mashindi ha Mtsinepfu. Kaduma wa kiloshyonyi kyake wawi-ho.
Kawawia, “Hendenyi kulya mṟinyi fukeri mambatsana na iya handu mui. Mochiida napfo mdi mochiwona ihache lya nzoi li-pfunge handu lilalemewawe mndu manya limu. Lyipfunguo-ho mliende.
Na koka mndu kechimuwesa, ‘Nkyili mowika mdo?’ Mumbie, ‘Mndumii alikundi, na oweṟe nechiliwihiṟa na iya.’ ”
Wakahenda wakawona ihache lilya lya nzoi lipfunge oo mongonyi kya nja kulya njienyi. Wakalipfunguo-ho.
Na walya wahoṟoki-ho maata-ho wakawawia, “Nkyili muipfunguo ihache lyi lya nzoi?”
Wa kiloshionyi wakawawia, chando Yesu awehambye. Nawo wakawalekya.
Wakaende ihache lyo lya nzoi na ko Yesu wakalihekya nguwo tsawo tsa huye, nao Yesu kadamya-ho.
Wandu Wafoi wakaala nguwo tsawo tsa huye ipfo njienyi, wengi wakaala-ho masahawa, walehamanya ipfo mademenyi.
Na walya wamsongoe na walya waituma numa wakafunja ngahai wechihamba, “Ruwa naichiko!” “Nawone ona ichu mocha ku rina lya Mndumii!
Kuwewona ona na wumangi wo ndee yadu Dawidi, ili wuicha! Ruwa naṟumisho kulya huye ruwehu!”
Nao Yesu kaida na mṟinyi fo Yerusalemu kahenda ipfo hekalunyi kaambuya-pfo Woṟisa orio kindo. Kyaindi kipfa kuwemeila kahenda Betanyia arianyi na walya ikumi na wawi.
Kyasia ili lya ngama wekiwuka ipfo Betanyia, Yesu kaicho njaa.
Kawona mkuyu ai aleshe, fuwode mambale hafoi. Kacha, kye kulako kyechiwona-pfo ndunda; Amcha afui alawone-pfo manya ndunda shila mambale tupu. Kipfa kulawei kiheri kya ndunda tsa mkuyu.
Kahalwo kafuwia, “Kuipfo mndu echilya-se ndunda tsapfo manya indiipfo.” Wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakaicho madedoho ha Yesu.
Naho wakacha na Yerusalemu. Yesu amida na ipfo hekalunyi, kawoka ifunyia nja walya wekumba na wehuṟa wai ipfo hekalunyi kapfuluo na shitaṟa sha weilacha pesa na shidi shedamya sha wekumba mbeta.
Nalade ma mndu, naduo kindo awuka ipfo hekalunyi.
Kalosha kawawia, “Ki kiṟehye, kye mba yako nyi yeterewia kipfa kya wandu wa mbaṟi tose. Nanyo mkawuya iihaluo opanga lo wandu wasoki.”
Wakohanyi wanene wakaiicho iki na walosha wa wuwawaso wakakusaṟa, chando wechimdetsa. Indi walemwowuo, kipfa kituṟu kya wandu kyose kileṟihio kya mloshye fokye.
Nahong'u komeila, Yesu na wa kiloshionyi wakawuka kulya mṟinyi.
Kyasia wekiida-ho ngamenyi, otuko, wakawona mkuyu fulya fomeuma fose tane mrinyi.
Petro kakumbuo kawia Yesu, “Mlosha, ambuya! Mkuyu fulya kulefusesa fomeuma.”
Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Idikienyi Ruwa.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia, kye mndu kawia ifumvu li, kyekuṟuka, ukukumbe kulya ipalipalinyi, alawado nyi mkeukeu ipfo ngoonyi yakye, kyaindi kaidikya kilya ahamba na kyewutika, na echiwona kyechiwa.
Nahong'u ngambia, orio shindo shose mochiterewa na yomba, keidikyenyi, ke momambya, na mochishiinengo.
Na ili mohoṟoka iterewa, kehoṟyenyi orio mndu, koka muwode kindo na mndu, kundu na Nde yanu o ipfo ruewehu namhoṟye madeko hanu. [
Indi nyo mkada mulahoṟya wengi na Ndeyanu o ipfo ruwehu echimhoṟya ma madeko hanupfo.]”
Wakacha-se na Yerusalemu. Yesu Kechichumya ipfo hekalunyi, wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso na wasongoru wa wandu wakamchea.
Wakammbesa, “A pfinya owuta nayo shindo sho nyi ida? Na ichu akuinengye pfinya yo, kundu nowute isho nyi u?”
Nao Yesu kawawia, “Njimuwesa kidedo kyimu; mkanjihaluo na njechimbia, pfinya ii ngawuta nayo shindo shi nyiida.
Pfinya ya Yohane Mpatisi yepatisa iwewukye ruwehu ngesa ang'u nyi ko wandu? Kenjihaluonyi.”
Wakawesana wo wenyi na wenyi wehamba, “Lukahamba, nyi ruwehu, nyi echihamba, nyi kilewa-ng'u kida, ili mlalemwidikia?
Lukahamba, nyi ko wandu?” (Nyi waweowoe kituṟu kilya kya wandu; kipfa wose waleidikia kye Yohane awei mwikimbi o lohi.)
Wakahaluo Yesu wehamba, “Luichipfo.” Nao Yesu kawawia, “Ma inyi njembia pfinya ngawuta nayo shindo sho kye nyi ya wupfo.”

Yesu kawoka ideda nawo kui mfanano, “Mndu aledonga dema lya msabibu kaliiṟihya na oṟiho kasumya-ho ipo lyekamya-ho mpfinyo, kawika-pfo kitaanga kyeringya kidoe huye. Kalinengya wademi, kahenda kyaṟonyi kya kuleshe.
Na kiheri kya kilimu kadumya wademi walya isinga lyake kya mashido ha dema lyilya.
Wademi walya wakambada wakamkapa wakamsama alarie kindo.
Kawuya iwadumya isinga lingi, ichu nao wakamkapa oo mdo na iminyala.
Menyi Dema kaduma ungi; nao wakambaha. Na wengi wafoi wengise waledumo, walya maata wakawakapa, walya mata wakawawaha.
Awewode-se manoke kimumu amkundi. Kafurumya mduma o kowo kechihamba, nyio manako wechimwowuo.
Kyaindi wademi walya wakawiana, Ichu nyio mwoṟi mooṟa-ho; lanye lumbahe, na kyoṟa kyo kyechiwa kyadu!”
Wakambada wakambaha wakamkumbalya kulya nja ya dema lya msabibu.
A menyi ulya o dema lya msabibu kindo echiwuta nyi kiki? Echicha narumatse wademi walya, na dema lilya lya msabibu nalinengye wandu wengi.
Ngesa mlawemesome shiṟehyo shi? “Iho lilya wewika mba waliminye nyi lyambuya iwa iho linene lya ndumbenyi?
Mndumii nyio alewuta mbonyitsi, nyi tsa kiṟiha kunu mesonyi hadu.”
Wakohanyi wanene, walosha wa mawawaso na wameku wakamanya kye mfanano-fu fowahoya. Wakaruwa kyama kyembada, indi wakaowuo kituṟu kilya kya wandu wakamda wakakuhendya kowo.
Wakaduma kokye Wafarisayo na wa ko Herode maata ko Yesu kundu wamdehe na idedo lyake.

Wakacha wakambia, “Mlosha na luichi, kye iyo nyi ui mhendeli, mohamba sha lohi tupu, ma okesaṟa mndupfo. Nyi kipfa kulekeambuya fana ya mndu, ke nyi ida, kyaindi kowalosha njia ya Ruwa na ii ya lohi, Ngesa kisumhanyi iwikya Kaisari okamba ang'u ote? A ngesa lukawika ang'u lukada lulawika?”
Nao Yesu kyekimanya ukulembetseṟi wowo kawawia, “Nyi kiili mocha njiseenga? Njiendye-nyi dinari, kundu njiiwone.”
Wakaende. Nao kawawia, “A mfano fu fukeri-pfo nyi fo u na kiṟehyo ki?” Wakambia, “Nyi sha Kaisari.”
Yesu kawawia, “Keinengyenyi Kaisari ishi shii sha Kaisari muweinengya Ruwa ishi shii sha Ruwa.” Wakiṟihio mnu kyake.
Kyasia Wasadukayo wakacha na ko Yesu, wai wandu wehamba, ke nyi kulaipfo iṟuka, wakambesa wehamba,
“Mlosha, Mose nyi aluṟehye kye, ‘Mndu kapfa kada mka, alade mana, manomae kimbaṟi naduo mka chu mkusu, nawonye manomae ulya apfie luwa.
Kyasia kuwekeri wana wa mka mfungade; ulya o kuwoka kaduo mka, kapfa, nalade mana.’
Na ulya o kawi kamduo mka ulya mkusu kawepfa, alafee mana. Na ulya kaṟaṟu na wudo.
Nawo woose mfungade wakapfa walafee wana. Lyefurumia mka ulya mkusu kapfa.
Ili kochishika iya maṟukyenyi mka-chu, nyi echiwa o u ipfo kiidi kyawo? Kifa woose mfungade wawemwalikie?”
Yesu kawawia, “Modeko, mnu cha kipfa mlaichi Madedo ho Maele ma pfinya ya Ruwa.
Kipfa ili wapfu weṟuka wapfunyi, wechialikapfo manya yalikopfo, kyaindi wechiwa cha wamalaika wa ipfo ruwehu.
Kyaindi kya maṟukyenyi ha iwo wapfiiye a nyi mulasomie kyawo ipfo kitabunyi kya Mose ipfo ko osha lulya luweiaka modo? Ruwa kawia Mose, ‘Inyi nyio Ruwa o Abrahamu na Ruwa o Isaki na Ruwa o Yakobo?’
Ruwa chi akeri o wapfupfo, chila na o iwo wai na moo. Nyo modeko mnu.”
Naho umu o walosha wa wuwawaso kasembelia kufui nawo kaadanya, chando waiwesana. Kekiwona Yesu awahalwo necha, kambesa, “A iwawaso inene liidye hose nyi lihya?”
Yesu kahalwo kye, “Lilya inene nyi ili, Israeli keadanya, Mndumii Ruwa chu odu nyi akeri Mndumii umu amonyi.
Kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo na ngoo yapfo yose, na mrima fopfo fose, na mahio hapfo hose, na pfinya yapfo yose.”
Lilya lya kawi nyi ili, “Kunda mndu o mṟasa opfo, chando okukundi kumony. Kuwode iwawaso lingi liidye ihapfo.”
Mlosha ulya o wuwawaso kambia, “Na necha, mlosha, nodeda kya sungusihu, ke Ruwa nyi umu, kulakeri ungi shila nyio.

Na kiwaṟi imkunda Ruwa na ngoo yose, na wuṟango wose, na pfinya yose, na ikunda mndu o mṟasa, opfo chando ukukundi kumonyi. Ikyo ki kicha na kamu kiidye shidaso shilya shekoṟo na shilya shingi shose shemaya modonyi.”
Nao Yesu kyekiwona kye mndu ulya nahaluo kui wuṟango, kambia, “Ukeri kuleshe na wumangi wo Ruwapfo.” Nahong'u kulakae ma mndu alekarya-se imbesa kindo.
Yesu kechilosha ipfo Hekalunyi kawesa, “A nyi wuda, ili walosha wa Wuwawaso wahamba, kye Kristo nyi akeri mana o Dawidi?
O Dawidi amonyi kahamba awodo nyi Mumuyo Mwele, ‘Mndumii alewia Mndumii oko, Kedamya kunu ora loko lo kulyo, na inyi njitane ngawika wakituwa wapfo wawe shi ya madende hapfo.’
Dawidi amonyi nyi amlahye, ‘Kristo nyi Mndumii,’ nyi wuda Kristo ai mana okye?” Na kituṟu kilya kya wandu kinganyi kikamadanya na sia.

Naho ipfo kiloshyonyi kyake Yesu kahamba, “Kekuṟisenyi na walosha wa wuwawaso, sa wakundi ichumia waṟee ikonya lya mkuruo na iiṟikiṟo ipfo tumo, wakundi iidaida na idamya shidembo sha kusonguo ipfo masinagogenyi.
Na handu hedamya ha kusonguo, ili wa walahye shelya.
Nyiwo wekelya mba ko waka wakusu na imaa, wechiterewa kui madedo hafoi kui ikulembetseṟa. Iwo nyiwo wechikaa wawonyo owingo lung'anyi kya ngoseṟa mkonu fulya fo mwanduye.”
Yesu Kadamya sumhana na kisoṟo kesanya mapesa. Kaambuya chando wandu wafoi waiwika mapesa ipfo kisoṟonyi. Kya Hekalunyi Wasuṟi wafoi wakawika-pfo pesa tsifoi.
Kukacha mka umu mkusu, ai mkiwa, kawikapfo senti tsiwi tsashika heleri tsitanu.
Yesu kalaha wa kiloshyonyi kyake kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, kye mka chu mkiwa na mkusu ambika shifoi kota wose wawika ipfo kisoṟonyi.
Kyamba wose wawikye kya shilya shiwatsuhae, kyaindi mka-chu kaende sha wukiwa wokye kalekia shilya awode shose, nyi shake shose shetolia moo.”
Yesu kechiwuka ipfo hekalunyi, umu o wa kiloshyonyi kyake kambia, “Mlosha, ambuya maho ho ha mba tso chando hai ha kiṟiha!”
Nao Yesu kambia, “Kuwonyi mba tso tsing'anyi? Manya kokaa kudeo-ho iho likuhekye huya iho lingi lide lilawundwohopfo.”
Yesu adamie ipfo fumvu-hu lya shidi sha Mtsinepfu ai sumhana na Hekalu, Petro, Yakobo, Yohane na Andrea wakambesa kyanya,
“Keluwie-wo, mbonyi tso nyi tsekaa tsiwe indii? Na kiṟingishyo, ki kii kechiloṟo ili isho shose shichikaa shiwe?”
Nao Yesu kawoka iwawia, “Kyekuṟisenyi, mlawone mndu kyemlemba.
Koekaa kuche sa wafoi, wache kui rina lyako, wahambe, kye, ‘Inyi nyio!’ Wadetse wandu wafoi.
Mkaicho shida na mbonyi tsa shida, mlakangaṟike. Mbonyi-tso kiwaṟi tsiche, kyaindi masiyonyi hamecha-pfo.
Kipfa mkambo fumu fochikapana na mkambo fungi, umangi wukapane na umangi wungi. Orio handu kochicha shiding'ashi na njaa. Mbonyi-tso nyi cha okooṟa lo mana aifeo.”
“Na mkuṟise muwenyi. Wandu wechimdambika mengenyi ya Synedrion na mochikapo ipfo ma sinagogenyi. Mochidao oshangunyi lo wachili na wamangi, kipfa kyako, kundu munjiṟingishie kowo.
Indi kiwaṟi kuwoka Mbonyi tsa Sia tsiongoyo mbaṟinyi tsa wandu tsose.
Nawo ili wechimduo wemdambike, mlawado makusaṟo chando mochideda, kyaindi nyi mochinengo kededa kiheri kyo kikamshika nyikyo mochihamba-ho, cha kipfa wededa-ho chi nyopfo nyi Mumuyo Mwele.
Manomae o mndu nechitwaṟa mana o mae, na wana wa wandu waamkye wafee wawo na iwawaha.
Nanyo muwenyi mochisuika ko wandu wose kipfa kya rina lyako. Kyaindi ichu mokarishya-ho tane masiyonyi, nyio echikiṟo.”
“Mochiwona ‘Kiwi kya Orumatso’ kii alyando kilakundikie iwono.” (Ichu Mosoma namanye mdambuye!) “Nalyo iwo wai kunu Yudaya wahende dichya kulya mafumvuhu.
Na ichu echikoya ai ipfo mbehu, nalasoke-pfo, ma nalaide na mba kokye kye ikuondoya-ho kindo.
Na ichu ekoya ai demenyi nalawuye na numa, ihenda kuondoya nguwo tsake tsa huye.
Ochia lo iwo wekoya nyi wakupfungye na iwo wekoya weonza mafiri ho!
Keterewenyi, kundu mbonyi tso tsilawutike kiheri kya mbeo.
Nyi kipfa mfiri yo kochikaapfo wukiwa wung'anyi sa wulalemewoneke kiwokya mawokyenyi ha shindo sho shi shiwumbe nyi Ruwa shika mandi ha wulalu. Ma ili numa wochikiwoneka-se wudopfo.
Na mafiri ho nokoe Mndumii alawechihaanguṟa, kuwechikiṟo mndu ma umu-pfo. Kyaindi nyi kipfa kya walya wa wasambuṟe, nyi kyondo Mndumii aleanguṟa mfiri-yo.”
“Nalyo mkakoya ma mndu kembia, ‘Kristo aichu kunu,’ ang'u, ‘a ulya alya.’ Nanyo ma mlaidikye.
Kipfa kochikure-pfo Wakristo wa wongo na waikimbi wa wongo na iwuta mawuto ha kiṟingishyo na ha kiṟiha, kundu watewe na walya Ruwa awasamburie, nokoe nyi kiwechiwa.
Kyaindi nyo mkuṟise! Ngamsonguo imbia shose, ili shilamehoya.”
“Nahong'u mafiri ho, kombona wukiwa wo womeida na mnengeṟi fochihaluka meema na meeri fochiloṟa ngela yafopfo.
Na nyenyeri tsechiwa molokya tsiwuke ipfo ruwehu, na pfinya tsa ipfo ruwehu tsechisingitsosingitso.
Mandi nalyo wawone Manomndu kechicha ipfo mapuchinyi ai na pfinya ing'anyi na wuitoṟi.
Na numa echiduma wamalaika wake; na isanya walya wasambuṟe wewuka njora tsiina tsa oruka, kuwokya kishingonyi kya oruka tane kishingo kya ruwehu.”
“Kuloshienyi mkuyunyi muwute-ho mfanano fu, Mkamkoya oṟuwe lofo luuwiriwiri lukadosa mambale, mkawuta-ho imanya nyi ipaṟika-ng'u kui.
Nanyo na wudo, mkamewona isho shechiwutika, mumanye, kye Mana o Mndu nyi amshika kufui.
Na kya lohi ngambia, kye mbaṟi i ya wandu ikeri-ho, yechisia manyale-pfo, na kutane isho shose shawutika.
Kulya ruwehu kukakye kunyamaṟike na kunu orukyenyi, kyaindi madedo hako hechinyamaṟika manyale-pfo.”
“Kyaindi mfiri fo na saa iyo kuipfo mndu aichi mbonyi tsashopfo, ma wasu wa ipfo ruwehu manya o Mana, shile na Wande.
Ambuyenyi muwekuṟisa na ilaa dembo kipfa mulaichi, indi kiheri kyo kyecha.
Nyi cha ili mndu ahenda kyaṟo kuleshe kada mba yake kadambikya shisinga shake ipfo kanyi orio mndu na iṟunda lyake, kawawasa ulya moikalya mongo kye nalae dembo.
Nahong'u mlae dembo kipfa mlaichi kiheri menyi mba echicha, kokoya nyi kyukany ang'u kio makidi hawi, ang'u kiheri kya aheṟa, ang'u ngamenyi otuko.
Laenyi dembo ili echicha peṟeseng'u nalakoye mui madonyi.
Kyaindi kindo ngambia nyo, ngawia wose, laenyi dembo!”
Kuwetsuheṟe mfiri iwi kushike mfiri fo Pasaka na fo Mkate Ilantarang'ashe. Wakohanyi wanene wasanganyi na walosha wa wuwawaso wakapfula, chando wechimbada na mtambo, wambahe.
Indi walehamba, “Lulambade mfiri fu mnenepfo kuwone kochiduka kituṟu kya wandu.”

Kyasia Yesu nawekeri kulya Betanyia mba ko Simon ulya awewodo nyi iwawe. Adamye-ho kechilya shelya, kukacha mndu mka, umu arie chupa ya alabastron iwode mafuda hapfama ha nardo mecha ha wuhuru wung'anyi, kampusuya o mdonyi ko Yesu.
Na kukakaa-ho wandu mata, walesuo wechikuwesa, “A mafuda ho hadetsyo hado wanda nyi ha ki?
Hakawekumbo haweende dinari mahana haṟaṟu tseenenga wakiwa.” Wakafuluko wakapomya mka ulya.
Kyaindi Yesu kawawia, “Kemlekenyi, nkyi ili muiwinyishawinyisha mka chu? Nyi kindo kicha anjiwutya.
Kipfa wandu wakiwa mui nawo mfiri yose, mkakunda na moidima iwawutya necha, kyaindi kyako inyi mokaa na inyi mfiri yosepfo.
Nyi awuta, chando akuidimya; nyi asonguo ishimbwo mbihu foko ifuṟeheṟa fuhende iṟiko.
Na kya lohi ngambia, Orio kundu kose komeongoyo Mbonyi tso Njiicha wuyaneny kose, na kyake anjiwutye napfondo kyehambo, kundu nakumbuo-pfo.”
Nao Yuda Iskariote ai umu o, walya ikumi na wawi kahenda ko wakohanyi wanene, kundo nadambike Yesu ipfo kowo.
Wakohanyi wanene wekiicho wado wakachihio, wakamteṟya kyemenenga fesa. Yuda kawoka ipfula mfiri mcha fomdambika.
Mfiri fo kuwoka fo mfiri iya yelya Mkate Ilantarang'ashe, kiheri kyeshinja huṟuwi lya Pasaka, wa kiloshyo kyake wakambesa, “Nyi ku ukundi luhende isungusia-ho, lukulie-ho Pasaka?”
Yesu kaduma wa kiloshyonyi kyake wawi kawawia, “Kehendenyi ipfo mṟinyi na mokumbuhanana na mndu umu akudikye kinungu kya mṟinga muitumane nao.
Na mba mochiwona aida-napfo muwie menyi mba, kye Mlosha akuwia wai, ‘Nyi kiṟiha kihya lochikulia-pfo Pasaka so na wa kiloshyonyi kyako?’
Nao echimloṟa kiṟiha king'anyi kya ipfo kai ki kyale nguwo ki kisungusie nyihondo mochilusungusia.”
Wa kiloshyonyi wakakure wakahenda kulya mṟinyi, wakawona chando Yesu alewawia, wakasungusia mfuho fo Pasaka.
Ili kyukanyi, Yesu kacha na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye walya ikumi na wawi.
Wai kiliiyonyi Yesu kahamba, “Na kya lohi ngambia, umu onu-ho, ailya na inyi, echinjidambika.”
Wa kiloshionyi kyakye wakawoka isokyo nyi fowa na imbesa umu kui umu, “Ngesa nyi inyi?”
Yesu kawawia, “Nyi umu onu nyo ikumi na wawi sa luikapa nao mkate kunu kitelenyi.
Nyi lohi Manomndu ihenda nyi ahenda, chando Madedo Maele hamaṟehie kyakye, kyaindi ochia lo mndu ulya, echidambika Manachu o Mndu! Kiwei kicha, okoe mnduchu alalefeo.”
Na ili wawelya shelya, Yesu kaira-ho mkate kaidapfuma Ruwa kafufunja, kawainengya wa kiloshionyi kyakye kahamba, “Ngenyi ifu nyi mbihu foko.”
Kawewada na kirahu kaana Ruwa kawainengya, wakanyoya-ho kirau kilya wose.
Kawawia, “Ikyi nyi samu yako iṟingishia mkundano fo Ruwa; samu ikeri ipusuo kipfa kya wandu wafoi.
Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Njechikinyo-se kya ndunda tsa msabibusepfo, na njitane ngashika mfiri fulya, ilindi njechinyoyaho wuhya ipfo Wumanginyi wo Ruwa.’ ”
Wameimba, wakahenda kulya Fumvunyi lya shidi sha Mtsinepfu.
Yesu kawia wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Mochiendyo wusutsu nyi inyi mose, kipfa ki kiṟehye kirehio kiele, ‘Njechikapa mlisi na machondi hawerahanyika.’
Kyaindi ngamidima iṟuka, njechimsongoya, kulya Galilaya.”
Petro kambia, “Ma kokoya wose waendyo wusutsu na ilekana na iyo, inyi njechilekana na iyo ma ntapfo.”
Yesu kambia, “Nyi kya lohi ngakuwia, inu kio ki, olong'onyi lulamekapa kawi ochinjikana kaṟaṟu.”
Petro kaengeṟa ihamba, “Kiti njikukane na njipfe njisanzeo na iyo njechikuda-pfo.” Na wa kiloshionyi wakahamba wado wose.
Wakashika kyungunyi kii kiiṟihye kilaho Getisemane, Yesu kawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Kedamyenyi iya, ili njikeri iterewa.”
Nao kahenda arianyi na Petro na Yakobo na Yohane, kawoka iwuko mnu nyi madima na ieṟewe.
Kawawia, “Mrima foko fuwodo mnu nyi fowa, ngakiṟa ipfa. Kyekaenyi ya muwelaa dembo.”
Katikira mbele kitutu kaho wanda katerewa, kokoya na kyechikuwiia saa yo ya maturo imwidye.
Kahamba, “Wande oko, ipfo kopfo shindo shoose shechiidimika. Njiwutawo kirahu ki kya maturo Indi kilawe chando njikundi inyi kiwe chando iyo ukundi.”
Kacha kakoya wa kiloshionyi walya waṟaṟu walee mado. Kawia Petro, “Simon, nyi ulee mado? Oidima ilaa dembo ma saa imu?”
Kawawawia, “Kelaenyi dembo mbeterewa, mlashike iida kiheshonyi. Ngoo yo yako nyi injiṟamtsu, kyaindi nyama tsikalehela.”
Kawuya ihendase katerewa kechihamba madedo halya halya.
Kawuya kakoya walee-se mado; kipfa meso hawo hai malemie mado. Walamanye kindo wemhaluo.
Ili alewachea lya kaṟaṟu alewawia, “Nyi molaa mado na isia moo? Nahongu kyakushikya-ng'u, saa yamshika! Ambuya, Manomndu, aidambiko mawokonyi ha wanyamaṟi.
Kurenyi luhende, Ambuyenyi monjidambika a ichu aicha.”

Yesu kekideda-se ado, nalyo liyenyi Yuda Iskariote nyio umu o walya ikumi na wawi, kacha arianyi na kituṟu kya wandu, warie njoshu na shiṟeta, wai wadume nyi wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso na wasongoru.
Na Yuda mṟiingi ulya momdambika awewateṟye kichano, kyehamba, “Ichu, njechimhekya momu nyio-ng'u; mumbade na imduo kiringonyi.”
Adi Yuda kacha katikirya kufui na Yesu kambia, “Mlosha!” Kamhekia momu.
Wandu walya wakamleshya mawoko wakawada Yesu.
Umu o walya wahoṟoki-ho na Yesu, kasomuo oshu lokye kakapa isinga lya mkohanyi mnene kamdumbuo kudu.
Yesu kawawia, “Mowuka kanyi murie njoshu na shiṟeta mkacha injiwada, cha ili njii msoki?
Orio mkonu njiwekeri konu ipfo hekalunyi njichilosha-ho, mlanjiwade. Wulalu kiwaṟi Shiṟehiyo Shiele shiinukye.”
Nahong'u wa kiloshionyi wakamda wakadicha wose.
Kuwekeri-ho manake amwituma Yesu aṟee nguwo ya owiṟo alaṟee nguwo ya kya mmba. Wakaheṟia imbada.
Nao kasheṟuka kada-ho nguwo yo ya owiṟo kadicha ai kitaṟe.
Kyasia wakaduo Yesu kulya ko Mkohanyi Mnene, handu wakohanyi wanene na wasongoru na walosha wa wuwawaso wose wawesanzie.
Petro kaitumana na Yesu, ai kuleshe, katana ashika alya osehu ko Mkohanyi ulya mnene kadamia-ho handu hamu na waringi kechioda modo.
Nawo wakohanyi wanene na menge ya Sinedrio wose wakashihia Yesu owingo lo mbaha, walawone.
Wandu wafoi wawekeri ihamba-ho njowingo tsa Yesu tsa wongo njowingo tsilya tsilasumhanane.
Kukakure-pfo wandu wehamba owingo loke lo wongo wechihamba,
“Luleicho kechihamba, ‘Njechisanja hekalu lyo li liwike na mawoko ha wandu njiwike lingi ko mfiri iṟaṟu lilaliwike na mawoko.’ ”
Ma ili walehamba-ho wado ma shilasumhane shoose.
Naho Mkohanyi Mnene kahoṟoka o makidi hawi kawesa Yesu, “A nyi kiili kulahamba ma shehaluo ishi sha wandu wa wahamba-ho shekuwinga?”
Nao kakutsia sau, nalahaluo ma kindo. Mkohanyi Mnene kawuya imbesa-se kambia, “Iyo na ukeri Kristo, Mana o Ruwa ichu aidapfumo?”
Yesu kahamba, “Ee da inyi nyio. Nanyo mochiwona Manomndu adamye ipfo ora lo kulyo lo Menyi Pfinya, kechicha ipfo mapuchinyi ha ruwehu.”
Mkohanyi Mnene karanduo kanzi yake kahamba, “Nyi kiki-se luipfula wehamba-ho shewinga?
Na momicho kirumo kyake kyeruma Ruwa. Mokusaṟa muda?” Wakamkumbya owingo wose, kindo kimsumhanyi na opfu.
Kyasia maata ho wakawoka imiselya mnyeri wakamshikia kyamu wakamkapa ngofi wachimbia, “Kehamba malasha nyiu akukapa!” Na walya wapfuṟukanyi-ho wakamwambya, wechimkapa ngofi.
Nahong'u Petro akeri-ho o seri osehu, kukacha mana o waka, akeri umu o shisinga sha Mkohanyi Mnene.
Kawona Petro, kechioda modo, kamwambuya kambia, “Na iyo na kuwekeri na mndu cho Yesu o kulya Nasareti.”
Nao Petro kakana, kechihamba, “Ma ngamemanya-pfo, ma njiichi kindo ohambapfo.” Petro kawuka-pfo, kahenda nja ya mbele. Olong'onyi lukakapa.
Mana ulya o waka kisinga kawona-se Petro; kawoka-se lingi iwia walya wahoṟoki-ho, “Mndu-chu nyi umu o walya.”
Petro kawuya ikana-se. Oweṟe kitutu walya wahoṟoki-ho wakawia Petro, “Nyi kya lohi ukeri umu o walya, kipfa ui Mgalilaya.”
Nao Petro kawoka ikusesa na ilya nyamu ke, “Njiichi mndu chu mumhambapfo.”
Nalyo lienyi olong'onyi lukakapa lya kawi. Petro kakumbuo idedo lilya, chando Yesu ambie, ke olongonyi lulamekapa kawi, ochinjikana kaṟaṟu. Petro katamuo-ho kalia mchenyeṟe.
Kyasia ngamenyi kilawo wakohanyi wanene wakaruwa kyama hando hamu na wasongoru na walosha wa wuwawaso na walya wa menge Sinedrio wose wakapfunga Yesu na shiwoho wakamduo wakamdambikya Pilato.
Na Pilato kawesa Yesu “Iyo nyi Mangi ya Wayuda?” Nao kamhaluo kahamba, “Na ikyo ohamba.”
Wakohanyi wanene wakamkumbya Yesu na shifoi.
Pilato kawesase Yesu, “Ohaluo-ho idedo? Ambuya, chandu waihamba shindo shifoi wakukumba nasho.”
Kyaindi Yesu nalamhaluo-se ma kindo, Pilato kaṟihio.
Kyasia orio mfiri mnene fo Pasaka Pilato nawekewapfunguya umu o walya wa wapfunge ulya wamemterewa.
Kyasia kuwekeri-pfo umu elaho nyi Baraba, ampfunge handu hamu na walya waṟiingya wanene wawo, sa wawahie mndu ipfo wuṟinginy wowo.
Kituṟu kya wandu kikahenda ko Pilato wakawooka imterewa nawawutye chandu ekewawutya lingi.
Pilato kawawesa “Mokunda, njimpfunguye Mangi ya Wayuda?”
Kipfa nyi aweichi, na pata kye wakohanyi wanene wamdambikye Yesu kokye kipfa kya wunenyi.
Wakohanyi wanene wakatsutsuma wandu, kundu wakunde Pilato nawapfunguye Baraba.
Nao Pilato kawawesa-se, “A kindo mokunda, njiwutye ichu momhamba, nyi ai Mangi ya Wayuda, nyi kiki?”
Wakawuya ifahya, “Umbambye msalabehu!”
Pilato kawawia, Kitewe nkiki? “A kindo kiwicho alekiwuta nyi kiki?” Wakaengeṟa ifahya, “Mbambye msalabehu!”
Pilato kyekikunda ichihiṟa kituṟu kilya kya wandu kawapfunguya Baraba. Kawuta Yesu, nakapo na ngowa itso tsinjitochie msha, kamdambika nawambyo msalabehu.
Kyasia waskari wakawuta-ho Yesu wakamduo ipfo osehu, lo Praitorion, wakalaha naho siṟi ya waskari yose.
Wakamṟika nguwo ya king'aring'ari wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakamhekya mdonyi.
Wakawoka imiṟikiṟa, “Lokwiṟikiṟa iyo Mangi ya Wayuda!”
Wakamkapa mdo na iṟeṟe wakamiselya mnyeri wakampfiria ndi wakamolokya ndenyi.
Nahong'u wamemtaluo, wakambuta nguwo iya ya king'aring'ari wakamṟika nguwo tsake amonyi. Wakamduo, kundu wambambye msalabehu.
Wai njienyi wechihenda, wakaitikia mndu aida-ho, elaho Simon o Kirene, awuka demenyi. Nyio ndeye o Aleksandria na Rufo, wakamwitikya nakudike msalaba fulya fo Yesu.
Wakaduo Yesu handu halaho nyi Goligota, ikyo kikahaluo nyi “Handu ha Mbuonyi.”
Wakamwinenga mvinyo fu mlonge-longe na manemane, nalaambye.
Wakambambya msalabehu; wakahawana nguwo tsilya tsake, wechiwika kuṟu kuhya kyatso, chando wechitsiduo.
Nyi kuwei ngamenyi saa tsiṟaṟu, ili walembambya msalabenyi.
Na kiṟehyo kya owingo loke nyi kiṟehye-ho kye “Nyi Mangi ya Wayuda.”
Naho kuwei-ho weala njia wawi wakawawambya msalabehu handu hamu nao, ulya umu kakaa ora lokye lo kulyo na ungi kakaa ora lokye lo kumoso. [
Kukaawutsyo-ho kilya Maṟehyo Maele hahambie “Aii msanzie kambenyi lyimu na wanyamaṟi.”]
Na walya, waida-ho, wakamruma wesingitsasingitsa mdo yawo na ihamba, “Iyo kui mosanja hekalu koliwika lya kawi mfiri iṟaṟu, likawa.
Kyekukiṟe-ng'u kumonyi, ochisoka ipfo msalabehu!”
Na wakohanyi wanene na wudo wakawemtaluo hamu na walosha wa wuwawaso wehamba, “Nalekiṟa wengi indi nalaidime ikukiṟa o amonyi.
Kye wai ai Kristo, ichu Mangi ya Israeli, Nasokye-ng'u o msalabehu wulalu kundu lochiwona na idikya.” Na walya wawawambye msalabehu handu hamu nao wakawemmina.
Wokya saa ya kaṟandaṟu mfiri, kukaho meema kulya orukenyi kose itane foshika saa kenda.
Na kiheri kya saa kenda mfiri Yesu kakoṟoṟoma ilaha na ṟu ling'anyi, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakitanyi?” Ikyo kohaluo, Ruwa oko, “Ruwa oko, nyi kili omenjida?”
Walya maata wahoṟoki-ho wakaicho wakahamba, “Ambuya nyi alaha Elia.”
Nahong'u ulya umu-ho kahenda, kedicha, kaichuṟa ipfupfu mṟinga fotarang'a kawika iwalehu kamrutsa nalyo, kechihamba, “Lekyenyi luambuye, kokoya Elia kechicha imsotsa o msalabenyi.”
Nao Yesu kakoṟoṟoma na ṟu ling'anyi, kanenuka.
Nahong'u isulia lilya lyeshingya ipfo hekalunyi likaranduka njora tsiwi, likawokya huye likashika tsindenyi.
Mnene ulya o waskari awehoṟoki-ho sumhana nao, kekiwona chandu Yesu ailia kechinenuka ado, kahamba, “Na lohi mndu chu nyi awei Mana o Ruwa.”
Kuwekeri-pfo na waka waweambuya wakeri kuleshe, na Maria o kulya Magidala; Salome, na Maria, mae o Yakobo ulya mtutu na o Yose hondo wawei.
Sa wawei itumana na Yesu na impfuṟukanya, kiheri awei kulya Galilaya, na wengi wafoi, sa wadoe na Yerusalemu warianyi nao.
Nalyo komshika kyukanyi ili kuwei mfiri foṟeheṟa nyi mfiri fusongoe Sabato.
Kukacha naho Yosefu o kulya Arimatia, nyi mndu o mmenge ang'anyi. Nao kawewa mndu aweiwedia Wumangi wo Ruwa, kakarya Kahenda ko Pilato alawodo nyi wuowu katerewaho nainengo mbihu fo Yesu.
Pilato kaṟihyo, amiicho kye Yesu amepfa, Kakulahya mnene ulya o waskari kambesa, koka Yesu awempfa kiheri kileshe.
Pilato amewio nyi mnene ulya o waskari kye Yesu amepfa, kaenengya Yosefu momu naireho mnying'a fulya.

Nao Yosefu ahuṟye nguwo tsa owiṟo, kasotsia wanda mbihu fulya kamoṟowya nguwonyi tsilya tsa owiṟo Kambika opangenyi loṟika mpfu, lulya lu utorongoche kulya ihonyi, kapiṟinyitsiaho iho oo momu fo opanga lulya.
Nao Maria o Magidala na Maria (mae) o Yose waleambuya handu alaṟo.
Kyasia mfiri fo sabato fomeida, Maria o Magidala; Salome, na Maria mae o Yakobo wakahuṟa mdi yepfama kundu wache ishia mbihu fo Yesu.
Nalyo ngamenyi otuko mfiri fo Ruwa wakacha na kulya opangenyi, kiheri mnengeṟi fomedo.
Wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi, “Nyiu echilueka ipiṟing'itsa-ho iho lyo oo momu fo ṟungu lyilya?”
Wakairia meso wakawona, kye iho lyo lyampiṟing'itso-ho, (Nalyo nyi liweng'anyi mnu.)
Wakaida na opangenyi wakawona manake adamye-ho ora lo kulyo, aṟee ikonya lya mkuruo, Wakaṟihio mnu.
Nao manake ulya kawawia, “Mulaṟihio mnu. Nyi muipfula Yesu Mnasareti, ulya ambambye msalabehu; Amṟuka, nakeri iyapfo. Ambuyenyi handu wawemṟikie.
Kyaindi henda wienyi wa kiloshyonyi kyake na Petro, kye nyi echimusongoya echihenda kulya Galilaya. Mpfondu mochimbona, chando alembia.”
Wakawuka alya opangenyi wechidicha, kipfa wawodo nyidedema na makangao. Walawie na mndu ma kindo, kifa wawekeri yowuo mnu. [
Kyasia Yesu ameṟuka mfiri fo Ruwa ngamenyi otuko, kawoka ikuloṟa na Maria o Magidala, nyi ulya Yesu awembutie waṟufu wawicho mfungade wawembode.
Maria Magidala kahenda yongoya walya wakye wawekeri na Yesu wakuinadie na ilia.
Nawo wekiicho, kye Yesu nyi ai na moo kawono nyi Maria Magidala walaidikye.
Ili numa Yesu kakuloṟa na wawi wa kiloshionyi, wechichumya, kakuloṟa nawo ai na fana ingi, wechihenda ipfo patehu.
Nawo daa wakahenda wakaongoya walya walawei-ho, manya walawaidikye.
Numa wadamie ilya shelya, Yesu kakuloṟa nawo walya ikumi na umu Kawadedya mnu, ili walaidikye na ngoo tsawo ili tsi ntumhari walaidikye walya wawemembona ameṟuka.
Kawawia, “Kehendenyi wuyana kose, muongoye-pfo Mbonyi tso tsa Sia ko orio mndu.
Msa aidikye kapatiso, nechikiṟo, msa alaidikye, echiwonyo owingo.
Na shiṟingishyo sheimya iwo waidikye nyi shikeri shii-le, nyi kui rina lyako wefuna nalyo waṟufu wawicho, na ideda kui mdedie mhya.
Na mawoko hawo wechiira naho njoka, wakanyo kindo kyewaha kyechiwawutia ma kindopfo; walya wai mtengeṟi, wechiwahekya mawoko, nawo nyi wechisambuka.”
Na Mndumii Yesu amededa ado nawo, kairio huye ruwehu, kahenda idamya ora lo kulyo lo Ruwa.
Na walya wa kiloshionyi wakahenda wakaongoya-pfo kose, Mndumii kechiwatarama na idedo lilya wahamba kaliwanza na shiṟingishyo shilya awainengye shewaimya.]
Kyamba wandu wafoi walewika mawoko hawo iṟehiya, mbonyi tsilya tsilewutika kunu kodu;
chando watsiludambikie iwo wawetsiwonyi matsika kuwooka, wawewei na wahidi wa kidedo-kyo.
Na inyi kilenjichihia, ngatumatuma mnu tsoose kimatsa kimaenyi kyatso; njikukuṟehie wokikisa iyo Teofilo oko umichimbiṟe mnu.
Kundu nomanye owanzo lo mbonyi-tso uletsipfundo nlo lohi.

Kyasia matika halya Herode aweei mangi ya kulya Yudaya, kuwei-pfo mndu mkohanyi amlahe rina lyake nyi Sakaria, ai o kambenyi lya Abia, na mkooke nyi o kishari kya wana wa waka wa Aron, nao rina lyake nyiwe Elisabeti.
Nawo wakawa wecha wasumhanyi ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa wawawi, wakahenda wechihendelia mawawaso hoose na njopfundo tsa Mndumii tsose, ma walaṟatsie-ho kindo.
Wawewode manapfo, kipfa Elisabeti nyiwe mhumba, nawo wawawi nyi wawei waku.
Kyasia kamba lyake likashika lyehenda ṟunda shindo sha wukohanyi woke sumuhana na Ruwa.
Kakooyo nyi kamba lyake kui kido kya wukohanyi nahende pfo ipfaamira opfaamo, kaida kulya hekalunyi lya Mndumii.
Mamwingi fulya fo wandu foose fukakaa nja fochiterewa Ruwa saa iya kochipfaamiṟo.
Kawonekio nyi malaika o Mndumii kahoṟoka oo ora lo kulyo lo kitaṟa kyepfaamiṟia.
Sakaria ambona kawa mkahai, kawado nyi wuowu.
Malaika ulya kambia, “Ma kulawowuo Sakaria, kyamba kiterewo kilya kyapfo nyiki kiidikie; na mkoopfo Elisabeti nyi echikaa nakufeeye mana o womi, na rina lyake nyi ochimlaha nyi Yohane.
Na iyo nyi ochiwado nyi sia na ikeseka, na iya mafeonyi hake wandu nyi wechiwuta-ho ichihio wafoi.
Kipfa nyi echikaa nawe mndu mnene ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa, elechinyo mvinyo ma kindo kyenanza, naweka amichuṟe Mumuyo Mwele kiwookia awuka wusunyi wo mae.
Nao nyi echihaluo wana wa Israeli wafoi-ho wawuye halukia Ruwa-chu Mndumii owo.

Na isonguo echisonguo ipfo mbele yake awode mumuyo fo Elia na pfinya yake, nakeimbeṟuo ngoo tsa wandee wa wandu tsiimbeṟukie wana wawo, na walya waapfinya wahalukie mhio fo wandu wai wecha wasumhanyi, nao kundu echiṟeheṟia Mndumii wandu wai wasungusie.”
Kyasia Sakaria kawia malaika alya, “Aka-wo kindo njemanya-wo nakyo ikyo nkyo kiki; kipfa njii mmeku namka oko nawei mku?”
Malaika kahaluo kambia, “Inyi nyi Gabrieli, njekehoṟoka sumhana na oshangu lo Ruwa, nao nyio anjiduma njiche ideda na iyo na ikushitsia mbonyi-tso tsiwode sia.
Kipfa ili kulaidikya madedo hako nyi ochiwa pipi kulechiidima ideda mtano noshike mkonu fulya kyechikaa kiwutike chando ngakuwia.”
Na wandu waweiwedia Sakaria wakaṟihio kipfa lya alekaa ado kulya hekalunyi.
Kiheri alewuka na kulya nja, nalakiidime ideda nawo; wakamanyia nyi ammbona kiṟiha kulya hekalunyi; nao kawakemya na owoko, kakaa ai pipi.
Kekimarisa mkonu iya ya iṟunda lilya lyake, kahenda kuwuuya na kulya kanyi koke.
Naalyo shiheri shilya shamsia, mkooke Elisabeti kakapika, kaowa meri itanu kahamba,
“Nyi wudo-ng'u Mndumii anjiwutia mfiri-yo imchihiye yenjiwuta wusutsu woko ipfo kiidi kya wandu.”
Meeri fulya fo kaṟandaṟu malaika ulya Gabrieli kadumo nyi Ruwa kundu ko mṟinyi fo kulya Galilaya, fumlahe Nasareti.
Ko manowaka ashitsye, nao awemkose nyi mndu, rina lyake nyi Yosefu, o kisharinyi kya Dawidi, na mana ulya o waka rina lyae nyi Maria.
Kyasia malaika ulya kaida na kulya mba, kahamba, “Ngakuiṟikiṟa iyo umsaṟie; Mndumii nakae na iyo, ui mwonyishe kota waka wengi.”
Nao kauma mkahai kipfa kya kidedo kilya, kasaangia kipfa kya kiirikiṟo kilya ke nyiwee kya iki.
Malaika kambia, “Ma kulaowuo Maria; kipfa nyi kulewona osu ko Ruwa.
Ambuya, nyiochikapia, nofee mana o womi, na rina lyake nyi ochimlaha nyi Yesu.
Nao nyi echikaa nawe mndu ang'anyi, nawelaho nyi ai mana o ichu ai huye ya shindo shoose, na Mndumii Ruwa nyi echimnenga kitima kya wumangi kya ndee Dawidi.
Nao nyi echikaa ai mangi ya oshari lo Yakobo mlungana, ma wumangi woke woikaa wudumbukepfo!”
Maria kawia malaika ulya, “A kindo-kyo nyi kyekaa kiwe kida, ili njilawode mii?”
Malaika kahaluo kambia, “Nyi Mumuyo Mwele echikusokia ipfo huye yapfo, na pfinyia ya ichu ai huye ya shoose nyi yechikuwikia mṟishe. Kyainenga kilya kyekaa kifeo kilaho nyi kyele, kii Mana o Ruwa.
Ambuya na mshari ulya opfo Elisabeti ao nyiawekupfungie lya mana o womi lya wuku woke, na meri-fu mfo kaṟandaṟu amkapika, ulya awemlahe mhumba.
Kipfa ko Ruwa kuipfo kindo kilemie iwutapfo.”
Maria kahamba, “Ambuya nyi njikukerie iya njii kisinga kya Mndumii kiwekunji-wutikia chando owehamba.” Kyasia malaika ulya kalekana nao.
Mfiri iya naalyo Maria kakure kaangusha ihenda kudooya na kulya mafumvuhu, nahende shika kulya mṟinyi fo Yuda.
Kaida na kulya mba ko Sakaria, kaiṟikiṟa Elisabeti.
Naalyo Elisabeti kekiicho kiṟikiṟo kilya kya Maria, mana ulya katoolatoola ipfo wusunyi koke. Elisabeti kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele.
Kakoṟoṟoma na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Wungusu iyo umbikie mboṟa iidye ya waka woose, na iki kyekaa kifeo ipfo wusunyi wopfo na kiwekiwikie mboṟa.
Ale kindo-ki ng'ku kyambukia, itane mae o Mndumii oko akuchea na kunu koko?
Keambuya, lilyandi ṟu lya kiiṟikiṟo kyapfo lyaida kunu madunyi hako, mana-chu katoola-toola amkesi kunu wusunyi koko.
Wungusu icho alekuidikia shilya alewio nyi Mndumii ke nyishekaa shihoye!”
Naalyo Maria kahamba, “Mrima foko foadapfuma Mndumii.
Na mumuyo foko fukakesekia Ruwa ai mkiṟa oko.
Kipfa kya ili ameambuya wufafa wo kisinga kyake. Ambuya wokia wulalu marika hoose hechianga monjisendia osu loko.
Nyi ili ichu menyi pfinya amenjiwutia shindo shing'anyi; na rina lyake li-yele.
Na isaṟia lyake nlyechikaa mtano marika na marika; ko walya wamwowoye.
Nao nyi awutie ngata sa njiyapfinya na kuwoko koke; karahanyitsa walya wakuirinyishie ipfo mahionyi hawo ha mrima yawo.
Nyi akumbalye waapfinya ipfo maloṟike-hu hawo; kadosya-ho wafafa.
Wawodo nyi njaa nyi awaihutsie shindo shicha; na wasuṟi kawasama wulya.
Nyi airie mana oke Israeli nakutamuye isaṟia.
Na chando ewewia waku walya wadu, Abrahamu na oshari loke mlungana.”
Kyasia Maria kakaa nao handu ha meri iṟaṟu, numa kawuya na kanyi koke.
Kyasia Elisabeti maheri hake hefee hakashika, kafee mana o womi.
Wandu walya wa mṟasa foke na wa kishari kyake wekiicho ke Mndumii amemnetseṟa ado, wakawado mnu nsia.
Ili mfiri fo nyanya wakacha napfo idina kimana kilya, wawekundi na ikidumbuya rina nyi Sakaria cha lilya lya ndee.
Mae kahaluo kahamba, “Ote-ko! Nalaho rina nyi Yohane.”
Nawo wakambia, “Kuwode mndu o kishari kyapfo ekelaho rinalyopfo.”
Nawo wakakemia nde ke nyi rina lihya akundi nalaho.
Nao kakuwesia kiṟaṟo kyeṟehia; kaṟehia-ho, rina lyake nyi Yohane. Wakaṟihio wose.
Naalyo tichi dumbu lyake likawuya tambalahaluka na olimi loke naawo, kadeda kechikuidapfumya Ruwa.
Na wandu walya wa mṟasa fowo wakahoyo nyi wuowu woose; na mbonyi-tso tsikadung'ana kulya mafumvunyi ha Yudaya kose.
Na walya waleicho wose wakatsiwika ngoonyi wakahamba, “A mana-chu nekaa nawe ada wai?” Cha kipfa lyandi kuwoko ko mndumii kuwei nao.
Na Sakaria ulya ndee kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele kahamba kisuku kya Ruwa kahamba,
“Kuhende kochikuidapfumyo Mndumii-chu ai Ruwa o Israeli; nyi ili indi amsahia wandu wake na ikuwawonyiia okiio.
Nao nyi ameluṟihichia ombe lo oletso; ipfo mbenyi ya mana ulya oke Dawidi.
Na chando awehambie na madumbu ha wadedi walya waele kimatsa kacha mṟamna.
Ke naluwonyie oletso lo mesa hadu; na lo owoko lo walya walusuo woose.
Ke nawikie waku walya wadu osaṟio; na ikutamuya mkundana fulya foke mwele.
Nyamu iya elelia ndeadu Abrahamu; kundu naluinenge,
Luke lui waletse owoko lo wakituwa wadu, lulai na wuowu.
Luwehenda lochimhidia na wuele na wucha wusumhanyi ipfo oshangunyi loke mandi-ha lui na moo mafiri hose.
Na iyo mkoku nyi ochikaa nolaho nyi ui mdedi o ichu ai huye ya shoose; kipfa nyi ochisonguo ipfo mbele ya Mndumii, nohende kochisungusia njia tsake.
Nokeinenga wandu wake wulaanyi womanyia okiio; ili wechileheṟo manyamaṟo hawo.
Kipfa kya isaṟia lya mrima fo Ruwa odu; nalyo nyi lyechiluinenga isahio nyi madoenyi ha huye.
Hahende waaya walya wadamie meemenyi na maṟishenyi ha opfu; kundu madende hadu hahende isumuhantsyo ipfo njiehu ya ofoṟo.”
Kyasia kimana kilya kikang'ana-ng'ana, kikahenda kyechiwada pfinya ipfo mumuyonyi fokyo, nao kahenda kukaya kundu ko nuka kukatana koshika mfiri fulya echa kuloṟa na wandu wa Israeli.
Mandi halya kukawuka iwawaso kulya ko Kaisari Augusto, ke masanga hoose hahende iṟehio baruonyi kya okamba.
Na kiṟehio-kyo nyikyo kya kuwoka, lilya mandi Kirenyio akeri mchili o kulya Siria.
Kyasia wandu wakahenda ṟehio wose, orio mndu na mṟinyi foke.
Na Yosefu nao kawewuka kulya Galilaya, mṟinyi fo Nasareti, kahenda ido na kulya Yudaya, mṟinyi fo Dawidi, fumlahe nyi Betlehemu, kipfa awekeri mndu o mbaṟinyia Dawidi, mpfo kikunyi kyake.
Kundu nahende ṟehio-pfo hamu na Maria ulya awemkosie, nao nyi awei mnene.
Kyasia wakeri kundu kulya kiheri kyake kyefee kikashika.
Kafee manoke mbee o womi kamwoṟowia shidami kamlaṟa mponyi, kipfa walalewonyia handu kulya mchalonyi fo wahenu.
Kyasia na kulya kihongonyi nyi kuwekeri-pfo walisi wai patehu wechiringa poo lyawo kui makamba kiheri kyakio.
Wadi a ulya malaika o Mndumii, kacha ihoṟoka alyando wai, na ngeela ya Ruwa ikawaṟingichya riti; nawo wakahoyo nyi wowu wung'anyi.
Malaika lulya kawawia, “Manya mulaowuo, ambuyenyi njiimwongoya mbonyi tsiwode sia ing'anyi, nayo nyi yekaa ishike ko wandu woose.
Kipfa ili momefeeyo mkiṟa inu; nao nyi Kristo Mndumii kulya mṟinyi fo Dawidi.
Na kitaanyio kyanu kyemumanyisha nyi iki, nyi mochiwona mkoku-cho amwoṟowie shidami amlaṟe mponyi.”
Naalyo peṟeseng'u kukocha mamwingi fo siṟi tsa ruwehu, fukasanza na malaka ulya, wakaidapfuma Ruwa wakahamba,
“Kiṟumi nyi kya Ruwa kulya huye na orukenyi nyi ofoṟo, ipfo ko wandu wakundikie!”

Kyasia wamalaika walya wekiwuka kulya kowo wakahenda ruwehu, walisi walya wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi wakahamba, “Kendenyi-ng'u lanye; lukehenda kulya Betlehemu, isahia kindo-kyo kyambutika; ikyo Mndumii aluongoya.”
Wakahenda wekambia owinyi; wakakoya-pfo Maria na Yosefu; na mkoku ulya amlaṟe alya mponyi.
Wameidima iwona wakahenda wechionguo mbonyi tsilya tsa kidedo kilya walewio kya kimana kilya.
Na walya waleicho wado wakaṟihio woose shilya waongoyo nyi walisi walya.
Na Maria kasuṟuma mbonyi tsilya tsose na mrima ketsihia-hia.
Kyasia walisi walya wakawuya na kulya kowo, wakaidapfuma Ruwa na imwana kya shindo shilya waleicho shoose na ishiwona chando walewewio.
Kyasia mkonu nyanya yameida-ho, kushike madinyionyi hake, wakamdumbuya rina lyake nyi Yesu; lilya lilehambo nyi malaika ulya lilyandi alawememoho.
Kyasia wekimarisa mfiri iya yekuheṟemtsa, iya isumhanyi, chando kiwekiteṟie ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mose, naalyo wakamduo kulya Yerusalemu wahende imloṟa Mndumii.
Chando kiwei kiṟehie ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mndumii ke, orio mana mbee o womi nyi echidambikio Mndumii nalaho nyi kyele kyake.
Wawewika na kidaso chando kiwei kiwawase ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mndumii; nakyo nyi kya mbeta tsa ngeṟenyi tsiwi, ang'u tsa mba tsiwi-njikoho.

Maheri halya kuwekeri mndu kulya Yerusalemu, rina lyake nyi Simeon, na mndu-chu nyi awei mndu mcha, asumuhanyi, aweowoye mnu Ruwa, kechiwedia ulya mowihiṟa Israeli moo, na Mumuyo Mwele nyiawekeri nao.
Nao nyiawewembikie kyaasa nyi Mumuyo Mwele ke, echipfa shile awona Kristo o Mndumii kuwookapfo.
Nao kacha na kulya hekalunyi amwamtse nyi Mumuyo Mwele. Kyasia ndee o mana ulya Yesu wekimwitsa na kulya mba, wo hamu na mae, wambutie chando kikiteṟie kyake ipfo wuwawasonyi.
Nao kamwambia mawokonyi, kaichika Ruwa kahamba,
“Mndumii wulalu nyiokusamia-ng'u msoṟo opfo kipuo; chando ulewekuhambia.
Kyamba meso hako hamekuwonyia ikiṟa lyapfo.
Lilya uweṟeheṟie sumuhana na njoshangu tsa wandu wose.
Lya ngeela yedambuya wandu wa orio mbaṟi mbonyi; na lya kiṟumi kya wandu wapfo Israeli.”
Kyasia ndee na mae wakawa moṟihio kilya kyahambo kyake.
Na Simeon kawawikia mboṟa, kawia mae oke Maria, “Ichu nyi ambike mohutsa na iira wafoi wa wana wa Israeli; nawewa kichano kyechidedo-dedo wokaṟuo.
Na iyo kumonyi oshu nyi lochikuambada ipfo makiidi hawi ha mrima fopfo; kundu mahio na ngoo tsifoi hamanyike napata.”
Napfo kuwekeri-se mwikimbi mka, elaho nyi Ana; mana o Fanueli; o kisharinyi kya Aseri; nao kui makuyenyi hake nyi awe-mku kaṟatsia; nyiawemkaa na mii maka mfungade numa ya wupora woke.
Kawekaa-se ai mkusu itane ashitsa maka makumi nyanya na iina, nao alawekelekana ipfo hekalunyi; kahenda kewuta shindo sha Ruwa tupu kekuotoya na iterewa kio na mfiri.
Nao kawecha naho, saa na iya, kaidapfuma Ruwa; kahenda kyechionguo kyake ko walya waweiwedia maletsionyi ha Israeli wose.
Kyasia nawo wekimaa yawutsia shisumuhanyi na wuwawaso wo Mndumii shoose, wakahenda ikuwuuya na kulya Galilaya wakashika kulya Nasareti, mṟinyi fowo.
Na mana ulya kang'ana-ng'ana, kahenda kewada pfinya, kaweichuṟo wuṟango, na osaṟio lo Ruwa lukamkaika.
Kyasia ndee na mae nyi wawekehenda-henda kulya Yerusalemu orio maka yose ili mkonu menene fo Pasaka.
Nao kekishitsa mndu o maka ikumi na iwi, wakado nao, chando kiweikido kya mkonu fulya mnene.
Wekimarisa mfiri iya, warie njia yewuya, mana ulya Yesu kafurumia kulya Yerusalemu, ndee na mae walaichi.
Wakakusaṟa kulako nyi akeri na walya wa kyaṟonyi, wakatsinda wehenda njienyi ohendo la mfiri fumu, wakampfula ipfo ko walya wa oshari lowo na ko walya waichianyi nawo.
Wameda walambona-pfo, wakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu wechimpfula.
Wamemaa mfiri iṟaṟu, wakambona kulya hekalunyi adamie na walosha kewaadanyia na iwawesa-wesa mbonyi.
Na walya wemadanyia wakatiri mnu wose kipfa kya wuṟango wulya woke na mahaluyenyi hake.
Kyasia ndee na mae wambona wakauma mkahai, na mae kambia, “Nkyi ili olutana kudi manoko? Keambuya nyi lomekushiha mnu na madima ndeo na inyi.”
Nao kawawia, “Aikyo mbeinshihia nkyo kiki? Mlaichi ke nyinjiwaṟi ikukaya ipfo shindonyi sha Wande?”
Nawo walamanye kidedo kilya awawia.
Naalyo kahenda kusotsanyia nawo, kacha na kulya Nasareti kawa mowahidia. Na mae kasuṟuma mbonyi tsilya mrimenyi tsose.
Kyasia Yesu kahenda kechiengeṟekia wuṟango na mng'ano na mkundye fokunda Ruwa na wandu.

Kyasia Kaisari ulya Tiberia ambada wukaisari kushikie maka fo ikumi na katanu, lilya mandi Pontio Pilato ai mchili o Yudaya, na Herode ai mangi ya Galilaya, na manomae Filipo ai mangi ya Ituraya na Oruka lo Tirakonyiti, na Lisanyia ai mangi ya Abilene.
Mandi Ana na Kayafa wawewode wukohanyi wunene, naalyo kidedo kya Ruwa kikachea Yohane ulya mana o Sakaria kulya nuka kundu akeri.
Nao kacha na kulya orukenyi kukinganyi na Yordanyi kose kaonguo-pfo mbonyi ya wupatiso wo ihaluka mrimenyi wuendie iletso njonyamaṟo.
Chando kii kiṟehie ipfo kitabunyi kya mwikimbi Yesaya kyehamba “Ailyo ṟu lya mndu moedia kulya nuka! Teseheṟenyi mtanu fo Mndumii, muwetembecheṟa na njia tsake.

Orio mapichi hoose haweikilio, na orio mafumvu hose na shitoṟomoso shose shihende idemo; na handu ha kilemekonyi kuwehoṟo-tso kuwe njia njihoṟotsu. Na handu kui kipilipili kuweanjaṟyo kuwe njia njidamiri.
Na orio wai na mbihu, na wehiwona okiio lo Ruwa.”
Kyasia kawia mamwingi fulya fuwekemchea ke wache ikupatisio nyio. “A lanye mui malea ha njoka, aichu alemoṟa ke mochikudichia nyashi iya yekaa iche nyiu?
Kyasia loṟenyi kui mawuto hasumhanyi kye modumbuya, ma mlawone mochideda muhambe, Luwode ndeadu nyi Abrahamu; cha kipfa ngamuwia, Ma maho-ho, Ruwa nechiidima yalutsia-ho Abrahamu luwa.
Wokya wulalu soka nyi li iwike tsindenyi ya mashidi-ho; akashika ikidi lilechiwika ndunda njicha chi lyechimanyo na ikumbo modonyi?”
Mamwingi fulya fukambesa fukahamba, “Aka luwike luda ngesa?”
Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Msa awode kanzi tsiwi nainenge ulya alawode, na ulya awode kando nawewika ado.”
Kukawecha na wasanyi wa okamba ke wapatisio-ho wakambia, “Mlosha, a so nyi lochiwika luda?”
Nao kawawia, “Ma mlakiwese kindo kya ngoseṟa ya kilya mui wateṟie.”
Na sa wawekehenda shidenyii wakawembesa, “A so nyi lochiwika luda?” Nao kawawia, “Ma mlawone mochisohuo mndu ma isoka mndu kindo kya wuilo, mwefuda na wueri-wo wonu.”
Kyasia wandu walya wakawa mohinga-hinga, wakawehia-hia ngoonyi tsawo kya Yohane ke, kulako nyiio amonyi akeri Kristo.

Naalyo yohane kahaluo kawawia, “Inyi nyi njekempatisa na mṟinga; kyaindi nyi kukeri icha msa anjieṟie, nao kinsumuhanyie ma yoṟowuo ngowa tsa shadu shakepfo, o nyio echikaa nampatise na Mumuyo Mwele na modo.
Nao nyiawode mpongo ipfo owokonyi loke, nyiechiseṟewenda kiwuha kyake kiile pang'a, mbeke-tso naingie kikumbinyi kyake, kyaindi muulu-fo nyiechifukoṟa na modo fulechiruma.”
Kyasia kawa moongoya wandu walya mbonyi tsiwode sia na iwatutuma-tutuma shindo shingi shifoi.
Kyaindi mangi ulya Herode kekidedio nyio kipfa kya Herodia, ulya mka o manomae, na kipfa kya mawicho halya hengi Herode awenyiamaṟie hose.
Kaengeṟa iwichuo, itane amshingia mbenyi ya wapfungo.
Kyasia lilyandi wandu walya waweikupatisio wose, na Yesu kekipatiso, kyechiterewa Ruwa; naalyo kulya ruwehu kukang'alawuka,
na Mumuyo Mwele kamsokia ai cha mbeta; na ṟu likawewuka kulya ruwehu likahamba, “Iyo nyi ui manoko mkunde unjichihiṟie.”
Nao Yesu amonyi lilyandi alewooka ilosha wandu nyiaweshikie kufui na mndu o maka makumi haṟaṟu, kyake nyi eeichio ke nyi ai mana o Yosefu nao ai o Eli;
O Matati, o Lewi, o Meliki, o Yanai, o Yosefu,
O Matatia, o Amosi, o Nahumu, o Esili, o Nagai;
o Matatia, o Matatia, o Semei, o Yosefu, o Yuda;
o Yoana, o Resa, o Serubabeli, o Salatieli, o Neri;
o Meliki, o Adi, o Kosamu, o Elimadamu, o Eri;
o Yosua, o Elieseri, o Yorimu, o Matati, o Lewi;
o Simeon, o Yuda, o Yosefu, o Yonamu, o Eliakimu;
Melea, o Mena, o Matata, o Natanyi, o Dawidi;
o Yese, o Obedi, o Boasi, o Salmone, o Naason;
O Aminadabu, o Adiminyi, o Arinyi, o Hesironyi, o Faresi, o Yuda;
o Yakobo, o Isaki, o Abrahamu, o Tera, o Nahori;
o Seruki, o Ragau, o Pelegi, o Eberi, o Sela,
o Kainanyi, o Arfakisadi, o Semu, o Noe, o Lameki;
o Metusala, o Enoki, o Yeredi, o Mahalaleli, o Kainanyi;
o Enoki, o Seti, o Adamu, o Ruwa.
Kyasia Yesu amwichuṟe Mumuyo Mwele, kawuya awuka kulya Yordanyi, katengesho-tengesho nyi Mumuyo kulya nuka mkonu makumi haana kechihesho nyi Satan womtewa.
Nao mfiri iya nalelya kindopfo, yekisia, naalyo kawado nyi njaa.
Satan kacha imbia, “Komkoya nyi ukeri mana o Ruwa lohi, kewia iho-lyo lihaluke liwe mkate nolye.”
Yesu kamhaluo, “Nyi kikiṟehie, Kindo mndu echitawulia nakyo moo chi mkate tupupfo.”
Naalyo kamduo kamdosia handu, kamloṟa mawumangi hoose ha wuyana-wu limu waṟu.
Satan kambia, “Wuitoṟi-wu nyi njechikuinenga iyo wose na kiweṟe kyawo, kipfa nyi njimdambikie inyi, na njechikuinengia msa ngakumkunda.
Kyasia iyo kopfira ndi sumuhana na inyi, konjiterewa, isho shose nyi shechikuw̱ia shapfo.”
Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Nyi kii kiṟehie, nyii ochipfiria Ruwa Mndumii opfo ndi nomterewe, na imhidia nowemhidia o amonyi tupu!”
Nao kamduo kulya Yerusalemu kamhoṟotsa alya huye kitongolo kya hekalu kambia, “Komkoya na ukeri mana o Ruwa, kuolotse alya wanda.
Kipfa nyi kii kiṟehie ke, njechikuwawasia wamalaika wake wakuringe.
Kye nawo nyi wechikuduo na mahi hawo, kundu ulawone koikapa mtulia ihohu.”
Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Nyi kikihambe, Ma kulaheshe Ruwa Mndumii opfo.”
Satan kekimarisa orio kyemhesha namtewe, kambuka, kamda, nawede iwuya shiheri shingi.
Na Yesu kawuya na kulya Galilaya ai na pfinya ya Mumuyo; na kiṟumi kyake kikahenda kedung'ana shihongo shilya shikinganyi na oruka lulya shose.
Kawewa molosha-losha kulya masinagogenyi hawo amichimbiṟe nyi woose.
Kacha na kulya Nasareti kundu ang'anyie, kaida na mbenyi ya sinagoge ili mfiri fo Sabato chando aweichiwie, kahoṟokaho nasome.
Kainengio kitabu kya mwikimbi Yesaya, kekioṟowuo kitabu-kyo kakooya-pfo handu hahaṟehiye,

“Mumuyo fo Mndumii nyi huyako fui; cha kipfa njimshimbuo na mafuda, njihende yongoya wakiwa mbonyi tsiwode sia. Anjidumie njihende yongoya wapfungo yashuka, na wapfu meso wechiwuya iwona. Njihende ilekia iwo wai wafaṟe wakuashukie.
Na yongoya maka fo Mndumii fukundikie.”
Kaoṟowia kitabu kilya, kainengia msoṟo ulya moringa-ho kadamia, na walya wawei kulya sinagogenyi wose wakamkumba meso wechimṟisa.
Nao kawooka-ng'u ideda nawo kawawia, “Shiṟehiyo-sho nyi inu shahoya ipfo madunyi hanu.”
Kyasia wose wakachihiyo kyakye, wakaṟihio shidedo shilya sheloda shilewuka dumbunyi lyake wakahamba, “Aka ichu chi mana o Yosefu?”
Kawawia, “Kulako nyi mui injikaṟwo mhambye-fo fokehambo ke, Mhanga kekukiṟe-wo kumonyi. Ke shindo shilya shiwutikie kulya Kapernaumu lukashiicho, keweshiwutie na iya orukenyi lo kikunyi kyapfo.”
Kahamba, “Nkya lohi ngambia, Kuwode mdedi o Ruwa ekekundika ipfo orukenyi lo kikunyi kyakepfo.
Na lohi ngambia, Na kuweipfo waka wafoi wakusu kulya Israeli matika halya ha Elia, lilya mandi kulya ruwehu kuwei kupfunge maka iṟaṟu na meri iṟandaṟu, kuhaho njaa kulya orukenyi kose.
Elia naladumo ma ko umu-ho, shile na kulya Sarepta, mṟi fo oruka lulya lo Simon ko mka mkusu.
Na wandu wawodo nyi maṟomu na wawepfo wafoi kulya Israeli mandi halya ha mdedi Elisa, kulakae-ho ma umu aleheṟemtso, shile na Naeman ulya Msiria.”
Na walya wawei kulya sinagogenyi wakapfuluko wose waicho wado.
Wakakure, wakamkumbalya-kumbalya na kulya kya patehu lya mṟi fulya, wakatana wamduo alya ohambehu lo ifumvu lilya liweiwike-ho mṟi fulya fowo ke wamwombotse-ho.
Kyaindi o kaida kulya makiidi hawi hawo kakuhendia.
Kasoka kashika kulya Kapernaumu, mṟi fo Galilaya, kakaa-pfo, kawa mowalosha ili lya Sabato.
Nawo wakauma mkahai kipfa kya mloshiye foke, kyamba kidedo kyake kiwewode na pfinya.
Na kulya sinagogenyi kuwekeripfo mndu awewodo nyi mumumyo fo mṟufu mbicho fo ngafu, nao kafihiṟa na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba,
“Kudee! Nyiki luwodo na iyo Yesu o Nasareti? Nyi uchee nolurumatse! Na njiichi ke nyi ui u; ke nyi ui Mwele o Ruwa.”
Na Yesu kamtilima kahamba, “Tsia-ng'u, nombuke!” Naalyo mumuyo ulya kamhutsa wanda alya kiidi kyawo, kambuka nalambike kifaṟe.
Naalyo wakaṟihio wose, wakawiana mndu na odoe wakahamba, “Nyi kidedo kida ikyo katana awawasa mumuyo ya ngafu kui wukari na pfinya, nayo ikawuka!”
Iki kyake kikakapo sumu kikadung'ana handu halya hakinganyi naho koose.
Nao kakure kulya sinagogenyi, kaida na mba ko Simon. Na mamka o Simon nyi awewodo nyi modo, kaaka keng', wakamumterewya.
Nao katikirya-ho kaarama ahoṟoki, kakanga modo fulya fukamda; mamka ulya o Simon oweṟe kakure kawapfuṟukanyia.
Koikiila orio walya wawode wandu wawo waluo ndaaṟe-tsi na itsi, wakawaende na alya handu ai; nao kawahekia mawoko umu umu kawachiṟa.
Na wengi wafoi wakaweleko nyi mumuyo mbicho yechifihiṟa ikahamba, “Iyo nyi ui Mana o Ruwa!” Kawakanga, nalawalekie wahambe ke nyi wamwichi nyi ai Kristo.
Koikikya nao kawuka-pfo kakuhendya kundu kulawode wandu, na mamwingi fulya fukawewa mompfula; wakacha na kulyando awei wakamwima nalalekane nawo.
Nao kawawia, “Na mṟi ingi nyi kinjiiwaṟi njihende yongoya mbonyi tsiwode sia tsa wumangi wo Ruwa, kyamba nkyondo njiimdumie.”
Kawewa moongoya mbonyi kulya masinagogenyi ha Galilaya.
Kukashika mfiri fumu, lilya mandi wandu wechicha imlulumia, kundu wamwadanyie kidedo kya Ruwa, nao ahoṟoki alya ohambehu lo nduwa ya Genesareti.
Kawona ngalawa tsiwi tsiwekeri alya ohambehu lo nduwa iya; na wadehi walya wawembuka-pfo; wakahenda isanjia mdeho yawo ii ya ndusu tsinjioke maṟawushi.
Kaida na ngalawenyi imuho, iya iwekeri ya Simon, kamterewa naiseheṟe kitutu ihende aleshe-leshe na wambaṟa ya nduwa iya; kadamia, kalosha mamwingi fulya fo wandu ai ipfo ngalawenyi.
Kekihutsia ideda kawuya iwia Simon, “Duo ngalawa ipfo makiidi hawi, ipfo oṟonyi ya nduwa, musotsye-ho mdehoyo yanu mdehe makunga.”
Simon kahaluo kahamba, “Mwaaria, nyi lulee loitambahana kio kyose kukakya lulawone ma kindo, kyaindi kui kidedo-kyo kyapfo na njechihenda sotsya-ho mdeho.”
Naalyo wekihenda kuwutia wado, wakakunguwa kilula kya makunga; mdeho iya yawo ikakiṟa itusuka-tusuka.
Wakatsinyia wodoyawo wa-wekeri ngalawenyi ingi ke wache iwaikanyia; nawo wakacha, wakaichuṟa ngalawa tsilya tsitsiwi itane tsakiṟa isoṟowia wanda.
Simon Petro awona adi kacha ikuhutsa alya shi-ya madende ha Yesu kahamba, “Kekure nombuke Mndumii, kipfa inyi njikeri mndu makideko.”
Nyi kipfa waleṟihio mnu o na walya wawekeri nao wose, kipfa kya makunga halya waleorana.
Nyi wudo na Yakobo na Yohane, wana wa Sebedayo walya waweei wodoe wa Simon. Yesu kawia Simon, “Ulaowuo, kimatsika wulalu nyi ochiwa mdehi modeha wandu.”
Wameende ngalawa tsilya na wambaṟa, wakakudeya-ho shose, wakamwosha.
Kukashika lilya mandi awetsindie mṟinyi fowo fumu-ho, kuweepfo mndu awewodo nyi saka; nao awona Yesu kakuhutsa wanda na kyamu kamterewa kahamba, “Iyo Mndumii, kokukundia na ochiidima injiheṟemtsa!”
Nao kahoṟuo owoko loke kampaaya kahamba, “Ngamkunda; heṟemka!” Naalyo saka iya ikasia.
Kambawasa nalakiwie mndu, “Kyaindi henda kuloṟe kulya ko mkohanyi nowewika na kindo kya iheṟemka lyapfo, chando kikiteṟie nyi Mose kiwe kiṟingishio kyawo.”
Kyaindi sumu tsake tsikaengeṟa idung'ana, wakakuwumbia mamwingi ifoi icha imwadanyia na ichiṟo nyio ndaaṟe tsawo.
Nao kawa mosheṟuka, kakaa kundu kulawode wandu kechiterewa Ruwa.
Kukashika ili limu kechilosha wandu, kuwedamie-pfo Wafarisayo na walosha na wuwawaso wawewukie orio mṟinyi yose ya Galilaya na Yudaya na Yerusalemu, na pfinyia ya Mndumii ikambanza, kachiṟa wandu.
Wadi aiwa womi warie mndu na kitaṟa, aluo lyetiliwana shiwungo, wakatambahana imwitsa napfo wahende imleṟia alya sumuhana nao.
Walawone mwaanya fomwitsa, kipfa kya mamwingi fulya fo wandu, wakado kulya mbehu, wakamsotsa kulya matofalinyi ha huye ario nyi kitaṟa kyake, wakamsotsia alya kiidi sumuhana na Yesu.
Nao awona iidikia lyawo kambia, “Iyo mndu, njonyamaṟo tsapfo nyi tsinjiwute.”
Walaanyi walya wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakawooka ihia-hia wakahamba, “A mndu chu-nyi ada, itane adeda ado shindo sheruma Ruwa? Nyiu ichu echiidima iwuta njonyamaṟo tsa wandu shile nyi Ruwa amonyi?”
Na Yesu kekimanya mahio hawo kahalo kawawia, “Nyiki muihiha ipfo ngoonyi tsanu?
Sa ki kyangu-ho nyi kihya? Ngesa nyi ihamba, ‘Njonyamaṟo tsapfo nyi tsinjiwute,’ ang'u nyi ihamba, ‘Kure nochuimie?’

Kyaindi muwone handu mochimanya ke Mana o Mndu nyi awode pfinya kunu orukenyi yewuta njonyamaṟo -- kawuya iwia ulya atiliwanyi shiwungo.” Ngakuwia, “Kekureng'u uire kitaṟa-kyo kyapfo nohende kanyi kopfo!”
Naalyo lienyi kahoṟoka alya sumuhana nawo kakuhendia kanyikoke kechiidapfuma Ruwa.
Na wandu wakaṟihio wose, wakahamba, “E-lae, nyi inu lowona shiṟiha!”
Shindo-sho shambutika kawuka-pfo kahenda, kawona mndu mosana okamba elaho nyi Lewi adamye alyando okamba lokesanyio, kacha imbia, “Njoo; awishana na inyi.”
Nao kada-ho shose, kakure kahenda yawishana nao.
Na Lewi kahenda imkoṟia mfuho kulya mba koke; kukakaa-ho mamwingi fufoi fo wasanyi wa okamba na wengi wakundanyi nawo wawedamie kilionyi hamu nawo.
Kyasia Wafarisayo walya na walaanyi wa shitabu wakarihinyikia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wakahamba, “A nyiki ili molya mukawenyo hamu na wesana okamba na wetehia?”
Na Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Iwo wai na oru wasarie mhangapfo shile nyi iwo waluo tupu.
Chi njicheye ilaha iwo wecha wasumuhanyipfo, indi nyi iwo wanyamaṟie kundu wadumbuye.”
Nawo wakambia, “Aili wa kiloshionyi kya Yohane wekekuotoya kitsitsi, na iterewa shiterewo, na walya wa Wafarisayo naawo, kyaindi iwo wa kopfo wakawa molya na ikunyooya.”
Na Yesu kawawia, “Alae nyi mochiidima iwia wandu wa walinyi wakuotoye mandi-ho menyi wali akeri nawo?
Kya kake na kukae kushike mafiri, ili indi menyi wali echiwuto kowo, nlyondo wechikuotoya mafiri-ho.”

Kawawia mfanano, “Ma kuwode mndu echiwuta kirache kya nguwo njihya nakiwehie nguwo-hu njikupfo; kokooya nyi wudo echiranduo iya njihya na kirache-kyo kikiwute nguwo-hu nyihya kilaṟinganyi na nguwo iya njiku.
Ma kuwode mndu echiwika mvinyio mhya machorenyi makupfo, kokooya nyi wudo, mvinyo-fo mhya mfochiranduo-randuo machoreho, nafo nyi fochipusukia wanda na machore hakanyamaṟika.
Kyaindi mvinyo mhya nyi kikundi fuletsio machorenyi mahya, nasho shikakia shishiwi.
Ma kuipfo mndu ekenyo mvinyo fukaiye kacha akundi-se mhyapfo; cha-kipfa nyiechihamba, nanga ifu fukaye kacha.”
Kyasia ili limu kui mkonu fo Sabato kaida mademenyi ha ngano, na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakatufwo-ho mahaa wakahasisa na mawoko wakalya.
Kyaindi Wafarisayo waweiho wakahamba, “Nyiki ili muiwuta kindo kilasumuhanyi kiwuto ili lya Sabato?”
Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “A mlemsome kilya Dawidi alewuta lya mandi wawado nyi njaa na walya werianyi nao.
Chando aleida na kulya mba ya Ruwa kaira-ho mkate iya iweembike mesehu ya Ruwa, ilamteṟie ilio nyi wandu shile nyi wakohanyi wawenyi?”
Kawuya iwawia, “Mana o Mndu nyi akeri mnene na o Sabato.”
Kukacha-se mkonu fungi fo Sabato, nao kakuidia na singogenyi kalosha-pfo. Napfo nyi kuwei-pfo mndu owoko loke luwekachukie.
Walaanyi walya wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakambikia meso waambuye kokooya nyi aikiṟa ili lya Sabato, kundu wawone kemkumba.
Nao kamanya mahio halya hawo; kawia mndu ulya owoko lukachukie, “Kekure uhoṟoke oo mtengele.” Nao kakure kahoṟoka.
Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Nyi njiimbesa-wo ke, na kisumhanyi iwuta shicha ang'u shiwicho ili lya Sabato? Ikiṟa moo ang'u ifudetsa ngesa?”
Kekiwaṟengutsia meso wose, naalyo kambia, “Hoṟuo owoko-lo lopfo.” Nao kawika ado owoko loke lukawuya ichia.
Nawo wakawado nyi oṟuuṟe, wakadeda kyaama wo wenyi na wenyi chando wechitana Yesu.
Mandi halya kawuka-pfo kakuhendia kundu ko mafumvunyi naterewe Ruwa. Kalaa dembo tambaṟu kechiterewa Ruwa.
Koikikya kalaha walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kasambuṟa-ho wasoṟo ikumi na wawi kawalaha nyi wasu,
nyi Simon, kamlaha-se rina nyi Petro, na Andrea manomae, na Yakobo na Yohane, na Filipo na Bartolomayo.
Na Mat na Toma, na Yakobo o Alifayo, na Simon elaho Selote.
Na Yuda o Yakobo na Yuda Iskariote ulya alewa mṟiingi.

Kasoka nawo kahoṟoka handu ha rendewele arianyi na mamwingi fufoi fo walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, na tendemra ya wandu ifoi, wawewukie Yudaya na Yerusalemu, na Tiro na Simon kulya kundu kukinganyi na ipalipali, walecha imwadanyia na ichiṟo ndaaṟe tsawo.
Na walya wawei waosose nyi mumuyo ya ngafu wakawechiṟo.
Tendemra iya ya wandu yose nyi iwekundi impaaya, kipfa ipfo koke nyi kuwewuka-pfo pfinya ikakiṟa woose.
Naalyo kairia meso kaambuya walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kahamba, “Wungusu nyo mui wakiwa, cha kipfa wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wui wonu!”
“Wungusu nyo muwodo nyi njaa wulalu, cha kipfa nyi mochikaa muihutso!”
“Wungusu nyio ili wandu wechimsuo na imuuma wakawemuuma na imruma-ruma na ikumba rina lyanu kuleshe cha ili liwei liwicho, nasho na kitewe kya Mana o Mndu.
Chihionyi mfiri fulya muwetoola-tola, kipfa woṟunda wonu nyi wufoi kulya ruwehu; kyamba nyi wudo wandeawo walewewutia wadedi walya wa Ruwa.”
“Kyaindi ochia lonu mui wasuṟi, cha kipfa ikyo kyechimuwihiṟia moo, nyi mulememaa ikudaaya!”
“Ochia lonu nyo muihutsu wulalu, cha kipfa nyi mochikaa muwado nyi njaa! Ochia lonu muiseka wulalu, kipha nyi mochikaa mkuinadie na ilia!”
Ochia lonu ili wandu wose wekemudedia necha; kyamba nyi wudo wandeanu walewewutia waikimbi walya wa wongo.
Kyaindi nyi ngamuwia nyo muiadanyia, Kundenyi wakituwa wanu, na iwo wamsuo muwewawutia mecha.
Kundenyi iwo wekemsesa mboṟa, muweterewia iwo wekemruma.
Ichu echikukapa nguchu-yo, mhaluye-se na iyo ingi, na ichu echikusoka ikonya lyapfo, manya ulamiime ma kanzu-yo.
Orio akuterewa mnenge, na ichu mokusoka shindo shapfo, ma ulakishiwese-se koke.
Nanyo chando mukundi muwutio nyi wandu, nanyo kewewutenyi mudo.
Aka nanyo mukakunda walya wamkundi tupu, nyi wucha wuhya muwode? Kipfa ma wadeko na wakundi walya wawakundi-wo.
Aka nanyo mukawutia mecha iwo wekumuwutia nyo, nyi wucha wuhya muwode? Ma wandu wadeko na wekewuta wado.
Aka mkaakuya iwo mochihamba ke nyi wechiidima imuwihiṟia, nyi wucha wuhya muwode? Ma wandu wadeko na wekeakuya wanyamaṟi wengi iwo wechiidima iwawihiṟia wado kuhyanyi.

Kyaindi kundenyi wakituwa wanu, muwewawutia na mecha, muakuye mulakundi iwihiṟio-se kindo; mukawuta mudo nlyodo woṟunda wonu wochifo, nanyo nyi mochiwa wana wa Ulya ai huye ya shose; kipfa o nyi aololye wandu wechimwana na walya wawicho.
Kyasia, angenyi wesaṟia; chando na Ndeanu ai msaṟi.
“Ma mlawone mochiwonyia wengi wuwicho, nanyo mochiwonyiopfo; ma mulatetekie owingo, nanyo mochitetekyopfo, leheṟenyi, nanyo kundu muleheṟo.

Inengienyi, kundu nanyo muinengo; kihesha kicha kii kitsindie kii kisikyesikye kiitsye msanjika, nyikyo wechimbikia ipfo ndenyi tsanu. Kipfa kihesha kilya mokeheshia nakyo, nyikyo mochikaa muheshio nanyo.”
Kawuya iwawia ifanano, “Alae mpfu meso na echiidima iduo mpfu meso, ungi na njia ngesa; aka chi wechioloka ṟungunyi wawawi?
Molosho naidye momoloshapfo; kyaindi orio mndu ainutsie shose nyi eching'ang'ana na mlosha oke.
A iyo, nyiki ili okeambuya kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo, na iyo ulawonyi mriti-fo fui ipfo risonyi lyapfo?

Aka nyi wuda ochiidima iwia manomayo, Manowama, keleka njiwute kinana-kyo kikeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo, na iyo kulawonyi mriti-fo fui ipfo risonyi lyapfo, iyo? Iyo nyi mokulembetseṟa! Kemewuta kuwoka mriti-fo fui ipfo risonyi lyapfo, numa noambuye-ng'u necha chando ochiwuta kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo.”
“Ikidi icha lyechidima ikumbia ndunda njiporu-pfo na ikidi liporu likumbia ndunda njicha-pfo.
Kyamba orio ikidi nyi lyekemanyika kui ndunda tsalyo lyilyenyi cha kipfa ipfo mshenyi wandu wechitowa-pfo mkuyupfo, ma isikinyi lya msha kochihao-pfo sabibupfo.
Mndu-cho mcha nyi ekeloṟa kilya ki kicha ipfo kisenyi kya mrima foke, na mndu-cho mbicho kaweloṟa kilya kii kiwicho. Kyamba ikyo kiichuo ipfo ngoonyi, na dumbu-lyo naakyo lyechihamba.”
“Aka-nyo, nyiki ili mokenjilaha, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii,’ nanyo mlekewuta ikyo njekehamba?
Orio mndu mokuchea na koko, kawa moadanyia shidedo shako na ishiwuta, mndu-cho nyi njiechimloṟa sa aṟinganyi nao,

nyi aṟinganyi na mndu mowika mba, kaisumia, kaisotsia wanda, kawika itsinde lyayo iṟaṟehu lya iho. Kyasia, mfu fukacha, mṟinga fulya fukatsindika-tsindika mba iya fulaidime iihutsa; kyamba kimae kyayo kiwei kisotsie necha.

Kyaindi ichu moicho madedo hako kada alahawuta, nyiaṟinganyi na mndu alewika mba yake terihu ya kimamile, nalawanze kimae kyayo, mfu fulya fukaitsindika itane yawunduka, na mbundukie foyo fukaṟihisha mnu.”
Ammaa ideda madedo halya hake hoose hakaida madunyi ha wandu, naalyo kakuidya na kulya Kapernaumu.
Napfo kuwekeri-pfo mchili o siṟi ya wasikari ihana, aweluṟe msoṟo o koke kepfa, nao nyiawemkundi mnu.
Mchili ulya kekicho sumu tsa Yesu, kamdumia wameeku wa ko Wayuda wamterewe nache, nachiṟe isinga lyake.
Nawo washika alyando Yesu ai wakamterewa mnu wakambia, “Nyawaṟi Mndumii, kembutie kudo.
Kipfa nyi akundi wandu wa mbaṟi yadu katana aluwikia na mba-i yeterewia.”

Kyasia Yesu kahenda nawo. Ashikye haleshe na mba ya mchili ulya, mchili ulya kamdumia mbuya tsake wahende imbia, “Mndumii, ulakuwinyishe, kyamba inyi njiiho sa ochicha na koko noide shi ya kai lyakopfo.
Nkyo kyaduma ngawona ke njilawaṟi icha na kopfo; indi kekuhambie idedo tupu, na msoṟo chu oko nechikuchia.

Kyamba na inyi nyi mndu njimbike shi ya wuchili, na inyi mbewode wasikari wanjinyiye, na inyi ngawia ichu, ‘Henda,’ nao nyiechihenda; na ungi, ‘Njoo,’ nao nyiechicha, na kisinga kyako, ‘Henda wuta wuliwe,’ nao nyiecheewuta.”
Yesu aicho ado kamṟihio, kaindukia mamwingi fulya fuwemwitung'atie kawawia “Ngamuwia nyo, ma ko wa Israeli njilemewone iidikia ling'anyi lidipfo!”
Kyasia walya waledumo wawuya na kanyi wakakooya msoṟo ulya amechia.
