Kukashika ili lya ngama kahenda kundu ko mṟinyi fumlahe nyi Nainyi, na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wakahenda nao na mamwingi fo wandu fufoi.

Lilyandi aweshikye kufui na kichumi kya mṟi fulya, adi a ulya mndu mpfu ario kehenda dao kya patehu, nao nyiawei mana kimumu ko mae, nao nyiawepfiie mii; na wandu wa kulya mṟinyi wafoi nyi wawerianyi nao.
Mndumii kekimbona, kamwichio wukiwa kambia, “Ma kulalie mai.”
Katikiria hafui, kapaaya kitaṟa kilya; na walya warie wakatirima. Nao kahamba “Iyo manake, ngakuwia kure!”
Mpfu ulya kakure, kadamia, kawooka ideda, nao kamnengya mae.
Wakawado nyi wuowu wose wakaidapfuma Ruwa wehamba “E lae; kodu komekure mwikimbi o Ruwa ang'anyi, na Ruwa amesahia-ng'u wandu wake.”
Mbonyi-tso tsake tsikadung'ana kulya Uyuda koose na kulya-ndo kukinganyi napfo kose.
Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi kya Yohane wakahenda imwongoya shoose.
Kyasia Yohane kalaha wa kiloshionyi kyake wawi, kawaduma ko mndumii wahende imbesa “Iyo nyi iyo ulya a mhambe ke nyi echicha, ang'u luwedie ungi?”
Wasoṟo walya wekishika kulya koke wakahamba “Yohane mopatisa nyi aluduma kopfo wai kakuwia-le wai, Iyo nyi iyo ulya a mhambe nyiechicha ang'u luwedie ungi?”
Na saa iya tichi Yesu kachiṟa wandu waluo ndaaṟe wafoi na maṟishi hawo, kawawuta na mumuyo mbicho na wapfu-meso wafoi kawewasaṟia kawaambuṟa.

Kahaluo kawawia “Kuhendyenyi muongoye Yohane ishi moicho na iwona mkawewona Wapfu meso aiwa wai iwona, wai iriteka na iwa wai ichumia, wawodo nyi saka wai iheṟemka, wapfu madu nyi wai iicho, wapfiie nyi wai iṟutso, na wakiwa wakaongoyo mbonyi tsiwode sia.
Wungusu ulya alamsukie nyi inyi.”
Walya waledumo nyi Yohane wamehenda, Mndumii kawooka ideda na mamwingi fulya fo wandu kya Yohane “A nyikiki mlehenda yambuya kulya nuka; ngesa nyi kiwale kiweisingitso-singitso nyi otanu?
A nyi kiki mlehenda yambuya-pfo; nyi mndu aṟee nguwo tsa kimamile ngesa? Walya waṟe̱ nguwo tsa shimamile wakuleheshie, nyi mbenyii tsa wamangi wai!
A nyi kiki-se mlehenda yambuya; ngesa nyi mdedi o Ruwa Ee wo ngamuwia, nyi aidie na wadedi.
Icho nyio sa awemṟehie ke Ambuya, ngaduma msu oko oshungunyi lopfo, nao nasungusie njia yapfo oshangunyi lopfo.
Nyi ngamuwia Ipfo ko iwo wawafee nyi waka, kuipfo mdedi o Ruwa ang'ang'anyi na Yohane-pfo. Kyaindi, ichu ai mtutu o woose ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa, nyi ang'anyi kota-o.”
Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu fokiicho fudo, na wasanyi wa okamba, wakapatisio wupatiso wo Yohane.
Kyaindi Wafarisayo walya, na walaanyi wa wuwawaso wakatahacha kyaama kya Ruwa wawenyi, kilya Ruwa awekundi, walapatiso nyio.
“A wandu wa oshari-lu nyi njiechiwafananyisha na kiki? Nyi wafananyi na kiki-wo?
Nyi wafananyi na shiwana shidamie tumo shechilahana shehamba ‘A ili lomemkapa mtoṟiṟo, nanyo mulashine nyiki; lomemfihiṟia, nanyio ma mlafuhe nyiki?’
Kipfa nyi kulecha Yohane Mpatisi alaweelya mkate ma inyo mvinyo, nanyo mkahamba nyi amosose nyi mumuyo mbicho!
Manomndu kacha, echilya na inyo, nanyo mkahamba aichu makilya na makinango mvinyio, nyi mbuya ya wesana okamba na wenyamaṟa!
Na mṟango ulya nyi ekededyo nyi wana wake woose!”
Kyasia umu-ho o Wafarisayo kacha imterewa ke nahende ikuliia shelya kulya koke; nao kacha kadamia-pfo.
Adi aichu mka o kulya mṟinyi ai monyamaṟia Ruwa, aleicho ke nyi adamie kiliionyi kya choonga ipfo mba ko Mfarisayo ulya, kacha naho arie kichupa kya alabastro kiwode mafuda hepfaama.

Kacha ihoṟoka alya numa ya madende hake kechilia, kawooka ichoweṟa madende halya hake na mchenyere iya; kawuya ihaanguo na njui tsa ipfo mdonyi koke. Amiidima ado kakomba-komba madende halya hake, kahashia mafuda halya hepfaama.

Kyasia Mfarisayo ulya amlahie shelyenyii kekiwona ado kahia mrimenyi foke amonyi kehamba “Kokoya ichu nyi ai mdedi o Ruwa, nyi awechimanya ke mka-chu nyiu, na mbaṟi yake nyi ida, ke nyi mka mnyamaṟi!”
Yesu kahaluo kambia “Simon oko, njiwode kindo kyako njiikuwia.” Nao kahamba “Mlosha, kuhambie, mwaaria.”
“Kuwekeri-pfo wandu wawi wai wasile wa mndu moakuya, ulya umu awode sile yake ya shilingi mahana hatanu, na ulya ungi ya shilingi makumi hatanu.
Nawo walawone kemtaa, nao kawadeea sile tsilya wo wawawi. Kyasiang'u nyi uhya echimkunda ngoseṟa.”
Simon kamhaluo kahamba “Ngakusaṟa na ulya aledeeyo sile ifoi-ko.” Nao kambia “Nodumbuo sungusihu teṟe.”

Kyasia kekiindukia mka ulya kawia Simon “Uwonyi mka-chu? Inyi ngamekuchea na kunu mba kopfo, na iyo onnenga ma mṟinga fosanjia madende hapfo. Nao kyake nyi achoweṟa madende hako na mechenyeṟe, kawuya kahaanguo na njui tsa ipfo mdonyi koke.
Ma omenjikomba-kombapfo na kiwookia ngacha, ameda ikomba-komba madende hakopfo.
Ma omenjishia mapfuda kunu mdonyii fokopfo; nao nyiashia madende hako mafuda hepfaama.
Kipfa kya ikyo nyi ngakuwia-ng'u O nyi ambute njonyamaṟo tsifoi, kyamba nyi amkunda mkundie fung'anyi; kyaindi ichu awuto kyake kitutu nyi awekunda mkundie mtutu.”
Kawia mka ulya “Njonyamaṟo tsapfo tsamewuto.”
Kyasia walya wadamie nao kilonyi kya shelya, wakawooka ideda ipfo mrimenyi yawo wehamba, “Nyio-u ichu katana awuta wandu njonyamaṟo?”
Nao kawia mka ulya “Nyi wuidiki wopfo wokukiṟa; kuhendieng'u na kipuo.”
Kukashika ili numa-numa, nao kawa motengeta mamṟinyi na shimṟinyi sha wandu kechilosha na yonguo mbonyi tsiwode sia tsa wumangi wo Ruwa arianyi na walya ikumi na wawi.
Na waka wengi sa walekiṟo mṟufu mbicho na ndaaṟe nyi wawerianyi nao; nyi Maria, amlahe Magidala, nyio ulya alechiṟo mṟufu mbicho mfungade.
Na Yohane, mka o Kusa, nyi awei msoṟo mokalia shindo sha Herode, na Susana, na wengi-se wafoi wawekemtarama na shindo shawo sha nga.
Lilyandi wandu wafoi walekumbuhanana wawuka mṟinyi yawo, kadeda nawo kui mfanano.
“Mkumbi mokumba mbeu alehenda ikumba mbeu tsake, na lilyandi awekeri ikumba, maata tsikaoloka mbai ya njia tsikachumo-chumo, na shilehe shikacha itsitola shikamaa-ho.
Tsingi tsikaoloka ihohu lya iṟaṟa, tsamedo tsikawuya yuma, kifa kulawei-ho mchoweṟa.
Tsingi tsikaoloka mshenyi, msha iya ikadosana natso ikatsichoronguo.
Na tsingi tsikaoloka terinyi njicha tsikado tsikang'ana, makumbienyi hatso, imu ikakumbia ihana.” Kekiidima ihamba ado kadeda na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba “Ichu ai na madu heicho naicho!”
Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wakacha imbesa mbonyi tsa ifanano lilya nyiiwe tsa iki.
Nao kahamba “Sa wai wainenge imanya mbonyi tsa kiṟika tsa wumangi wo Ruwa nyinyo; indi iwawengi nyi kui mafanano, kundu ma ili wewona walawone, na ili wechiicho walamanye.”
“Na ifanano lilya nyi ili; mbeu tsilya nyi idedo lya Ruwa.
Na tsilya tsa mbai ya njia nyiwo iwo weadanyia; numa Satana kacha iwuta kidedo kilya ipfo ngoonyi tsawo, kundu walawone wechiidikia wakiṟo.
Na tsilya tsa ihohu nyi iwo wekeicho idedo lilya wakaliwada na sia, indi kindo walawode nyi mri, nyi wandu wekeidikia oweṟe kitutu, na kiheri kya mahesho wakakuletsana-ho.
Na tsilya tsiolokie mshenyi nyi iwo wekeadanyia idedo, wakahenda ishingio nyi akusaṟo ha wukiwa na masaa na malango ha moo-fu, walakikumbie ndunda.
Indi tsilya tsa terinyi njicha, nyi iwo wekeicho idedo lilya, wakaliwada na ngoo njilalutsu wakakumbia ndunda na itirisia.”
“Ma kuipfo mndu echiatsa taa naipfinyikie nungunyi ang'u naiwike shi ya kitarapfo; indi nyi echiiwika kidi-hu kyemasa taa, kundu orio wandu waida napfo wawone sayo.
Kipfa kuipfo kindo kii kipfinyike keeda kilapfunuka numapfo, ma kindo kii kiṟike keeda kilamanyika na iwoneka na patapfo.
Kyasia ambuyenyi mnu chando mokeicho; kipfa ichu awode nyi echinengo, na ichu alawode, ma isho ekekusaṟa nyi shake necheshisoko.”
Alyando awei kukawecha naho mae na wana wa mae, indi walaidime ishika afui nao, nyi kipfa waleshingio nyi mamwingi fo wandu.
Kawio ke mayo na wana wa mayo nyi wahoṟoki oo njia, nyi wakundi ikuwona.
Nao kahaluo kawawia “Wama oko na wana wa wama nyi iwo wekeadanyia idedo lya Ruwa wakawewa moliwuta.”
Kyasia naalyo mfiri fumu kadooya ngalawenyi arianyi na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake; kawawia “Ndenyi luambadie kulya kya ora lungi lo nduwa.” Wakahenda.
Wechihenda wado na ngalawa iya, nao kalaa mado. Naalyo kukacha otanu sa lwafinya kulya ipalipali-hu, wakawona ngalawa iya iichuo mringa, wakawado nyi fowa.
Wakahenda imwamtsa wakahamba “Mndumii Mwaaria, Mndumii Mwaria, nyi ideka-ng'u lui!” Nao kakure madonyi kadedia otanu lulya na masinanu halya ha mṟinga; nasho shikatsia sau-sau, kukahutsa olele.
Nao kawawia “A iidikia lyanu nyiiku li?” Wakaowuo, wakaṟihio, wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi “A ulalu nyiu-wo ichu, ili awawasa otanu na mṟinga nasho shikawemwicho?”
Wakaambadya, wakashika ohambehu lo oruka lo Wageraseno, nalo nyi mambatsana na Galilaya.
Kawuka ngalawenyi kadooya kulya orukenyi, kakumbuhana mndu o kulya mṟinyi ai mosose nyi mṟufu mbicho, alawekiṟe̱-se ma nguwo handu ha mfiri ifoi ma ikaa kundu ko mba, shile na shifunyi tupu.
Kekiafuṟa Yesu kafihiṟa kamwolokia kadeda na ṟu ling'anyi “Nyikiki njiwode na iyo Yesu Mana o Ruwa ichu ai huye ya shose? Ngakuterewa ma ulantuure.”

Kipfa nyi awemewawasa mṟufu ulya mbicho nalekane na mndu ulya; cha kipfa nyiawemwosose, kakuruo-kuruo shiheri sa shifoi kawa moringo ampfunge na mshe na matima, nao nyiawekedumbuo-dumbuo shilya shiwempfungie, kawa motengesho-tengesho nyi mṟufu ulya kundu ko nuka kulaai wandu.
Yesu kambesa “Rina lyapfo nyiu?” Nao kahamba, “Nyi Legionyi (isiṟi).” Kyamba awemwosose nyi waṟufu wawicho wafoi.
Wakamterewa nalawawawasie wasoke ngolokionyi.
Napfo nyi kuwekeri-pfo poo lya nguwe tsifoi tsiweiliso alya fumwunyi; wakamterewa nawainenge momu wahende itsiososa-tso.
Kawainenga momu. Naalyo mṟufu iya ikawuka mndu ulya ikahenda yosoosa nguwe tsilya. Poo lilya likapiṟimika kulya msaṟi-hu, likaoloka kulya nduwenyi, likapfumbo nyi mṟinga.
Walisi walya wawona wado, wakadicha, wakashitsa mbonyii-tso kulya mṟinyii na ko wademi.
Wandu wakakure wahende yambuya kilya kyawutika, wakashika alyando Yesu ai, wakakooyaho mndu ulya alewuto waṟufu walya wawicho adamie; aṟee nguwo, apfudie, ai alya madendenyi ha Yesu; wakaowuo.
Na walya wawewonyii wakawaongoya chando ulya awewodo nyi waṟufu wawicho achiṟo.
Na wandu walya woose walee mṟasenyi ya Wageraseno wakamterewa nawuke kulya kowo, kipfa lyandi walehoyo nyi wuowu wung'anyi; nao kadoya ngalawenyi, kawuya.
Msoṟo ulya alewuto waṟufu walya wawicho kamterewa ke nakukaye nao. Nao kamsama kambia.
“Kuwuuye na kanyi; nohende yonguo shindo-shi shing'anyi shidi Ruwa akuwutia.” Nao kakuhendia; kawa moonguo kulya mṟinyi koose shilya Yesu alembutia.
Lilyandi Yesu alewuya, mamwingi fulya fo wandu fukamwambia, kipfa nyi fuwei imbedia fose.
Adi a ulya mndu, rina lyake nyi Yairo; kacha naho, nao nyi awei mwitoṟi o mba yeterewia. Kakuhutsa oo madendenyi ha Yesu, kamterewa nahende kulya kanyi koke.
Kipfa nyi awewode mana kimumu o waka aweshitsie maka ikumi na iwi, nao nyi aweshikie hafui na inenuka. Nao kechihenda mamwingi fulya fuka-peṟehetsana nao.
Na mka umu aweluo ndaare ya samu handu ha maka ikumi na iwi, awemarisie shindo shake piu ko wahanga nalaidimike ichiṟo nyi mndu.
Kacha kya ipfo numa, kapaaya mambo tsa nguwo tsake, naalyo lienyi ndaaṟe iya ya samu ikamsia piu.
Yesu kahamba “Njiu anyipaaya lanye?” Wechikana-kana wose Petro na wodoe wakahamba “Mwaaria, nyi mamwingi-fu fuipeṟe-hetsana na iyo na ikutsindika.”
Yesu kahamba “Kuwode mndu amenjipaaya, kindo ngamanya nyi pfinya yanjiwuka.”
Mka ulya awona kechiidima imwowyapfo, kacha naho kechidedema, kamwolokia ndenyi, kamwongoya alya kiidi kya wandu wose kimarete kampaaya, na chando awechia oweṟe lulya.
Nao kambia “Wuyo nyi moo manoko, kiidikio kyapfo kyamekukiṟa; kuhendie kipuo.”
Alamhutsia ado, adi a ulya sa awuka kulya ko mwitoṟi ulya o mba yeterewia kawia Yairo, Mana ulya opfo amenenuka, ma kulawinyishe-se mlosha.
Yesu aicho ado kamhaluo “Ma ulaowuo, idikia tupu, na echichia-se.”
Kekishika kulya kanyi nalalekie mndu echiida nao kulya mba, shile nyi Petro na Yohane na Yakobo, na ndee o mana na mae.
Nawo nyi wawekeri ifihiṟa wechimkapya shilio wose. Nao kahamba “Mulafihiṟe, kipfa amepfapfo, nyi alee mado!”
Nawo wakamseka mnu, kipfa nyi waweichi nyi apfiie.
Nao kambada owoko, kamlaha kahamba, “Iyo mana, kure!”
Mumuyo foke fukambuya, kakure. Kawawasa nainengo shelya.
Wafee wake wakaṟihio. Nao katutuma walawie mndu ikyo kyawutika.
Kyasia kalaha walya ikumi na wawi na handu hamu, kawainenga pfinya na chila yeng'anyia waṟufu wawicho na ichiṟa ndaaṟe.
Kawaduma wahende yonguo wumangi wo Ruwa na ichiṟa wandu waluo.
Kawawia, “Ma mlawone mochiduo kindo kya njienyi, manya ndichi manya kikuchu, ma mkate ma mapesa; ma nguwo ya kawi.
Na orio mba momekuidia-ho, kaenyi-ho itane moweda iwuka-ho.
Walya wada walamwambia, mkashika iwuka mṟi-fo, kute-kutenyi kiluli-kyo ipfo madende, kundu kiwawiie kiṟingishio kyawo.”
Kyasia wakawewuka-ho, wakawa motengeta-tengeta mṟinyi ya wandu wechionguo mbonyi tsa sia, na ichiṟa wandu handu hoose.
Kyasia mangi Herode kawio shindo shilya shilewutika shoose, kapfiio nyi mdo; nyi kipfa wandu maata waweihamba, Yohane nyi aleṟutso ko wapfu.
Na maata wakahamba, nyi umu o wadedi wa Ruwa wa kacha akure.
Herode kahamba, “Yohane nyi njilemdumbuo mdo; aka ichu ngaicho shindo shake shii shido nyiu?” Kaanga moshiha mweke fowonana nao.
Wasu walya wamewuya, wakamwongoya shilya walewuta shoose. Kasheṟuka nawo kawaduo kundu ko kisekenyi, kulya mṟinyi fumlahe nyi Betisaida.
Na mamwingi fo wandu foikimanya, fukamwitung'ata. Kawaambya; kadeda nawo mbonyi tsa wumangi wo Ruwa, na sa wawelangi ichiṟo, kawewachiṟa.

Kushikye iila, walya ikumi na wawi wakacha na alyando ai wakambia “Kesama-ng'u-wo mamwingi-fu fo wandu, kundu wahende ipfo mṟinyi ya wambaṟa na madema, wawone handu helaa na shelya, kifa iya handu lui nyi nuka, nyi handu halai na wandu.”
Nao kawawia “Wainengenyi shelya nyo.” Nawo wakahamba, “Luwode kya ngoseṟa kota mkate itanu na shikunga shiwipfo, shile na luhende ihuṟa shelya wandu-wa walye wose.”
Kipfa sa wawei-pfo nyi waweshikie kufui na shiku shitanu womi tupu. Nao kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake “Damiṟenyi wandu njiotasa makumi hatanu-hata-nu.”
Wakawika wado, wakawadamiṟa woose.
Nao kaiṟa mkate iya itanu na makunga halya hawi, kaambuya huye ruwehu kashiidapfumya Ruwa, kashipeṟenguo-peṟenguo kainengia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, wakahawia wandu walya.
Wakalya wakaihuda wose, kukatolo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu shilya waletsihaṟa, ikaichuo shikunjia ikumi na shiwi.
Kukashika ili limu aweiiterewa Ruwa kyanya, walya wa kiloshionyi kyake waai hamu nao, kawawesa kahamba, “Mamwingi fo wandu nyi wekehamba inyi nyiwu?”
Nawo wakahaluo wakahamba, “Nyi wekehamba nyi Yohane mpatisi, na wengi wakahamba nyi Elia na wengi wakahamba nyi umu o wadedi walya wa Ruwa wa kacha akure.”
Nao kawawia, “A nyio nyi mokehamba inyi nyiu?” Petro kahaluo kahamba, “Nyi Kristo-chu o Ruwa.”
Nao katutuma, kawawawasa walawie wado mndu.
Kawehamba ke, “Nyi kiwaṟi Mana o mndu nahende iliso wukiwa wufoi na ileheka ko waitoṟi na ko wakohanyi wang'anyi na ko walaanyi wa shitabu, itane wambaaha, na ili lya kaṟaṟu naṟuke.”
Kawuya iwia woose, “Mndu akundi yawishana na inyi, nakukane amonyi, nakudikie msalaba foke nache injiosha-ng'u.
Kipfa ichu akundi iletsa moo foke nyi echifudetsa; na ichu echidetsa moo foke kipfa kyako inyi, nyi echifukiṟa.
A mndu nyi kiki echiira-ho kya wowina woke kokoya nyi awinya wuyana-wu wose wukawa woke, nao kakudetsia-ho amonyi kawichuṟa mrima foke?
Kipfa orio mowada sonu tsako inyi ang'u tsa shidedo shako, o ichu na Mana o mndu na echeewada sonu tsake ili echikaa nache na wusuṟi woke, nyiwo wo Nde na wo wamalaika wake waele.
Nyi kya lohi lohi ngamuwia, iwa wahoṟoki iya maata-ho, wechisonja opfu ma nta walawona wumangi wo Ruwa kuwookapfo.”
Kyasia kekihamba shidedo-sho, kukaida-ho mkonu cha nyanya, kaduo Petro na Yohane na Yakobo kado fumwunyi nahende iterewa Ruwa.
Kechiterewa, kyamu kyake kikailacha fana, na nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu tsikakengemaa.
Naho kudi aiwa womi wawi waideda nao, nawo nyi Mose na Elia.
Wakawawonekia wai na kiṟumi wechideda nao kya mainukionyi hake, chando echihenda iinukia kulya Yerusalemu.
Na Petro na wodoe nyi wawewodo nyi mado. Waambuo, wakawona wusuṟi woke na womi walya wawi wahoṟoki nao.

Kyasia, lilyandi wawei isamana wahende, Petro kawia Yesu, “Alewo Mwaaria, iya nyi hecha, lukukaye-ho, luwike-ho mahema haṟaṟu, limu lyapfo, na limu lya Mose, na limu lya Elia!” Nao nalamanye kilya aideda.
Kechideda ado kukacha ipuchi likawawikia maṟishe; nawo wakaowuo lilyandi waleshingio nyi ipuchi.
Kukawuka ṟu kulya ipuchinyi likahamba, “Ichu nyio manoko msambuṟe mwadannyienyi!”
Ṟu lilya lyechihamba lido, Yesu kawono ai amonyii. Nawo mfiri iya wakatsia walaongoye mndu ma nta shilya walewona.
Kyasia ili lya ngama, wechisoka kulya fumvu-hu, kakumbuhana mamwingi fufoi.
Kulya mamwinginyi kuwekeri-pfo mndu, kakoṟoṟoma kahamba “Mlosha Mwaaria! Nyi ngakuterewa nosaṟie mana oko o womi, kipfa nyi ai kimumu kyako!
Keambuya, mumuyo mbicho nyi fokemososa, nao kawefihiṟa ngeṟu-yo, kawa momrakuo-rakuo katana adosa mahoṟe-hoṟe, fulakunde ida fulamiwira.
Ngaterewa iwo wa kiloshionyi kyapfo wafuwute, walaidime.”
Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Ee, nyo kishari kilawode iidikia kihendie makika! Aka-le-wo, nyi njekaa nanyo njishike indii, a njiwe moduana nanyo njishike indi? Keende mana-cho opfo na iya?”
Kekicha na alyando ai, mṟufu ulya kawemrakuo-rakuo na imrengetesha-rengetesha. Yesu katilima mṟufu ulya o ngafu, kachiṟa mana ulya, kamnengia ndee.
Wakaṟihio wose kipfa lya walewona mng'ano fo pfinya fo Ruwa. Nawo wose wechiṟihio wado kya shindo shilya ekewuta, naalyo kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake.
“Wikyenyi necha madedo-ha ipfo madunyi hanu! Mana o mndu nyiechikaa nahende dambiko mawokonyi ha wandu.”
Nawo walamanyie kidedo-kyo, kikawatambisa walatambahalukio, wakaowuo imbesa kya kidedo kyo.
Kyasia wakawado nyi mhio-hio ke nyiu echikaa nawe mnene-nene ngesa?
Na Yesu kamanya mhio-hio iya ipfo ngoonyi tsawo, kawada kimana kitutu, kakihoṟotsa oo mbaṟinyi yake.
Kawawia, “Mndu kaambia kimana-ki kui rina lyako, nyi inyi anjiambia; na monjiambia inyi, nyi aambia ichu anyiidumie; kipfa ichu ai mtutu onu kamunyiia, nyio sa ang'anyi.”
Yohane kahaluo kahamba, “Mlosha Mwaaria, nyi lulewona mndu aweifuna waṟufu wawicho kui rina lyapfo, naso lukamwima, cha kipfa alekeawishana naso.”
Yesu kambia, “Ma mlamwime; kipfa sa alalehanyi nanyo nyi awishanyi nanyo.”
Lilyandi mfiri yake ileetuka, kushikie mainukionyi hake nao kahaluka wohenda Yerusalemu.
Kaduma na wasu wakawemsongoya. Wakahenda, wakaida mṟinyi fo Wasamaria ke wamteseheṟie-pfo handu.
Nawo walakunde imwambia, kipfa lyandi awesumhantsie kyamu wohenda Yerusalemu.
Walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wo ko Yohane na Yakobo wekiwona wado wakahamba, “Mndumii, ukundi luhambe modo fuoloke kulya ruwehu fuwarumatse, chando na Elia ewewuta?”
Nao kainduka, kawadedia kahamba, “A mumuyo-fu mkeri nafo mlafuichi nyi fuda?
Mana o mndu chi alecha narumatse moo ya wandupfo, shile nyi iikiṟa.” Wakahenda mṟinyi fungi.
Wechikuhendia wado njiehu, mndu kambia, “nyi njechiawishana na iyo orio handu omekuhendaia.”
Na Yesu kambia, “Mapaara nyi hawode mruma, na shilehe shikawewada sungu, indi Mana o mndu awode handu helaṟa mdo fokefo.”
Kawia mndu ungi, “Nde, awishana na inyi.” Nao kahamba, “Kemembikia momu fohenda ikuṟikia wande.”
Yesu Kambia, “Leka, wapfu-wo waṟike wapfu wawo, indi iyo njoo nohende kochionguo wumangi wo Ruwa.”
Na ungi-se kahamba, “Mndumii, njechianga moawishana na iyo; indi kya kuwooka kemembikia momu njihende isamana na wandu wa kanyi koko.”
Na Yesu kambia, “Ma mndu amelesha owoko loke kawada kumbi lyedema na mbe, kawuya yambuya numa, nechikaa nasumhane ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwapfo.”
Iya numa-numa Mndumii kasambuṟa wasoṟo wengi makumi mfungade, kawaduma wawi wawi wahende imsongoya, wahende kundo ko mṟinyi koose, na handu hoose ekaa nache naho.
Kawawia, “Shesambuo nyi shifoi, indi weṟunda-ho wakanyia. Keterewenyi Mndumii menyi shesambuo nadume waṟundi ipfo kisambuyonyi kyake.
Kuhendyenyi! Ambuyenyi nyi ngamduma mui cha machoondi hai kiidi kya shisii.
Mulahende murie kichoṟe, manya kikuchu, ma shadu, manya mulaiṟikiṟe mndu njienyi.
Indi mkaida na mba ko mndu, kuwooka hambenyi, ‘Ofoṟo lukae na mba-i.’
Na kokoya ipfo kuipfo mana o ofoṟo ofoṟo lonu nyi lochimkaika; na kokooya alaipfo, nyi lochiwuya-se na konu.
Kyasia kaenyi mba iya mochikulia na ikunyooya isho wamwinenga. Kipfa moṟunda nyi asumuhanyie woṟunda woke. Ma mlaṟaheṟahe ihenda mba-i na ii.
Na orio mṟi moida napfo, wandu wafo wakamuambia, shelya wamuomoya lyenyi.
Chiṟenyi wandu-wo wakeri-pfo waluo, muwawie, ‘Wumangi wo Ruwa womchea hafui.’
Na orio mṟi moida, wandu wafo walamuambie, wukenyi-pfo muhende ipfo njienyi tsafo muhambe,
‘Ma kiluli-kyo kya ipfo mṟinyii fonu kikuwode kunu madende kodu, nyi lochimuangatsia, kyaindi manyienyi, wumangi wo Ruwa womcha hafui!’
Na inyi ngamuwia, Kilya kya Sodoma nyi kechianguo mfiri fulya kota ka mṟi-fo!”

“Ochia lopfo iyo Korasinyi, ochia lopfo iyo Betisaida; nokooe nyi kulya Tiro na Simon kulewutikia shindo-sho sha pfinya cha ishi shiwutikie kunu kiidi kyanu, nawo nyi wawechidumbuya lilya kacha, wakuṟike na shisaṟa sha wukiwa na idamia mafunyi.
Kyaindi kilya kya Tiro na Simon nyi kyechianguo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kyanu.
Na iyo Kapernaumu chi uweei mdose kokooya ruwehu? Nyi ochikaa noolotso noshike kulya kundu ko wapfu.
Ulya amwicho nyio nyi anjicho inyi, na ulya amleha nyo nyi anjileha inyi; na ichu anleha inyi, nyi aleha ulya anjidumie.”
Wasoṟo walya makumi mafungade wakawuya wai wachihiye, wakahamba, “Mndumii, kui rina lyapfo, waṟufu wawicho na waleluicho, nyi wai wawike shi yadu.”
Nao kawawia, “Nyi njilewona Satan kechioloka ruwehu cha mbawa.
Kyasia na inyi nyi njimwinengie pfinya yechumia njoka na shisuwa na ya orio pfinya yose ya mkituwa, ma kuipfo kindo ma kida ma kida kechimukapapfo!
Kya kake mulawone mochichihio ili mumuyo mbicho imbike shi yanu ikamuicho; indi chihionyi kya ili marina hanu hamaṟehie kulya ruwehu.”

Saa iya iya kakeseka kui Mumuyo Mwele kahamba; “Ngakuana Wande, ui Mndumii menyi ruwehu na oruka, kipfa ili mbonyi-tsi utsiṟikie iwo waṟango na iwo waṟamtsu, kowuya idambuya shikoku; ee-wo Wande, na kiweekuchihie kihendeke kido.”

Kaindukia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kahamba, “Shindo shose nyi njiledambikio nyi Wande, ma kuwode msa aichi ke Mana nyiupfo, shile na Wande, ma ke Wande nyiu, shila na Mana, na ichu Mana akundi imdambuya.”
Kaindukia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kyaanya kahamba; “Wungusu walya meso hawo hechiwona isho nyo muwonyi.
Cha kipfa nyi ngamuwia; Waikimbi wafoi na wamangi nyi wawelangie wawone ishi nyo muiambuya, manyia walashiwone, na iicho isho nyo mokeicho, manya walaicho.”
Adi a ulya mndu mlaanyi o mawawaso kakure kacha imhesha namtewe kahamba, “Alewo Mlosha Mwaaria. Nyi wuda njiechiwika ngesa njikuoṟie-wo moo fo mlungana?”
Nao kambia, “A ipfo wuwawasonyi nyi kii kiṟehie-pfo kida, nyi usomie-pfo kuda?”
Nao kahaluo kambia, “Kunda Ruwa Mndumii opfo na ngoo yapfo yose, na mrima fopfo fose, na pfinya yapfo yose na makusaṟo hapfo hose, nowekunda na odoo chando ukundi moo fopfo kumonyi.”
Yesu kambia, “Na ohaluo kisumhanyi, kewewuta kudo na ochikaa uwone moo.”
Nao kakunda ikutana mcha asumhanyi kawia Yesu, “A odoya oko nyiu?”
Yesu kamhaluo kahamba, “Nyi kuwekeri mndu alewuka Yerusalemu kesoka na Yeriko, katumukio nyi wasoki, wakamwatuo nguwo, wakamkapa, wakambika maṟishi, wakamda kinawo-nawo kyepfa na ikia.
Kyasia mkohanyi kasoka na njia iya-iya, alakusirie, kambona kaida kihadi wokusheṟuo.
Na mndu Mlewi nawo kashika-ho, kambona, kawekusheṟuo.
Kyasia mndu Msamaria arie njia yake, kashika alyando ai, kambona, kamwichio wukiwa.
Kasembelia kufui, kampfunga shifaṟe shilya na shidami, kaletsia-ho mafuda na mvinyio; kamwira kamdosia mhongo fo indo lilya lyake liwembawie, kamduo mbenyi ya wahenu kamwinduṟia-ho.
Na ili lya ngama ngamenyi kakure nahende, kawuta dinaṟi tsiwi kainengia ulya menyi mba kahamba, ‘Njikanya imbawaṟa, na kokooya owutase kindo kya ngoseṟa, na njekutaa njimonyi ili njewuya.’ ”
Yesu kambesa, “A wandu-wa waṟaṟu nyiu-ho awekeri odoe o ulya aletumukio nyi wasoki walya? Nyi ohamba kuda?”
Nao kahamba, “Nyi ulya alemsaṟia ko.” Yesu kambia; “Henda-ng'u nowute kudo.”
Nawo wechichumia wadi na njia, nao kaida na kundu ko mṟinyi. Mndu mka umu, rina lyake nyi Marita kamwambia, kamduo kulya kanyi koke.
Nao nyi awewode mana o mae elaho nyi Maria; nao kacha damia alya madendenyi ha Mndumii, kaadanyia madedo hake.

Marita kapfuṟukana imtomboshanyia shelya, numa kacha na hafui kahamba, “A nyi kulaikusaṟa-wo Mndumii, ili manowama anjidea shindo ngapfuṟukana njimonyi? Kembie-wo nawewika-ho owoko loke lutomboshane kimu.”
Mndumii kamhaluo kambia, “Marita, Marita, kyapfo nyi uwodo nyi makusaṟo ha shindo shifoi na ikuwinyisha kowekuwinyisha.
Indi, kindo kiwaṟi nyi kimu tupu; Maria o nyi asangie-ho kiteeno kii kicha, nakyo ekaanakisoko adipfo.”
Kukashika ili limu awei handu kechiterewa Ruwa, amhutsia, umu o walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, luloshe-wo iterewa Ruwa, chando na Yohane alewelosha walya wa kiloshionyi kyake.”

Nao kawawia, “Ili mochiterewa Ruwa hambenyii mudi, ‘Nde-yadu ui ipfo ruwehu, rina lyapfo litano lyele; wumangi wopfo wuche. Isho ukundi chando shekewutika kulya ruwehu, na kunu orukenyi shiwewa shido.’ ”
“Kando kadu kalufoi uluinenge inu.
Uludeye sile tsapfo luwode, chando naso lokedeea wasile wadu. Ma ulaluduo kitewionyi. Indi ulukiṟe shindo shiwicho.”
Kawawia, “Nyiu o konu awewode mbuya yake, kahenda koke kio madumbwo hawi kambia, ‘Mbuya yako, kenjiakuya mkate iṟaṟu.
Kipfa nyi mbuya yako acha koko wulalu awuka kyaṟo, ma njiwode kindo kemnengapfo.’
Na ulya o mba nahaluo nahambe, ‘Ma kulanjiwinyishe; na mongo fomemaa ishingo; na wana wako nyi wakeri na inyi kitaṟehu, nyi walee-ng'u; ma njiechiidima ikure njiihende ikuinengapfo.’
Nyi ngamuwia; Ma kada alakure nahende imnenga ili ai mbuya yake, na awechikure kipfa ili amterewa ado na kituumuo, alawode sonu, namnenge isho awuṟie shoose.”
“Na inyi nyi ngamuwia; Keterewenyi nyi mochiinengo; kepfulenyi nyi mochiwona. Kekapekapenyi mongo nyi mochipfunguyo.
Kipfa orio moterewa nyi echiinengo, na mopfula kawewona, na mokapakapa mongo kawepfunguyo.
Ang'u ipfo konu kuipfo ndee o mana, mana kamterewa mkate nao namnenge iho? Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, nao namnenge njoka handu ha ikunga?
Ang'u, kamtereewa ipoṟe lya nguku, nao namnenge lya kisuwa?
Kyasia-ng'u, kokooya nyo mui wawicho, nyi mokeidima iinenga shiwana shanu shiinengo shicha, aka chi kya ngoseṟa mnu Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu echiengeṟa inenga Mumuyo Mwele iwo wamterewa?”
Yesu nyi awekeri ifuna mṟufu mbicho ai na pipi; mṟufu mbicho kekimbuka, mndu ulya ai pipi kadeda.
Na maata-ho wakahamba, “Kindo kyainenga kaidima ifuna waṟufu wawicho nyi Belsebuli, ichu ai mnene o waṟufu wawicho weososa wandu.”
Wengi-se wakamhesha wakundi nawaloṟe ofano luwukie ruwehu.
Nao kekimanya makusaṟo hawo kawawia, “Orio wumangi wupaṟakanyi kipfa kyawo wuwuenyi nyi wochihaluka mrapu, na mba nyi yechihoya mba ingi.
Aka kokoya Satan nao nyi apaṟakanyi amonyi, akashika wumangi woke nyi wochiwanga wuda? Kipfa ili muihamba ke nyi Belsebuli anjiwanza ngafuna waṟufu-wa wawicho wekeososa wandu.
Aka kokooya inyi nyi njiekefuna waṟufu wawicho na pfinya ya Belsebuli, aka wana wanu nyi wechiwafuna na pfinya ya wu? Kipfa ikyo wo nyi wechimuwinga.
Indi kokooya nyi kimnyo kya Ruwa njekefuna nakyo waṟufu wawicho, nyi wudo-ng'u wumangi wo Ruwa wucheye na konu.
Ili mndu mwapfinya akupfungie shisha kechiringa mmba yake, nzohoṟa tsake nyi tsekaa kipuo.
Kyaindi ili mwapfinya amng'anyie amchea kambinga, nyiechiduo shisha shake shose awekusirie nasho na isumba shilya amsoka.
Ichu alawadanyi na inyi anjikundipfo, na sa alasanyia na inyi nyi echiola ola.”
“Ili mumuyo fufanyi ngafu fombuka ko mndu fochipfula handu heonyonya halawode mṟinga, na ili fulechiwona nyi fokehamba ‘Wai, too, keleka njiwuye na kulya mba koko kundu ndewuka.’
Fushika-ho, fukakooya injiahie na ishelo ikaweshelo.
Nalyondo fochihenda iende mumuyo ingi mfungade ifuwichuye kundu iidime ikaa-pfo, na numa mawuto ha mndu ulya hefurumia hakawa mawicho kota halya ha kuwooka.”
Lilyandi aweihamba madedo-ha, mndu mka mliwe o masumbuhano halya kairia ṟu kambia, “Nanga wusu wulya wulekuduo na mawe̱ halya kulehaonga.”
Nao kahamba, “E-wo, kyaindi nanga sa wekeicho idedo lya Ruwa na ikaa wakakaa nalyo.”

Kyasia mamwingi fo wandu wafoi wakakuwumbia alyando aweei, naalyo kawooka ihamba “Kishari-ki nyi kishari kiwicho, kekepfula ofano luṟihishie; nakyo ma kechiwona ofanopfo, shile nyi ofano lulya lo Yona.
Chakipfa chando Yona alewa afano lo wandu wa Niniwe, na wudo na Mana o mndu echiwiia kishari-ki ofano.

Mangi mka o kulya ora lo-kosoka nyi echikaa nahoṟoke alya mondunyi hamu na wandu wa kishari-ki, nawawinge; kipfa nyiawecheye awuka alyando oruka lutsitsie, kacha yadanyia wuṟango wo Solomon, na kya ngoseṟa kota Solomon aiki.
Wandu walya wa Nyinyiwe nyi wechikaa wahoṟoke mondunyi hamu na kishari-ki, wakiwinge; kipfa mrima yawo iletau ikamanya mwongye fo Yona, na kya ngoseṟa kota Yona aiki!”
“Kuipfo msa echiatsa taa naiwike kimolyapfo ang'u naipfihisie kiponyipfo, kyaindi nyi echiiwika kidihu kehekia taa, kundu orio waida na ipfo mba wawone ngeela-yo.
Taa ya mbihu nyi riso. Riso-lyo lyapfo kokooya likeri licha, kyasia na mbihu fopfo fose nyi fuwode sa. Kyaindi ili lii-iwicho, na mbihu fopfo nyi fochiwa meema.
Kyasia, wang'u mokuṟisa mnu, kundu sa-yo ii ipfo kopfo ilawone yechiwa meema.
Kyasia, ili mbihu fopfo fose fukeri sa, fulawode ma ohawi lui na meema, naaho-ng'u nyi fochiwa sa rambatanyi, cha ili taa yakulimika na ngela yayo ii cha mbawa.”
Kechideda ado Mfarisayo umu kamterewa nahende ilya shelya kulya koke; kahenda-pfo, kadamia.
Lilyandi Mfarisayo ulya alewona alye alawooka isanja mawoko, kaṟihio.
Mndumii kambia, “Nyo Wafarisayo nyi mokesanja shirahu na shitela ipfo kya-nja, kyaindi ipfo kiidi kyanu nyi kuichuo wusoki na wuwicho.
Mui matondo, alae chi ichu mowuta sha kya-nja ekewuta na sha kya-mba?
Kyasia, shilya shii ipfo kya-mba, saṟienyi nasho wandu, na shose nyi shechimbiia sha osu.
Ochia nyi lonu nyo Wafarisayo, kipfa nyi mokedambika kya ikumi kii kya kyaana na shindunda na mboha, indi mkaidia wuchili wusumuhanyi na ikunda lya Ruwa, ishi nyi shimuwaṟi iwuta kulawode ida shilya.
Ochia nyi lonu nyo Wafarisayo, kipfa ili mukundi isambuṟa shidembo sha kusonguo ipfo masinagogenyi, mkawekunda na shiṟikiṟo sha ipfo tumo.
Ochia lonu, kipfa nyi mui cha shipfu shiwowie, na wandu wakawa moshichuma-chuma walaichi.”
Kyasia mndu umu o walaanyi wa wuwawaso kamhaluo kambia; “Mlosha Mwaria, kohamba kudo nyi olumina naso.”
Nao kahamba, “Nanyo walaanyi wa wuwawaso, ochia lonu, kipfa ili mokedika wandu maṟio halechiwa iira, nanyio ma mlekehapaaya ma na kimnyio kyanu kimu.
Ochia lonu, kipfo ili mokechopa shifu sha wadedi wa Ruwa, na wewawaaha nyi wande-yanu.
Nyi wudo moketetekia mawuto halya ha wandeyanu, mukawechihiṟo nyiho; kipfa nyiwo wawewawaahie, nanyo mkawachopia shipfu.
Nyi njechiwadumia waikimbi na wasu, na maata wawo nyi wechiwawaaha na wengi wawafune.
Kundu oshari-lu luwuwuyo samu tsa waikimbi wose tsipusukie kimatsika wuyana wuwiko shika inu.
Wokya samu ya Abeli itane samu ya Sakaria ulya alewoohio makiidi ha kitaṟa kilya kedasia na omombo. Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia; Wandu waoshari lu nyi wechiiweso!
Ochia lonu, nyo walanyi, wa wuwaso, kipfa muleduo opfunguo lo wulaany nanyo muwenyi mulaide napfo, na walya wawekundi iida napfo mkawakingia.”
Lilya mandi alewuka alyando awei, walaanyi wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakawooka imtengetia mnu na imbesa shifoi.
Wakamṟinjiawia wechimdeha madedo echihadeda, kundu wawone kemkumba.
Kiheri nakyo kukakuwumbia-ho mamwingi fo wandu shiku na shiku itane wachumana-chumana, nao kawooka ideda na wasu wake kuwooka kahamba, “Kuṟisenyi mso fotarang'asha fo Wafarisayo, nyifo wulembetseṟi.
Ma kuipfo kindo kii kiwoshie kilechishikuo ma kiṟike kilechimanyika numapfo.
Kyasia-ng'u, orio shindo shose muhambie memenyi nyi shechikaa shiichio senyi; na orio kindo muwewedie madunyi ipfo mba kimolya, nyi kekaa kihambio ipfo mbehu.”
“Kyaindi nyi ngamuwia nyo wakunde wako, mulawone mochiowuo iwo wewaha mbihu, wakammaa walaidime iwuta kya ngosera.
Kyaindi njimloṟe sa mochimwowuo; owuonyii ulya echiidima iwa̱ha, numa awewode-se pfinya yemkumba kulya modonyi, Ee, ichu nyiio ngamuwia; muowuonyii!
Alae chi wekekumba njoṟiu tsitanu wuhuru wo senti tsiwi? Indi manya lumu-ho luhadimikie ko Ruwapfo.
Kyaindi nyo ma njiui tsa ipfo mdonyi konu na tsinjitale tsoose. Mulaowuo, nyo nyi muidie shilehe shifoi kui wucha!”
“Orio monjiṟingishia oshangunyi lo wandu, na Mana o mndu nyi echikaa namṟingishie oshangunyi lo wamalaika wa Ruwa.
Kyaindi ichu monjikana wandunyi, nyi echikaa nakano alya sumuhana na wamalaika wa Ruwa.
Na orio sa echihamba idedo lyesutsa Mana o mndu nyi echihooṟio manyalepfo.
Nanyo, ili wechimuduo masinagogenyi na ko wachili na ko waitoṟi ma mulakuwinyishe ikusaṟa chando mochihaluo ang'u kindo mochikuashuo nakyo ang'u chando mochihamba.
Cha kipfa Mumuyo Mwele nyio echimlosha saa iya tichi kindo kiwaṟi ihambo.”
Kyasia, mndu umu o kulya mamwinginyi kambia, “Mlosha Mwaria, njikanyia iwia manowama luhawane kyooṟa kyadu.”
Nao kambia, “Nyiu anjiwikie njidumbuo mondu yanu ang'u mhawi mohawa shooṟa?”
Nao kawawia, “Ambuyenyi, mukuṟise lango tsa shindo ma tsida ma tsida, cha kipfa mfeeṟa fo mndu fochiidima imnenga natawulye moo na shindo-sho awodepfo.”
Kyasia kawawia ifanano kahamba, “Kuwekeri-pfo mndu msuṟi, madema hake hakaende mnu shelya.
Nao kakusaṟa-saṟa mrimenyi kahamba, ‘Nyi wuda njiechiwika, ili ndawode kundu njesambuya shelya sako?’
Kahamba, ‘Nyi wudi njiechiwika; nyi njechisanja shikumbi shako njiwike shing'anyie ishi; nyipfondo njiesanyia isho shicheye shoose na nzohoṟa tsako.
Numa njiwie mrima foko; iyo mrima foko nyi uwode shindo sha kisa shifoi shishikie maka ifoi; onyonya-ng'u, nokuliie na ikunyooya na ikeseka nokukesekie.’
Kyaindi Ruwa kambia, ‘Iyo nyi tondo, kio-ki nyi wechicha ishiha moo fopfo wafuduo, aka isho uteseheṟie nyi shechiwa sha-u?’
Nyi wudo kyechiwutikia ichu mokusanyia shindo indi alasuṟie ko Ruwa.”
Kawia na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Kwi kipfa-kyo nyi ngamuwia; Ma mulakusaṟe wukiwa wo kindo ketawulia moo ang'u kindo mochiṟaa ipfo mbihu yanu.
Kipfa moo nyi fung'anyie shelya, na mbihu fukaweng'anya maṟao.
Keambuyenyi-wo makuru, hekewaaya ma isambuopfo, na Ruwa nyi ekehalisa hakaihuda pacha, a nyio chi mung'anyiie malehe-ho kui wuhuru!
A wukoho wonu nyiu onu echiidima yengeṟia-ho ma kyoweṟe kimu ma cha dambo ma ili akusaṟa-saṟa?
Kyasia kokooya mlekeidima ma kindo kitung'tu kido, nyiki ili mokesaṟa wukiwa wo isho shingi?
Kuloshienyi ipfo shiwaṟonyi sha mademenyi, chando shilekekapa ndusu manyia yoka; indi nyi ngamuwia; manya Solomon ipfo wusuṟinyi woke wose, awei mṟike nguwo cha kimu kyashopfo.
Aka, kokooya Ruwa nyi wudo ekeṟika maṟa-ho ha mapatenyi hechikaa-ho inu, na ngama hakakumbo mawiwenyi, a chi ngoseṟa echimuṟika nyo muidikie kitutu?”
“Nanyo mamlatambahanyie kindo mochilya na kido mochinyo, ma mrima yanu ilaṟahisho nyisho. (
Cha kipfa isho nyisho wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wa kunu wuyana weketambahanyia wose.) Kyaindi Ndeyanu na amuichi, kamanya ke shindo-sho nyi shimuwaṟi.
Kyaindi lalakienyi wumangi woke; na isho shingi nyi cha sha ngawo.”
“Ma mlawone mochiowuo nyo poo itutu; kipfa nyi kilechihia Ndeyanu imuinengia-nyio wumangi-wu.
Kumbenyi nzohoṟa tsanu muwone shesaṟia wakiwa. Kesungusienyi na shikuchu shilechikuo sheṟika kisa kilechisia ipfo ruwehu, nyiho handu kulechisembelio nyi manyinyi ma ilio nyi kase.
Chakipfa ipfondo kisa kyanu kikeri, nyipfondo na mrima yanu yechikaa.”
“Kaenyi-ng'u mukupfungie shitsi, na taa tsanu tsiweaka.
Nanyo muwenyi muwe cha wandu waiwedia mndumii owo nawuye walinyi, kundu ili echicha, kakapa mongo, waweṟuhuo faṟa.
Nanga wasoṟo walya mndumii owo echiwakooya walee dembo ili echicha; nkya lohi ngamuwia; nyi echikupfunga na iwadamiṟa shelyenyi, natengete kechiwahidia iwainenga shelya.
Kokoya acha isumuka lya kawi ang'u lya kaṟaṟu kawakooya wai wado, nanga wasoṟo-wo.
Manyenyi iki; kokooya menyi mba aweichi kiheri mwiwi echicha, nyi awechilaa dembo, ma awechilekia mba yake ifunjopfo.
Nanyo kaenyi mukuṟeheṟie, kipfa Mana o mndu nyi echicha saa mulakuṟeheṟie.”
Petro kambia, “Mndumii ifanano-li nyi oluwia so lu-wenyi tupu, a ngesa na wandu wengi wose?”
Mndumii kahamba, “A nyiu ichu mokalia kanyi awei mwidiki mṟango, mndumii oke awemhaluye mnene o waṟundi wake, nawe mowahawia kando ili kiheri kyashika?
Nanga msoṟo ulya mndmii oke kacha kamkooya kewuta ado!
Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, Nyi echimbika mwiṟichi o nzohoṟa tsake tsose.
Kyaindi msoṟo ulya kawuya ikusaṟa ipfo mrimenyi foke, mndumii oko nyi akeleo icha, kawooka ikapa wodoe wa kyumi na wa kika, na ilya na inyo na inango.
Ilindi mndumii oke echicha mkonu alakusirie, saa alaichi, nyi echimkapa ilyi iwicho na imsamza na wadeko.
Na msoṟo aichi shindo mndumii oke akundi, nalateseheṟe, ma nalawute kisumhanyi chando mndumii oke akundi, o nyi echikapo maṟiinga hafoi.
Na ichu alaweichi, kawuta sa shechimwendie ikapo, o nyiechikapo kyake kitutu. Orio amnenge shifoi, koke nyi shechiweso shifoi, ma ichu amwaṟie shifoi mnu, nyi wechimbesa sha ngoseṟa.”
“Nyi njilecha ikumba modo wuyana, fukamekekuakia, nki njikundi-se?
Kyaindi njiwode wupatiso woko njipatiso nawo, na chando wunjikoṟoma, na mtano wumarisike.
A nyi muhiye nyi njicheye yende ofoṟo wuyana? Nyi ngamuwia, Ote, indi nyi mpaṟakano.
Kipfa kimatsika wulalu, wandu watanu wai mba imu nyi walekanyi kui waṟaṟu nyi kui wawi, waṟaṟu waloyane na wawi na wawi waloyane na waṟaṟu.
Nyi wechiloyana ndeye na mana o nguwo yake, na mana na nde, mae na mana oke o kika, na mana o kika na mae, mamii na mali o mana.”
Kawewia na mamwingi fulya fo wandu, “Mkawona ipuchi liiu lido kulya kishingonyi, nyi mokehamba owinyi, mvuo nyi icha ii. Kyaindi nakyo na wudo.
Kukawiwita otanu locha kulya nuka nyi mokehamba nyi kochiwaa, kikawewa kido.
Nyo makulembetseṟe, ate fana ya ruwehu na ya oruka nyi mocheedima iitambahaluo; na nki ili mulaidima itambahaluo shiherishi sha wulalu?”
“A nyiki ili nyo muwenyi mlekechilia kindo kisumhanyi?

Kipfa ili murianyi na mokituwa mohenda ikukumba ko mchili, kiheri mui njienyi, kambiṟa imnenga woṟunda woke, kundu mulekane nao, nalawone kekuduo wokukuruo itane ko mangi, na mangi-chu nalakudambikie msoṟo mokusaṟikia, na mosaṟikiacho nakuwike kipfungonyi.
Nyi ngakuwia, ochikiwuka-pfopfo, na utane omaa itaa piu, kulechitsihaa ma senti imu.”
Naalyo shiheri shilya shilya kukacha wandu wakamwongoya kya Wagalilaya walya Pilato alesangana samu tsawo na shidaso shilya shawo.
Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Aka nyi mohamba ke Wagalilaya walya nyi wawei wanyamaṟi kota Wagalilaya wengi wose ili waletowokio nyi shindo-sho-ko?
Ote, nyi chi wudopfo; kyaindi nyo mukada muladumbuya, nyi mochirumara kotawo.
Ang'u, walya ikumi na nyanya wehoyo nyi kitaanga kilya kya Siloamu kikawawaaha, nyo nyi mokehamba ke nyi waweei wanyamaṟi wakaida wandu wa Yerusalemu ko?
Ngamuwia, chi wudopfo, kyaindi mukada muladumbuya, nyi wudo mochisaramaya mose.”
Kyasia kahamba ifanano-li, “nyii mndu awewode mkuyu fuwedooye demenyi lyake lya msabibu, kahenda, akundi ndunda tsafo nalatsiwone.
Kawia moringa mdemi fulya, ‘Ambuya, maaka-fu nyi fo kaṟaṟu, njechecha njikundi ndunda kunu mkuyu-hu njilawone; fusume, nofukuṟuo; njiki-ili fokelemeṟa teri, fukashingia handu wulya?’
Nao kahaluo kambia, ‘Hoi Mndumii, kefude-se makafumu-se njikefudemia njifualye na kyala.
Kulako fochiwika dunda numa; fulawike, nofumanye-ng'u.’ ”
Kyasia mkonu fumu kechilosha sinagogenyi yawo imu-ho.
Napfo kuwei-pfo mka awewodo nyi mumuyo foluo-luo msengetete, kawenjongya maka ikunyi na nyanya, nao ipfo mbihu awemlemeka, nalaidime-se ma ihoṟoka necha.
Yesu ambona, kamlaha na alya afui kambia, “Iyo mndu-mka; omeletsano na iluo-luo lyapfo!”
Kamhekia mawoko, naalyo kahoṟoka chiu, kaidapfuma Ruwa.

Kyaindi mnene ulya moambuya sinagoge kapfuluko nyashi, kipfa lya Yesu achiṟa mkonu fo Sabato, kawia wandu walya, “Nyi kuwode mfiri iṟandaṟu yeṟunda lanyie, iwaṟi iṟunda, kyasia, njonyi mkonu-yo muchiṟo, ma mlache mkonu fo Sabato!”
Mndumii kahaluo kahamba, “Nyo nyi wamakulembetseṟi; alae chi orio umu onu ekepfunguo pung'a yake ang'u nzoi yake ipfo mbangonyi mkonu fo sabato nahende iirutsa mṟinga?
A ichu ai mana o waka o Abrahamu Satana aweempfungie maka ikumi na nyanya, a nyikili kilawaṟi na ichu napfunguo mshe-fo ili mfiri fo sabato?”
Kekihamba ado, wakituwa walya wake wakasuka woose; na mamwingi fulya fo wandu foose fukachihiṟo nyi shindo shilya sha wusuṟi shiwekewuto nyio.
Yesu kahamba, “A wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wufananyi na kiki a njiwufananyishe na kiki.”
Nyi wufananyi na mbeu imu ya Haradali, mndu aleira kawiaya mdeminyi foke; ikado ikang'ana, ikawa mdi fung'anyi, shilehe sha shi ya ruwehu shikacha ikulaya ipfo maṟambe-hu hafo.
Kahamba-se lya kawi, “Nyi kindo kida njiechifananyia nakyo wumangi wo Ruwa?
Nyi wufananyi na mso foshimbiṟa mkate mndu-mka alefuira, kafuwika msonyi fo shitela shiṟaṟu, fukatana fotarang'aa fose piu.”
Nao kawa motengeta-tengeta mamṟinyi na njiotiṟiwenyi kechilosha arie njia yehenda Yerusalemu.
Mndu umu kambia, “Ale Mndumii, sa wechikiṟo nyi wangu ngesa?”
Kawawia, “Tambahanenyi ikuchuruwuya kichuminyi kii kisise; kipfa nyi ngamuwia; nyi kuipfo sa wechikunda ikuidia-pfo, indi walechiidima.

Kiheri menyi kanyi amaa ikure, amshinga na mongo, lyondo mochiwooka ihoṟoka oo nja na ikapa-kapa mongo mochihamba; ‘Hoi Mndumii, kelupfunguye-wo.’ Nao nyi echimuhaluo nahambe; ‘Njichi kundu muwukiepfo.’
Nalyondo mochiwooka ihamba, ‘Nyi luwekelya na inyo kuwonyi, na iyo kocheluloshia kulya mṟinyi yadu.’
Nao nyiechimmbia nyo, ‘Njimwichi kundu muwukiepfo; kurenyi iya koko nyo moose muwuteie sha wukika!’
Nlyondo kochikaa-ho yeṟeṟa na iimadya maheho ili mochiwona Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo na wadedi wa Ruwa wose wakeri ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa, nanyo muwenyi muwone ke nyi muwapfunyie nja.
Kochikaa kuche wandu wawuka kulya kya ora lo ngamenyi na kya ora lo kyukanyi, na kya ora lo huye na lo seri, wache damia shelyenyi sha wumangi wo Ruwa.
Ambuyenyi, nyi kuipfo wefurumia wechiwa wawooki; na wawooki wawe wefurumia.”
Oweṟe lulya tichi Wafarisayo maata wakacha na alyando aweei wakambia, “Wuka iya nohende, kipfa Herode nyi akundi ikuwaaha.”
Nao kawawia, “Hendenyi muwie ipaara-lyo; Ambuya nyi njiifuna mṟufu mbicho na ichiṟa njimarise ichiṟa wandu inu na ngama, na kilalau nyi njechikooya njimarisie.
Kyaindi inu na ngama na kilalau nyi kinjiiwaṟi itengeta, kipfa kilawaṟi mdedi o Ruwa nawoohio mbarinyi, shile na Yelusalemu.

Ee-Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, okewaaha wadedi wa Ruwa kowekumbia na iwo wawadume kopfo maho, nyi kafoi kada njiwekundi isanyia wana wapfo handu hamu chando nguku yekesanyia malea hayo makungonyi nanyo mulakunde!
Ambuyenyi mmba tsanu nyi tsechideo tsii njisame. Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, mochinjiwona-se manya-lepfo, shile na mkonu fulya mochihamba; kuichiko ichu acha kui rina lya Mndumii.”
Kyasia kaida na mba ya mnene umu o Wafarisayo ili lya mkonu fo sabato nalye-pfo shelya; nawo wakambikia ndeheka.
Napfo nyi kuwekeri-pfo mndu aluo, aambi mṟinga, ai alya sumuhana na oshangu loke.
Yesu kawesa walanyi walya wa wuwawaso na Wafarisayo walya kawawia, “Kuipfo mti kochiṟa mkonu fo sabato ang'u ote?”
Nawo wakatsia do. Nao kambada, kamchiṟa, kamsama.
Kawawesa, “Nyiiu onu pung'a yake ang'u punda yake ikaoloka ṟungunyi lya mṟinga, nade alaidosa-pfo oweṟe kudi ili kui mkonu fo sabato?”
Nawo walaidime imhaluo ma-nta.
Kyasia kawia walya wa-walahe ifanano, kipfa alewona chando walesambuṟa shidembo sha kusonguo, kawawia.
“Kowona olaho nyi mndu walinyi, manya kuladamie kidembo kya kusonguo, kipfa nyi kochiwona kochicha mndu amlahe awode kiṟumi kota iyo.
Na ulya amlahie mu-wawi nache nakuwie, Kesehia ichu; na iyo nyi ochiwooka iwado nyi rihima ili ochiwada kidembo kya numa ya woose.
Kyaindi kolaho, damia kidembo kya numa; kundu ulya akulahie ili echicha nakuwie, mbuya, tikira alya huye. Nlyondo ochiṟumisho nyi walya wadamie na iyo shelyenyi woose.
Chakipfa orio mokudosa amonyi nyi echisotso, na mokusotsa nyi echidoso.”

Kyasia kawuya iwia na ulya awemlahie, “Kowona osungusia choonga ya kyahuo ang'u ya kilaayo, manya kulalahie mbuya tsapfo ma wana wa mayo ma wodoo ma wamṟasa wasuṟi, wawone wechikulahia-se iyo kiwe matalana.
Indi kosungusia choonga ya mpfuho, lahia wakiwa na shileta na weriteka na shipfupfuṟe.
Na iyo, nanga iyo; kipfa wo walawode kekutaa. Kipfa kitaayonyi kyapfo nyi alya maṟutsyonyi ha wecha wasumuhanyi.”
Kyasia umu o walya wadamie nao shelyenyi aicho ado kambia, “Wungusu ichu ekaa nakuliie choonga ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
Na Yesu kambia, “Mndu umu alesungusia kilaayo king'anyi, kalaha wandu wafoi.
Kyasia, kiheri kya kilaayo kaduma msoṟo oke nahende-wia walya wawalahe, ‘Kenjonyi, kipfa shoose shamewa!’
Iwo woose wakawooka yoka mtambo na kamu yekuwuta-ho. Ulya o kuwooka kambia, ‘Nyi njilehuṟa mdemi foko, nyi kinjiwaṟi njihende ifuambuya, ngakuterewa kenjieeka iwuya.’
Na o kawi kahamba, ‘Nyi njilehuṟa mbe ikumi, nyi njihenda itsihesha kokooya na tsiichi ikuruo magari, nyi ngakuterewa kenjieeka iwuuya.’
Na o kaṟaṟu kahamba, ‘Nyi njiilealika mka, kwi kipfa ikyo, ngaidima ichapfo.’

Msoṟo ulya kawuya kaongoya mndumii oke ado. Naalyo menyi kanyi kapfuluko nyashi, kawia msoṟo ulya oke, ‘Kure owinyii faṟa nohende ipfo mtandarenyi na ipfo njienyi tsa mṟi noende wakiwa na shileta na wapfu-meso na wairiteka nowaitse na kunu.’
Msoṟo ulya kahamba, ‘Mndumii, kilya ulembawasa kyambutika; indi na kuwode-se mwaanya.’
Mndumii ulya kawia-se msoṟo ulya, ‘Kure nohende mtanunyi na mṟasenyi ya kuleshe, uwaitike wache na iya, kundu mba yako iichuo pacha.
Kipfa nyi ngamuwia; Wasoṟo walya waweei-walahe, ma umu owo, echisonja kelya kyakopfo!’ ”
Kyasia mamwingi fo wandu fufoi fukaawishana nao, nao kawaindukia kawawia.
“Mndu kacha na koko, alasuo ndee na mae na mka na wana wake na wanawamae wa kyumi na wa kika na mrima foke amonyi, echiidima iwa mloshe okopfo.
Orio sa ada alakudika msalaba foke fopfiaho nanjioshe-ng'u inyi, echiidima iwa mloshe okopfo.
Kipfa nyi mndu ada o konu ili akundi iwika imba ling'anyi, alechidamia, naitale kuwooka, kokooya awewode shelimarisa?
Kulawone kechiwooka ilisumia, na numa elechiidima ilimarisa, na wose wechiwona wawooke imtaluo.
Wahambe, ‘Mndu chu nyi alewooka isumia immba, nalakidime ilimarisa.’

Ang'u na kuipfo mangi echihenda shidenyi iwinzana na mangi ingi, alechiwooka idamia nadede chila, kokooya na ekaria imsembelia na wasoṟo wake shiku ikumi nawingane na ichu arie wasoṟo shiku makumi hawi?
Kawona alechimwidima, nyi echimdumia wasu ai kuleshe namterewe wawade ofoṟo.
Nyi wudo-ng'u na orio umu onu, echiidima iwa mloshe oko, alawooka ikuletsana na shilya awodepfo.”
“Chumwi nyi injicha, kyaindi kombona yamepuo nyiki kechiwiko-pfo ichie-se?
Ma yeewa-se iwiko mdemenyi ma kyalenyipfo, shile nyi ikumba ipfo nja wandu wachume-chume. Ichu awode madu heicho naicho.”
Wesana okamba na wanyiamari, iwa woose nyi wawekemchea, kundu wamwadanyie.
Wafarisayo na walaanyi wa shitabu wakarihinyika wakahamba; “Ichu nyi ekeambia wanyamaṟi na ilya kalya nawo.”
Nao kawawia ifano-li kahamba.
“Nyi mndu uhya o konu awode machoondi hake ihana, limu-ho lideke, alechida halya makumi kenda na kenda ipfo patenyi nahende iwatiṟa lilya lidekie itane aliwona?
Nao kameliwona, kalihekia makoso-hu hake amchihiye.
Kamecha na kanyi kalaha wambuya na wa mṟasa kawawia, ‘Kechihiyonyi-wo kimu na inyi, kipfa ngamewona ichoondi lilya lyako liwedekie.’
Ngamuwia, ‘Na wudo kochiwada sia kulya ruwehu kya mndu umu mnyamaṟi adumbuya kota kya wandu wecha makumi kenda na kenda walasaṟie idumbuya.’ ”
“Ang'u nyi mndu mka uhya awode shilingi tsake ikumi, ikadeka-ho imu, alechiatsa taa naahie ipfo mba, napfule wo-laalya itane aiwona?
Na kameiwona kalaha wambuya wake na waka wa mṟasa kawawia, ‘Ke chi-hionyi-wo hamu na inyi, kipfa ili ngamewona shilingi iya yako iwedekie.’
Na inyi nyi ngamuwia, ‘Na wudo kochiwa sia ko wamalaika wa Ruwa kya mndu umu mnyamaṟi adumbuya.’ ”
Kahamba-se, “Mndu awewode wana ake wa womi wawi.
Ulya manawo kahenda iwia ndee, ‘Wande, njinenga ohawi loko lo masaa lulya luwechinjisumhanyia.’ Nao kawahawia shindo shilya shake.
Kukaida mfiri sa mwangu, mana ulya lyamkeku kakungura shindo shilya shose kahenda-samia oruka lo kuleshe. Kundu kulya kaola-ola masaa halya hake kui shindo sha seṟeṟia, kawa mseṟeṟi.
Nao kekimaa yola-ola shoose, kukacha njaa ing'anyi kulya orukenyi. Nao kawooka iwuṟa shetawulya moo pichu.
Kahenda ikuwada na msuṟi umu o walya wa kulya orukenyi; nao kamduma mdemenyi foke, nahende ilisa nguwe.
Kalanga iihutsa ndeu yake na makanda hekelio nyi nguwe tsilya, indi nalainengo nyi mndu.
Kawuya itawuka mrima kahamba, ‘Nyi waikelei wenga wa wande oko wawode kando kawo kaingiki, na inyi njipfiia njaa kunu wai!
Njechikure njihende ko wande oko njimbie, Wande, njilenyamaṟia ruwehu na sumuhana na iyo.
Ma njikisumhanyi ilaho nyi mana opfo-sepfo; kekunjihaluye umu o waikelei wapfo.’ ”
Naalyo kakure kahenda kulya ko ndeye. Akeri handu sa haleshe alameshika, ndee kambona, kamwichio wukiwa, kakambia, “Kamchunguṟia nzingonyi, wakahekiana momu.
Mana kambia, ‘Wande, nyi njilenyamaṟa huye ruwehu na sumuhana na iyo; ma njikisumhanyi ilaho nyi manopfosepfo.’
Kyaindi ndeye kawia masinga hake, ‘Kambienyi owinyi muhende yende nguwo ya wuitoṟi iya ichihiye tsingi mumṟike, muwembika na rachi ipfo kimnyonyi kyake na shaadu ipfo madende.
Muhende yende na ihache lilya linoru mulishinjie,’ lulye, luchihio.
Kipfa mana-chu oko nyi awepfie kawuya iṟuka, nyi awedekie, kawuya iwoneka. Naho wakawooka ichihiyo.
Kyaindi mana ulya oke mbee nyi mdemenyi aweei; achepfo ashikie kufui na kanyi, kaicho shinanda na ṟingi.
Kalaha-ho ileu limu kaliwesa, ‘Nkiki ikyo?’
Nalyo likambia, ‘Nyi mananu acha na ndeyo kashinja ihache lilya linoru, kipfa kya ili awuya imbona ai na oru.’
Nao kaichuo nyashi, nalakunde ma iida napfo. Kyasia ndee kaida na ipfo nja kamlemba-lemba.
Nao kahaluo, kawia ndee, ‘Keambuya; kiṟa mbeikuṟundia maka ifoi ido, na inyi njilemetehiye ma wuwawaso wopfopfo, ma iyo kulemennenge wudahina wo wuoṟo njihende ma ikuchihiṟanyia na wambuya wakopfo.
Kyaindi wulalu omekewona mana-chu opfo ache ichu aolye masaa hapfo ai na shisaya na weṟuhuyo, ate o nyi omshinjia ihache lilya linoru!’
Nao kambia, ‘Manoko, iyo nyi ukeri na inyi shiheri shoose, na ishi njiwode na shapfo shoose.
Kyaindi nyi kiwewaṟi ichihio na ikeseka, kyamba mana-cho oko nyi awepfiie kawuya iṟuka, nyi awedekie kawuya iwoneka.’ ”
Kyasia kawia na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake; “Kuwekeri-pfo mndu msuṟi awewode mwiṟichi oke momringia kanyi, o kakumbo koke ke nyi ekeola-ola masaa hake.
Kamlaha kambia, ‘Nyi kiki iki ngaicho kyapfo; kenjiloṟa itala lya shindo sha wuiṟichi wopfo, kipfa nyi njiwonyii ochiidima-se injihidiapfo.’
Mhidi ulya kahia ipfo mrimenyi koke, ‘Nyi wuda njechiwika ngesa, ili mndumii oko anjifuna wuhidinyi? Idema njechiidimapfo, na yeṟeṟa nyi njechiwado nyi sonu tseeṟeṟa.
Hoo! Ngamemanyia chando njechiwika, kundu ili njechiwuto wuhidinyi wanjiambie, wanjiitse na mba kowo.’
Kyasia kalaha wasile wa mndumii oke wose umu-umu kawia ulya o kuwooka, ‘Nyi sile ya kiki uwode ya mndumii?’
Nao kahamba, ‘Nyi matanaki ihana ha mafuda.’ Nao kambia, ‘Ambia baruo yapfo nodamie, noṟehie-ho owinyi fara makumi hatanu,’
Kawia na ulya ungi, ‘A iyo nyikiki uwode?’ Nao kahamba, ‘Nyi mkunja ihana ya ngano.’ Nao kambia, ‘Nga baruo yapfo noṟehiye-ho makumi nyanya.’
Kyasia mndumii ulya kaṟumisha mwiṟichi ulya awenyamaṟie, kipfa lilya alewuta ado na wuṟango; kipfa wana wa wuyana-wu wo wulalu nyi wa-waṟango kota wana wa sa ipfo sumuhana na kishari kyawo wawenyi.”

Nyi wudo-ng'u na inyi ngamuwia, “Kehenda kuwadienyi mbuya na shindo sha mamona ya wuwicho, kundu ili shechishika isenekia, wamwambie, wamdamiṟe alyando kochikao mlungana mandi-ho masaa hanu hechimdekia.
Ichu ai mhendeli o shindo shangu, nechiwa na mhendeli o shindo shifoi.
Na ichu atahacha kindo sa kitutu, nechiwa motahacha na kindo king'anyi?
Akashika mkada mlaiwahendeli kya mamona ya wuwicho, ichu echimasia sha lohi nyiiu?
Nanyo mulamewa wahendeli kya shindo sha wengi, aka-shika ichu echimwinenga shii shanu nyiu.”

Kwipfo mṟundi echidima ipfuṟukanyia womi wawipfo. Kipfa nyi wudi kechihendeka, “Nyi echisuo ichu o kuwooka, nakunde ulya o kawi, ang'u nakuwade na ichu o kuwoka, naisaluche ichu o kawi; Mochiima iṟundia iwa wawi; Ruwa na Mamonapfo.

Kyasia Wafarisayo walya waicho wado nawo nyiwe-wandu wawelangie mnu mapesa, wakakutsinyia kyake. Nao kawawia, ‘Nyo nyi mokekuhaluo wecha wasumhanyi oshangunyi lo wandu muwenyi, kyaindi Ruwa nyio aichi ngoo tsanu; cha-kipfa wutumbe wo ki-wandu nyi kindo kisuikie ko Ruwa.’
Mbonyi tsa wuwawaso na tsa waikimbi nyi tsileedio itane Yohane acha, na kiwookya-lyo nyi kokeongoyo mbonyi njicha tsa wumangi wo Ruwa, na orio mndu nyiekepario-pfo na pfinya.
Nyi kyaangu ruwehu na sanga shisaramaye, kota kimṟeho kimu kya wuwawaso kechideka.
Orio mndu alekana na mka oke kaalika ungi nyiaṟuhuya; na ichu echialika ulya alekana na mii, nyiaṟuhuya.”
“Kuwekeri mndu msuṟi awekeṟaa nguwo tsa king'aring'ari na tsa kimamile tsa owiṟo pang'a, kawa mokukesekia na shiweṟe mkonu yose.
Na mndu mkiwa, rina lyake nyi Lasaro awe-mkumbe alya mongo koke, nao nyi awewodo nyi matiinga,
kalanga ikuihutsio nyi shipeṟengu-sho shechioloka ipfo mese-hu ya mruṟi ulya. Kyaindi na shite itane shacha shikamkomba-komba matiiga halya.
Kukashika, mkiwa ulya kapfa, kahenda-dao nyi wamalaika kulya nndenyi tsa Abrahamu. Na msuṟi ulya kawepfa, kaṟiko.
Msuṟi ulya akeri kulya kundu ko wapfu mawukiwenyi, kairia meso kawona Abrahamu kuleshe, na Lasaro ai ipfo nndenyi tsake.

Kalesha ṟu, kamlaha kahamba, ‘Hoi wande oko Abrahamu! Kenjisaṟia-wo wukiwa, nokeduma Lasaro nakape kimdo kya kimnyo kyake mṟingenyi nache injioloṟa olimi-lu; kipfa ili njiilya mnu wukiwa kunu ngumienyi ya modo-fu.’ ”

Abrahamu kahamba, “Manoko, kekumbuo-wo chando iyo kuwei-yambia mecha hapfo lilya mandi uwei na moo orukenyi, na Lasaro kyake kaambia mawawio tupu na wuale, nao wulalu iya nyi aiwihiṟyo moo na iyo kowawiṟo.
Ma koda isho shoose, kunu kiidi kyadu nanyo nyi kung'alawukie-ho pichi lya ngolokio ing'anyi, kundu iwo wakundi yambadia ipfo konu walaidime, na iwo wa konu walaidime yambadia kodu.
Nao kahamba, ‘Kyakusiia, indi ngakuterewa, ndeyako, nokekumdumia kulya kanyi ko wande.
Kipfa nyi njiwode wanawawama wako watanu, nakehenda iwakekedia, kundu wo walawone wechicha-se na kundo-ku ko mawukiwa.’
Abrahamu kahamba, ‘Na wawode Mose na waikimbi wa Ruwa, leka wawaadanyie-wo.’
Nao kahamba, ‘Ote-wo, Abrahamu oko, ndeako, indi kokooya wacheyo nyi mndu o kunu ko wapfu, nalyondi wechidumbuya mrimenyi yawo.’
Abrahamu kambia, ‘Wakamda walaadanyia Mose na waikimbi wa Ruwa, na nokoe mndu awechiṟuka awuka ko wapfu, wawechiidikishopfo.’ ”
Kyasia Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Na kukaki kochida kulacha madekeshopfo, indi ochia lo ulya echihaende!
Nanga kapfungio iho lya iseo ipfo tsingonyi kapfuluyo ipalipalinyi, nlyondo kiwechichia kota ili adekesha umu o watutu.
Kuṟisenyi Kokoya manomayo akudekio, kemdedie! Kakutochia, mhooṟie.
Na kakudekio ka-mfungade mkonu fumu, nao kawewuya icha na-kopfo ka -mfungade ihamba, ngamedumbuya, kewemhooṟie.”
Wasu walya wakambia, “Mndumii, luengeṟie pfinya yeidikia Ruwa.”
Mndumii kahamba, “Kokoya mbewode iidikia ma litutu cha mbeu ya haradali, na muwechiwia mkuyu fu, kuṟuka iya, nokudonge ipalipalinyi!” Nafo nyi fuwechimwidikia.
“Indi nyiiu onu awode isinga lyake lyedema na mtambo fodema, ang'u molisa, nao kiheri acha awuka demenyi nambie, Kenjo owinyi nodamie?
Chi echimbia, ‘Njiomoya kando njilye! Kupfunge nonjihidie mṟasa njimae ilya na inyo; ngammaa ilya, nokulieng'u iyo kumonyi na inyo noweku nyooya.
Alae nyi awechiwia isinga lilya haika kipfa lyaṟunda kilya lyawawasio?
Kyasia, nanyo na wudo, mukamemarisa iwuta shoose mui wawawasie hambenyi, So nyi masinga halechiwa; shilya luwutie nyi shilya shiluwaṟi iwuta tupu.’ ”
Naalyo kukashika, lilya mandi awerie njia yehenda Yerusalemu, kaida kiidi kya Samaria na Galilaya.
Kekiida na kimṟinyi kimu, naaho wasoṟo ikumi mawawodo nyi saka wakamkumbuhana; wakahoṟoka aleshe.
Wakairia ṟu wakahamba, “Yesu! Mwaria! Kelusaṟie wukiwa!”
Nao kekiwawona kawawia, “Kuhendyenyi mukuloṟe kulya ko wakohanyi.” Wadi wechihenda-pfo wakaheṟemka.
Na umu owo-ho awona ke amchia, kawuya kaichimbira Ruwa na ṟu ling'anyi.
Kacha, kamhoya na kyamu alya madendenyi hake kamwana. Nao nyi-we o Samaria.
Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Walya waheṟemka chi ikumi; a walya kenda nyiku waya?
Kowoneka-se-ho ma sa wawuya wache iichika Ruwa shile na mhenu-chu tupu?”
Kambia, “Kure nokuhendie kanyi, nyi iidikia lyapfo lyakukiṟa.”
Lilyandi aleweso nyi Wafarisayo ke wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wochicha indi, kawahaluo kahamba, “Wumangi wo Ruwa wochicha wochikuloṟa-loṟa na wandupfo.
Manya wechihamba, aiwu iya, ang'u awulya kulyapfo; kipfa wumangi wo Ruwa nyi ipfo kidi kyanu wui!”
Kyasia, kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Nyi kochikaa kuche shiheri, nyilyondo mochilanga iwona mfiri fumu fo Mana o mndu, manya mulechifuwona.
Na sa wechimuwia, Ambuyenyi iya, ambuyenyi ipfo; ma mlakure handu mui muhendepfo.
Kipfa chando mbawa yekewaṟuka ikawooka ora-lu likakooya ora lungi, ikalimikia shoose shii kunu shi ya ruwehu, nyi wudo na kya Mana o mndu kechiwa mkonu-fo foke echicha nafo.
Kyaindi kuwooka nyi kimbaṟi ituuro mnu na ileho nyi wandu wa oshari-lu.
Na chando kulewa shiheri shilya sha Noe, na wudo kochikaa kuwe mkonu iya ya Mana o mndu.
Nyi wawei ilya, wakawenyio, wakaalika, wakaaliko, itane mkonu fulya Noe aleida na kulya ngalawenyi, kukacha mra fukawakombetsa wose piu piu.
Nyi wudo shiwefananyi na kiheri kya Loti, nyi waweilya, wakawenyo, wakawehuṟa, wakawekumba, wakawewaaya, wakawewika mba.
Kyaindi mkonu Loti alewuto kulya sodoma, kukaoloka modo fo kibiriti-biriti ipfo ruwehu fukawarumatsa woose piu.
Na wudo-ng' tichi kochikaa kuwe mkonu fulya Mana o mndu echitarambuyo.
Mkonu fulya, ma mndu ai kai na masaa hake hai wanda, ma nalawone kesoka ihaira. Na wudo namndu ai mdemenyi, ma nalawuuye shii numa.
Kekumbuonyi-wo mka o Loti!
Orio mndu akundi ineneka mrima foke, nyi echifudetsa, na mndu alakundi ifunenekia, nyi echifuinutsia kipuo wyoo.
Ngamuwia, kio kilya kilya, wandu wawi walee kitaṟehu kimu, umu-ho nyi echiiroho, na icho ungi nadeoho.
Na waka wawi waisea handu hamu, umuho nyi echiiroho, na ungi nadeo-ho. [
Wawi wechikooyo wai demehu, umu-ho nairoho, na odoe nadeo-ho.]”
Wakahaluo wakambia, “Nyiku Mndumii.” Nao kawawia, “Handu hai mnying'a, nyi'hondo mtonyi (mosuṟa) yekekuwumbia.”
Kawawia ifano lyehamba, n'kimuwaṟi iterewa kitsitsi mlechilemo.
Kahamba, “Kundu ko mṟinyi kuweepfo mchili modumbuo mondu, alaweowoye Ruwa ma ikusaṟa kya mndu ma uhya.
Kuweepfo-se na mka mkusu kulya mṟinyi, kawa mohenda-henda ko mchili ulya modumbuo mondu kahamba, ‘Dumbuo-wo mondu foko na mosile chu oko!’
Nao nalakunde, kambetesa haleshe. Numa kawuya ihamba ipfo mrimenyi koke, ‘Ngakaa njilaowoye Ruwa, na ikusaṟa kya mndu ma uhya.
Kyaindi ili mka-chu anjichungia-chungia adi kitsitsi, na njimweke idumbuo mondu foke, kundu nalawone kefurumia icha injiraha-raha kyamu.’ ”
Mndumii kahamba, “Keadanyenyi mchili-chu modumbuo mondu kilasumhanyi chando ahamba.
Aka Ruwa awechidumbuo mondu fo iwo awasambuṟie, iwo wekemfuhia mfiri na kio? A ngesa nyi echiwawetesa?
Nyi ngamuwia, nyi echikambiṟa idumbuo mondu fowo owinyi. Nyi mohamba muda? Ili Mana o mndu echicha na echiwona ofoṟo orukenyi?”
Kuweepfo wandu wawekusaṟye kyawo wawenyi ke nyi wai wecha wasumuhanyi, wakapiṟa wengi; kawawia ifano-li,
“Wandu wawi waledo na hekalunyi iterewa Ruwa; umu nyi Mfarisayo, na o kawi nyi mosana okamba.
Mfarisayo ulya kahoṟoka, katerewa mrimenyi koke adi, ‘Ruwa ngakuichika, kipfa ili njilafananyi na wandu wengi, wasoki, wa ukika, waṟuhui, ma ndafananyi na msanyii-cho o okamba.
Mfungade fumu nyi njekekuotoya kawi, na shilya njiwode shoose, ngawedambika kenga kya ikumi.’
Kyaindi msanyi ulya o okamba kahoṟoka haleshe, nalakarie ma iiiia meso huye ruwehu, indi kakukapa kipeeta kahamba, ‘Hoi Ruwa, kenjisaṟia-wo inyi mokudekio!’
Kyasia nyi ngamuwia, ‘Ichu nyi alesoka na kanyi koke amsumuhantse kota ulya.’ Chakipfa orio mokung'anyisha amonyi, nyi echinyiiṟo, na mokunyiiṟa amonyi, nyi eching'anyisho.”
Wakamwendie na shiwana, kundu nashipaaye. Walya wa kiloshionyi wekiwawona, wakawatukia.
Yesu kawalaha wache na koke kahamba, “Kelekenyi shiwana shikucheye na koko, ma mulashiime; cha kipfa wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wo iwo wai chasho.
Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, ‘Mndu alaambia wumangi wo Ruwa ai cha mana nechishika-pfopfo.’ ”
Kuwei-pfo mndu ang'anyi, kambesa kahamba, “Mlosha mcha, ngawika njida, njioṟe moo fo mlungana?”
Yesu kambia, “Nyikipfa-ki ili onyiilaha Mcha? Kuipfo mchapfo, shile Ruwa amonyi.
Mawawaso na uhaichi ke, ‘Ulaṟuhuye; Ulawaahe; Ulaiwe; Ulairie sha wongo; India ndeyo na mayo.’ ”
Nao kahamba, “Isho shose nyi njishiwode wookia wututu woko.”
Yesu aicho ado kambia, “Utsiheṟe kindo kimu henda kumba isho uwode shose nohawie wakiwa, nlyondi ochiwada kisa kulya ruwehu. Komemarisa, nocheng'u nonjioshe.”
Kekiicho ado kasokio mnu nyi fowa kakuinadia mnu, kipfa nyi awesuṟie mnu.
Yesu kekimbona ado kahamba, “Ambuyenyi chando kiumie wasuṟi ida na wumanginyi wo Ruwa!
Kipfa nyi kyangu ngamia iide ṟochenyi lya sindanu kota mndu msuṟi iida wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
Walya waleicho wakahamba, “Aka nyi mndu ada echikiṟo?”
kahamba, “Isho shilechiidimika ko wandu, ko Ruwa nyi shechiidimika.”
Petro kahamba, “Ambuya, so nyi luleda shindo shadu shoose, lukakuosha.”
Yesu kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, Kuwode mndu aleda mba ang'u mka, ang'u wanawamae, ang'u iwo wamfeye, ang'u wana, kipfa kya wumangi wo Ruwa.
Aleekaa nawihiṟio sha ngeria kafoi shiheri-shi shekaa iya wanda, na shiheri shechicha, nasumbo moo fo mlungana.”
Kyasia kasanza walya ikumi na wawi handu hamu kawawia; “Ambuyenyi, nyi lukeri-ng'u ido luhende kulya Yerusalemu, na shilya shii shiṟehie kya Mana o mndu nyi waikimbi wa Ruwa, nyi shechihoya shoose.
Kipfa nyi echihenda idambikio wandu wawicho, wamwisaluche, na imruma, na imwiselia mnyeri.
Wawemkapa na ngowa tsiwode msha, numa wambaahe. Nao mfiri fo kaṟaṟu nawuye iṟuka.”
Na iki walakimanyie ma kitung'tu. Idedo-lyo likawaṟikikia, walalimanye kimaduma, walamanye kilya lyahamba.
Lilya aweshikie kufui na Yeriko, adi a ichu mndu kipfupfuṟe adamie mbarinyi ya njia kechiterewa shiinengo.
Aicho tendemra ya wandu yechiida, kawesa, nkyo kiki ikyo?
Wakamwongoya ke nyi Yesu o Nasareti aiida.
Nao kakoṟoṟoma ilaha kahamba, “Hoi Yesu, mana o Dawidi, njisaṟia-wo wukiwa.”
Walya wawesonguo wakamkanga natsie. Kyaindi o kaengeṟa ilaha, “O mana o Dawidi, njisaṟiawo wukiwa mmbe!”
Yesu katirima, kawawasa naendo na alyando ai. Kekishika-ho, kambesa.
“Nyi kiki ukundi njikuwutie?” Nao kahamba “Nyi njiwuye yambuo-se Mndumii.”
Yesu kahamba, “Ambuo-se; nyi iidikia lyapfo lyakukiṟa.”
Naalyo kaambuo, kahenda nao kechiidapfuma Ruwa. Na wandu walya walewona, wakang'anyiisha Ruwa.
Kekishika kulya Yeriko, kaida na kulya mṟinyi.
Napfo kuwekeri-pfo mndu awelaho rina lyake nyi Sakayo, aweei mnene o wasanyi wa okamba, awewei msuṟi.
Kalanga iwona Yesu namanye chando ai, nalaidime; kipfa kya mamwingi fo wandu, nao nyi awe mfui wumba.
Kahenda kusonguo kechidicha, kado mkuyu-hu kundu nambone, kipfa njia nyi iweidie handu halya.
Yesu kekishika-ho, kaambuya huye, kambona, kambia, “Sakayo, soko-pfo owinyi faṟa; kipfa na ngaki, inu na njihende itsinda kulya mba kopfo.”
Nao kasoka-pfo owinyi faṟa, kamduo kanyi kokye amchihiye.
Na walya walewona, wakamnunuwia wakahamba “Nyi aida na ko mndu mnyamaṟi katsinda-pfo.”
Sakayo kahoṟoka, kawia Mndumii, “Ambuya Mndumii kenga kya masaa hako njiwode nyi njechiinenga wakiwa, na kokooya ndemlemba mndu kindo, nyi njechimbihiṟia kya ngeria kaana.”
Yesu kambia, “Kunu mmba komewoneka okiio kipfa nao amonyi nyi awei mana o Abrahamu.
Kipfa Mana o mndu nyi alecha ipfula kilya kidekie, nakikiṟe.”
Wandu wekiicho isho, nao kaengeṟa ideda kechiloṟa mfano, kipfa nyi awei afui na Yerusalemu, nawo wakakusaṟa kulako wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wochikuloṟa oweṟe lulya.
Kahamba, “Mndu o wumangi alehenda oruka lo kuleshe nawade-pfo wumangi, numa nawuye.
Kalaha wasoṟo wake ikumi, kawainengia mahana ikumi ha shilingi, kawawia, ‘Kape-kapenyi natso mbucha njitane ngawuya.’
Na wandu wa kulya mṟinyi nyi wawemsuo, wakaduma wasu ipfo numa yake wambie, ‘Lukundi ichu naluitoṟie-sopfo.’
Nao kekiidima iwada wumangi wulya, kawuya, kahamba wasoṟo walya alewainengia pesa tsilya, walaho wache na koke, kundu namanye sa aendie kindo kulya mbuchenyi.
Kukacha ulya o kuwooka kahamba, ‘Mndumii, shilingi tsilya tsapfo ihana tsileṟimiṟa tsingi mahana ikumi.’
Nao kambia, ‘Hoona! Iyo msoṟo mcha, kipfa ui mṟeheṟi o shindo shitutu, wa-ng'u mwitoṟi o mṟi ikumi.’
Kukacha o kawi, kahamba, ‘Mndumii, shilingi tsapfo ihana tsileende tsingi mahana hatanu.’
Kawewia na ichu, ‘Na iyo kewewa-ng'u mwitoṟi o mṟi itanu.’ ”
“Kukacha ungi owo kahamba, ‘Mndumii, ambuya, aitsi shilingi tsapfo ihana. Nyi njiwetsipfungie ipfo kidaminyi kya mbiṟuko.
Kipfa njikuowoye ili ukeri mndu mkeremi, nyiokekuiria kindo kulaleṟie-ho, kowesambuo sa kulawaaye.’
Nao kambia, ‘Na madedo ha dumbu lyapfo nyihechikuwonyia naho owingo, iyo msoṟo mbicho. Nyi uweichi ke nyi njii mndu mkeremi, njekekuiria kindo njilaleṟie na isambuo sa njilawaaye.
Aka nyikili kulaleduo pesa tsako ko menyi mokumba shindo? Na ili njiwechiwuya nyi njiwechitsiambia na tsa ngeria.’
Kawia walya wawe-ho, ‘Msokenyi shilingi-tso ihana, mwinengie icho awode mahana ikumi.’
Wakambia, ‘Mndumii, nyi awode mahana ikumi!’
‘Na inyi nyi ngamuwia, Orio sa awode echiengeṟa inengo, na ulya alawode, nyi echisoko na kilya awode.
Na wakituwa walya wako, walakundi njiwaitoṟie, waendenyi na iya muwarandwo-randwo njiwonyi!’ ”
Kekimaa ihamba ado, kaengeṟa iwada njia yedo na Yerusalemu.
Kekishika hafui na Betifage na Betanyia, alya kufui na fumwu lya mashidi ha msinepfu, naalyo kaduma wasu wake wawi, kawawia;
“Hendenyi kulya mṟinyi fui mambatsana nanyo. Mkameida napfo nyi mochiwona-pfo ihache lya nzoi li-ipfunge, ilalembawe mndu ma umu, mulipfunguo-ho, munjiendie.
Na kokooya mndu ambesa, Nyikili molipfunguo-ho, mbienyi, nyi Mndumii alikundi.”
Na walya waledumo wakakure, wakahenda, wakawona chando alewawia.
Wechifunguo ihache lilya lyo nzoi, wenyi-lyo wakawawia, “Nyikili mopfunguo ihache-lyo?”
Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi Mndumii aliwodie iṟunda.”
Wakaliduo ko Yesu; wakaliala nguwo tsawo, wakadosiaho Yesu.
Kechihenda ado, wakamwalia nguwo tsawo kulya njiehu.

Lilya aleshika kufui na msaṟi fulya fo fumvu lya mashidi ha msinepfu, naalyo siṟi iya ya wandu wa kiloshionyi kyake yose ikawooka ichihio na iadapfuma Ruwa na maṟu hang'anyi kipfa kya ṟiho tsilya tsa pfinya waletsiwona tsose.
Wakahamba, “Naleheke ichu mocha iwa mangi kui rina lya Mndumii; ruwehu nyi ofoṟo, na kiṟumi kikae huye ruwehu!”
Kyasia, kulya mamwinginyi kuwekeri-pfo Wafarisayo maata, wakambia, “Mlosha, kanga iwo wa kiloshionyi kyapfo!”
Nao kahaluo kahamba, “nyi ngamuwia, Kokoya iwa watsia, maho na hechikoṟoṟoma.”
Ashika kufui na yafukia, kawona mṟi fulya kafulilia.
Kahamba, “A kulamanya-wo na iyo mfiri-fu fo inu mbonyi-tso tsiwechikuendie ofoṟo! Kyaindi ulalu shameṟiko mesonyi hapfo ulawonyi.
Cha kipfa nyi kochikaa kukuhoye mafiri, nlyondo wakituwa wapfo wechikuṟingichia na mfoo na ikutengetia na ikufiṟita kose kose.
Nawo nyi wechimuwunduya wanda na wana wapfo wai ipfo kiidi kyapfo, wamuole-ole walechida ma iho likae huya iho lingi, kipfa ulalemanya shiheri shilya ulesahio!”
Kaida na hekalunyi, kawooka ifuna-pfo sa wawei ikumbia-pfo shindo.
Kawawia, “Nyiki kiṟehie, ‘Mba yako iwe mba yeterewia,’ nanyo mkawuya iihaluo opango lo wasoki!”
Nao kawa molosha handu halya haele orio mkonu, Indi wakohanyi wanene na walaanyi wa wuwawaso na wanene wa wandunyi wakashiha mwaanya fomrumatsa.
Walawone kembutia; kipfa wandu wafoi wawewatiṟanyi nao wechimwadanyia.
Kukashika, ili mkonu fumu kechilosha wandu kulya hekalunyi, na yonguo mbonyi tsa sia, kukacha wakohanyi, na walaanyi wa shitabu warianyi na wameeku.
Wakadeda nao, wakambia “Keluwie, Ishi nyi uiwuta kui pfinya ida? A kingise, nyiu akuinengie pfinya-i?”
Kahaluo kawawia “Na inyi na njimuwesa kidedo kimu, munjihaluo,
wupatiso wo Yohane nyi ruwehu wuwukie ang'u nyi ko wandu?”
Wakakusaṟa-saṟa wo wenyi na wenyi ke, lukahamba nyi ruwehu wuwukie, nao nyiechihamba, a nyiki ili mlalemwidikia?
Na lukahamba, ko wandu, wandu wose nyi wechilukumbia maho, kipfa wakusirie ke Yohane nyi mwikimbi o Ruwa.
Wakahaluo, “Luichi kundu wuwukiepfo.”
Na Yesu kawawia, “Ma inyi njiechimuwia pfinya-i njeketana nayo ishipfo.”
Kyasia kawooka iwia wandu ifano-li, “Mndu awedemie mdemi fo msabibu; kafudambikia wefulimia, kahenda orukenyi lungi ikaa-pfo mfiri ifoi.
Kiheri kya ndunda tsambiṟa, kaduma msoṟo oke nahende ko walya welimia, kundu wamnengie ndunda tsintowe kulya msabibunyi; na walya welimya wakamkapa, wakamwinutsa wulya.
Kawuya iduma msoṟo ungi; wakawemkapa-se na imwinyala, wakamfuna alarie kindo.
Kaengeṟa iduma, kaduma-se o kaṟaṟu; nawo wakambika shifaṟe wakamfunyia nja.
Menyi dema lya msabibu kahamba, ‘Ngawika njida? Nyi njechiduma mana-chu oko mkunde; kofia ichu nyi wechimwowuo!’
Walya welimia wambona, wakakusaṟa na ideda kyama wo wen na wenyi wakahamba, ‘Hoona ichu nyio mokyora, nndenyi lumbahe-ng'u, kundu na kyora-kyo kechiwa kyadu!’
Wakamkumbalya nja ya mdemi fulya fo sabibu, wakambaaha, ‘Kyasia, menyi dema lilya lya msabibu nyi echiwawutia ada ngesa?’ ”
“Nyi echicha nawarumatse, na msabibu iya nadambikie wengi.” Na walya waleicho wakahamba, “Kilahendeke kido!”
Nao kawaambuya wowatuma kahamba, “A idedo-lyo li iṟehie lyehamba, Iho lilya wandu wewika mba walelisuo, nyilyong'u lilewa iho ling'anyi lya ndumbenyi; kimaduma kya idedo-lyo nkiki?”
“Orio moho huye ya iho-lyo nyiechifunjika-funjika; na ichu mohoyo nyi iho-lyo, nyi lyechimsonohotsa.”
Walaanyi wa shitabu na wakohanyi wakakunda imleshia mawoko wambade kiheri kilya kilya, indi wakaowuo wandu, kipfa nyi walemanya ke ifano lilya nyi lyahambo kipfa kyawo.
Wakambikya ndeheka, wakamdumia wemsoṟa wokulembetseṟa ke nyi wai wecha wasumhanyi na wucha, kundu wawone mti fo madedo hake wahende imdambika wuchilinyi na pfinyenyi ya mchili mwitoṟi o oruka.
Wakambesa kindo kemsoruo, wakahamba, “Mlosha, nyi luichi nyi okededa kisumhanyi na ilosha kisumhanyi, ma ulekeambuya shamu sha wandu; na njia tsa Ruwa kolosha chando tsii lohi.
So na kilusumhanyie iwikia kaisari kodi ang' ote?”
Nao kamanya mkoṟo yawo, kawawia,
“Kenjiloṟenyi shilingi. Nyi iwode ofano lou na mṟeho nyi fou?” Wakahamba, “Nyi sha kaisari.”
Nao kawawia, “Keinengyenyi kaisari ishi sha kaisari; na Ruwa mbemnenga isho shi sha Ruwa.”
Manya walaidime imdeha na madedo hake alya oshangunyi lo wandu, wakaṟihio mhaluye foke, wakatsia.
Kuwekeri-pfo na Wasadukayo wawekekaṟuo ke kuipfo iṟuka lya wapfupfo, wakacha na koke wakambesa.
Wakahamba, “Mlosha, Mose nyi aleluṟehia ke; kokoya mndu, manomae apfa kada mka alawode mana, manomae naoṟe mkachu, kundu nawonyie manomae luwa.
Kyasia kuweepfo wasoṟo mfungade wa mndu umu; ulya mmbee kaduo mka, kapfa kada mka ulya alawode mana.
Mka ulya kadao nyi ulya momwituma.
Na ulya o kaṟaṟu naawo, kikahendeka kido, itame wapfa woose mfungade walade ma mana,
Mainukionyi na mka ulya kawepfa.
Kyasia, maṟutsionyi ha wapfu, mka -chu nyi echiwa o uhya-ho? Kipfa woose mfungade nyi waweei wamii wa mkachu.”
Yesu kawawia, “Nyi wana wa wuyana wu nyiwo sa wekealika na yaliko.
Kyaindi walya wechinengo ishika wuyana wulya na iṟutso ko wapfu, wo wechialika ma yalikopfo.
Kipfa ma ipfa wechikipfapfo; kipfa wo nyi wechiwakana na malaika, wawewa na wana wa Ruwa, kifa wai wa kirukionyi.
Kyaindi kui kipfa kya wapfu, ke nyi wechiṟutso, ma Mose na alewetongio ipfo isikinyi kiheri Mndumii alemlaha. Kamhamba, Ruwa o Abrahamu na Ruwa o Isaki na Ruwa o Yakobo.
Ruwa chi o mnying'apfo, indi nyi o wai na moo. Kyamba iwo wai ma moo woose nyi wai-ho kipfa kyake.”
Wengi wa walanyi wa shitabu wakahaluo wakahamba, “Mlosha, iyo nyi odambuo necha.”
Nawo walelekaria-se imbesa kindo.
Kyasia kawawia, “A nyi wuda ili wandu wekehamba ke Kristo nyi mana o Dawidi?
Nao Dawidi nyi ahambie amonyi ipfo kitabunyi kya shimbo kehamba, ‘Mndumii nyi alewia mndumii oko, Kedamia kuwokonyi koko ko kulyo.’ ”
“Njitane ngaleṟia wakituwa wapfo, wanda madendenyi hapfo.”
“Alae, komkooya Dawidi nyi amlahiye nyi Mndumii, nyi wudaechiwa-se manoke?”
Kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wandu walya wawei imwadanya waichio wose.

“Kuṟisenyi kya walaanyi wa shitabu, iwo wakundi ichumia waṟee nguwo tsa mkuruo tsekulembetseṟa, wokulefuo, wawekundi iṟikiṟio nyi wandu ipfo tumo; na ipfo sinagogenyi nyi wakundi-pfo shidembo sha kusonguo; na wakalaho shelyenyi wakasambuṟa alya ko wasuṟi.
Nyi wekelya mba tsa waka wakusu wakatsimaa, na kwi wulembetseṟi wakakurihiria ihamba ke nyi lokemterewia. Iwo! Iwo, nyi wechikaa wawonyio owingo ngoseṟa.”
Nao kairia meso, kawona chando wasuri wechiwika shindo sha nnga ipfo sandukunyi lya njodambiko.
Kawewona na mka umu mkiwa, ai mkusu kechiwika-pfo shisenti shiwi.
Kahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, Mka-chu mkiwa ai mkusu, nyi awika-pfo kya ngoseṟa kota woose.
Chakipfa iwo woose nyi wawuta ipfo mfoeṟenyi fo masaa hawo, kyaindi ichu, ipfo wukiwenyi woke, nyi adambika shoose ashiwode, isho shiwechimbanza moo foke.”
Na wandu wengi nyi wawei ikapa sumu tsa hekalu lilya chando liweishele necha na maho mecha na mchopie ingi iwenji sanzie-pfo nao kahamba.
“Kya ishi muyambuya wulalu, nyi kochikaa kuche shiheri, kulechideo ma iho huya iho lingi lilaiwunduye wanda.”
Wakambesa wakahamba, “Mlosha, nyi indi isho shechikaa shishike; na kitaanyio kyasho nyi kiki ili shechikaa shiwe?”
Nao kahamba, “Ambuyenyi mlawone mochidetseṟo; kipfa nyi kochicha wafoi kui rina lyako wahambe nyio inyi; wawehamba, Kiheri kyamesembelya. Manya mulahende ilungana nawo!
Nanyo ili mochiicho mbonyi tsa shida na tsa shipfulu-pfulu sha wandu, ma mlawuko nyi madima. Kipfa shindo-shi na shikaki na shikae shiwooke iwutika, indi, imarisio lyechicha owinyi lidopfo.”
Naalyo kawawia, “Wandu wa mbaṟi imu nyi wechiapfinyiana na mbaṟi ingi, na wumangi na wumangi wungi.

Na handu hengi na hengi nyi kochiwoneka na shidihinyisha-shi shing'anyi, na kungi na kungi njaa na ndaaṟe tseambukia, kuwewoneka na makindo hechikangaṟitsa wandu; na riho tsing'anyi tsioweshie tsiwoneke huye ruwehu.

Kyaindi kuwooka, isho shoose shilameshika, nyi wechimuitsa kiterengionyi wamukape na imufuna, wawemduo masinagogenyi na mengenyi, wamuhoṟotse oshangunyi lo wamangi na lo wachili waitoṟi, nakyo nyi kipfa kya rina lyako.
Ishi nyi shechimuwonekia nyo kundu muidime injiṟingishya.
Mukuteṟye ipfo mrimenyi konu ke mulawooke ihia kekuashuo.
Kipfa ipfo madumbunyi hanu nyi inyi njechimbikia-pfo madedo ha wuṟango, na iwo wemkaṟuo wose, wechidima ihakaṟuo ma ihakanapfo.
Nanyo nyimocheṟiingio na nyi wafee na wanawamaanu, na wodoyanu wa kishari na wakunde wanu.
Nanyo nyi mochisuikia wandu woose kui kipfa kya rina lyako.
Kyaindi ma ochui lumu lochimdekia mdonyi konupfo.
Damiṟenyi mrima yanu kui ikutirisya.”
“Kyaindi ili mochiwona mṟi fo Yerusalemu fochitengetio nyi masiṟi, wutenyi-ho imanya, kiheri kyafo kenyamaṟo kyamshika.
Kiherikyo sa wakeri kulya Yudaya, wadichie nja; na iwo wai nja, ma walawuye napfo.
Kipfa shiherisho, nyisho shewuwuya kisecha, kundu shilya shii shiṟehie shishike shoose.
Kyaindi ochia nyi lo waka walya wekooyo waai walemo na weonza mandi-ho! Kipfa iya wuyana nyi kochiwada kiwi king'anyi, ili wa oshari-lu wechiwuwuyo kui nyashi ing'anyi.
Wengi nyi wechiwooho kui njoshu, wengi wadao wafungo njosharinyi tsose. Na Yerusalemu ideo yechichumo-chumo nyi wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu, itane shiheri sha mbaṟi-tso njihenu shainutsio.”

“Kochiwoneka na ṟiho tsa njofano ipfo mnengeṟinyi na merinyi na nyenyerinyi, na iya wuyana wandu wa mbaṟi tsoose nyi wechikapo ngoo walechimanya kimaduma, kipfa masinanu ha ipalipali nyi hechiengeṟa ihaluka-haluka na idihina.
Wandu nyi wechiuma ndadya kwi kitewe kya wuowu na iwedia shilya shechihoya wuyana; kipfa pfinya tsa ruwehu nyi tsechisingitso-singitso.
Kiheri-kyo, nlyondo wechiwona Mana o mndu kechicha ario nyi ipuchi, awode pfinya na kiṟumi king'anyi.
Kyasia, ili isho shechiwooka iwa, kekuheluonyi, mbeiria mdo yanu huye, kyamba momshika hafui na iletso.”
Kawawia ifanano, “Keambuyenyi mkuyu-fo, na orio mashidi hengi hoose.
Mukamewona haoṟa, nyi mokemanya mbenyi ke, kiheri kya masambuyonyii kyameshika hafui.
Nyi wudo nanyo, mkamewona shindo-sho shamewooka iwa, manyenyi ke, wumangi wo Ruwa womshika afui.
Nyi lohi ngambia; Oshari-lu lochiarisika manya-lepfo, na kutane ishi shawutika.
Ruwehu na oruka nyi shechikaa shimande, kyaindi madedo hako hechimandapfo.”
“Kyasia, kuṟisenyi, mulawone ngoo tsanu tsechilemeṟo nyi itandaluo ndeu na wunanzi na mawinyisha ha wanda-i, mfiri fulya fuwone fochimutowokia mulakusirie.
Kipfa chando mdeho fokerakuo, nyi kechichea woose handu hose wai kunu wuyana.
Nanyo, laenyi dembo mfiri yoose mochiterewa, kundu muidime ikuashuo isho shoose shikundi iwa, na ihoṟoka alya sumuhana na Mana o mndu.”
Kyasia, nao orio mkonu, ili mfiri, nyi awekewa molosha kulya hekalunyi, kukameila kakure-pfo kahenda ilaa kulya fumvunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu.
Wandu woose wakawemchea ngamenyi kilawo kundu wamwadanyie.
Kyasia, kukatikiria mkonu mnene fo mkate ilamtarang'ashe; fulya fumlahe nyi fo pasaka.
Na wakohanyi wang'anyi na walaanyi wa shitabu wakashiha mweke fombaaha; kipfa nyi waweowoye wandu.
Kyaindi Satana kahenda yososa Yuda ulya amlahe Iskariote, nao nyi umu o walya ikumi na wawi.
Kakure, kahenda ideda na wakohanyi wanene na wachili walya wa wasikari, kundu namdambike mawokonyi hawo.
Nawo wakachihio, wakaidikiana nao kya pesa wechimnenga.
Nao kaidikia na pata, kashiha mweke fomdambika kundu wandu walamanye.
Koikishika mkonu fulya fo mkate ilamtarang'ashe, nafo nlyondo kokedaso kidahina kya Pasaka.
Kaduma Petro na Yohane, kawawia, “Hendenyi muluteseheṟie handu lochiliia kiidahina kya pasaka.”
Nawo wakambia, “Nyiku ukundi luhede isungusia, Mndumii?”
Nao kawawia, “Ili mochiida na kulya mṟinyi, nyi mochikumbuhanana na mndu arie nungu ya mṟinga, mwoshenyi, itane kulya mba kundu echiida napfo?
Muwie ichu menyi mba, Mlosha nyi akuwesa, nyi'ku kui mba yekaa, kundu njiliie-ho Pasaka hamu na wa kiloshionyi kyako?
Nao nyi echimlora kiriha kinene ki-kyale nguwo; nyipfo-ndo mochilusungusia.”
Nawo wakahenda, wakawewona chando alewewawia, wakawaṟeheria-pfo kidahina kya Pasaka.
Kiheri kikashika, kacha idamia shelyenyi hamu na wakiloshionyi kyake.
Kahamba, “Nyi mbelangie mnu ngawewado na nyi macha helya nanyo Pasaka-i ili ndameshika mawawiṟionyi hako.
Kipfa nyi ngamuwia; Njechilya-se ma ntapfo, na iwede ishika ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
Kaira kirahu kiichuo mwinyo, kakiterewia, kakiwainengia kahamba, “Ambienyi iki, hawianenyi mu-wenyi na wenyi.
Kipfa nyi ngamuwia, njechikinyo-se kya ndunda tsa msabibu wumangi wo Ruwa wulachapfo.”
Kaweira na mkate, kafuterewia, kafufunja kafuwainengia kahamba, “Ifu nyifo mbihu foko [fuimdambikio. Wutenyi iki kiwe ngumbuo yako.”
Na wudo kaweira na kirahu, wammaa ilya, kahamba, “Kirahu-ki nyi mkundano mhya fo ipfo samunyi yako impusuyo nyo.]
Kyaindi ambuyenyi owoko lo monjiṟiingia ailu lui kunu mesenyi hamu na inyi.
Mana o mndu na echihenda njia yake chando amteṟie, kyaindi ochia lo mndu ulya momṟiingia.”
Naalyo wakawooka iwesana wo wenyi na wenyi, “Iya kodu-so nyiu echiwuta iki?”
Kukaweamka na marekiano ipfo kambenyi lyawo ke, nyiu o kambenyi lyadu ai mnene kaida wengi.
Nao kawawia, “Wamangi wa mbaṟi tsa wandu nyi wekewaitoṟia, na iwo waapfinya ipfo kowo wakalaho nyi wandu wang'anyi.
Nyo, ma mlawone mochiwa mudo. Indi ichu ang'anyi ipfo kambenyi lyanu nakutane cha mtutu, na ichu ai msongoru, nawecha mopfuṟukanyia.
Kipfa ang'anyi nyi uhya, nyi ulya adamie ailya a nyi ulya momwendiye? Chi ichu adamie ailya? Kyaindi inyi kambenyi lyanu nji cha mopfuṟukanyia.
Nanyo nyinyo mulewatiṟana na inyi kulya maheshionyi hako.
Na inyi nyi ngamdambikia wumangi, chando na Wande oko anjidambikie inyi.
Muwe welya na wenyo mesenyi yako ipfo wumanginyi woko; nanyo nyi mochikaa mudamie maloṟike-hu ha wusuṟi mochichilia njoshari-tso ikumi na tsiwi tsa Israeli.”
Kyasia kahamba, “Simon, oo Simon, keambuya, Satan nyi amkundi nyo namuwiwite chando mokeela ngano.
Kyaindi inyi ngamekuterewia, kundu iidikia lyapfo lilamande; na iyo komewanga, wanza wanawamayo.”
Nao kambia, “Mndumii, nyi hamu na iyo! Nyi njikuteseheṟie ihenda na iyo kipfungonyi ma opfunyi.”
Nao kambia, “Nyi ngakuwia Petro, olong'onyi lochikapa inu kulamaa injikana kaṟaṟu ke, Unjiichipfo.”
