Kawawesa, “A mandi halya ndemduma mlarie kichoṟe ma kikuchu ma shadu, kuipfo kindo mulewuṟa ma kimu?” Wakahamba, “Ma kimu lulewuṟapfo?”
Kawawia, “Kyaindi ulalu ichu awode kichoṟe na kikuchu, nashiduo, na ichu alawode oshu nahende ikumba ikonya lyake nahuṟe oshu.
Cha kipfa ngamuwia, ‘Isho shi shii-ṟehie na shikaki na shikae shishike shewutikia iya koko. Nasho nyi ishi, katalio wanyamaṟinyi,’ kipfa isho shinjiwaṟi na shikae shiwutike.”
Nawo wakambya, “Mndumii, ambuya iya nyi kwiho njoshu tsiwi.” Nao kawawia, “Kyakusiia!”
Yesu kawuka-pfo kahenda kulya fumvunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu chando aweichiwie; na wa kiloshionyi kyake wakamwitung'ata.
Ameshika handu halya kawawia, “Terewenyi, mulashike iida kiheshonyi.”
O kahenda kyaada, handu ha mkumbie fo songoṟo, kapfira ndi, katerewa kahamba,
“Hoi Wande, kokukundia, njiashuo kirahu-ki, kyaindi kilahendeke channdo inyi njikundi, shile chando ukundi iyo.” [
Kacheyo nyi malaika awuka ruwehu kambanza.
Nao kakaa kelimbana na opfu, indi kaengeṟa mnu iterewa; itane mbiṟuko foke fowa cha matacha ha samu hetonyiikia wanda.]
Nao kakure kulya kiterewionyi kakooya walya wa kiloshionyi walee kitewe kya fowa.
Kawawia, “Kimaduma nyiki mukalaa? Kurenyi muterewe, mulawone mochida kiheshionyi.”
Kechededa ado, alamhutsa, kukacha wandu wafoi, na umu o walya ikumi na wawi, rina lyake nyi Yuda, awasongoe, kasembelia Yesu kamkomba.
Yesu kambia, “Yuda, na otana oṟingia Mana o mndu kochimkomba?”
Na walya wa weei nao wamṟingichie wekiwona chando kiiwa wakahamba, “Mndumii, lukawakapa na oshu?”
Odoyawo umu kamanya isinga lya mkohanyi ang'anyi, kasunukuṟa-ho kudu kulya ko kulyo.
Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Tsienyi wamarise kyawo!” Kapaaya kudu kulya, kamchiṟa.
Yesu kawia walya walecha immbada; nyi wakohanyi wang'anyi, na wachili wa hekalu na wame̱ku, “Nyi mokure na njooshu na nguwidi cha wandu wewatiṟa msoki.
Orio mkonu nyi njiwekeri nanyo ipfo hekalunyi ma mulanjileshie mawoko; kyaindi ii nyiyo sa yanu, nyihondo meema fuwodie pfinya.”
Wakambada, wakamduo, wakamwitsa na mba ko mkohanyi ang'anyi. Indi Petro kamiwata ai haleshe-leshe.
Wakaatsa modo alya osehu lo mkohanyi ang'anyi makiidi hawi wechioda, Petro kadamia alya kiidi kyawo.
Kisinga kika kekimbona, ai alya senyi ya modo, kikamtukuya, kikahamba, “Na ichu na awei nao.”
Kakana kahamba, “Wai, njimanya, njimwichipfo mae!”
Oweṟe ungi kambona kahamba, “Na iyo na umu-mbo owo-e?” Petro kakana kahamba, “Oṟa msumi, njimanya.”
Saa imu iida-ho, ungi kawanza kahamba, “Ee lohi, na ichu nyi awei hamu nao, kipfa nyi Mgalilaya.”
Kyaindi Petro kahamba, “Oṟa odoya, njiichi kindo uihamba-nyi.” Kechededa ado, olong'onyi lukatesa.
Mndumii kahalukia Petro, kamwambuya, Petro katamuo idedo lilya lya Mndumii embia, “Inu olong'onyi lochitesa kulamaa injikana kaṟaṟupfo.”
Kahenda kulya kya nja, kafuha kahutsa tara.
Na wasoṟo walya wawemrie wakamtaluo na imkapa-kapa.
Wakamboshia ipfo mesonyi, wakambesa-wesa, malasha, njiu akukapa?
Na shitaluo shingi shifoi wakaweshihamba sanza na imruma.
Koikikya kukakusanza wameeku wa njoshari na wakohanyi wanene na walanyi wa shitabu, wakamduo mengenyi yawo.
Wakahamba, “Luwie, kokooya nyi iyo Kristo?” Kawawia, “Ngakaa nyechimuwinyiya, mochinjidikia manyalepfo.
Manya inyi ngamuwesa kindo, mochiidima injihaluopfo.
Kyaindi wookia wulalu Mana o Mndu nechikaa adamie owokonyi lo kulyo lo pfinya ya Ruwa.”
Wakahamba woose, “Ate iyo nyi Mana o Ruwa?” Nao kawawia, “Nyo nyi mohamba, kipfa inyi nyo.”
Nawo wakahamba, “A nyikiki luita mbahanyia-se wuṟingishi, kipfa so luwenyi lomemwuicho dumbunyi lyake amonyi wushikie imbinga.”
Mamwingi fulya fukeri-ho fose fukakure fukamduo kulya ko Pontio Pilato.
Wakawoka imkumba wakahamba, “Ichu nyi lulembona chando aihaluo-haluo wandu wa oshari lodu na iwaima ke, walataaye Kaisari okamba, kakuhamba inyi Kristo nyi mangi.”
Pilato kambesa, kahamba, “Iyo nyi mangi ya Wayuda?” Nao kamhaluo kahamba, “Na chando owehamba.”
Pilato kawia wakohanyi na mamwingi fulya fo wandu, “Ko mndu-chu njiwonyi-pfo kyemwanduya-nyi.”
Kyaindi wo wakaengera mnu iitikya-itikya wakahamba ke nyi ekewa mopfuluo-pfuluo wandu kelosha kadung'atsa kunu Yudaya kose awookie kulya Galilaya itane ashika iya.
Pilato kekiicho ishi kawesa kokooya nyi mndu o Galilaya.
Kekimanya ke nyi asumhanyie wuchilinyi wo Herode, kamdika kulya ko Herode, kyamba na mandi halya Herode nyi kulya Yerusalemu awecheiye napfo.
Herode kekiwona Yesu, kachihio mnu; kipfa nyi awelangie imbona wokia shiheri sha haleshe, kipfa nyi awemiicho mbonyi tsake tsifoi kahamba kulako nyi echiwona kindo kiṟihishie kiwuto nyio.
Kambesa shifoi, indi nalahaluo ma idedo limu.
Na wakohanyi walya wang'anyi na walanyi wa shitabu wakahoṟoka-ho, wakamkumba kui wuitiki.
Herode na wasoṟo wake wakamuisalucha na imwinyila, wakamṟika nguwo ikengemae, kambihiṟia Pilato.
Mfiri fulya tichi Pilato wakawada mbuya na Herode, kipfa ili kuwooka nyi wawesuanyi.
Pilato kalaha wakohanyi wanene na handu hamu wameeku wa njoshari, na wandu wose.
Kawawia, “Nyi monjiendei mnduchu cha nyi ai mndu moweṟuo-weṟuo wandu, indi ambuyenyi, ili njilededa mondu foke muweho mkaicho, inyi njilewona owingo lo mbonyi-tso mocha imkumba natsopfo.
Manya Herode na wudo; kipfa ili ambihiṟa na kunu kodu. Kyasia, kuwode kisumhanyie opfu kii iwute nyiopfo.
Kyasia, nyi njiechimkapa kya kisamo njimlekie.” [
Indi nyi kuwe-pfo kido kewapfunguya mpfungo umu ili mkonu mnene fo Pasaka.]
Wandu wose dang'a wakafahia wakahamba, “Ichu mduo, nolupfunguye Baraba.”
Na Baraba-chu nyi awemshingie mba ya wapfunguo kipfa kya wuṟiingi wuweamkie kulya mṟinyi na wuwaahi.
Pilato kawuya ideda nawo wose lya kawi, kipfa nyi awekundi ipfunguo Yesu.
Nawo wakakaṟuo wakahamba, “Mbambye msalabenyi, mbambye msalabenyi!”
Nao Pilato kawawia lya kaṟaṟu, “A nyi kiwicho kida awutie lanye? Inyi njiwonyi kido limsumhanyie opfupfo. Kyasia, nyi njechimkapa, numa njimlekie.”
Kyaindi wakamrohia mnu wakundi nawambio msalabenyi. Na kifahio kilya kyawo, sanza na kya wakohanyi kikarohia.
Pilato kadumbuo ke kihendeke chando wakundi.
Kawapfunguya ulya awembike kipfungonyi kipfa kya wusutsu wo wuwahi; nyio walemkunda; na Yesu kamdambika wawute nao chando wakukundia.
Kiheri wawemrie, wakakumbuhanana na mndu ewuka mdeminyi foke, ewio nyi Simon o kulya Kirene, wakamdika msalaba fulya foke nafuduo oo numa yake.
Kyasia mamwingi fo wandu wafoi fukamiwata numa na fo waka wechifuha na imkapia shilio.
Na Yesu kawaindukia kahamba, “Nyo waka wa kunu Yerusalemu, ma mlanjililie inyi, indi lienyi kyanu muwenyi na kya wana wanu!
Cha kipfa ambuyenyi, nyi kochikaa kushike mafiri wahambe, nanga iwo wahumba, na wusu-wo wulalefee na mawee-ho halelemeonze!
Nlyondo wechiwooka iwia mafumwu, keluhoyenyi, na shitoṟomoso, kelushikienyi.
Kipfa kokooya wawutia wadi ikidi iwishi, aka ili yumu nyi lyekaa liwiko lida?”
Kukawedao-pfo na wandu wawi wewuta mawicho, kundu wawooho wasanzo nao.
Nawo wekishika handu ha-halahe nyi handu ha mbuonyi, wakambambya msalabenyi hamu na wanyamaṟi walya, umu ora lo kulyo, na ungi ora lo kumoso.
Na Yesu kahamba, “Hoi Wande uwahooṟie, kipfa iki waiwuta wakiichipfo.” Na nguwo tsilya tsake wakatsihawa wechikapa natso kuṟu kuhya.
Na wandu wakahoṟoka-ho wechiambuya. Na waitoṟi walya wakamtaluo wakahamba, “Chi alekiṟa wengi, nakekukiṟa-ng'u amonyi kokooya nyio Kristo amsambuṟe nyi Ruwa!”
Na wudo na wasikari walya wakawemtaluo-taluo na imchungia-chungia na imwendie mṟinga futarang'ae.
Wakahamba, “Kokoya iyo nyi ui mangi ya Wayuda, kekukireng'u kumonyi!”
Na alya msalabehu huye yake nyi kuweeho mṟeho fumṟehie Kigriki na Kiroma na Kiebri, Mangi ya Wayuda nyi ichu.
Wanyamaṟi walya wawewamase kimu nao, ulya umu-ho kawemtaluo kahamba, “Iyo chi iyo Kristo? Kukiṟeng'u kumonyi naso-wo!”
Kyaindi ulya odoe kahaluo kamdedia kahamba, “A iyo okiowuo-se Ruwa ili ukeri iya owingonyi ilu?
So nyi lukeri-ho kya sungusihu, kipfa nyi luiambia kilya kisumhanyie mawuto hadu; kyaindi ichu awode kindo awutie kya wukika manya-lepfo.”
Kawuya kawia Yesu, “Kewekunjitamuye-wo hoi na hoi Mndumii, ili ochishika ikuidia ipfo wumanginyi wopfo!”
Nao kambia, “Nkya lohi ngakuwia, Na inu tichi ochiwona kui na inyi kulya Paradiso.”
Kyasia ili kuweshikie kufui sa ya kaṟandaṟu, kukaho meema puti kulya orukenyi koose mtano saa ya kenda.
Mnengeṟi fulaloṟe ngeela yafo, isulia lilya lyeshingia hando haele ipfo hekalunyi likarandukia oo makiidi hawi likalekana.
Na Yesu kalesha ṟu na pfinya kahamba, “Hoi Wande, ngadambika mumuyo foko ipfo mawokonyi hapfo.” Amaa ihamba ado kalekia moo.
Kyaindi mchili ulya o wasikari kekiwona shilya shewutika, kaidapfuma Ruwa, kahamba, “Na lohi, mndu-chu na awei mcha asumuhanyi!”
Na mamwingi fulya fuwekuwumbie-ho yambuya shido-sho, wekiwona shilya shilewutika, wakawuya na kanyi wechikapa-kapa shipeeta.
Na wandu walya waweichianyi nao wose, na waka walya wawemitung'atye wookia Galilaya, nyi waweehoṟoki aleshe wechiamabuya shindo-shi.
Nlyondo kulekuloṟaho mndu ang'anyi, rina lyake nyi Yosefu o mṟi fo Wayuda foilaho Arimatia, nao nyiwe mndu mcha o wusumhanyi.
Ichu awekuwode na chila yawo ma mawuto hawopfo; nao nyi aweiwedia wumangi wo Ruwa.
Ichu kahenda kulya ko Pilato, kamterewa mnying'a fulya fo Yesu.
Kahenda-fusota-ho, kafuoṟowia nguwo tsa owiṟo, kafuṟika opangenyi luwei lusume kundu ko ihonyi, sa lulawemerike mndu.
Nafo nyiwe-mkonu fosaya Sabato, kuile kuamkenyi Sabato.
Kyaindi waka walya wawehendesanyi nao wookia Galilaya, wakaosha-osha, wakawona opanga lulya, na mbihu foke chando fuleṟiko.
Wawuya-pfo, wakacha iṟeheṟa mdi ya opfamo hamu na mafuda hemshia. Mkonu fulya fo Sabato wakatsinda wakutsiiye chando kiweei kiwawase.
Mkonu fo kuwooka fo mfungade wakacha na alya opangenyi ngamenyi otuko warie mdi iya ya opfaamo waweṟeheṟie.
Wakakooya iho lilya liliwute-ho, likapiṟimitsio mbai.
Waida napfo walawone-pfo mnying'a fo Mndumii Yesu.
Wechiṟumo-ṟumo wado, wadi a iwa wasoṟo wawi wahoṟoki alya mbarinyi yawo waṟee nguwo tsikengemae.
Wawodo wado nyi wuowu, wechiinamitsia na mdo yawo wanda, nawo wakawawia, “Ichu ai na moo nyi wuda muimpfula ko wapfu?
Akeri ipfo-sepfo, indi ameṟutso. Kekumbuonyi-wo shilya alemuwia lilyandi awekeri kulya Galilaya.
Kechihamba, nkishikie Mana o mndu nadambiko mawokoonyi ha wandu wanyamaṟi nakapio msalabenyi na mfiri fo kaṟaṟu nawuye iṟuka.”
Nawo wakakumbuo madedo halya hake.
Wakawuya wawuka alya opangenyi, wakacha yongoya walya ikumi na umu shindo-shi shose, hamu na walya wengi wose.
Nawo nyi, Maria Magidala, na Yohane, na Maria mae o Yakobo, nawaka wodoya, nyiwo walewia wasu walya shindoshi.
Madedo-ho hakawawiia cha kihano tupu walahaidikie.
Kyaindi Petro kakure kakambia na kulya opangenyi, kaimehya-pfo, kaaambuya kawona shidami shilya sha owiṟo tupu shi-shileṟyeho; kawuya kechiṟihio mrimenyi kya shilya shawutika.
Kyasia mfiri fulya tichi wandu wa mbari yawo wawi wakahenda kundu ko mṟinyi, napfo kowuka kulya Yerusalemu nyi kukuleshe cha mchumie fo saa tsiwi; na rina lyafo nyi Emao.
Nawo wakahenda wechikapa sumu tsa mbonyi tsilya tsiwutikie.
Wechikapiana wado sumu na iwesana, Yesu kacha kaduana nawo.
Kyaindi meso hawo hakawooho walammanye.
Nao kawawia, “A nyi mbonyi tsida mukeri ihaluyana ili mukeri ichumia lanye?” Indi wo wakahoṟokaho wakuinadie.
Na ulya umu owo, rina lyake nyi Kleopa, kamhaluo kambia, “Ate na iyo kumonyi ukeri kunu Yerusalemu kulaichi mbonyitsi tsiwutikie mafiri-ha?”
Nawo kawawia, “Antso njiki?” Wakambia, “Nyi tsa Yesu o kulya Nasareti, ulya aweei mdedi o Ruwa awode pfinya yewuta na yededa sumuhana na Ruwa na wandu wose.
Ichu-ng'u wakohanyi wadu wang'anyi, na waitoṟi wadu, nyi alemdambika kundu nahutyso owingo lombaaha, wakambambya msalabenyi.
Natso nyi luwekusirie nao ke nyi awechikaa naletse Israeli. Kyasia-ng'u ishi shose shambutika, mfiri fo inu nyi fo kaṟaṟu.
Na kingi nyi waka wa kodu maata wameluwuta madima, nawonyi washika kulya opangenyi ngamenyi kilawo.
Walakooye-pfo mnying'a foke. Wakacha wakahamba, nyi wawonekio nyi wamalaika, wakawawia nyi ai na moo.
Nyi wudo na wodoyadu waangu wahenda kulya opangenyi, wakawekooya wado chando waka walya waluwia, kyaindi o walambone.”
Nao kawawia, “Nyo mulaichi mbonyi mui mudo na ngoo njilemeri iidikia shilya waikimbi wa Ruwa wahambie.
Alae Kristo chi kiwemsumhanyie iliso wukiwa kundu naidime ikuidia wusuṟinyi woke?”
Nao kawoka alya ko Mose na waikimbi wose kawatambahaluya shilya shi-shidede sha mbonyi tsake kadung'atsa mṟeho yose.
Wekisembelia hafui na mṟi fulya waweihenda, kakuhesha cha ili akundi ihenda.
Nawo wakamlemba-lemba wakahamba, “Shika-wo kodu, kipfa nyi iila kui, na mfiri fomekelia.” Nao kaida na mba, kakaa nawo.
Kikashika lilyandi awedamie nawo kilionyi kya shelya, kaira mkate fulya, kaidapfuma, kafupeṟenguo, kawainengia.
Nawo wakatambaruka meso hawo, wakammanya nyio. Nao kawadekia-dekia walakimbonese.
Wakawiana wa-wawi, “A chi luweihya shimbadu kunu ngoonyi tsadu lilyandi aweideda naso kulya njiehu kelutambahaluya mṟeho iya?”
Wakakure oweṟe lulya, wakawuya na Yerusalemu; wakakooya walya ikumi na umu wakuwumbie handu hamu, na walya wodoyawo wakeri nawo.
Wechihamba, “Mndumii na kya lohi ameṟuka opfunyi, amekuloṟa na Simon!”
Nawo wakawaongoya mbonyi tsilya tsilewutikia kulya njiehu, na chando alemanyo nyiwo lilyandi alefunja mkate fulya.
Wechideda wado, o amonyi kacha kahoṟoka oo kiidi kyawo kawawia, “Ofoṟo lukae nanyo.”
Wakawuko m'madima, wakaowuo wakahia kulako nyi kiṟishe wawona.
Kawawia, “Nyikili moangalala mdo, nkili mahio mawicho hadi hakuwada ngoonyi tsanu?
Njiambuyenyi mawoko hako na madende hako, mumanye nyio inyi, njiwade-wadenyi, muwone. Kipfa kiṟishe kiwode nyama na mbihu na mafuo chando muwonyi njiwode inyipfo.”
Kekimaa ihamba ado, kawaloṟa mawoko na madende.
Nawo wakeri wado walameidikia wawodo nyi mkeu-keu fo sia na iṟihio, kawawia, “Muwode kindo kelya ma kida iya?” Nawo wakamneenga ora lo ikunga lu-ukahaṟe.
Kaluambia, kalulya wawonyi.
Kawawia, “Iha nyiho madedo hako njilemuwia lilyandi njiwei nanyo ke, shilya shii shiṟehie nyi Mose ipfo wuwawasonyi na ipfo ko waikimbi na ipfo saburinyi na shikae shihoye shose.”
Nahong'u katambaṟuo wuṟango wulya wowo wakatamuo mṟeho iya mwele.
Kawawia ke, “Nyi wudo kikiṟehie ke Kristo nyi awechikaa naliso ado wukiwa, na ili lya kaṟaṟu naṟuke wapfunyi.
Numa wandu wa mbaṟi tsose tsa masanga waongoyo rina lyake wadumbuye, waidime ihoorio manyamaṟo. Nasho shiwoke Yerusalemu.
Nanyo nyi mochiwa waṟingishi wa mbonyitsi.
Keambuyenyi, nyi njiechimdumia kyaasa kya Wande kimuwonekie, nanyo kaenyii-ng' kunu mṟinyi ifu itane mowonyio pfinya iwukie huye.”
Kahenda nawo, kawaduo kulya Betanyia, Kawaṟambatsia mawoko, kawawikia ona.
Kechiwawikia ona, kalekana nawo, kairio huye ruwehu.
Nawo wakampfiria ndi, wakawuya na Yerusalemu wawodo nyi msiha fung'anyi.
Wakahenda ika kulya hekalunyi mafiri hoose wechiadapfuma Ruwa.
Ipfo mawokyonyi kuweipfo idedo; liweipfo nalyo Idedo liwei na Ruwa, nalyo liwei Ruwa.
Lyo liwekeri na Ruwa ili mawokyonyi.
Shindo shose shiipfo nyi shiishitane na mweeke folyo. Nalyo kulawode liweipfo kuwechitano kindo ma kimu kya isho shii-shitanepfo.
Lyo liwerie moo, na moo fu fukawa sa ya wandu.
Na sa yo nyi iwaa ipfo meemenyi, na meema fu fulaiambye.
Kuwei-pfo mndu aledumo nyi Ruwa rina lyake nyi Yohane.
O alecha kyewika-ho wuṟingishi kundu nawikye sa yo kiṟingishyo wandu washike iidikia wose.
Chio awei sa iya amonyi-pfo kya indi alecha kundu nawe mṟingishi moṟingishya wandu sa yo.
Nyi yo Sa ya lohi yo yelimika oryo mndu ose ai kunu wuyana.
Nyi idedo liwekeri kunu wuyana na wuyana wu wuwuumbe kui mweeke folyo na wuyana wu manya wulammanye.
O nyi alecha na orukenyi lokye amonyi na iwo wai wakye ma walamwambye.
Indi iwo walemwambya na imwidikia kawaenengya wulimbi wo itano wana wa Ruwa wose.
Nawo nyiwo walefeo nyi Ruwa chi kui wuidimi wo mndu o wandupfo ma kui pfinya tsa mbihu-pfo, ma kui idumbwo lya msoro mliwe pfo kya indi Ruwa amonyi nyio ndeawo.
Nalyo idedo likahaluka mndu arie nyama tsa wandu likakaa kodu. Natso lukawona wuitoṟi wokye, nawo wuitoṟi wu wui wo Mana kimumu mfi aikaa na Wande aichuo wutonga pacha na wukilohi woose.
Yohane nyi aṟingishye kyake kechipoṟohora na ihamba, “Ichu nyio ulya njilehamba kyake, kye kwipfo aicha oo numa yako na nawenjisongoye nyi aweipfo, kipfa o awekukeṟye-ho, inyi njilamefeo.”
Na ili pfo koke nyi kadahyonyi lukawa welimyo kisumbo kikaweitumano nyi kisumbo.
Cha kipfa Ruwa naleende wuwawaso wulya kui Mose, indi wutonga na wukilohi, wo nyi wuleendo nyi Yesu Kristo.
Kuipfo mndu alemewona Ruwa ma indipfo. Ichu akeri Mana okye kimumu mfi ai cha Ruwa alunganyi na wande, nyio aleluongoya mbonyi tsa Ruwa.
Na kiṟingishyo kilya kya Yohane kikeri kii-le lya mandi Wayuda walemdumya wandu wakohanyi na Walewi wawuka kulya Yerusalemu wahende imbesa wahambe, “A iyo nyi ukeri o wu?”
Nao kakuhambya na pata ma alakane kakuhambya, “Inyi chi njii Kristo-pfo.”
Wakambesa, “A iyo nyiu? Ngesa nyi ukeri Elia?” Yohane kahamba, “O chi inyipfo.” A ngesa ukeri mwikimbi ulya? Nao kahaluo, “Oo.”
Nahong'u wakambia, “A nyi ukeri nyi wu? A nyi wuda ohamba kyapfo iyo kumonyi? Natso luwone kindo lochihenda iwia walya waludumye?”
Nao kahamba, “Inyi njikeri mndu ulya mwikimbi Yesaya alehamba kyakye, ‘Ru lya mndu moedya kundo kuwode olele kyehamba, keachikyenyi njia ya Mndumii.’ ”
Na wandu walya wai-wadume nyi Wafarisayo.
Wakawesa Yohane “A nyi ki kyaduma kowa mopatisa wandu na iyo kulakeri Kristo ma Elia, ma mwikimbi ulya?”
Yohane kahalwo kahamba, “Inyi njechekepatisa na mṟinga, indi kwipfo ahoṟoki kiidi kyanu nanyo mulamwichi.
Nyio sa aicha numa yako, na inyi njimfoi ma ipfungwo ngowa tsa shadu shakepfo.”
Kyasia-ng'u nakyo kundo kyewutikya kido nyi kulya Betanyia kulya molyola ya meda fo Yordanyi kundo Yohane echipatisya.
Na ili lya ngama Yohane kawona Yesu kyechimchea kahamba, “Aiki kichondi kya Ruwa kyechiwuta-ho wunyamaṟi wo wuyana.
Nao nyio ichu njiweihamba kyake kye kwipfo msoro aicha numa yako, na nyi aweipfo kipfa o awekukerye-ho inyi njilamefeo.
Na inyi njimonyi njiwemwichipfo. Indi o kundu namanyike na pata ipfo ko wandu wa Israeli nkyo kindo njilechea njipatise na mṟinga.”
Na Yohane kawika kiṟingishyo kahamba, “Njilewona Mumuyo fo Ruwa echimsokya ai cha mbeta awuka ruwehu kacha ikaa nao.
Na inyi njiwemwichipfo, indi ichu alenjiduma njipatise wandu na mṟinga nyio alenjiwia, ‘Mndu-chu ochimbona Mumuyo fo Ruwa fochimsokia fuwuka ruwehu fukamkaya nyio echiwa mopatisa na Mumuyo Mwele.
Na inyi iwona ngamebona ngawika kiṟingishyo kyake ngahamba, kye ichu nyio Mana o Ruwa.’ ”
Nahong'u ili lya ngama Yohane awehoroki-ho lingi arianyi na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wawi.
Kawona na Yesu echikuidyaho kahamba, “Ichu nyio ihuruwi lya Ruwa.”
Nahong'u walya wawi wa kiloshyonyi wamwicho Yohane adeda adi madedoho wakaoshana na Yesu.
Yesu kaindukya kawawona wa kiloshionyi waimwituma kawawia, “Iki mwipfula nkyo ki?” Nawo wakambia, “Hoi Rabi (Nakyo nyi kimu na Mlosha) nyi ku okyekaa?”
Kawawia, “Kyenjonyi muwone.” Nahong'u wa kiloshionyi wakacha wakawona hando ekyekaa wakatsinda nao mkonu fulya puti. Nalyo nyi mbe saa ikumi kyukanyi.
Andrea, manomae o Simon Petro, nyi umu o walya wawi waleicho kilya Yohane ahamba wakamwituma Yesu numa.
Andrea kawoka iwona manomae o Simon kambia, “Lombona Mesia.” (Nakyo kokihalwo kigriki nyi kimu na Kristo.)
Kaduo Simon na alya ko Yesu. Yesu kaambuya Simon faa kahamba, “Nyi iyo Simon ui mana o Yona nolahong'u rina lyapfo nyi Kefa.” (Nakyo kohalwo nyi kimu na Petro iho lya “ngina.”)
Ili lya ngama Yesu awerie ihenda kulya Galilaya. Nalyo kakoya Filipo. Yesu kambia, “Oshana na inyi.”
Na Filipo awei mndu o Betisaida, o mṟi fulya fo Andrea na Petro.
Filipo kawona Natanaeli kambia, “Hoo lomekuwonya ichu amhambe nyi Mose na waikimbi, nyio Yesu o Yosefu ulya o kulya Nasareti.”
Natanaeli kawesa Filipo, “A kulya Nasareti kindo kyechiwukaho kii kicha nkyo kiki?” Filipo kambia “Kenjoo-wo uambuye.”
Yesu kawona Natanaeli kecha na oo ando akeri kadeda kyake kehamba, “A ichu mndu Mwisraeli o lohi; alawode mtambo ipfo mrimenyi.”
Na Natanaeli kambia, “A nyi nonjimanya kuda?” Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Ili Filipo alawemekulahe kukeri alya tsindenyi ya mkuyu fulya na mbemekuwona.”
Natanaeli kamhaluo, “Hoi Rabi, iyo nyi ukeri Mana o Ruwa, Iyo nyi Mangi ya Israeli.”
Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Ili ngamekuwia kye nyi njiwekuwonyi kukeri alya tsindenyi ya mkuyu fulya nkyo kyakuenenga koidikya-ng'u. Nyi ochikaa nowone kyeching'anya isho.”
Nalyo Yesu kambia, “Na lohi na lohi ngambia, nyi mochiwona kulya ruwehu kuṟuhukye na wasu wa Ruwa wechido na isoka wekaya Mana chu o mndu.”
Kikasia ili lya kilalau kukaalika wali kulya Kana ya Galilaya. Na mae o Yesu npfondo awei.
Na Yesu nawo wawei walahe-pfo na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
Kyasia mpfinyo foikitenekya mae o Yesu kambia, “Wakiwode-se ma mpfinyo-pfo.”
Yesu kambia, “Kyadu na iyo nyi kiki, mka? Saa iya yako yamekushikyapfo.”
Kyasia mae kawia waeeki walya, “Kindo echimbia nanyo kewekiwutenyi.”
Kyasia hando kuwekuṟihichye-pfo nungu tsiṟandaṟu tsa maho chando mbuka tsa Wayuda tsiwei tsa msambye yawo imu yechiwada madewe hawi ang'u haṟaṟu.
Yesu kawawia, “Kehenda ichuṟenyi nungu tsi mringa,” Wakatsiichura wakashitsa o mingenyi.
Kawuya kawawia, “Wulalu kedahyenyi-ng'u mbehenda daya mheṟi.” Wakaduo-pfo.
Kyasia mheṟi ulya kekisaha mṟinga fulya fuhalukye mpfinyo. Nao nalamanye kundu fuwukye; wandu waichi na wae̱ki walya weedahya mṟinga fulya. Mheṟi ulya kalaha menyi-wali.
Kambia, “A lae oryo mndu ose chi echiwoka kuheṟya mpfinyo ifu mcha, nawo wakameihuda-ihuda chi echiheṟa ifu mbicho-wicho-ng'u. Ate iyo kowuya iṟika ifu mcha tane wulalu.”
Yesu nalewoka iwuta ṟiho i ya kuwoka Kana ya Galilaya. Kalora wuitoṟi wokye, na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakamwidikya.
Iki kyamsia kahenda isoka na kulya Kapernaumu o amonyi na mae na wanawamae na wa kiloshyonyi wakye wakakaa-pfo mkonu mangu.
Kyasia mkonu mnene fo Wayuda fulya fo Pasaka fuwekeri fo afui; Yesu kahenda ikudoya na kulya Yerusalemu.
Na ipfo hekalunyi kakoyapfo wandu wekumba mbe, machondi na mbeta, na wailachi weilachia wandu pesa tsawo nyi wadamye mesenyi tsawo.
Nao kalemalema shihowo, shelachwo kawafuna ipfo hekalunyi handu hamu na machondi halya na mbe tsilya tsawo. Na fesa tsa wailachi katsipusuya shi na ipfulwo na shitaṟa (mesa) shawo.
Kawia na walya wekumba mbeta, “Irenyi shindo shi mushiwute aa. Ma mulawone mohalwo mba ya Wande oko iwe mba ya mbucha.”
Wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakakumbwo kikeri kiṟehye kyehamba, “Ikunda lyako lyekunda mba yapfo lyanjimaa.”
Kikatewa Wayuda wakawesa Yesu, “A nyi kichano kya kiki owuta oluloṟa kye nuwode pfinya ili ohenda itana kudo?”
Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Sanjenyi Hekalu li na inyi njiliwike-se lingi ko mfiri iṟaṟu.”
Nahong'u Wayuda wakahamba, “Hekalu lyi liliwike ko maaka makumi haana na iṟandaṟu na iyo noliwike-se lingi ko mfiri iṟaṟu?”
Indi Yesu nyi alededa kya mbihu foke mfo fui hekalu lilya.
Nahong'u lilyandi aleṟuka awuka ko wapfu waloshe wakye wakawuya ikumbwo kye nkyo ikyo alemhamba, wakaweidikya Maṟehyo halya Maele na idedo lilya Yesu awehambye.
Kyasia kiheri kilya Yesu awekeri kulya Yerusalemu lya mkonu mnene ya Pasaka wandu wafoi wakaidikya rina lyake wechiwona ṟiho tsilya etsiwuta.
Indi o Yesu aleidikyana nawopfo, kipfa awewaichi o amonyi wose.
Yesu naweichi chuṟe tsa wandu tsoose alawewurie mndu motsimbia.
Kukakaa-pfo mndu o ipfo kambenyi lya Wafarisayo, awio rina lyake nyi Nyikodemo ai msongoru o Wayuda.
Nao kakuchea ko Yesu ili kio kambia, “Hoi Marya, nawo luichi kye ukeri mlosha umdume nyi Ruwa cha kipfa kulakeri ma mndu echiidima iwuta ṟiho tso owa mowuta iyo na koka nyi Ruwa akeri nao tupu.”
Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Kya lohi na lohi ngakuwia, Mndu kada lafeo uhya nechiidima iwona wumangi wo Ruwapfo.”
Nikodemo kambia, “Aka-wo mndu namanye ifeo-se ada lingi ai meku? Ngesa nyi echiidima-se kuwuya na ipfo wusunyi wo mae nawefeo-se lya kawi?”
Yesu kahalwo, “Kya lohi na lohi ngakuwia, Mndu kada alafeo nyi mṟinga na Mumuyo echiidima ihenda ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa manyale-pfo.
Mndu nekefeo kimbihu nyi ndeye na mae, kya indi nekefeo kimrima nyi Mumuyo.
Ma kulaṟihio ili ngakuwia kye mkaki na mufeo wuhya.
Otanu lochekewiwita kundo lochikukundya na mrundumo folo na ochikuichyo, kya indi kulamanye ma kundo luwuka ma kundo loihenda. Kyasia-ng'u na oryo mndu mofeo m Mumuyo na wudo akeri.”
Nikodemo kahalwo kambia, “A ikyo nyi kyechiidimika kida ngesa?”
Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Nyi ukeri mlosha o kunu Israeli kulamanye ikyo?”
Kya lohi na lohi ngakuwia, Kilya lomemanya nakyo lochekehamba na kilya lomewona nakyo lochekeongwo kya iṟingishya lyadu. Na kiṟingishyo kyo kyadu nyo mulakiidikye.
Ili njemwongoya kya shindo shii sha kunu orukenyi nanyo mulanjiidikye, a ili njemwongoya kya shilya sha ruwehu nyi mochikuidikya muda?
Ma kulelemedoe mndu kulya ruwehupfo, na ichu alewesoka ruwehu nyio Mana o Mndu ai ipfo ruwehu.
“Chando Mose ewedosya njoka iya huye kulya kundo ko olele na Mana o mndu na wudo echika nairio huye.
Kundu oryo mndu momwidikiya nawone moo fo mlungana.
Kyamba Ruwa nyi awekundi wuyana katana alekya Mana okye kimumu mfi, kundu oryo mndu ose amwidikye nalawone kedeka kya indi nawone moo fo mlungana.
Kyamba Ruwa alaleduma Mana okye nache na kunu wuyana kundu naanduye wuyana wu, kya indi nyi kundu wuyana wuhendekiṟo nyio.”
“Mndu aidikye Mana echiwonyo owingopfo. Mndu alamwidikie o ammaa iwonyo owingo kipfa ada alaidikya Mana chu o Ruwa kimumu mfi.
Na owingo lu lukeri luile: Nyi sa ilecha na kunu wuyana na wandu wakakunda meema kota sa. Kitewe kipfa nyi shindo watanye shiwei shiwicho.
Kipfa oryo mndu atanye shiwicho o asuo sa ma ekehenda kundo kuwode sa iipfo kundu mawutoho hake mawicho halalimiko.
Indi mndu ai motana kiwulohi kilya o ekehenda kundo kuwode sa kundu ngata tsake tsihende imanyishoho ke nyi tsinjiwute kui ihendelia Ruwa.”
Ishi shikawa Yesu kahenda kulya orukenyi lo Yudaya arianyi na waloshe wakye, Katsinda-pfo nawo kechipatisa wandu.
Na Yohane nyi awei-pfo echipatisa wandu kulya Ainon kulya kufui na Salemu ili kuweipfo mṟinga fufoi. Kukacha napfo wandu nao kawapatisa.
(Kyamba kiheri kilya Yohane awemekumbo kipfungon-pfo.)
Nakyo kikaenenga wa kiloshionyi wa Yohane Waleloyana na mndu Myuda wechiwesana nao kya isamba.
Wakawuya Yohane wakambia, “Hoi Marya, ulya awei na iyo kulya mataya ya Yordanyi, nao nyio iyo ulembikya kiṟingishyo nyi aipatisa na wandu wose wakamwosha.”
Yohane kahalwo kahamba, “Kwipfo mndu eidima iwada kindo shila nyi kilya ainengo nyi Ruwapfo.
Nyo muwenyi mkaṟingishia kye njilemhamba kye chio inyi njii Kristo-pfo. Kya indi njimdume njimsongoye.
Ichu arie mka moaliko nyio menyi-wali. Indi mbuya ya menyi-wali ichu ahoṟoki oo afui kemwadanya nyi aichihio mnu na sia ing'anyi ili aicho menyi wali kechideda. Nyi wudo sia yako yaichuo pacha.
Kimbaṟi o naengeṟe iṟumisho na inyi njinyie.”
“Ichu acheye awukye huye nyio mnene o woose. Ichu apaṟikye kunu wuyana kawewa na o kunu wuyana kuwededa shii sha wuyana. Indi ichu achee awukye ruwehu o akeri mnene o wose.
Nao nekehamba kilya alekiwona na ikiicho na kiṟingishyo kyo kyakye nyi
akiwikya mhuri fohamba ke Ruwa nyio kiwulohi.
Icho Ruwa alemduma nyi mbia tsa Ruwa aihamba, kyamba Ruwa aimnengya Mumuyo kulaipfo iikenya.
O Wande nyi akundi Mana chu kamdambikya shindo shose.
Mndu aidikye Mana o nakuwode na moo fo mlungana. Na mndu ada alaidikya Mana cho o echiwona moo fo mlunganapfo kya indi tuuke ya Ruwa yechikaa irianyi nao.”
Wafarisayo wakaicho kye Yesu nyi akuwonya waloshe wafoi na iwapatisa kaida Yohane. (
Kui lohi Yesu amonyi alepatisa wandupfo, nyi waloshe wake nyiwo.)
Yesu kekiicho isho kawuka kulya Yudaya kawada njia kawuya na kulya Galilaya.
Na njia ikamtewa nahende idumbwo kulya Samaria.
Kyasia kashika mṟinyi fumu fo kulya Samaria fu-mdumbuye rina nyi Sikari fukeri kufui na kihamba kilya Yakobo aleinenga mana ulya oke Yosefu.
Napfondo kuwei soka ya Yakobo. Na Yesu kakoya amayo nyi kyaṟo kahenda idamya kudi oo sokenyi kiheri kya saa tsiṟandaṟu tsa mfiri.
Kukacha napfo mka o Kisamaria idahya mṟinga. Yesu kambia, “Nenga mṟinga njinyo.” (
Nyi kipfa waloshe wake wawehendye kulya mṟinyi wahuṟe-pfo shelya.)
Mka ulya o Kisamaria kambia, “Kyechiwa kida ili iyo ui mndu o Kiyuda konjiterewa mṟinga na inyi njikeri mka o Kisamaria?”
Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Koye kuweichi kisumbo kya Ruwa na nyiu ichu aideda na iyo kyekuwia, ‘Njirutsa mṟinga njinyo,’ koye uwemwichi nyio uwechimterewa nao awekuenenga mṟinga fuwode moo.”
Mka ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, a ili kulawode ma kindo kyedahya mṟinga, na ṟungu li lyiileshe lidi nyi hanga ochiende mṟinga fu furie moo?
Alae iyo ui mnene koida mku ulya odu Yakobo? Nyio aleluenenga ṟungu ili. Nao nyi alewa monyo-pfo mṟinga o amonyi na wana wake na shuma shake nasho.”
Yesu kahalwo kambia “Oryo mndu ose anyo mṟinga fu o cheiwuya iwado nyi nyoda.

Indi mndu kanyo mṟinga fu njechimnenga inyi ewado nyoda ma indipfo shika mlungana. Kya indi mringa fu inyi njechimenega ipfo koke nyi fochiwa soka ya mṟinga fuwode moo, na fochimnenga moo fo mlungana.”
Mka ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nnenga-ng'u mṟinga fu njilakoye-se yakuka, manya njilakiitike iwuya na iya idahya mṟinga.”
Nao Yesu kambia, “Henda laha mii opfo uche nao na iya.”
Mka ulya kahalwo kahamba, “Njiwode miipfo.” Yesu kambia, “Nyi ohamba kya sungusihu kye uwode miipfo.
Kipfa nyi kulemdao nyi wamii watanu, na ichu ukeri nao wulalu o ai mii opfopfo.” “Ikyo nyi kya lohi ahamba.”
Mka ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, njiwonyi iyo nyi ukeri mwikimbi.
Alewo waku walya wadu nyi wawekewikya Ruwa wuindi kunu fumvu-hu li nanyo nyi mokehamba, kye nyi kulya Yerusalemu mpfo kundo kusumhanyi iwikya Ruwa wuindi.”
Yesu kambia, “Iyo mka, njiidikya, kye kukae kuche kiheri mulakiwikye-se Wande wuindi kunu fumvu-hu manya kulya Yerusalemu.
Nyo Wasamaria kilya mokeindya mukiichipfo indi so lokeindya kilya lukiichi, kyamba nyi ipfo ko Wayuda mpfo kundu okiio lo wandu luwukye.

Kya indi kukaa kuche kiheri nakyo kii-ho na wulalu kyechienenga weindya Ruwa wa lohi nyi wechiwikya Wande wuindi wurio nyi Mumuyo na kiwulohi. Kipfa nao Wande amonyi aipfula wai wadi wembikya wuindi wo mbaṟi ii.
Ruwa nyi ai Mumuyo na wemwindya wawe wembikya wuindi wurio nyi Mumuyo na kiwulohi.”
Nahong'u mka ulya kambia, “Njiichi kye nyi kochicha Mesia elaho nyi Kristo. Nao mandi echicha o echilutambahaluya orio kindo.”
Yesu kambia, “Nao nyio inyi njideda na iyo.”
Kashika oo waloshe wake wakacha wakaṟihio wakoya aideda na mndu mka. Indi kulakae-pfo ambesa nkiki uipfula kokye, angu nkili uideda nao.
Nahong'u mka ulya kada-ho nungu yake kahenda kulya mṟinyi kahenda iwia wandu walya.
Kawawia, “Kenjonyiwo muwone mndu ammaa injiwia shose njiletana; kulako nyio Kristo ngesa?”
Wandu wakakure wawuka kulya mṟinyi wakachea Yesu.
Ikyi kyechihendeka kidi waloshe wake wakamterewa wakahamba, “Hoi marya, lya kyelya.”
Nao kawaia, “Inyi njiwode kando njikeri ilya nyo mulakaichi.”
Waloshe wake wakawesana, “Kulako kuweipfo amwendye wundo wolya ngesa?”
Yesu kawawia, kyelya kyako nyi ihenda iwuta kilya kikundyo nyi ichu alenjiduma na inutsya iṟunda lyake.
Nyo chi mokehamba, ke leka kusie meri iina kushike kiheri kyesambwo. Keambuyenyi-wo, inyi ngambia, ke-iryenyi meso hanu muambuye madema ha, shilimu nyi shesambuo.
Mosambwo aambia wueṟi wokye kechisanyia shilimu kipfa kya moo fo mlungana; kundu ichu mokumba mbeu na ichu mosambwo wasangane wechikesa kimu.
Kipfa mdedie fu fuhambie, “Mokumba mbeu nyi ungi na mosambwo kawa ungi.
Njimuduma isambuo kilimu mulalewinyia. Nyi wengi wawinye-ho nanyo mkawona ho kiira kundo ko wawinye.”
Wasamaria sa wafoi wa kulya mrinyi wakaidikia kipfa kya madedo ha mka ulya, “Nyi anjiongoya shindo njilewuta shose.”
Wasamaria walya ili walekoya Yesu walemterewa natsinde kowo. Nao kakaa-pfo mfiri iwi.
Na wandu wafoi wakaingiki wakamwidikya kipfa kya mloshye fokye.
Wakawia mka ulya, “Kye lokiidikya-se kimaduma kya kilya uhambie iyopfo. Kyamba nyiso luwenyi lomwicho lukawuta-ho imanya kye ichu nyio lohi ai Mkiṟi mokiṟa wuyana.”
Mkonu iya iwi yamsia Yesu kakure kulya kahenda Galilaya.
Kyamba Yesu amonyi aleṟingishya na pata ke. “Mwikimbi hando alechiindyo nyi ipfo orukyenyi lokye.”
Ili amaa ishika adi kulya Galilaya Wagalilaya wafoi wakamwambia necha. Kipfa walewona shilya aletana kulya Yerusalemu shose mkonu fulya mnene. Kyamba nawo wawesengudie mkonu fulya mnene fo Pasaka.
Yesu kawuya ishika-se kulya Kana ya Galilaya kundo aletana mṟinga fukawa mpfinyo. Nahong'u kuwewode mndu mnene aluṟe mana o womi kulya Kapernaumu.
Nao ili aleicho ke Yesu amcha na kulya Galilaya awuka kulya Yudaya kamhendia kashika kulya kundu ai, kamterewa kye nachiṟe mana ulya okye kyamba nyi kufui nalekie moo.
Yesu kambia, “Mukamba mulawona shichano sha mawowo na maṟiho hemuṟishisha mochikuidikyapfo.”
Mnene-chu kambia, “Hoi-wo Mndumii, soka owinyi ukoye manoko alamnenuka.”
Yesu kambia, “Kuhendye-ng'u manachu opfo nekia.” Mndu ulya kaidikya idedo lilya Yesu ambia kakuhendya.
Arie njia yesoka na kulya kanyi masinga hake hakacha imwambya wakahamba, “Manopfo amchia.”
Nao kawatuma saa iya mandi mana alekyo. Wakambia “Nyi wukowu ili saa mfungade lyo modo fulya fulembuka.”
Nahong'u ndee kakumbuo saa nayo lyandi Yesu alembia, “Manopfo nekukaya na moo.” Nawo wakakuidikya na wa kanyi kokye wose.
Nayo nyiyo ṟiho ya kawi Yesu ewuta amcha na kulya Galilaya awuka kulya Yudaya.
Ili numa kuweshikye mkonu mnene fo Wayuda Yesu kahenda ido na kulya Yerusalemu.
Nahong'u kulya Yerusalemu oo kufui na kichumi kilya kya machondi kukeri-pfo nduwa ilaho rina lyayo kiebri nyi Betesida. Nayo ii na shidangasha sha mholo-holo shitanu.
Napfo kudamye-pfo mamingi fo wandu waluo wapfu meso na wahuli madende ho, na watangarimi. [Nawo wechiwedaya mṟinga fulya fochikupayapaya,
cha kipfa ili malaika echisokya kulya nduwenyi ku kiheri kapayapaya mṟinga fulya. Na ulya amewooka isokya ipfo mṟingenyi ili fomekupayapaya kawekuchia ndaṟe yo yakye.]
Kyasia hando ho kwipfo mndu aluo amaye maka makumi haṟaṟu na nyanya.
Yesu kawona mndu ulya alee-pfo. Kamanya kye amaye-pfo maheri hafoi. Kambia, “Okunda ichia woe?”
Mndu ulya aluo kamhalwo, “Mndumii njiwode ma mndu nanjisotsie ipfo nduwenyi ili mṟinga fochikupayapayapfo. Indi ili njii-pfo njihendahenda ungi kawenjiida kasonguo ikusokya-ho.”
Yesu kambia, “Kyekureng'u nokudike kitaṟa kyapfo nokuchumie-ng'u.”
Nalyo liyenyi mndu ulya kachia kakudika kitaṟa kilya kyake kachumia. Na mfiri fulya fuwei fo Sabato.
Nahong'u Wayuda wakacha iwia mndu ulya alechiṟo “Inu nyi Sabato kikusumhanyi iduo kitaṟa kyapfopfo.”
Nao kawawia, “Mndu ulya anchiṟa anjiwia, kudike kitaṟa kyapfo nokuchumie.”
Wakambesa, “A mndu ulya akuwia kundike kitaṟa kyapfo nochumia nyiu?”
Na ulya alechiṟo nalakimanye mbeo-u kyamba Yesu awemedekya ipfo kidi kya mamingi fung'anyi fo wandu fukeri hando halya.
Kyasia ili numa Yesu kamkoya ipfo hekalunyi kambia, “Ambuya omekuchia-ng'u, ma kulakae unyamaṟe-se ukae nowone kindo kiwichowicho kyechikutowokya.”
Mndu ulya kakure-pfo kahenda iwuuya Wayuda walya kye mbeo Yesu eemkiṟa.
Nakyo kikaenenga Wayuda wakawa weṟinjawya Yesu wakapfula meeke fombaha cha kipfa lya alewuta ado mkonu fo Sabato.
Nao kawahalwo, “Ndeyako nyi aiṟunda kiheri kyoose na inyi daa njiṟunda.”
Nakyo kikaengeṟa iitika Wayuda wapfule mwaanya fombaha chi kipfa atahachye Sabato tupupfo kya indi nyi ili ahamba kye Ruwa nyi ndee amonyi kechikung'ang'anyisha adi na Ruwa.

Nahong'u Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mana echiidima itana kindo kui chila yake amonyi kulawode nyi ikyo awona Nde aitana-pfo. Kyamba kindo ndee atana na Mana nakyo kawekitana ado da.
Kyamba o Wande nyi akundi Mana, kamloṟa orio kindo aitana amonyi shose. Nao echimloṟa na shetana shing'anyi kota isho mukuwutye-ho iṟihio.
Kyamba chando Wande aṟutsa walya wapfu kawainenga moo, nao Mana na wudo-ng'u iwo akunda kawainenga moo.
Kyamba Wande alaanduya mndu o wandu ma umu kya indi Mana nyio amdambikye yanduya li lyose.
Kundu wandu waindye Mana chando wekeindya Nde. Ichu ada alaindya Mana nyi ada iindya na Nde alemduma.”
“Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Ichu moanguya dedo lyako madu na iidikya ichu alenjiduma nawode moo fo mlungana. Nao echianduyo manyalepfo, kya indi nyi amsama auka opfunyi kasamya moonyi.
Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Kukaa kuche kiheri na wulalu na kikeri-pfo da lyondo wapfu wechiicho ṟu lya Mana o Ruwa na iwo weliicho wechiwona moo.
Kyamba chando Wande awode moo fuwukye ipfo kiidi kyake kwenyi nyi wudo da aleinenga Mana ikaa na moo fuwukye ipfo kiidi kyake kwenyi.
Kawemnenga na wuchili wo idumbwo mondu kipfa akeri Mana chu o Mndu.
Ma mulaṟihyo kya ikyo, kipfa kukaa kuhoye kiheri ili iwo woose walee ipfo shipfunyi wechiicho ṟu lyake.
Nawo nyi wechiṟuka. Iwo wawutye hai mecha waṟuke kyewada moo, na iwo wawutye hai mawicho waṟuke kya yanduyo mondu fulya.”

“Inyi ngaidima iwuta kindo kii kya chila yakopfo. Njekeanduo mondu mdumbuye fuidikyanyi na kilya ngaicho njewio nyi Wande, na mdumbuye foko nyi fusumuhanyi. Kindo njiiwalya chi kilya njikundi inyipfo; kya indi nyi kilya ichu alenjiduma akundi.
Kokoya ngakuṟingishya njimonyi kiṟingishyo kyako kyeidikyo kye kii kya lohipfo.
Indi nyi kuipfo ungi monjiṟingisha. Na inyi njiichi kye kiṟingishyo anjiṟingishya nyi kya lohi.
Nyo nyi muleduma watichi wanu ko Yohane nao kaṟingishiaho kiilohi kilya.
Na inyi ma njekewada kuṟingishyo ki-kiwike nyi wandupfo kya indi nyi ngahamba ikyo kundu muhende ikiṟo.
Yohane nyio awei cha taa yewaa yechilimika, nanyo nyi mlelanga ikukesya na saa yo ya oweṟe lulya.
Indi inyi njiwode kiṟingishyo kyako king'anyi kota kilya kya Yohane. Kyamba maṟunda njiṟunda halya wande alenjienenga njihaṟunde, naho nyiho hairingishia kye nyi Wande alenjiduma.
Nao Wande monjiduma kawenjiwikya kiṟingishyo o amonyi. Nanyo mlemeicho ṟu lyake ma mantapfo, ma fana yake mlemeiwone-pfo.
Ma idedo li lyake mukuwodye nalyo likae ipfo mrimenyi-pfo kipfa ichu alemduma mulalemwidikya.
Nyo mokyeweṟuwetsa Maṟehyo Maele muichi kulako mochiwonapfo moo fo mlungana, ate maṟeho ho nyi inyi. Naho hainjiṟingishya.
Nanyo ma mulakunde ikuchea na koko kundu muwade moo fulya.”
“Kitewe kyako chi iwona kiṟumi ko wandupfo.
Kya indi nyo njimwichi kye ikunda lya Ruwa muliwode ipfo mrimenyi yanupfo.
Inyi njicheye kui rina lya Ndeyako, nanyo ma mulanjiambye. Kokoya ungi echicha kui rina lyake amonyi nyi mochimwambya.
Nyi wuda moidima iidikya nyo ili mokeringa kiṟumi mukeri muiwikyana muwenyi na wenyi, na kiṟumi kilya kicheye ko Ruwa amonyi mulaikiwalya?
Ma mulawone mohamba kye nyio inyi nyechimkumba ipfo ko Wande. Mose chu mumkusihye nyio echimkumba.
Kyamba kokoya muweidikye Mose na inyi muwenjiidikya, kyamba Mose o aṟehye kya injihamba inyi.
Indi kokoya mulaidikie shilya aleṟehya, nyi wuda mochiidikya madedo inyi njideda?”
Kyasia ili numa Yesu kahenda yambada nduwa ya Galilaya (ilaho ya Tiberia) kaambadya kya kulya molyolya.
Mamingi fung'anyi fo wandu wakamwosha kipfa ili wandu wo walewona ṟiho alewuta tsechiṟa wandu waluo.
Yesu kahenda ido na kundo ko fumvu-hu wakadamya-ho wo na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye.
Na mkonu fulya mnene fo Wayuda fulya fo Pasaka nyi kufui fuhoye.
Nahong'u Yesu kekiirya meso hakye kekiwona mamingi fung'anyi fochikuchea na alyando ai nao kawia Filipo, “A kundo lochihuṟa mkate fo wandu wa wakulie nyi ku ngesa?” (
Nao kehamba ado nyi kyeseenga Filipo cha kipfa nyi aweichi kindo arie iwuta.)
Filipo kamhalwo, “Kyakyo ma mkate fo shilingi (dinari) mahana hawi fochiwashika mndu nawone-ho ma kipeṟengupfo.”
Umu o wa kiloshyonyi kyake ewio rina lyake nyi Andrea ai manomae o Simon Petro kambia.
“Kunu nyi kuwode manake awode mkate ya ngano itanu na makunga hawi. Kyechiwiko cha iki wandu wamfo wado?”
Yesu kahamba, “Damiṟenyi wandu wo wadamye wanda.” Napfo nyi kuwewode-pfo maṟa hafoi. Nahong'u wasoṟo walya wakadamya wanda washikye cha shiku shitanu.
Naho Yesu kawada mkate iya kaidapfuma Ruwa kahawya wandu walya wadamye, na mkunga halya kawewahawya chando wakundi.
Wekiidima ikuihudya Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye, “Doduonyi-ho shipeṟengu sho shitsihee-ho shiladekye wanda.”
Wakadodwo-ho shipeṟengusho sha mkate shiletsuha wandu wamlya wakaichuṟa shikunja ikumi na shiwi.
Kyasia wandu wekiwona ṟiho lilya Yesu awuta wakahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ichu nyi akeri mwikimbi ulya aimteṟye nache kunu wuyana.”
Kyasia Yesu kekimanya nyi icha wai wache wahende imbika mangi nao kasheṟuka, kahenda alya fumvu-hu o amonyi.
Kyasia ili kyukanyi wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakasoka na kulya mawambao ha nduwa.
Wakado alya ngalawehu, wakahenda yambadya kya kulya Kapernaumu. Na mema fuhoye-pfo na Yesu alawemewakoye.
Na nduwa iya ikahalukahaluka mnu masinanu otanu lochiida-ho sa lung'anyi.
Naho ili wa kiloshionyi wammaa ihendesho na ngalawa iya mhendo fo saa imu ang'u kufui nayo (kilometa5-6) nalyo wakawona Yesu kyechichumia huya mṟinga, amshika kufui na ngalawa iya wakaangalala.
Yesu kawawia, “Nyio inyi, ma mulaowuo.”
Nawo wakakunda imdosya ipfo ngalaweny. Nalyo liyenyi wakakoya ngalawa yamshika alya ohambe-hu lo oruka lulya kundo waihenda.

Nahong'u ili lya ngama mamingi fulya fo wandu walya waledeo wahoṟoki kulya molyolya ya nduwa iya wakakoya ke kwipfo-se ngalawa ingipfo shile iya imu iweipfo na Yesu alesangana na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye ido nawo alya ngalawe-hupfo. Nyi walya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye walehenda wo wawenyi.
Kyasia kukacha napfo ngalawa tsingi tsiwuka kulya Tiberia tsikashika kufui na alya ndo walelia mkate iya Mndumii ammaa iadapfuma Ruwa.
Nahong'u mamingi fulya fo wandu ili wakoya Yesu nalaiho manya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakahenda ido alya ngalawehu tsilya wakashika kulya Kapernaumu, wechimpfula.
Nawo ili walemkoya alya ohambe-hu lulya lungi lo nduwa wakambia, “Marya a nyi indi omshika kunu?”
Yesu kawahalwo kahamba, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Kyamwenenga monjiwalya chi maṟiho halya mulewonapfo, nyi kimaduma kya mkate iya mulelya mukaihuda.
Mlawinyie kelya kyechipuo; winyienyi kyelya kyechikaa kipfa kya moo fo mlungana nakyo nyi Mana chu o mndu echimwenenga. Kyamba Wande nyio Ruwa nyi alembikya mhuri yemṟingishya kye nyio.”
Nawo wakambia, “Alewo luwike luda lukoye itana maṟunda ha Ruwa?”
Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Iṟunda lilya liwawaso nyi Ruwa aili, kye kundu muhende iidikya ichu alemduma.”
Nahong'u wakambia, “A nyi kiki otana kyeluloṟa kichano so lukiwone luwute-ho ikuidikya iyo. Nyi owika-pfo kuda ngesa?
Waku walya wadu wo walelya Manna kulya olelenyi lulya chando ki-kiṟehye kyehamba, Alewaenenga mkate folya fuwukye ruwehu.”
Nahong'u Yesu kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Chi Mose amuinengye mkate fu fuwukye ipfo ruwehupfo. Nyio Wande oko amuenenga mkate fu fo lohi fuwukye ruwehu.
Kyamba mkate fu fui fo Ruwa nyio ichu asokye ruwehu kechienenga wuyana wu moo.”
Nahong'u wakambia, “Hoo Mndumii, keluenengewo mkate fu kiheri kyose.”
Yesu kawawia, “Nyio inyi njikeri mkate fu fo moo. Mndu akuchea na koko akiwado-se nyi njaapfo, na mndu awa monjiidikya nakirohyo-se nyi nyoda ma indipfo.
Kya indi ngammaa imbia, kye nyi mulenjiwona manya mulanjiidikie.
Iwo woose Wande amenjienenga wo wechikuchea na koko. Na mndu akuchea na koko njechimfunya njapfo.
Kipfa kyannenga ngasoka ruwehu chi kundu njiwute kya chila yakopfo kya indi kundu njihende iwuta kii kya chila ya ichu alenjiduma.
Na kilya ichu alenjiduma achilia kikeri kii-le, njiladetseho ma umu o walya alenjiinenga kya indi kundu njiṟutse woose Mfiri fulya fofurumia.
Kyamba kindo Wande oko akundi nyi ikyi kye oryo mndu awona Mana na imwidikya nawade moo fo mlungana. Na inyi njechiwaṟutsa Mfiri fo urumia.”
Nahong'u Wayuda wakawoka inunuwa kyake ili ahamba, “Inyi nyi mkate fu fo moo fuchee ruwehu.”
Wakahamba, “Ashika-wo ichu chio Yesu ai mana o Yosefu? Nde na mae na luwaichi. Nyi kyawa kida ili ahamba kye nyi asokye ruwehu?”
Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Lekyenyi inunuwa nyo muwenyi na wenyi.
Kwipfo mndu eidima icha na kokopfo, kulawode wande ichu alenjiduma amhomwo napfo, na inyi njechimṟutsa Mkonu fulya foimarisya.
Waikimbi waleṟehya, ‘Wandu woose wechilosho nyi Ruwa.’ Nahong'u oryo mndu ose aadanya kiwuka ko Wande na ikulosha nyi aicha na koko.
Chi kikeri cha ili kwipfo mndu alemewona Wandepfo, shila nyi ichu awukie ko Ruwa, nyio alemewona Wande.
Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Ichu aidikie nyi awode moo fo mlungana.
Inyi nyi mkate fo moo.
Waku walya wanu wo walelya Mana kulya nuka wakawepfa.
Aifu mkate fusokye ruwehu; kundu wandu wechilya-ho walakikoyese ipfa.
Nyio inyi nji mkate fu fo moo fusokye ruwehu. Mkate fu mndu ailya-ho nechikaa na moo mlungana. Na mkate fo njechimnenga mfo mbihufu foko njifulekia njiwonesye nafo wuyana wu moo.”
Lyo likatewa Wayuda wakaloyana wawenyi na wenyi wakahamba, “A nyi wuda ichu echiidima iluhavya nyama tsake lukulile ngesa?”
Nahong'u Yesu kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mukada mulalya nyama tsa Mana chu o mndu na inyo samu yake mochikaa ma na moo fu mufuriepfo.
Mndu kalya nyama tsako na inyo samu yako nyi awode moo fo mlungana na inyi njechimṟutsa Mkonu fulya foimarisya.
Kyamba nyama tsako tso kando ka lohi na samu yako nyi yo kyenyo kya lohi.
Na mndu kalya nyama tsako kawenyo samu yako nyio akaa kiidi kyako na inyi njikaa kiidi kyakye.
Kikawa chando Wande chu alenjiduma akeri menyi-moo na inyi njii na moo kimaduma kya Wande na wudo da ichu anjilya inyi nyi akaa na moo kimaduma kyako.
Ifu mfo mkate fusokye ruwehu, fulai fo mbaṟi imu na mana iya waku walya walelya wakawepfa. Mkate fu mndu kafulya o echiwada mo mlungana.”
Na kundo alehambya madedo ho nyi ipfo sinagogenyiyi ya kulya Kapernaumu echiloshya-ho.
Nahong'u wa kiloshyonyi kyake wamwicho adeda ado wawo wafoi wakahamba, “Madedo ho nyi maumu. A mndu eidima ihaicho nyi wu?”
Nao Yesu kamanya ke wa kilohyonyi kyake nyi wainunuwa kya ikyo. Nalyo kawawia, “A ikyo kyamutewa mkawa kiṟumaṟuma?
Alewo nyi kyechiwa kida kiheri mochiwona Mana chu o Mndu echido na alya kundo awekukeṟye-ho kacha?
Mumuyo mfo fuiwika moo, mbihufu fumenyi fochiidima kindopfo. Madedo ho ngamemuwia ho hai ha Mumuyo hakawewa na moo.
Indi ipfo kiidi kyanu nyi kwipfo maata walai waidiki.” (Kyamba wuka kiwokyonyi Yesu aweichi walya walamwidikye nyi wahya na ulya echimtwaṟa nyio u.)
Nalyo kahamba, “Nkyo kimaduma ngamuwia, Kwipfo aidima icha na kokopfo shila nyi ichu ai mṟamtse nyi Wande oko.”
Kipfa kya madedo-ha, wandu wa ipfo kiloshyonyi wafoi wakawuya na numa walakihendesane-se nao.
Nahong'u Yesu kawesa walya ikumi na wawi, “Kulako nanyo mokunda ikuhendya ngesa?”
Simon Petro kamhalwo, “Hoi Mndumii lukuhendye ko u ngesa? Nyio iyo uwode madedo haende moo fo mlungana.
Natso lomekuwutya-ho ikuidikya lukakumanya ke iyo nyi ukeri Mwele chu o Ruwa.”
Yesu kawahalwo, “A chio inyi njilemusambuṟa nyo ikumi na wawi? Na ipfo kiidi kyanu umuho kawuya iwa mkumbi?”
Yesu alehamba ado kya Yuda Iskariote ai mana o Simon. Kyamba nao nyio alehenda imtwaṟa ma ili awei umu o walya ikumi na wawi.
Nahong'u ili numa numa Yesu naweida kulya Galilaya. Kyamba alalekunda itengeta kulya Yudaya kipfa wasongoru wa Wayuda wawekundi imbaha.
Na Mkonu mnene fo Wayuda fomanya Matengo iwei kufui.
Nahong'u wanawamae wakambia, “Kure kunu nohende ishika kulya Yerusalemu kundu na wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo wawone ngata tsi tsapfo otana.
Kyamba kwipfo mndu etana kindo kiṟika namanyikye isangenyi-pfo. Kokoya owuta shindo shii shidi henda kuloṟe-ng'u na wuyana wu.” (
Kyamba ma wanawamae wawememwidikie-pfo.)
Nahong'u Yesu kawawia, “Kiheri kyako kyamshikapfo. Indi nyo kiheri kii kyanu kyo kihianyi na mkonu yose.
Ma wuyana wu woidima imusuo nyopfo. Indi inyi wanjisuo kipfa kya kiṟingishyo kyako njiwikye kimaduma kyawo njihamba ke mawuto hawo hai mawicho.
Nyo kudoyenyi na kulya mkonu ii mnene. Inyi njihenda ido napfo mkonu yo mnenepfo kipfa heri lyako lilandeshika ihoya.”
Amdeda nawo ado o amonyi kakaa kulya Galilaya.
Kyasia wanawamae wamedo napfo kya mkonu iya mnene iipfo nao Yesu kawedo napfo kyaṟo kilawei kya pata.
Wasongoru wa Wayuda walya wakawa wempfula-pfula ili lya mkonu iya mnene wakahamba, “Alewo o nyiku-aya ngesa?”
Na wandu walya wafoi waweiho wakachila mnu kyake. Walya maata wakahamba, “O ai mcha wyo.” Maata wakahamba, “Ote nyi adekesha wandu.”
Ma kudo kulakae-pfo mndu adeda kyake na pata kipfa nyi waowoye wasongoru walya wa Wayuda.
Nahong'u mkonu iya mnene ishikie kyenga Yesu kahenda kulya hekalunyi kadamia-ho echilosha wandu.
Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakaṟihio wakahamba, “A mndu chu nyi wuda aichi mapfundo nao alalesoma shule?”
Nahong'u Yesu kawahalwo kahamba, “Mloshye yo yako njilosha nayo chi yako inyipfo kya indi nyi ya ichu alenjiduma.
Mndu akundi iṟunda shilya Ruwa akundi nyio echimanya kya mloshye yo yako kokoya nyi ipfo ko Ruwa iwukye ang'u kokoya nyi ngadeda kiwukye koko inyi njimonyi.
Ichu ekyekuhambia kyakye tupu o apfula iwikyo kiṟumi o amonyi. Indi mndu atambahanya iwonya ichu alemduma kiṟumi o akeri mhendeli alawode mtaambo, o lohi.
Alewo chio Mose amunengye wuwawaso? Na kunu kiidi kyanu kuipfo ma umu aiindia wuwawaso wupfo. Kimaduma nyi ki ili mukundi injiwaha?”
Wandu walya wakuwumbie-ho wakahalwo. “Nyi uisuko! Nyiwu akundi ikuwaha?”
Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Nyi ngata imu njiletana nanyo mukaṟihio kyayo.
Mose nyi amwinengye mṟumo fo odino, Ma chi ipfo ko Mose fuwukyepfo kya indi nyi ipfo ko waku walya. Nanyo mokedina mndu na mkonu fo Sabato.
Kyasia kokoya mndu naidino ili lya Sabato kundu wuwawaso wo Mose wulahende itahachyo nkili monjiwadya nyashi ili njilechiṟa mndu pyu mkonu fo Sabato?
Mulawone modumbwo mondu mochiadanya ora lumu. Dumbwonyi mdumbuye fo sungusihu.”
Nahong'u wandu maata wa kulya Yerusalemu wakahamba, “Alewo chio ichu wawempfulya mweke fombaha?
Ambuyenyi! Nyi aiwaikimba na pata walambie ma kindo. Kulako wasongoru walemanya kye nyio Kristo ngesa?
Kya indi mndu chu nyi lumwichi kundu awukye, na kiheri Kristo echicha kwipfo mndu echimanya kundo echichapfo. Kyaindi so luichi kundu awukie.”

Lyo likaenenga Yesu ipfo hekalunyi kundo ailosha kaira ṟu kahamba, “Ee-da na muwenjiichi na kundo njiwukye na muweichi da. Na inyi njicheye kui chila yako njimonyipfo. Kwipfo mokilohi alenjiduma, nao ma mulamwichi nyo.
Inyi njimwichi, kyamba nyi ipfo koke njiwukye nao nyi anjidumye.”
Nahong'u wakawa wepfula mweke fombada mondu, ma kulakae-pfo mndu alekaria imleshia owokonyi kipfa kiheri kyake kilawemshike.
Nahong'u ipfo maminginyi fo wandu wafoi-ho wakawuta-ho imwidikya o, wakahamba, “Kiheri Kristo echicha a nechiwika shichano shing'anyie iishi ichu alewika ngesa?”
Wafarisayo wakaichowandu waideda kya Yesu shiwehewehe shidi naho wakohanyi walya wang'anyi na Wafarisayo wakasangana wakaduma wasoṟo wawo wahende imbada.
Yesu kahamba, “Nyi kiheri sa kyangu njitsinda-se nanyo njihende ko ichu alenjiduma.
Mochinjiwalya mulechinjikoya. Kyamba kundo inyi njechikaa moidima ishika-ho nyopfo.”

Nahong'u Wasongoru wa Wayuda walya wakadeda wo wenyi na wenyi, “Akawo mndu chu nyi hanga aihenda napfo naso lude lulamkoya-se? Kulako akunda ishika ko Wayuda walya wanyanyaṟikye ipfo masangenyi ha Wagriki nahendelosha-pfo Wagriki wo?
Kimaduma nkiki ili ahamba, mochinjiwalya mulechinjikoya na ipfo kundo inyi njechikaa moidima ishika-ho nyopfo?”
Naho ili komshika mkonu fulya mnene foimarisya nafo fui mtoṟu kota ingi Yesu kahoroka-ho kaira ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Kokoya kwiho mndu awodo nyoda nakucheye na koko nache inyo.
Mndu kanjiidikya inyi kyake kyechiwa chando kiikiṟehye kyehamba, ke mndu chu ipfo mrimenyi fokye kochisoka-pfo meda ya mra fo mṟinga fuwode moo.”
Nakyo nyi alededa kya macheyenyi ha fo Mumuyo Mwele, fulya wandu wamwidikye wekaa wafuambie. Kyamba mandi halya Mumuyo Mwele fulawemsokye kipfa Yesu alawemeng'anyisho.
Wandu maata wa ipfo maminginy fo wandu wekiicho adeda adi wakahamba, “Ichu nyi lohi ai mwikimbi ulya.”
Wengi wakahamba, “Ichu nyio Kristo.” Wengi wakahamba, “Alewo Kristo nawukye kulya Galilaya?
Mareho Maele hahambieki? Hahambye, ke Kristo echicha awukye kishariny kya Dawidi,” na echifeo ipfo Betlehemu ipfo mṟiny fo Dawidi.
Nahong'u mamingi fulya fo wandu fukadumbukana kawi kimaduma kyake.
Kukawekaa-pfo wandu wangu wakundi imbada indi kulakaepfo mombada.
Nahong'u wasoṟo walya wadume wakawuya na kulya ko wakohanyi wanene na Wafarisayo. Nawo wakawawia, “A nyi kyi kyaima mulamwende?”
Wasoṟo walya wakahalwo, “Kulandewoneke msa adeda cha mndu chupfo.”
Wafarisayo wakawahalwo, “Nanyo namuiwatandawushe?
Mlemewona mndu msongoru ma umu tupu amemwidikya ang'u o ipfo ko Wafarisayo?
Kya indi moṟimboho fu fo wandu fulaichi wuwawaso, wo Mose; wai wasese!”
Umu-ho nyi Nikodemo ulya alesahya Yesu kacha, nao nyi o ipfo kiidi kyawo kawawia.
“Alewo wuwawaso wu luwode nyi wokewonya mndu owingo kulawode nyi ammaa yadanyo komeshika itichyo kilya kyake aletana ngesa?”
Nawo wakahalwo wakambia, “Kulako na iyo nyi uwukye kulya Galilaya? Suma Maṟehyo Maele teṟe nomanye, ke kulya Galilaya kochikure-pfo mwikimbi manyale-pfo.” [
Wakahenda oryo mndu na kanyi kokye.
Nahong'u Yesu kahenda kulya fumvunyi lya mtsinepfu.
Ili lya ngama ngamenyi kaida-se na ipfo hekalunyi Wandu waipfo woose wakamwosha, nao kadamya-pfo kechiwalosha.
Nahong'u Walaanyi wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakaende napfo mka amtumukyo wuṟuhuinyi. Wakamhoṟotsa oo makiidi hawi.
Wakawesa Yesu, “Alewo Mwarya, Mka chu amtumukyo wuhuṟuinyi.
Mose aluwawasye ipfo Wuwawasonyi wodu kya waka wa mbaṟi ii kye lowakapa na maho. Na iyo nyi ohamba kuda kya iki ngesa?”
Kyainenga wadeda wadi nyi ili wakundi imhesha wawone kitewe kyemkumba. Na Yesu kakuaramya wanda kechiṟehia na kimnyo ipfo teri-hu.
Naho ili waleisima imbesa kahoṟoka kawawia, “Ichu onu alai na mti o naase imkapa na iho.”
Nahong'u kawuya kakuaramya-se lingi wanda kechiṟehya teri-hu.
Nawo wamicho wado wakawoka ituṟuka-ho umu umu wakawokya na wameku wakatana wasia-ho. Na Yesu kadeo-pfo amonyi na mka ulya ahoṟoki oo kiidi.
Nahong'u Yesu kekihoṟoka kawesa mka ulya, “Nyiku waya wandu walya? Kokaa-pfo ma umu akuwutya kya mti fulya?”
Mka ulya kahamba, “Ma umupfo, Mndumii.” Nahong'u Yesu kambia, “Manya inyi njikuwonya kya mti fulyapfo. Kuhendye. Kowuka-ho dumbuya teṟe, ulakinyamaṟe-se.”]
Nahong'u Yesu kawuya kadeda nawo lingi kahamba, “Inyi nyi sa ya wuyana. Mndu anjilatya nakihenda-se memenyipfo. Nechikaa ai na sa yende moo.”
Nahong'u Wafarisayo wakambia, “Iyo nyi okuṟingishya kyapfo kumonyi. Kiṟingishyo kyo kyapfo kii kya lohipfo.”

Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Na kokoya ngakuṟingishya kyako njimonyi, kiṟingishyo kyako na kii kya lohi da nyi kipfa njiichi kundo njiwukye na kundo njihenda. Indi nyo mulaichi ma kundo njiwukye ma kundo njihenda.
Nyo mokedumbwo mochiambuya fana ya nja, indi inyi njidumbwo kya mndupfo.
Na kokoya ngadumbwo kya mndu mdumbuye foko nyi fo sungusihu fowa fuichi kimaenyi cha kipfa njilaiho njimonyi. Wande-chu alenjiduma nai na inyi.
Ma ipfo wuwawasonyi wonu nyi kii-kiṟehye kyehamba, ke kiṟingishyo kii-kiwike nyi wandu wawi nyi kya lohi.
Nyio inyi njii mṟingishi njikuṟingishya kyako chando kii, na wandechu alenjiduma kaṟingishya kyako da.”
Nahong'u wakambia, “Wande chu opfo nyi ku aya?” Yesu kahalwo, “Inyi munjiichipfo ma Wande mumwichi-pfo. Kima muwenjiichi inyi na Wande oko na muwemmanya da.”
Nyiho madedo Yesu alededa ipfo kiṟihenyi hando njosano tsekeambyo kechilosha wandu ipfo Hekalunyi. Ma kulakaepfo mndu ambada cha kipfa kiheri kyakye kilawemeshikye.
Yesu kawuya kawawia lingi, “Inyi njikuhendya nanyo mochinjipfula. Na mochikupfia ipfo wunyamarinyi wonu. Kundo kulya inyi njikuhendya nyo mochiidima ishika-ho pfo.”
Wasongoru wa Wayuda wakahamba, “Kulako akundi ikuwaha Nki ili ahamba kye kundo kulya njikuhendya mochiidima ishika-ho nyopfo?”
Yesu kawawia, “Nyo nyi kunu wuyana mupaṟikye, inyi kipaṟika kyako nyi kulya huye. Nyo mui wandu wa wuyana, inyi chi o wuyanapfo.
Nkyo kitewe ngamuwia-ng'u, Nyi ipfo wunyamaṟinyi wonu kundo mukeri mpfondo mochikupfia. Kyamba kokoya mulechiidikya kye, ‘Inyi nyio.’ Na ipfo wunyamaṟinyi wonu kundo mukeri mpfondo mochikupfia.”
Nawo wakambia, “Alewo iyo o ku ngesa?” Yesu kawawia, “Njilemuwia wokya o, ke kilya njideda nanyo idumbwo kyanu njileicho.
Njiwode shifoi shededa kyanu na idumbwo kyanu. Kya indi ichu alenjiduma akeri menyi-wukilohi, na inyi shilya njileicho shiwuka kokye nsho njiiwia wa wuyana.”
Nawo ma walamanye ke aideda nawo kii kya Wande.

Nahong'u Yesu kahamba, “Mukamshika iiria Mana chu o mndu mpfondo mochimanya ke, ‘Inyi nyio;’ na imanya ke njiwode kindo ngiwuta ki kya chila yako njimonyi-pfo kyaindi ikyo Wande alenjilosha nkyo njihamba.
Na ichu alenjiduma nyi ahendesanyi na inyi. Ma anjida njikae njimonyi-pfo kipfa nyi njiwuta shichihianyi nao mfiri yose.”
Kyekimaa ideda ado wandu wafoi wakamwidikia.
Nahong'u Yesu kadeda na Wayuda walya wamwidikye kahamba, “Kokokya mokaa mukuwode na dedo lyako lyo-ng'u mochiwa wa kiloshyonyi kyako wa lohi.
Na imanya mochimanya wukilohi wu, na wukilohi wu wochimwashwo muwe wenyi-mkuachie.”
Nawo wakamhalwo, “So lui luwa lya Abrahamu, lulandewe masinga ha mndu ma indipfo. Kyawa kida ili ohamba, Muwe wenyimkuachie?”
Yesu kawahalwo, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Oryo mndu mowuta wunyamaṟi akeri isinga lyesingya wunyamaṟi.
Isinga ekyekaa na menyi ipfo kanyi kiheri kyosepfo. Mndu mokaa kanyi kiheri kyose nyi Mana.
Kokoya ichu ai Mana echimwashwo lyo-ng'u mochiwa wenyi-mkuachie.
Njiweichi da nyi mukeri luwa lya Abrahamu. Kya indi nyi mukundi injiwaha kipfa muladikia idedo lyako.
Inyi kilya njiwonyi ipfo ko Wande nkyo njikeri ihamba. Nanyo kilya momicho kiwukye ko ndeanu nkyo muiwuta.”
Wakahalwo wakambia, “Ndeyadu nyio Abrahamu.” Yesu kawawia, “Kokoya muwei wana wa Abrahamu nyi muwewuta chandu Abrahamu alewuta.
Inyi ngamuwia wukiilohi njilewuicho ko Ruwa; na ma kudo mkundi injiwaha. O Abrahamu alewika adipfo!
Nyo nyi mokewuta mawuto halya halya ha waku wanu walewuta.” Wakambia, “Chi lui-wafee wa njapfo. So luwode Wande umu da nao nyio Ruwa.”
Yesu kawawia, “Ukoye Ruwa awei Ndeyanu nyi muwenjikunda inyi kyamba inyi njilecha njiwuka ko Ruwa na wulalu njikeri iya. Njilecha kui kyama kyako inyi njimonypfo. Ruwa alenjiduma.
A kimaduma nyi ki ili mulamanya mdedye foko? Manya mulaidima yadanya idedo li lyako.

Nyo mui wana wa Mkumbi ulya onu, na mukundi iwuta lango tsa ndeanu. Na ishi shilango nyi Nde chu onyu nyisho mukundi ishiwuta. O awekeri mmbahi, mowaha wandu wokya mawokyonyi; alakuwode wukilohi-hu ma hanga, kipfa wukilohi wulai nao. Ilindi adeda kii wongo kyo kii kyake akiende kii kya chure yake amonyi kipfa akeri mowongo kawa nyio mku mopaṟa shi wongo shose.
Kya indi inyi njekehamba wukilohi wu nkyo kyaima mulanjiidikye.
A le nyi wu o kunu konu aidima injiwonya mti fo kindo njiwenyamaṟye? Na kokoya ngahamba wukilohi wu, kitewe mulanjidikye nyi iki ngesa?
Ichu apaṟikye ko Ruwa o nekeadanya madedo ha Ruwa. Nanyo muinjiadanyiapfo kipfa nyo chi wana wa Ruwapfo.”
Wayuda walya wakahalwo wakambia, “Chi lohamba kya lohi kye ukeri Msamaria uwodo nyi oṟuṟe?”
Yesu kahalwo, “Inyi njiwodo nyi oṟuṟe manyalepfo. Inyi njiwikya Wande oko kiṟumi kya indi nyo muidetsa kilya kii kyako.
Manya njipfula iwada kiṟumi kyakopfo. Na kwipfo umu mokiringa, nao nyi modumbuo mondu.
Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mndu awada madedoho hako echipfa ma indiipfo.”
Wayuda walya wakambia, “Wulalu lomanyang'u kye uwodo oṟuṟe! Abrahamu nalepfa na waikimbi wakawepfo da; na iyo kohamba, ‘Ichu echikuwada na idedo lyapfo echipfa ma indipfo.
Akawo iyo ui mnene kong'anya mku odu Abrahamu ngesa, nao nyi alewepfa? Na waikimbi walya wakawepfa da. Nyi okutana cha wu iyo kumonyi ngesa?’ ”
Yesu kahalwo, “Kokoya ngakung'anyisha njimonyi mng'ano foko fuwechiwa kindopfo. Wande chu oko mochekyehamba nyio Ndeanu nyio ainjing'anyisha.
Ma mulalememmanye. Kyaindi inyi njimwichi. Kokoya ngahamba njimwichipfo nyi njiwechiwa mowongo chanyo. Kya indi njimwichi na idedo lii lyake lyo njiliringa.
Abrahamu mku chu onu nyi alekesa kya iwona mkonu fu foko nao kafuwona kachihio.”
Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakambia, “Alewo iyo omshitsa ma maka makumi hatanu-pfo, kohamba nyi kulewona Abrahamu?”
Yesu kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mandi Abrahamu alawemefeo inyi njiwei-pfo.”
Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakaira maho wamkumbye. Nao Yesu kasheṟuka kawuka ipfo hekalunyi.
Na ili Yesu aweiida kawona mndu apfie meso kui ifeo.
Na walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambesa, “Alewo Mwaria, mndu anyamaṟyeho nyi uhya, nyio ichu a nyi wafee wakye ili alewoneka ado ai mpfu meso?”
Yesu kahalwo, “Ma chi ichu ma chi wafee wakyepfo. Kya indi nyi kilewa kido kundu pfinya Ruwa iwono yechirunda ipfo kokye.
Kui na sa kiluwaṟi luṟunde maṟunda na ichu anjidumye; kipfa kio kiicha kiheri mndu elechiidima iṟunda maṟunda.
Mandi njikeri kunu wuyana njii sa ya wuyana.”
Kyekihamba ado kapuchya mada ipfo wanda, mada halya kawumbawumba naho mbumba fo teri. Mbumba fulya fo teri kafushia kulya mesonyi ha mpfu meso.
Kambia, “Kehenda kusanje kulya nduwenyi ya Siloamu.” (Kohalwo nyi kimu na “Mndu mdume.”) Nao mpfu meso ulya kakuhendya-pfo kakusanja, adi kawuya kechiambwo.
Kyasia walya wamṟasa wake na walya walembona lya awei maliomba wakahamba, “A lae ichu chi mkiwa ulya echidamya kawa maliomba?”
Wengi wakahamba, “Chiopfo lang'u.” Wengi wakahamba, “Ote nyi mndu afananyi nao.” Nao kahamba, “Ee nyio inyi da.”
Nahong'u wakambia, “A meso hapfo nyi wuda halewuya itambaṟuka?”
Nao kahalwo, “Nyi mndu ulya alaho nyi Yesu o amewumba mbumba fo teri kafushia aa mesonyi hako kanjiwia, ‘Henda samba kulya nduwenyi ya Siloamu.’ Nalyo ngamhenda, ngasamba ngaidima iambuo.”
Wakambia, “A mndu chu nyi ku aya?” Kahamba, “Njichinyi.”
Nalyo wakahenda iduo mndu ulya awei kipfupfure kulya ko Wafarisayo.
Na mfiri-pfo Yesu alewumbawumba teri nyi mkonu fo Sabato katambaṟuo meso halya hake.
Kyasia Wafarisayo nawo da wakambesa-se, “Kuleambuo kuda?” Nao kawawia, “Nyi aleshia mbumba fo teri aa mesonyi, ngamhenda isamba ngakoya-ng'u yambwo.”

Nahong'u Wafarisayo maata-ho wakahamba, “Mndu chu awukie ko Ruwapfo kyamba ada alaindya Sabato.” Wengi wakahamba, “A mndu mnyamaṟi naidime iwuta ado ṟiho tsa mbaṟi ii ngesa?” Kyasiang'u wakadumbukana kawi.
Wakawuya wakawia-se kipfupfuṟe ulya, “A iyo kyakye nohamba kuda ili akuambuṟye meso?” Nao kahamba, “Nyi akeri mwikimbi.”
Nahong'u wasongoru wa Wayuda walya walaidikye kyake kye nyi awepfie meso kawuya yambwo. Wakatana walaha wafee wa mndu ulya alekoya yambwo.
Wakawawesa wakahamba, “Ichu na mana onu ulya mochekehamba nyi amfee ai mpfu meso? Aka nyi wuda alewiko ili aambuo wulalu?”
Wafee wakye wakahalwo wakahamba, “Nawo luweichi nyi ai mana odu na ifeo nawei mfee ai mpfu meso.
Kya indi kundo aendye wuamburu wu kyakyo lokimanyasepfo ma mndu cho alemwambuṟa meso lumwichipfo. Kekumbesyenyi amonyi atoṟikye nechekudedya kyake amonyi!”

Na kyaenenga wafee walya wakadeda wado nyi waleowuo wasongoru walya wa Wayuda. Kyamba Wayuda walya wawemmaa ideda kyama kyawo kye kokoya mndu echimhamba na pata kye nyio Kristo nawo wambute siṟinyi yawo.
Nkyo kiletewa wafee wakye wakahamba, “Nyi atoṟikye, kembesenyi o amonyi!”
Nahong'u wakawuya wakalaha-se mndu ulya awei kipfupfuṟe wakambia, “Hamba lohi oshangunyi lo Ruwa. Kya mndu chu luichi kye nyi akeri mnyamaṟi.”
Nahong'u mndu ulya kahalwo, “Koka nyi ai mnyamaṟi kyakyo njiichi-pfo. Na kimu tupu njiichi kye mbei kipfupfuṟe ngawuya yambwo wulalu.”
Wakambia, “A ngesa nyi alekuwika ada? Kakuambuṟa ada meso ho?”
Mnducho kawahalwo, “A ili ngamembia-se nanyo mulaadanye. Nyi kya ki-se mukundi ikiicho lya kawi. Ngesa nanyo na mbekundi imhalukya muwe wa kiloshyonyi kyake?”
Wakamruma wakahamba, “Mndu o kiloshyonyi kyake na iyo. So lui wa kiloshyonyi kya Mose.
Kya Mose nyi luichi kye Ruwa alededa nao. Kya indi mndu chu lumwichi o kupfo!”
Mndu ulya kahalwo kawawia, “Iki nyi kindo kya kiṟiha ili mulaichi kye nyi o ku, nao alenjiambuṟa meso ha hako.
So nyi luichi kye Ruwa echiadanya wandu wanyamaṟipfo. Na msa aowoye Ruwa kawuta shilya shimchihie nyio ekyemwadanya.
Wokya mawokyenyi ha wuyana kulemewonekye mndu aambuṟye meso ha mndu a mfee ai kipfupfuṟe-pfo.
Kima chila mndu chu awei o ko Ruwa aweidima iwuta kindo-pfo.”
Nawo wakambia, “A iyo ui mfee kudo ui mnyamaṟi kotana olulosha so?” Nawo wakamtuhuta na nja.
Kyasia Yesu kaicho kye nyi wamtuhutye na nja. Kekimkumbuhana kambia, “Uidikye Mana chu o mndu ngesa?”
Nao kahalwo kahamba, “A nyi o wu Mndumii na inyi njikekumwidikya-ng'u.”
Yesu kambia, “Iwona omembona, na ichu aipfo adeda na iyo nyio.”
Nao kahamba, “Akawo ngakuidikya hoi Mndumii!” Kakuhutsa wanda na kyamu oo madendeny hake.
Na Yesu kahamba, “Inyi kindo njikucheye na kunu wuyana nyi ianduya, iwa walawonyi kundu wakoye iwona, na iwa wawonyi kundu wawe shipfupfuṟe.”
Wafarisayo maata-ho warianyi nao waicho wado wakambesa, “Ngesa naso lui wapfu meso?”
Yesu kawawia, “Kima mbei wapfu meso muwewa wanyamaṟipfo. Kya indi wulalu momhamba, ‘So nyi lui waamburu,’ na ikyo kyaloṟa mui wanyamaṟi.”
Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, “Mndu kada alaida na mfiṟihenyi fo machondi aida oo mongo, kang'alawuo hando hengi o nyi mwiwi na msoki.
Indi ichu aiida napfo aida oo mongonyi nyio ai mlisi o machondi.
Nao mringi o mfiṟiha kawempengeluya kichi. Na machondi halya hakaicho ṟu lyakye. Na machondi halya hai hakye amonyi kahalaha marina haho kahaduo nja.
Kamaa iduo halya hai hakye nja hose nekehasongoya. Na machondi halya hakamwiwata kyamba haichi ṟu lyakye.
Indi mndu mhenu hekemlatyapfo, kya indi nyi hekemdicha cha kipfa halaichi ṟu lya wahenu.”
Nyifong'u mfanano Yesu alewawia. Nawo walamanye ikyo arie iwawia nkyo iki.
Nahong'u Yesu kawawiase, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, inyi nyi mongo fohenda kundo machondi hai.
Walya walenjisongoya nyi wawekeri waiwi na wasoki wose kya indi machondi halawaadanye.
Ngiṟi iya nyio inyi. Mndu aida napfo aidia koko nyechikiṟo na yanga napfo na iwuka napfo nawekoya na uṟa.
Mndu ai mwiwi nelekecha shila nyi kundu naiwe na ishinja na idetsa. Inyi njilecha napfo kundu mukoye iwada moo na mweena fofo fose.
“Mlisi mcha nyio inyi. Ichu ai mlisi mcha nyi nekerekya machondi hakye moo.
Mndu chu ai mekelei ma alakeri mlisi, machondi ho halambaṟi hakye, kyakye kawona rumu lyechicha nao katihia-ho machondi ho kadicha. Na rumu likacha iharakwo na iharahanyitsa.
Cha kipfa ili o ai mekelei ma echisaṟa machondi hopfo.
Mlisi mcha nyio inyi. Na inyi njiichi iho hai hako, naho hakawekunjimanya.
Chando nao Wande anjiichi inyi na inyi njiweichi Wande, Na inyi ngarekya machondi moo.
Njiwode na machondi hengi-se halakeri ha mfiṟihafu. Kyaho nangaki na njihaende naho. Naho na hecheicho ṟu lyako. Naho kochikaa-ho ipo limu tupu na mlisi na umu mfi.”
“Nkyo kyaenenga Wande anjikundi ili ngakurekya-ho moo foko kundu njiwuye ifuwada-se lingi.
Ma kwipfo aifunjisokapfo kya indi nyi ngafulekya kui ikunda lyako njimonyi. Nyi njiwode pfinya ya ifulekya, njiwewode na pfinya ya ifuwada-se. Nyi wudo wande oko alenjiwawasia njiṟunde.”
Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakawuya idumbukanase kawi kipfa kya madedo halya hake.
Wafoi wa ipfo kiidi kyawo wakahmba, “Nyi oṟuṟe lumbode na isuko kasuko. A nyi nkya ki-se mumwadanyia?”
Wengi wakahamba, “Madedo ho adeda chi hakeri cha ha mndu awodo nyi oṟuṟepfo. Alewo mooṟuṟe awechiidima itambaṟuo meso ha shipfupfuṟe ngesa?”
Nahong'u kushikye mkonu mnene kulya Yerusalemu fokumbwo ngumbwo ya hekalu ilesamyo. Na kiheri kilya kiwei kya mbeo.
Na Yesu aweichumiachumia ipfo hekalunyi ipfo kiṟihenyi kyalyo kihambo kya Solomon.
Nalyo Wayuda walya wakacha imtengetia wakahamba, “Mtano indi ochiluwika mkeumkeu? Kokoya ukeri Kristo iyo, keluwie-wo na pata ṟaa.”
Yesu kawahalwo, “Nyi njilemuwia da nanyo mulaidikye. Maṟunda hako ngiwuta kui rina lya Wande oko, nyiho-ng'u hainjiṟingishia.
Nanyo ma mulaidikye ili mulakeri kambenyi lya machondi hako.
Machondi ho hako nyi haicho ṟu lyako. Na inyi njihaichi naho hanjilatya.
Na inyi ngahaenenga moo fo mlungana. Naho ma hechikaa hadeke-se ma mlunganapfo. Ma kwipfo mndu echiharakwo kunu owokonyi lokopfo.
O Wande ahanjienengye nyi ang'anye wose. Ma kwipfo mndu aidima iharakwo ipfo mawokonyi ha Wandepfo.
Inyi na wande lui wamu.”
Nalyo Wayuda walya wakawuya yende maho wamkape naho.
Yesu kawahalwo, “Maṟunda hafoi sa mecha ngamaa imbonesya nyo hawuka ko Wande. Ipfo kiidi kyaho nyi liki lyemtewa munjikape na maho ngesa?”
Nalyo Wayuda walya wakamhalwo, “Chi kimaduma kya iṟunda liwe icha lurie ikukapa na mahopfo. Nyi kimaduma kya ngalali yapfo yeruma Ruwa, na ili iyo ukeri mndu o wandu kokutana Ruwa kumonyi.”
Yesu kawahalwo, “A ipfo wuwawasonyi wonu chi kuwode-pfo idedo lii iṟehye lyehamba, ke, Inyi njilehamba, ‘Nyo nyi mukeri maruwa?’
Kyasia walya waleshitsyo idedo lya Ruwa komkoya Ruwa nyi alewasenda maruwa na iki kii-kiṟehye ma kilechiwa ipfunguka.
Ashika-wo inyi ili njiletano mwele nyi Wande kanjiduma kunu wuyana nyi monjihamba ke nyi ngaruma Ruwa ili ngahamba, njikeri Mana o Ruwa ko?
Kokoya ngada njilawuta maṟunda ha Wande oko, denyi mulanjiidikye inyi.
Indi kokoya ngawa mohawuta nahong'u mulanjiidikye inyi modeda, keidikyanenyi na maṟunda ho hako mukuwutye-ho imanya kya kisimirya kye o Wande ai na inyi na inyi njii na Wande.”
Nahong'u wakawuya wakapfula mweke fombada. Nao kakuashuo ipfo mawokonyi hawo.
Yesu kawada njia kaambada meda fo Yordanyi kashika kulya kundo Yohane epatsiya kakaapfo.
Wandu wakamchea wafoi, nawo wakahamba, “O Yohane ma alewuta ngata ya ṟihopfo. Kya indi kilya Yohane alededa kya ichu kyamba iwa kya lohi kyose.”
Nalyo wandu wa kulya wafoi wakamwidikia.
Kyasia kuwekeri-pfo mndu aluo nyio Lasaro o kulya Betanyia (o mṟi fulya fo Maria na Marita manawo.
Na Maria nyi ulya aleshimbwo Mndumii na mafuda ha opfamu sa lucha, kaangatsa madende hake na njui tsa mdonyi fokye. Na msacha chu okye nyio Lasaro ulya aweluo.)
Nahong'u washiki walya wakye wakamdumya Yesu ndumi wakahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, mbuya yapfo nyi aluo.”
Yesu kekiicho ado kahamba, “Ndaṟe ii chi ikeri ya opfupfo, chila kipfa kya mng'ano fo Ruwa kundu Mana chu o Ruwa nanganyisho.”
Na Yesu nyi ekundi Marita na maomae Maria na Lasaro.
Kyasia amicho Lasaro nyi aluo Yesu katsinda-se mfiri iwi kulyando awekeri.
Kidima kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Kendeng'u luwuye na kulya Yudaya.”
Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambia, “Hoi Mwarya, kandi Wayuda walya werie ikukapa na maho, na iyo owuya napfo lingi?”
Yesu kahalwo, “Saa tsa mfiri chi tsiipfo ikumi na tsiwi? Kokoya mndu achumia kiheri kya mfiri echikapa mtuliapfo kipfa nyi awonyi sa ya wuyana wu.
Indi kokoya mndu achumia ili kio nechikapa mtulia kipfa sa iya ilakeri nao.”
Yesu ekihamba adi kawuya kalungyaho kingi kawawia, “Mbuya chu odu Lasaro nyi alee, kya indi njihenda-pfo njimpang'tse.”
Nahong'u walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambia, “Hai Mwarya, kokoya naleee madonyi nyi echichia.”
Na Yesu adeda ado kehambaho opfu loke, nawo wakahamba lako nyi aideda kya mahombyenyi ha mado.
Nalyo Yesu kawawia na pata, “Lasaro ampfa.
Na inyi ngachihio ili njilawekeriho kipfa kyanu nyo kundu muwuteho iidikya. Indi nndenyi-ng'u luhende kulya kokye.”
Nahong'u Toma (ulya alaho o mbasa) kawia wodoya walya wa kiloshyonyi “Nndenyi-ng'u naso, luhede ipfa hamu nao!”
Nahong'u Yesu kekicha-ho kakoya ammaa mkonu iina opangenyi.
Na kowuka kulya Betanyia ushike Yerusalemu nyi ochimaa mhendo fo kyenga kya saa ushike kilometa tsiṟaṟu(mastadio 15).
Na Wayuda wafoi wawecheye na kulya kany ko Maria na Marita kundu wechiwawanza kya opfu lo msacha chu owo.
Nahong'u Marita kekiicho Yesu akeri icha kahenda imwambya na Maria kakaa kulya kanyi.
Marita kawia Yesu, “Hoi Mndumii, nokoe iyo kuwekeri-iya msacha oko nawechipfapfo.
Nako na wulalu njiichi oryo kindo ochiterewa Ruwa nao Ruwa echikuenenga kyose.”
Yesu kambia, “Msacha opfo nyi echikuṟukya.”
Marita kambia, “Njiichi nyi echikuṟukya iya maṟukyenyi ili Mkonu fulya fofurumya.”
Yesu kambia, “Inyi nyio wuṟuki na moo. Na mndu anjiidikye nekaa-ho na moo ma kapfa.
Na ichu aiho na moo kanjiidikya ekaa napfe ma indi-pfo. Ngesa uweidikye kudo?”
Nao kambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii, nawo ngamekuidikya nyi ui Kristo Mana chu o Ruwa ulya awechicha na kunu wuyana.”
Kekihamba ado kakure-pfo kahenda ilaha Maria ulya ai manomae kambia kya kiṟika, “Marya amcha nao nyi akulaha.”
Nao kekiicho ado kakambiṟa ikure owinyi kahenda alyando Yesu ai.
Na Yesu awemeshikye kulya mṟinyipfo, nawei alyando ekumbuhana Marita.
Nahong'u Wayuda walya wawei na Maria ipfo mba wechimbanzawanza ili wawonyi Marita akure owinyi chuṟu kehenda nja wakamwosha wehamba kye nyi echihenda ipfo opangenyi ihenda ikapya-pfo kilio.
Nahong'u Maria kekishika alya ndo Yesu ai kekimbona adi kakuhutsa wanda oo madendenyi hake kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nokoe iyo uweiho msacha oko nawechipfapfo.”
Nahong'u Yesu kekiwona kelia na Wayuda walya wacha warianyi nao nawo, kawado nyi rihima ipfo ngoonyi kawa kirihisa o amonyi.
Kahamba, “Nyi ku mumlaṟye?” Wakambia, “Njoo-wo Mndumii, noambuye.”
Yesu katonyitsa matihi.
Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakahamba, “Keambuyenyi chando awemkundi.”
Nawo maata-ho wakahamba, “A ichu aleweambuṟa-se meso ha kipfupfuṟe kilya nalaidime iima Lasaro nalapfe?”
Nahong'u Yesu kawuya iwado nyi rihima ipfo ngoonyi lingi kashika oo opangenyi. Na opanga lo luwei utoche na iho li-ihekye oo momu.
Yesu kahamba, “Keirenyi-ho iho ili.” Marita mshiki o mpfu ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, amshika idaa! Kyamba mkonu fu nyi fo kaana lang'u.”
Yesu kambia, “A lyando ngawekuwia, Komekuidikya nyi ochiwona wuitoṟi wo Ruwa?”
Nalyo wakairaho iho lilya. Na Yesu kairya meso huye ruwehu kahamba, “Hoi Wande, ngakuana ili okenjiadanya.
Na inyi na mbeichi nyi owa monjiadanya kiheri kyose. Kya indi nyi kipfa kya wandu wa wahoṟoki iya waiṟingichye nkyondo ngakihambya kundu wechiwuta-ho iidikya ke nyi iyo unjidumye.”
Kekihamba ado kakoṟoṟoma na ṟu ling'anyi, “Lasaro, ncho na nja.”
Nalyo lienyi mpfu ulya kawukaho kacha na nja ampfungye shidami sha nguo madende ho na mawoko ho na kyamu kyake kii-kiwoshye na kidami kya mbiṟuko. Yesu kawawia, “Kempfungwonyi mumlekye nakuhendye.”
Nahong'u Wayuda wafoi walya wacheye na kulya ko Maria wekiwona kilya Yesu awuta wakamwidikia.
Na walya maata-ho wakahenda kulya ko Wafarisayo wakawawia kilya Yesu awuta.
Ko ikyo wakohanyi wang'anyi wakasangana na Wafarisayo wakalaha chila iya ing'anyi ya wanjama wakahamba, “A luwike luda ili mndu chu awa mowuta ngata tsifoi tsido?
Lukamda nakae ado wandu nyi wechisia ipfo kokye wahende imwidikya wose. Nalyo Waroma wechicha wechilusoka sanga-li na Hekalu-li na inyamaṟa mkambo fodu.”
Nahong'u o umu ipfo kiidi kyawo nyi Kayafa awei Mkohanyi Ang'anyi o maka fulya o kawawia, “Muichi ma kindopfo.
Ma mulakusaṟye kye nyi kichaho konu mndu umu napfe hando ha wandu wa sanga lyose kota wandu wa sanga lyose wechiarisika?”
Na ili alededa ado chi ipfo koke kwenyi liwewukyepfo. Kya indi nyiili awei mkohanyi ang'anyi o maka fulya adeda ado kechihamba kisuku kyeṟingishya kye Yesu ai mteṟye napfe kyekiṟa mkambo fu fowo.
Ma chi kyekiṟa mkambo fu fo wandu tupupfo kya indi kundu na wana wo wa Ruwa wanyanyaṟikye wo nawasanze wawe wamu.
Nahong'u wokya mkonu fulya wasongoru wa Wayuda wakachilya ihenda iwaha Yesu.

Nalyo Yesu nalakiwe-se moidaida na pata ipfo ko Wayuda walya, kya indi kawuka-ho kahenda sangenyi liwe likinganyi na kundo kulya ko olele, kashika mṟinyi folaho Efraimu katsinda-pfo ai hamu na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
Nahong'u Pasaka ya Wayuda iwei kufui, wandu wafoi wakahenda ido na kulya Yerusalemu wawuka ipfo sangenyi lilya, Pasaka ilamshika ihoya, wahende ikuilisha.
Nawo nyi Yesu waweimpfula wakadeda wo wenyi na weny wahoṟoki ipfo hekalunyi wehamba, “A nyi mowona kyawa kida? Nyi lohi nechida alechicha isenguda mkonu ii mnene ngesa?”
Na wakohanyi walya wang'anyi na Wafarisayo wo wakawawasa na pata wehamba, “Kokoya mndu ammanya kundo Yesu akeri naende mbonyi kundu wakoye imbada.”
Nahong'u kuwetsuheṟe mfiri iṟandaṟu mkonu mnene fo Pasaka fukishike Yesu kashika kulya Betanyia kundo Lasaro awekyekaa ulya Yesu emṟutsa wapfunyi.
Napfo wakamsungusia choonga ili kyukanyi. Na mndu mopfuṟukanya-ho m Marita. Na Lasaro nyi ai o ipfo kiidi kya walya wadamye na Yesu kilionyi kya choonga.

Naho Maria kawuta kiraryo kya mafuda ha mbaṟi ya Nardo ha wuhuru wung'anyi hashikye ratili imu, kacha ishia Yesu madende kawuya kaangatsa madende halya na njui tsake. Mba iya ikarumbalala opfamo lo mafuda halya.
Na Yuda o Iskariote umu o walya ikumi na wawi ipfo kiidi kya walya wa kiloshyony kyake (nao nyio sa echikaa namtwaṟe Yesu,) kahamba,
“A mafuda ha kima hakumbo ko dinari mahana haṟaṟu tsiinengo wandu wakiwa nyi ki?”
Na kyemnenga kahamba ado chi kipfa ili echikusaṟa kya wakiwapfo, nyi ili ai mwiwi arie mfuko fulya na shilya shechidambiko kafoi kawa moṟoṟokwo-ho.
Naho Yesu kahamba, “Mulawinyishe mka-chu kumdeye-ng'u nahende ihasuṟuma kuwede mkonu foko fo iṟiko.
Kyamba wandu wakiwa nyi mukeri nawo mafiri hose, mndu mulakeri nao mafiri hose nyio inyi.”

Nahong'u mamwingi fulya fung'anyi fo ipfo ko Wayuda ili wamwicho ke Yesu nyi kulya Betanyia ai wakacha napfo chi kimaduma kya iwona Yesu tupupfo, indi nyi kundu wawone na Lasaro ulya emṟutsa wapfunyi.
Na wakohanyi walya wang'anyi wakadumbwo chila kundu wawahe na Lasaro.
Kipfa nyio aletewa Wayuda wafoi wakawa wakalekana na wasongoru wawo; wakaidikya Yesu.
Kyasia ili lya ngama mamwingi fo wandu fulya fucheye napfo kya mkonu fulya mnene wakaicho kye Yesu nyi aicha na kulya Yerusalemu.
Wakawada maṟamba ha makangachi wakakure wahende imwambya wakakoṟoṟoma ilaha, “Hosana. Kwadapfumo ichu acha kui rina lya Mndumii kawewa mangi ya Israeli.”
Na Yesu kakuwonya mchungu mkoho kadamia mhongo-hu fofo. Kiwekehendeka chando kiikiṟehye kyehamba.
“Kulawone kochiowuo iyo ukeri mṟi fo Sionyi. Ambuya Mangi yapfo aikuchea ai mdamiṟe mhongo-hu fo ihache lya mchungu.”
Nakyo chando kikeri wa kiloshyonyi wake waweichi kuwokapfo. Nyi mandi halya Yesu amhenda iwiko mwitoṟi lyo mandi walekumbwo kye nyi wudo kii-kiṟehye kyakye na iwuta wakawembutya wado da.
Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu walya wawei nao mkonu fulya alelaha Lasaro nawuke ipfo opangenyi kamṟutsa wapfuny wo wakahamba-ho kyemṟingishya.
Nakyo kikaweinenga mamwingi fulya fo wandu wakahenda imwambya kipfa waleicho kye Yesu aletana ikyo kikawewa kichao king'anyi kidi.
Nalyo Wafarisayo walya wakawiana mndu na odoye, “Muwonyi da? Loidima kindopfo! Ambuya wuyana wose wuimwosha.”
Na ipfo kiidi kya wandu walya waledo na Yerusalemu wahendewikya Ruwa wuindi mkonu fulya mnene kukawekaa-pfo na Wagriki waangu.
Wo wakachea Filipo o kulya Betisaida ya kulya Galilaya. Wakamterewa wakahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, lulangie iwona Yesu.”
Filipo kakure kahenda iwia Andrea. Andrea kasangana na Filipo wakahenda iwia Yesu.
Na Yesu kawahalwo kahamba, “Aikyo kiheri kyamshika Mana chu o mndu nahende iwiko mwitoṟi.
Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, ndunda iya ya ngano kokoya yada ilaoloka teri-hu ikapfia-ho yo yadeo ikakaa ido. Indi kokoya yampfia-ho yo yechido iwike ndunda tsifoi.
Ichu mokunda moo fokye nekaa nafudetse. Na ichu mosuo moo fokye kunu wuyana aifuringa fushike ikaa mlungana.
Kokoya mndu akundi njipfuṟukanya nache injilatya. Na hando inyi njikeri mpfondo na mpfuṟukanyi oko echikaa. Na kokoya mndu anjipfuṟukanya Wande nyi echimng'anyisha.”
“Wulalu mrima foko fotautau, na inyi njihambe njida? ‘Ngesa njihambe,’ Hoi Wande, njiletsa na saa ii ikeri-ho? Kya indi kimaduma ngakoya saa ii nyikyo ikyo.
Hoi Wande, kunda ung'anyishe rina lyapfo iyo.” Nalyo ṟu likaichio liwuka ipfo ruwehu lyechihamba, “Ngameling'anyisha na lingi-se njechilinganyisha-da.”
Nahong'u mamwingi fo wandu wahoṟoki-ho wakaicho iki wakahamba, “Nyi ikuṟuṟuma lyadeda nao.” Wengi wakahamba: “Nyi malaika adeda nao.”
Yesu kahalwo kahamba, “Ṟu lyo kimaduma lyadeda chi kipfa kyako inyipfo, indi nyi kipfa kyanu nyo.
Wulalu wuyana wu wohenda iwonyo mdumbuye. Wulalu mnene o wuyana wu echifunyo kulya nja.
Na inyi ngammaa iiryo huye njilekana na wanda ii lyo njechiwahomwo orio umu na koko.” (
Kadeda ado kechenga kya opfu lokye kye nyi lo mbaṟi njiki echikaa napfe.)

Nahong'u wandu walya wakuwumbye-ho wakamhalwo, “So nyi lokeicho kya Kristo kii-kihambe ipfo wuwawasonyi wodu kye nyi echikaa-pfo mlungana. A kyawa kida-ng'u ili iyo ohamba kye nyi kiwari Mana chu o mndu nahende iiryo huye? A Mana cho o mndu nyi o ku ngesa?”
Yesu kawawia, “Kutsuhae-ho kiheri sa kyangu sa ii ikeri-se nanyo. Chumie ili mukeri na sa ii mulawone mohenda ihoyo meema, kyamba ichu mochumia memenyi aichi ma kundo ashikapfo.
Ili mukeri na sa ii keidikyenyi sa kundu muwe wana wasa.” Yesu kyekimaa ideda madedo-ho kawukaho kahenda isheṟuka.
Ma amemaa iwuta ṟiho tsing'anyi tsidi wawonyi nawo ma walakunde imwidikya.
Nyi kilehendeka kido kyeinutysa idedo lya mwikimbi Yesaya lyehamba, “Hoi Mndumii, a mndu aleidikya shilya luiongoya nyi wu? Nao nyi o ku atambaṟukye meso nawone wuidimi wo Mndumii?”
Na kimaduma walaidima imwidikya nyi kilya kingi Yesaya alededa kyehamba.
“Ruwa nawahye meso hawo kaumiṟa na ngoo tsawo kundu walahende yambwo na meso hawo, ma ichihio na ngoo tsawo wawuyei nyi Mndumii ahamba, na inyi njiwakiṟe.”
Nyi wudo Yesaya alededa lya alewona wuitoṟi wokye kawa modeda kyakye.
Ma kudo kuweipfo na wasongoru wafoi wa Wayuda waleidikya Yesu kya indi kipfa kya iowuo Wafarisayo walakihambe na pata wakoye wawuto sinagogenyiyi.
