Nalyo wasikari wakadumbwo shiwoho sha kingalawa kilya wakakilekia kiho.
Napfo koikishika itambaṟuka Paulo kawawasa wose walye shelya kehamba, “Inu nyi mkonu fo ikumi na kaana mochiweda na ikuotoya mulalya kindo ma kitutu.
Kyasiang'u ngambawasa ke mulye shelya, kyamba nkyo kyechimwendie wuṟamtsu, cha kipfa kulaipfo ma ochui lo ipfo mdonyi yanu lochideka.”
Kekimaa ideda adi kaira mkate kaana Ruwa oshangunyi lowo wose kafufunja kawoka ilya.
Wakasambuka wose wakalya shelya shawo wawenyi.
Natso chando luwekeri ngalawenyi luweshitsye wandu mahana hawi na makumi mfungade na waṟandaṟu.
Wekiihuda wakaanguṟa nzohoṟa ya ngalawenyi wakaṟukuta ngano ipalipalinyi.
Kukye walamanye oruka lulya shile nyi walewona ndumba imu-ho iwode kyambado wakadeda chila ke waitse naho ngalawa kokoya kyechiwa.
Wakadumbwo ngoi tsa shitirimisha ngalawa wakashida ipalipalinyi, wakaleheṟwo shiwoho sha shiindutsa ngalawa wakadosa ikungo lilya itutu kundu liwade otanu wakahenda na kya alya kyambadonyi.
Kya indi wakakoya hando kihongo kya sanga kimandye mṟingenyi wakananza-ho ngalawa. Kulya kusongwo kukawado kukawanga tapu kulakupaye, kya indi kulya kya numa kukafunjika kui pfinya tsa masinanu.
Chila ya wasikari ikawa ke nyi wapfungo wawoho mndu nalashike ikukumba mṟingenyi na idicha.
Kya indi mchili ulya ili ekundi iletsa Paulo kawaima walawute chando wakuteseheṟye kawawasa walya waichi iigelea mṟinge-hu wakuolotse ipalipalinyi kuwoka washike teri-hu.
Na walya watsuhae wakukiṟe wechikuwada iwa maṟaṟo-hu na iwa shindo-hu shingi sha ngalawenyi. Na wudo wandu wose wakawuta-ho yafukya oruke-hu na kipuo.
Loikiidima yashuka lukamanya ke kiṟingiti kilya nyi kyechilaho Malita.
Na wandu walya walee-pfo wakaluwutya shicha shiilewetsye. Nyi waleatsa modo wakaludamiṟa lose kipfa kya mvuo iwekapye na kipfa kya mbeo.
Paulo amsana ngu kikonde katsiwika kulya rikonyi kukawuka-pfo njoka yedicha modo fulya ikamwoṟowya owoko loke.
Wandu walya wekiwona indo lilya likumasye ipfo kuwokonyi wakawiana, “Mndu chu naashukye iwa mndu mbahipfo. Ma chando ameashuka kulya ipalipalinyi motaa kirache amda nakae na moopfo.”
Nao kaikutiakutia kulya modonyi nalatano kindo nyiyo.
Wakamtuluya meso wakusaṟie ke nyi aishimba ang'u naho wanda pu aa mfu. Wamemtuluya meso mnu na iwona ke lyamtana kindo ma ntapfo wakailacha mahio hawo wakahamba ke ichu nyi Ruwa.
Kufui na hando halya kuwekeri-ho kihamba kya mnene o kiṟingiti kilya ewio rina lyake nyi Publio. Mndu chu kaluambya na kyamu kiila kalutana wahenu wake hando ha mkonu iṟaṟu.
Kikashika ndee o Publio kakoyo aluo ndaṟe ya modo na yaraka samu. Paulo kaida na ipfo koke katerewa kamhekya mawoko kamchiṟa.
Isho shekitanyika wengi wawewodo nyi ndaṟe tsawo kulya kiṟingitinyi wakacha wakachiṟo.
Nawo wakaluwikya wuindi na iluinenga shindo sha mwaano. Natso loikikure ke luire-se mta wakalusama na shindo shilya luweshihuṟi shose.
Komeida-ho meri iṟaṟu lukahenda kyaṟo kya ngalawenyi ya Aleksandria iwentirimishye kiheri kya mbeo kulya kiringitinyi irie ofano lo wambasa walya.
Lukashika Sirakusa lukakaa-ho mkonu iṟaṟu.
Luwuka ipfo lukahaluka lukashika Regiumu. Komeida-ho mkonu fumu otanu lo ora lo kingoto lukawiwita lukaenenga loafukya Puteoli komsia mkonu iwi tupu.
Ipfo lukakoya-pfo wanawa-wama lukaterewo nyiwo ke lukae-pfo mkonu mfungade. Na wudo lukashika Roma.
Na wanawawama wa ipfo wekiicho mbonyi tsadu wakacha iluambya wakashika tumo ya Apio na kundo kulaho Mkahawa Iṟaṟu. Paulo kekiwawona kaidapfuma Ruwa kasambuka.
Loikikuidya na ipfo Roma mchili ulya kadambikya wapfungo ipfo mawokonyi ha mchili o waringi wa Kaisari, kya indi Paulo o alewikyo momu fokukaya amonyi kimu na askari momringa.

Kikasia komeida-ho mkonu iṟaṟu kalaha wanene wa Wayuda wache kisanzyonyi. Wekimaa icha kawawia, “Lanye mui womi na wanawawama, na kikawa ke njilatanye kindo kyetahachya mkambo fu fodu ma mbuka tsa waku wadu na njimdambike mawokonyi ha Waroma nji mpfunge njiwuto Yerusalemu.
Nawo wamemaa injiwesa wakundi injipfunguo kyamba kulawepfo kitewe ma kimu kyetewa njiwooho.
Kya indi Wayuda wekideda mnu ipfo mondunyifu ngaitiko ikulahya ko Kaisari. Chi kikeri ke nyi mbewode kidedo kyecha ikumba wandu wa mbaṟi yakonyi.
Kyasia nkyo kimaduma inyi ngamlaha muche luwonane na ideda kimu. Kyamba kyatewa njii mpfunge na mshe fu nyi mkusirye fo Israeli.”
Nawo wakamhalwo, “So lulemeambye baruo tsiwode mbonyi tsapfo tsiwuka Yudaya-pfo. Manya kwipfo monowama ma umu ashikye kunu echiluongoya kyapfo kii kiwicho ma ilukapya sumu kyapfopfo.
Kya indi lukundi iicho kopfo iyo chando uwonyi. Kyamba kya siṟi ii ikuwikye idi kyanya nyi luichi ke nyi ikeri ileholeho hando hose.”

Wekimaa iteṟyana nao mkonu wakacha na koke kulyando awelaa wandu sa wafoi kawaongoya neng'cha na iṟingishya wumangi wo Ruwa kechiwadambuya kya Yesu na mweke fo wuwawaso wo Mose na fo waikimbi awoka ngamenyi kashika kyukanyi.
Maata-ho wakaidikya shilya shilededo na maata walaidikye.
Na ili walaweidikyanyi wo wenyi na wenyi wakakuhendya kowo Paulo kekimaa ihamba idedo li limu ke, “Mumuyo Mwele alededa necha na waku walya wanu kui dumbu lya mwikimbi Yesaya.
Kechihamba, Henda ko mkambo fu nowawie, licho na mochiicho na madu manya mochimanyapfo. Na yambwo na mochiambwo manya mulechiwona kindo.

Kyamba ngoo tsa wandu wa tsii njiumiṟe na madu hawo nyi wai walemeri yadanya, na meso hawo nyi wahapfumbye walashike iwona kui meso hawo nyi iicho kui madu hawo na itawuo kui ngoo tsawo na iilacha mahio hawo kundu njiwakiṟe.
Kyasia iki kimanyike-ng'u ipfo konu wokya wulalu, ke okiio lu lo Ruwa lui udike ko wa mbaṟi njihenu. Nawo na wechiluadanya.” [
Kekimaa ihamba isho Wayuda wakakuhendya kowo wechiwesana sa shingi wo wenyi na wenyi.]
Paulo kakaa-pfo hando ha maka iwi iambanyi alee ipfo mbenyi koke kundo echilaa, kawa moambya wandu wose wawekewa momcheya.
Kechiongwo mbonyi tsa wumangi wo Ruwa na ilosha kya Mndumii Yesu kui wukesi wuingi nalaimo nyi mndu.
Nyio inyi Paulo njii isinga lya Yesu Kristo msu msambuṟe nji-mdahuye Ndumi ya Ruwa ya Sia ya okiio.
Nyiyo aweiteṟye na mweeke fo waikimbi walya wakye ipfo Maṟehyonyi Maele.
Ya mana chu oke apaṟikye osharinyi lo Dawidi kui nyama.
Ambike-ho Mana o Ruwa Menyi pfinya kui Mumuyo mosumba wuele likawa kui iṟuka wapfunyi, nyio Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu.
Nao nyio alelusaṟya kaluinenga wudumi wohendelishya rina lyo lyake wuidiki ipfo mkambonyi ya wandu yose.
Mpfondo nanyo muipfo mui wasambuṟe wa Yesu Kristo.
Ngamwiṟikiṟa nyo mukeri ipfo Roma mose mui wakunde wa Ruwa, wasambuṟe waele. Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo luwukye ipfo ko Ruwa Nde yadu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Kya kuwoka ngaana Ruwa oko njikuwawie na Yesu Kristo kimaduma kyanu mose kyamba wuidiki wonu wukeri ihambo wuyana kose.
Kyamba Ruwa chu njimṟundya kui mrima fose foko njechionguo Ndumi ya Sia ya Mana chu okye nyio awa mṟingishi oko moṟingishya kye njimukumbwo nyo kitsitsi.
Oryo mandi njiterewa njikeri iwesa Ruwa kulako njechiwonyo mwaanya foshika konu.
Kyamba njiwodo macha hewonana nanyo njimwendye kyemuwanza kii-kiwike nyi Mumuyo.
Nalyo nyilyo liwe nyi iwanzana iidikya lyanu linjiwanze na iidikia lyako lyimmbanze nyo.
Indi njikundi mumanye, wanawawama, kye njiwelangie kafoi icha na ipfo konu cha ipfo mkambonyi iya ingi, kya indi ngaimo shika inu.
Inyi na njii mosile o Wagriki na o wa mdedie mhenu, o waṟango na o walai waṟango.
Nyi wudo njilangie ionguo Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio na konu ipfo Roma.
Kyamba inyi njilapfia sonu kya Ndumi yo ya Sia ya okiio, kyamba nyi ikeri pfinya ya Ruwa yewonya oryo mwidiki oletso iasie na mndu Myuda na mndu Mgriki.
Kyamba kotambahaluyo nayo wuhoṟotsu wuwukye ko Ruwa wokuwada kundo kuwode wuidiki wochiduo mndu wuidikinyi, chando kyikiṟehie, ke Mndu mhoṟotsu nyi echikaa awode moo fuṟukye wuidikinyi.
Kyamba tuuke ya Ruwa yahenda imanyisho ichee ruwehu yechiolokya oryo wukika wo wandu na wutahachi wowo iwo wekeshingya wukilohi wulya njia kui tewe lya wutahachi.
Kipfa isho sha Ruwa shewa imanya na shiwataṟambukye kyamba Ruwa nyi alewatambaṟuya.

Kyamba isho shake shilowa yambuya sho shekyewono wokya awikie wuyana shishiwike nyio wehanahana kyasho; nasho nyi shiile, pfinya yake ilunganyi ikaa na mkaike foke fui fo Ruwa amonyi kikaenenga walawonyo mwaanya fokapa nene.
Kitewe nyi kipfa ili waweichi Ruwa, indi walawemwindya cha Ruwa manya imwaana, kya indi wakahenda ihanahana uhamu wo wongo, na mdo fowo fukatushia fukawa meema.
Ipfo kundo wakutanye walaanyi mpfondo watondokye.
Wusuṟi wu wo Ruwa alechisia wo wakawuilacha na mfano fofanana na mndu o wandu ekesia na fo malehe na fo mando na fo shindo shekekupupurwo.
Nkyo kitewe Ruwa alewalekia wahende dao nyi lango tsawo tsewaduo ngafunyi washike yendye mbihu yawo wusutsu kowo wawenyi.
Wo walekuilachya wukilohi wo Ruwa na wongo, wakawikya kitsane wuindi na ikiterewa wakada mtsanyi mokiwika ai moidapfumo mlungana. Amenyi.
Nkyo kimaduma Ruwa alewalekia wahende iwado nyi wulanga wuendie wusutsu; na waka wawo wakailacha mbutie fulya fuwaṟi na sa fulawaṟi.

Na womi na wudo wakaweda ikaa na waka wawo chando kiwaṟi wechiaka-aka na ilangana wo wenyi na wenyi, womi wakawewuta na womi mbutie fulai na sonu, wakakuwonya wueri wusumhanyi wo wunyamaṟi wowo kowo wawenyi.
Nawo chando wawepiṟye ikaa na Ruwa ipfo kundo akuwatambaṟuye na wudo o Ruwa nyi alewalekia wahende furunjikya mhie yawo wechiwuta shilya ishiwuta.
Wakaichuo wutahachi wo orio mbaṟi na wunyenyi na wuwahi na isohuo mondu na yoka mtambo na maupahapaha na maweweda.
Nyi wekeduo wandu aaṟu, wesuo Ruwa, wai waami, wechumia useṟeṟi wai wa mtengelele, wandu wasumi, wepiṟa wafee.
Kindo kilai nawo nyi osaṟe, nyi wuhendeli, kindo kilai nawo nyi sonu, kindo kilai nawo nyi iichio mndu wukiwa.
Ma ili waichi kilya Ruwa awikye-ho kye wewuta wadi ate wawoho. Nawo naa wekewuta wado chi wo wawenyi tupupfo kyaindi wekeichika na walya wekewuta wado.

Nkyo kyaenenga hoi iyo, ui mndu o wandu, ma kowa wu, ulaidima ikuwuta-ho ili uidedya ungi; kyamba ipfo kundo odedya ungi mpfondo okuwonya owingo iyo kumonyi, kyamba isho ukeri ideda kyasho nyisho nasho iyo kumonyi ukeri iwuta.
Indi luichi ke mdumbuye fulya Ruwa afudumbuya walya wewuta shindo shido nyi fuidikyanyi na kilya kii lohi.
Aka wo iyo ui mndu o wandu, mowonya owingo iwo wengi wewuta wado na iyo kumonyi okewuta kudo, alae nyi okusaṟa kye nyi ochikia ipfo kundo Ruwa adumbuo mondu ko?
Ang'u ngesa upiṟye wuwongoya woke na wutsitsa na wuleeli wufoi wudi kulamanye ke wucha wu wo Ruwa wokuitika udumbuye umhalukye kui mrima?
Na orikiki lu lopfo na wuumu wo ngoo ilakunda imhalukya sho shekuwiia tewe okuruwia kumonyi tuuke ya Mkonu fulya fo tuuke fomanyisha mdumbuyo fusumhanyi fo Ruwa.
Natae oryo mndu ose wueri wo mawuto hake.
Iwo watsinda wewuta kilya kii kicha wepfula moo fo mlungana echiwaenenga wuitoṟi na kiṟumi na moo fulechisia.
Indi iwo wengi wawode ikukunda walaidikye kilya kiilohi indi wakaidikya mawicho wo wechihoyo nyashi na tuuke ya Ruwa.
Kiwi na fowa na mawawio shechiwada oryo mrima fo mndu ose mowuta sha wuwicho, wokya Myuda shika Mgriki.
Indi Ruwa nechiinenga wuitoṟi na kiṟumi na ofoṟo shechisokya oryo mndu mowuta kilya ki kicha, wokya Myuda shika Mgriki.
Kyamba Ruwa ekyeambuya fana ya mndu-pfo.
Kyamba iwo wawetahachie walaweichi wuwawaso wo Mose na wachideka kulawode wuwawaso, na walya wawetahachie waichi wuwawaso nyi wechidumbuyo mondu na mweke fo wuwawaso.
Kyamba chi iwo waicho wuwawaso wawa wahoṟotsu ipfo sumhana na Ruwapfo, shila nyi iwo wai wewuta wuwawaso wechitano wahoṟotsu.
Kyamba ili wa mkambo iya ilawode wuwawaso wekewuta kui madoenyi hawo isho wuwawaso wuhambie kyasia-ng'u wuwawawaso wawenyi.
Wo wamanyishye ke iwuta lilya wuwawaso wulya wuliwawasye likeri iṟehye ngoonyi tsawo wai waliṟingishye kui ngo tsa mrimenyi yawo na kui mahio hekeanduyana na yanguṟyana njowingo.
Kuwe mkonu fulya ilindi Ruwa echianduya kui mweke fo Yesu Kristo kya shilya sha wandu shii-shiṟike. Nyiyo ndumi njimdume nayo.
Aka-wo iyo, kokoya okusenda Myuda ochikuihetsa wuwawaso-hu na ikushela kye ui na Ruwa.
Komanya kilya Ruwa awawasye kochiletsana sheletsana ui-mpfunde na wuwawaso.
Kokusirya iyo kumonyi kye uwei msongoru o wapfie meso, na sa ko walya wai meemenyi.
Kuwewa mtoṟishi motoṟisha walaichi kindo, mlosha o walatimie ili wuwawaso wukupfungye mtaato fo wutichi na wukilohi.
A kikawa kido kolosha wengi koda ulakulosha iyo kumonyi? Kowa moongwo; ma kulaiwe, na iyo kowuya iwa?
Kowewa mohamba; kulaṟuhuye, na iyo koṟuhuya? Iyo koleha mfano ya maruwa ha wongo kowewa mokapa naho mbucha?
Nyi okuichika kye nowode wuwawaso wo Ruwa, kowewa moendye Ruwa wusutsu ochiumbuya wuwawaso wu.
Chando Madedo Maele hahambye “Rina lya Ruwa lyekeanga mosalucho ipfo mkambonyi ya wandu kipfa kyanu nyo Wayuda.”
Kyamba odino lui lucha kokoya owa mowuta shilya shii-shiwawase, indi kokoya okeumbuya wuwawaso odino lopfo lomba cha ili ulai mdine kima uladedino.
Kokoya nyi wudo kii na ichu alai mdine kawa moringa shilya shii shiwawase nyi wuwawaso, nechiwa cha ili amdine.
Na ichu moawutsya uwawaso alai-mdine nyame-hu nyi echikuwonya owingo iyo owa motahachya wuwawaso na ukukerye na mṟeho fulya na odino ma chandu walai wadine.
Kyamba Myuda chi ichu afanyi Myuda kya nja-pfo manya odino lo Myuda chi ilu luwonyo ludo ipfo nyamenyipfo.

Kya indi sa ai Myuda o lohi nyi ichu akukerye adi Myuda kya mmba na odino nyi lukukerye ipfo kundo ngoo iinjitsane. Likawa kui Mumuyo likawewa kui mweke fo iwawaso. Na mndu ai adi kiichiko kyake ewikyo kiwukye ko wandupfo shila nyi ko Ruwa amonyi.
Kikawa kido Myuda wawodeki kya ngoseṟa kota wandu wengi? Na odino lulya loekya ki?
Mwidye fu a fui-pfo foringa njora tsose. Kya kuwoka Wayuda nyi waiwadambikye mbia tsa Ruwa.
A nyi ki-wo ili kuweipfo waleletsihendelya? Alae wuṟingi wu wowo wushike iwuta-ho wuhendeli wo Ruwa ko?
Oo! Manyale Ruwa nyi mhendeli kiheri kyose indi oryo mndu o wandu ai mowongo chando ku-kuṟehye, “E-wo Ruwa, oryo mandi omededa.”
Indi kokoya wutahachi wu wodu wowikya wudi wuhoṟotsu wo Ruwa kiṟingishyo luhambe luda ngesa? Kulako Ruwa nekedeko echilekia tuuke yake iluhoye ko? Ngadeda njido mbaṟi ya kiwandu.
O Manyale! Aka shile nyi wudo nyi wuda Ruwa awechianduya wuyana wu?
Indi kokoya kiwulohi kya Ruwa kyawutia tewe lyehenda yengeṟya wuitoṟi ipfo hando inyi njii mowongo a nyiki-se inyi njianduyo cha ili njii mnyamaṟi ngesa?
Kyimu cha ihamba, “Luwute wuwicho kundu luwone mecha?” Wengi nyi wudo ili kwipfo wailuiria wongo na ilusutsa kye nyi wudo lokelosha. Wo wechianduyo owingo lusumhanyi.
Kwipfo mndu ma umu aimhendelyipfo? A nyi wuda-se ngesa! So Wayuda lulimbie ngesa? Chi kosepfo. Kyamba lulesonguo ikumba na Wayuda na Wagriki kye nyi wai-walamye nyi wunyamaṟi wose.
Chando kuu-kuṟehye, “Kulaipfo ai mhoṟotsu manya umu.
Kulaipfo awode osaaṟe kulaipfo ai mopfula Ruwa.
Wama ihenda itandawuka wose wakalehela wose kakapi. Kulaipfo sa ekewuta kilya kii kicha manya umu.
Oṟo lowo nyi kipfu kiwedye mnying'a, njolimi tsawo nyi wekelemba natso, ipfo shi-ya momu yawo nyi wuṟoi wo manjoka wuu-wuṟike-pfo.
Dumbu lya-wo liichwo shirumo na shipusiṟo.
Madende hawo hedichya ipusuo samu.
Ipfo kundo wamekuidya-ho kodeoho mawaṟi na mawawiṟo.
Na njia yewika ofoṟo walaimanye.
Ipfo kowo wawode yowuo Ruwa manyale-pfo.”
Kya indi luichi kye isho wuwawaso wuhambye nyi woshiwia walya wai shi ya wuwawaso kundu oryo dumbu lipfumbo na wuyana wose wuwone wuu-wuhutsye owingo sumuhana na Ruwa.
Kipfa kulaipfo mndu o wandu awetano mhoṟotsu oshanguyi lo Ruwa kui mweke fo mawuto ha-mawawase, kyamba wuwawaso wu kindo wukiendie nyi imanyisha mndu wunyamaṟi wokye.
Na wulalu wuhoṟotsu wo Ruwa womhenda imanyisho tare wuwawaso indi wuu-wuwikye kiṟingishyo nyi wuwawaso-wo na waikimbi wo.
Ruwa neketana wandu wahoṟotsu oshangunyi lokye kui wuidiki woidikya Yesu Kristo iwo wamwidikye wadi wose, kyamba kulaipfo mletsano.
Kyamba wandu woose wawenyamaṟie na iwuṟa wawewuṟye ngeela ya Ruwa.
Nyi wai-watane wahoṟotsu ki wutonga wokye walawewika-ho kindo likawa na oletso lulya luleendo nyi Kristo Yesu.
Nao nyio Ruwa alemtana njoko yeoloṟa mondu fulya, iwe kui samu yake ko iwo womemwidikya. Nalewuta ado kundu namanyishe wuhoṟotsu wu wokye na kya mwidyo fulya aweidya matahachyo halya ha kacha mwidyo.
Nyiho naho Ruwa alewa mokukarishya kyaho kundu namanyishye-ho wuhoṟotsu wu woke, kiheri kya wulalu kumanyike-ho ke nyio amonyi ai mhoṟotsu kawewa motana na ichu aidikye Yesu mhoṟotsu.
A mwaanya fokushela ku foya ngesa? Nyi fumbikye hima. Nyi kui mweke fo wuwawaso wuki? Nyi wulya woringa iawutsia mawuto ngesa? Manyale, kya indi nyi kipfa luidikie.
Nyihondo lokuwutya-ho ihamba ke mndu o wandu aitano mhoṟotsu ili awa mwidiki kulawode nyi iawutsia mawuto hamaringe nyi wuwawaso wulya.
Alae Ruwa nyi o Wayuda tupu ko? Chi nao mkambo ingi riti wo? E-ko na o mkambo ingi riti!
Ruwa nyi umu echitana ichu mdine nawe mhoṟotsu kui wudiki na ichu alai mdine nawe wa mhoṟotsu kui wuidiki.
Ashika kikawa kido luilache wuwawaso luwike-ho wuidiki ngesa? O ma-le kya indi nyi ikapya wuwawaso owanzo lukeri.
Aka luhambe luda kya nde yadu Abrahamu ngesa? Ke nyi luwemkoya ai mku odu molualutsa kui mbihu ngea?
Kokoya Abrahamu ametano mhoṟotsu kui mweke fo shilya o awutye, nyi awode-ho kyekuṟumisha, kya kakye echikushela sumuhana na Ruwa pfo.
Kyamba kilya kii-kiṟehye kyo kyehamba kida? Kyehamba ke Abrahamu nyi aleidikya Ruwa, nao Ruwa kamtana mhorotsu.
Mndu moṟundya ungi, weri woke alekewutalyo kyemsaṟya kya indi nyi wusumhanyi wokye.
Indi mndu alawa moṟundya-woṟunda kawa moidikya kekusirya Ruwa ichu awa motana mndu alasumhanyi nawe mhoṟotsu nao nyio kui wuidiki wu woke atano mhorotsu.
Na wudo na Dawidi ahambye kya sia ya mndu Ruwa amtanyie mhoṟotsu kulai ko mawuto.
Nyi ahambye, “Nanga iwa waiwahoṟye matahachyo hawo njonyamaṟo tsawo tsikaangatso.
Nanga msoṟo ulya Mndumii alaikumbuose manyamaṟo hakye!”
Nanga ii nyi ya wadine tupu ang'u nyi na ya walawadine ngesa? Na ko walya walawadine daa. Kyamba lomhamba kye, “Abrahamu nyi aleidikia nao Ruwa kamtana uhoṟotsu.”
Kyasia Abrahamu nyi aleitalyo ada ngesa? Ngesa nyi lyandi amedino a lyandi alawemdino? Chi lya amdinopfo, na lya alawemdino.

Na kichano kya odino kyo alekiambya kiwe kichano kya wuhoṟotsu wulya wuwemba kui mweke fo wuidiki wulya awei nawo mandi alawendedino, kundu nawe mku o walai wadine wechiidikya wakashika italio wuhoṟotsu wu.
Nawewa na mku o wa-wadine iwa walai wadine wadi kya indi na wekyeosha njia iya iya ya njayo tsa wuidiki ndeyadu Abrahamu awewuwode lyandi alawemdino.
Kyamba kyaasa kilya kyeteṟya Abrahamu ang'u luwa lyake ke wakudaaye wuyana wu, kyoṟa kyo kilawei-kiteṟye kui mweeke fo wuwawaso kya indi kui mweeke fo wuidiki wotalio wuhoṟotsu.
Kyamba kukoye walya wakuwodie wuwawaso-hu wawei waoṟi weoṟa wuyana, wuidiki wuwechiwa wo maai na kyaasa-kyo kya Ruwa chi kindo-pfo.
Kyamba wuwawaso wokyeende mondu kya indi ipfo kundo kulawwode wuwawaso kwipfo yumbuyapfo.

Nkyo kimaduma kyose kiwe kui wuidiki kikuhendekye njia ya wutonga, kundu kyaasa kilya kiwe kituwe kituwie oryo luwa lyoose chi iya ipaṟikye ipfo wuwawasonyi tupupfo kya indi na iya ipaṟikye wuidikinyi wo Abrahamu ichu akeri mku odu lose.
Kisumhanye kilya kii-kiṟehye, “Ngamekuwika mku o mkambo ifoi.” Kikawa kido ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa cha Abrahamu awemwidikye ichu ai moṟutsa wapfu na kui idedo lyakye shindo shilaiho shikawewa.
Ipfo kundu kulawewode kowedya Abrahamu aleidikya kechiwedya kye nashike iwa mku o mkambo ifoi kisumhanye kilya kii-kihambe, “Nyi wudi-ng'u luwa lyapfo lyechifo cha nyenyeri.”
Alalehele wuidikinyi wokye machandu aweichi ke mbihu fokye fomkachuka ashitsye kufui maka ihana manya wusu wo Sara chando wuwekachukye cha mhumba.
Indi alepfio nyi mdo kya kyaasa kilya kya Ruwa nade alakiidikyapfo, nyi elewanga wuidikinyi kechiwikya Ruwa mng'ano.
Kawekusihya pyu kye Ruwa ai na pfinya yeawutsya kyaasa aleteṟya.
Nalyo nyilyo kalitalio wuhoṟotsu.
Indi ilyo lyehamba, “Kalitalio wuhoṟotsu” chi kimaduma kyakye amonyi tupu-pfo.
Kya indi lii-iṟehye na kimaduma kyadu so lushike ilitalio ludi lochikusihya na Ruwa-chu aṟutsye Yesu Mndumii odu ipfo ko wapfu.
Nyio icho ammaa ihenda idambiko kimarete kya matahachyo hadu kashika iṟutso kipfa kya wuhoṟotsu wodu.
Kyasia ili lui-watane ludi wahoṟotsu na mweke fo wuidiki nyi luwode ofoṟo lo ko Ruwa lui-uwikeho nyi Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu.
Nao nyio aluinengye mtengele fulya foluduo ipfo kundo kuwode wutonga-wu wo Ruwa lukuilikishye nawo na ikuṟumisha kui owedi lowedya wuitoṟi wo Ruwa.
Ma chi kya ikyo tupupfo, kya indi lui wakyesi ipfo shiwirenyi kipfa nyi luichi shiwira shekeende ikuhoda.
Na ikuhoda-li lyeke̱nde otsano na otsano-lu loke̱nde owedi.
Na owede-lu lohutsa sonupfo kipfa ikunda lya Ruwa liikualya ngoonyi tsadu kui Mumuyo Mwele ichu lui-wasumbe.
Kyamba Kristo amelupfia so kiheri luwefafae kawepfia walemeshi walemanyi na Ruwa matika na halya.
Chi kii kiangu ipfa keletsa mndu asumhanyipfo. Kya ichu ai mcha amonyi kofia kuweipfo ekaria ilekia-ho moo.
Indi Ruwa nyi amanyishye ikunda lyake alukundi nalyo so ipfo kundo Kristo alelupfia kiheri luwei-se wanyamaṟi.
Kikawa kido naso lui-watane wahoṟotsu wulalu oshangunyi lo Ruwa kui pfinya ya samu iya yake, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa lochikaa luhende iletso nyio tuuke iya ya Ruwa.
Kyamba kokoya lomhenda yoloṟyo Ruwa kui ipfa lya Mana-chu oke lilyandi luwei kituwenyi, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa lochikaa luiwaringe ipfo kundo aitsinda na moo ili lui-waoloṟye ludi.
Manya chi ikyo lukuwawye na Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo lukamaayambya mwoloṟye-fu wulalu kui mweke foke.
Nakyo kihendekye kidi, ke wunyamaṟi wulecha na kunu wuyana kitewe kya mndu umu, na opfu lukacha kitewe nyi wunyamaṟi, nakyo kikaenenga opfu lomhenda idung'ana wandu wose nyi kipfa wanyamaṟie wose.
Kyamba wunyamaṟi wuwei kunu wuyana kiheri kulawewode wuwawaso, indi wunyamaṟi wulahenda italo alyando kulaipfo wuwawaso.
Kya indi wokya Adamu shika Mose nyi opfu luwei mangi achilie na walya walawenyamaṟye cha Adamu aleumbuya mawawaso ha Ruwa. Nao Adamu nyio awehambie ichu echikaa nache.

Kya indi kiiho na kiira chi shihianyipfo, kyamba kokoya yumbuya lya ichu umu litewye washike ihenda ipfa wadi wafoi nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa wutonga wo Ruwa na ohawi lo wutonga wurio nyi mndu-chu umu Yesu Kristo wusuṟie wafoi walya.

Na kisumbo-ki kya Ruwa kilafananyi na wunyamari wulya wo mndu ulya umu. Kyamba ipfo kundo ulya umu alemhenda yanduyo kukawuka-ho mdumbuye folunga ipfunga kitsitsi, indi kisumbo ki kya wutonga ili kyamcha kitewe nyi marendemko ha wandu wafoi, kyo kyaende msumhantsie fowatana wahoṟotsu.

Nkya lohi wunyamaṟi wo mndu ichu umu wuletewa opfu luchilie wose kimarete kya ichu umu-ho, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa iwa weambya mfeṟa fo wutonga na fo kisumbo kya wuhoṟotsu wulya nyi wechiwa mangi tsekuachia na moo wakuwode na ichu umu nyio Yesu Kristo.
Nahong'u kihendyekye kidi; kye chando iho lya ichu umu lyendie wandu wose owingo nyi wudo ipfo kundo ichu umu awehoṟoki-ho kechihendelya shose kuendyo wandu wose kihoṟotsa moo.
Cha kipfa chando walya wafoi wamhenda itano wanyamaṟi kitewe nyi wulemi wulya wo mndu-cho umu, na wudo na walya wafoi wechitano wahoṟotsu kimaduma nyi wutechi wo ichu umu-ho.
Indi wuwawaso wulya wuweoshye-ho wofeṟya iho lilya. Indi ipfo kundo wunyamaṟi womfo, mpfondo wutonga woshika ifo kawi wochilimba.
Nyi kyawa kido kundu chando wunyamaṟi wuwei mangi yededa na pfinya ya opfu nyi wudo wutonga wuwe mangi ipfo mengenyi ya wuhoṟotsu wochiwika moo fo mlungana fo ipfo Mndumii-hu odu Yesu Kristo.
Aka luihamba luda ngesa? Lukae lochiwuta kya wunyamari, kundu wotonga wushike ifo ko? O, manyale.
So lukamaa iwiia wunyamaṟi wapfu, nyi wuda luwuye-se ikaa nawo lingi ngesa?
Ang'u mokaa mulaichi ke so ili luiwapatisye Kristo Yesu nyi lui wapatisye opfu loke?
Kikawa kido nyi lui-waṟike kimu nao opfunyi kulya kui wupatiso kundu chando Kristo aleweṟutso wapfunyi kui wuitoṟi wo Wande na wudo so lukae-ho lochihendekya luirie moo mhya.
Kyamba kokoya lomehenda ilungyo kila kya opfu lulya loke, na kya iṟuka lyake na lochihenda ikilungyo.
Kilya lukiichi kikeri kiile; ke wumndu wodu lui-wawike nawo, wo womaa ihenda ikapyo msalabe-hu kimu nao kundu mbihu-fu fuichiwie inyamaṟa fudi fuhende irumara so lulakisingye-se wunyamaṟi.
Kyamba alyando mndu o wandu amhenda ipfa nyi aimdumbwo mwaanya fonyamaṟa.
Indi kokoya lomhenda ipfa kimu na Kristo nyi luidikie kye lochikaa nao.
Nyi luichi ke Kristo alemerutso wapfunyi ekifasepfo, opfu lokimwidimasepfo.
Kyamba kilya alepfa kyakyo nyi alepfa kya wunyamaṟi ili limu lyedumbwo teṟe, indi iki kimbode ili ai-ho na moo nyi kii-le; ke nyi ai mopfuṟukanya nafo Ruwa.
Nanyo na wudo kewekuitalenyi mui wandu wawewiia wunyamaṟi wapfu, na moo muwode nyi mukuwodye nafo Kristo-hu Yesu mochipfuṟukanya nafo Ruwa.
Ko ikyo mulalekie wunyamaṟi wuchilie mbihu mopfa yanu yechikaa ipfe muwechiidikyana na lango tsafo.

Ma mulawone mochidambikya wunyamaṟi shiwungo shanu shiwe shihia sha wukika, kya indi kudambikenyi nyo muwenyi Ruwa cha wandu warie moo waweṟukie nafo wapfunyi, na shiwungo shanu shiwiie Ruwa shihia sha wuhoṟotsu.
Kyamba wunyamaṟi wulechimwidimase, kyamba mulai shi ya wuwawaso kya indi nyi mukeri shi ya wutonga.
Alewo kiwukye-ho nyi ki? Ke luwute kya wunyamaṟi kipfa ili lulai shi ya wuwawaso kya indi lukakaa shi ya wutonga? O, chi wudopfo.

Aka mulaichi ke ichu mochikumdambikya cha masinga kyemwanguya madu nao nyio mombia masinga hake mochimwanguya madu kiwe kya wunyamaṟi woduo opfunyi kiwe kya wuidiki woende wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
Indi Ruwa nawikyo mwaano ki kipfa muwesia ikaa masinga ha wunyamaṟi mukashika yanguya madu mateteṟa-chu mompfunda muiwadambikye kokye mukuwode-ho na mrima msanze.
Indi mlewuto wusingenyi wo wunyamaṟi nyi musingye wuhoṟotsu wu.(

Ngadeda njidi kiwandu kipfa mofafaa kui nyama tsanu;) Kyamba chando muwewedambikye shiwungo shanu shiwe shesingya ngafu na wukika wofeṟya-ho wukika, nyi wudo muwe mochidambikya shiwungo shanu wulalu shiwe shechisingya wuhoṟotsu-wu wuduo kiilishyonyi.
Kyamba ilindi muwei masinga ha wunyamaṟi mandi-ha muwechi chandu kimuwaṟi iwa wahoṟotsu pfo.
Nyi kiira kiki mulewona ho mandi halya? Chi kiwei kya mbaṟi imwinengye mopfia kyayo sonu wulalu? Cha kipfa kiira kyakyo nyi opfu.
Indi wulalu ili momeletso na wunyamaṟi mukatano masinga ha Ruwa; nyi muwode-ng'u kiira wulalu kimwendie iilisho na kiheṟi kyefurumia nyi moo fo mlungana.
Kyamba wueri wosingya wunyamaṟi nyi opfu, indi kilya Ruwa aisumba nakyo mndu oke nyi moo fo mlungana fukukerye Kristo-hu Yesu Mndumii odu.
Ang'u mulaichi, wanawawama, kyamba njiideda nanyo sa muichi mawawaso. Mawawaso haitoṟye mndu ili mandi ai-ho na moo?
Kyamba mndu mka amwalikyo mii nyi apfungyo mii nyi wuwawaso ili mandi mii aiho na moo hose; kya indi mii chu kamekupfia, mka-cho amuitorye-se nyi wuwawaso womfungya miiacho-pfo.

Kiwukye-ho nyi kii-le; ke kiheri mii ai-ho na moo mka cho kadao nyi mii ungi nyi echiwio kye nyi ai mokiṟuhuyo; kya indi kombona mii amekupfia nyi alekio nyi wuwawaso wompfungya mii cho, kakudayo nyi mii ungi echiwio-se ke nyi ai mokiṟuhuyopfo.
Nanyo wanawawama wako, na wudong'u, mulewohyo kyemletsa na wuwawaso wu kui mweeke fo mbihu fo Kristo; mui wake ichu aleṟutsa auka wapfunyi luwe lochipfuṟukanya Ruwa mapfuṟukanyo.
Kyamba lyandi luwei wandu wa kimbihu nyi olakilakilo lo maumbuyo hewutyo tewe ipfo wuwawasonyi, nyilo luweiṟunda ipfo shiwungonyi sho shadu shechiuendye opfu.
Indi wulalu luwode mkuachie lulawaitoṟie nyi wuwawaso-wo lukapfa opfu loluletsa kilya kilupfungye kundu lukae-ho lochipfuṟukanya Ruwa lulawukye mumuyo, lulakuwode-se na mṟeho fo kacha.

Ili kii kido luhambe luda ngesa? Wuwawaso nyiwo wunyamaṟi? Ote-ko. Kya indi shile wuwawaso inyi njiwe manya wunyamaṟi-pfo. Ma njiwechimanya lango chando tsikeripfo chila wuwawaso wuhamhe. “Ma kulalange.”
Indi wunyamaṟi wulekuihetsa na iwawaso wukaamtsa lango tsa mbaṟi tsose tsiwei na inyi. Kyamba chila wuwawaso wuiho wunyamaṟi wupfiye.
Na inyi njiwewekukerye-ho na moo kacha kulaweiho wuwawaso; indi wuwawaso woikicha na wunyamaṟi wukaaluka.
Na inyi ngaendyo opfu kukanjihoya ke wuwawaso-wo wuwenjiwia okiiyo wowuuya injiendie opfu.
Kyamba wunyamaṟi wulekuihetsa na iwawaso wukanjilemba wukanjiendie opfu kui mweeke folyo.
Kyasiang'u wuwawaso nyi wui wulele na isho wushiwawasye shii shiele shirie wuhoṟotsu na wucha.

Alae kilya kya wucha nyi kiwenjiwiia kya opfu? Ote-ko; kya indi kundu wunyamaṟi-wu, ipfo kundo wuwenjiendie opfu mfondo wumanyikeho na pata ke nyi wunyamaṟi, na iwawaso liwe lyechiitika wunyamaṟi wuhende inyamaṟa wofeeṟa njowingo.
Kyamba luichi ke wuwawaso wurio nyi mumuyo. Indi inyi njii o kiwuyana njiimbikye isinga lya wunyamaṟi.
Njiichi kindo njiwuta-pfo; kyamba kilya njikundi njiikiwutapfo kya indi kilya njisuo nkyo njekekiwuta.
Kyasia komkoya ndakundi ikyo njekewuta na ngaidikya ke wuwawaso nyi wuwucha.
Indi wulalu chi o inyi njiiwuta-se njidipfo kya indi nyi wunyamaṟi-wu wukuwode na inyi.
Kyamba njiichi kye kunu koko nafo nyi mbihu fu foko tsako kuwode-ho kii kichapfo. Kyamba ikunda kilya kisumhanyi ee njikundi indi ikiwuta ote, kyalema.
Kyamba ikyi kisumhanyi njikikundi chiikyo njekewutapfo, kya indi ikyo kiwicho njisuo nyikyo sa njekewuta.
Indi komkoya ikyo njilakundi nyikyo sa njekewuta, chio inyi njii-ho-se mokiwutapfo, chila nyi wunyamaṟi-wo wuikiwuta, iwu wui kiidi kyako.
Ili kii kido nyi ngatamuo imanya ke ili njii-ho mokunda iwuta kii kicha nyi kwiho monjichilia, nyikyo kiwicho kilya kiwodanyi na inyi.
Kyamba njichihianyi na wuwawaso wo Ruwa kui wumndu woko wo kyammba.
Indi njiwonyi kwipfo wungi wuiwawaso ipfo shiwungonyi shako wochiwahana na wulya wowawasa mhie foko. Wo wukanjitana mpfunge o ipfo wuwawasonyi wo wunyamaṟi wuiwawasa ipfo shiwungonyi shako.
Apa, inyi nyi kisaya! Ichu ekaa nanletse mbihu-fu funjiduo opfunyi nyi wu?

Mwano fuwe fochiwikyo Ruwa chu echiidima lukuwawie na Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu. Ili kii kido na inyi njiwekaa na shilya shi shako njimonyi, njiwe mopfurukanya wuwawaso wo Ruwa kunu wuṟangonyi indi kimmbihu njikae njepfuṟukanya wuwawaso wo wunyamaṟi.
Kyasia ili kii kido wulalu kwiho oseso lohoya walya wai Kristo-hu Yesu-pfo.
Kyamba wuwawaso-wu wo Mumuyo moende moo fukeri Kristo-hu Yesu, nyiwo wulenjiletsa na wuwawaso wulya woende wunyamaṟi na opfu.

Kilya wunyamaṟi wulaweidima ili wuwei-wufafaṟe wudi nyi nyama, nyio Ruwa alekiwuta. Kechiduma Mana-chu oke amonyi, awa mfano fo nyama chaso tsirie wunyamaṟi, na kitewe alemduma na kya wunyamaṟi, kawonya wunyamaṟi-wu wukuwode ipfo nyamehu owingo.
Kiwehendekye kido kundu chile tsa wuwawaso tsishike yawutsyo nyiso lulekechumia mchumie fui-mhendeshe nyi nyama tsa mndu o wandu, indi luichumia mchumie kui pfinya ya Mumuyo.
Kyamba iwa wai wa mbuka ya nyama wo wekyechilio nyi shii sha nyama tso, indi iwa wai wa mbuka ya Mumuyo, wo wekyechilio nyi shii sha wai wa mbuka ya Mumuyo, wo wekehia shii sha Mumuyo.
Kyamba shilya nyama-tso tsekekuelengya, nyi shiduo opfunyi, indi shilya Mumuyo fokekuelengya sho shiwika moo na ofoṟo.
Kipfa shilya nyama-tso tsekekuelengya shiende kituwa na Ruwa kyamba tsilaindye wuwawaso wo Ruwa madu, manya tsilaidima iwuta tsido.
Indi iwo wakukerye-ho mkao ya nyama waidima ichihiana na Ruwapfo.
Indi nyo mukeri wa mkao fo nyamapfo kya indi mukeri wa mkao fo Mumuyo, komkoya Mumuyo o Ruwa aikukaya konu ketsinda nanyo. Mndu alai na Mumuyo o Kristo ichu chi o Kristo-pfo.
Indi komkoya Kristo akuwode nanyo, mbihu-i yanu yechipfa kipfa kya wunyamaṟi, indi Mumuyo fui moo fuimbike ipfo konu kundo momtano wahoṟotsu.

Indi komkooya Mumuyo o ichu aleṟutsa Yesu wapfunyi aikukaya konu ketsinda nanyo, mṟutsi-chu aṟutsye Yesu Kristo wapfunyi nechimtana na mbihu yanu ii mfari-moo, iwe meny-moo kipfa kya Mumuyo-cho oke ai kiidi kyanu.
Ili kii kido wanawawama nyi lukeri welya sile, indi sile tso tsilakeri tsa nyama tsadu, luwechikapya moo luiwaitike nyitso.
Kyamba kokooya mokapya moo mui-waitike nyi nyama tsanu mokunda ipfa. Indi komkoya mowaha mbutie ya nyama tsanu njiwicho mui-waitike nyi Mumuyo nyi mochiwada moo.
Kyamba iwa wose wadao nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa nyiwo wai wana wa Ruwa.
Kyamba nyi mulaleambya Mumuyo fo wusinga foamtsa-se lingi wuowu chi wudopfo, kya indi nyi muleambya Mumuyo o wuwana moluenenga ilaha; hoi Aba, hoi Wande.
Nao Mumuyo-cho nyi akusanzye na mumuyo-fu fodu kya iṟingishya kye nyi lui wana wa Ruwa.

Indi kyamba so lukeri wana wa Ruwa nyi lui na waoṟi luchiambia mboṟa tsa Ruwa; lukamba waoṟi nyi lui na waoṟi weoṟa hamu na Kristo kiwe lohenda ikisokiso nao kundu lushike iwiko na wuitoṟinyi wumu nao.
Kyamba ngahamba mawawyo ha ki-wulalu halaṟingananyi na wuitoṟi wulya lochikaa luwutambaṟuyo.
Cha kipfa mweṟeṟukye fo mbika ii fuwedye mnu ke wana-wa wa Ruwa washike ihenda itambaṟuka.
Kyamba mbika-ii indambikye masionyi chi kipfa iwekundi ihendeke idipfo, kya indi nyi kipfa kya Ruwa ichu moidambika-ho. Iwewa kya owedi.
Cha kipfa na shiwumbe shi shechikaa shihende yashuo wusingawu wo mkae yepuo ishike ikoya mkuachie fo wuitoṟi-wu wana wa Ruwa wawode.
Kyamba luichi ke shiwumbe shi shoose shikeri itsika shiwodo nyi kinangananga shika wulalu cha ha okora.
Manya chi shiwumbe shi tupupfo, kya indi naso luwenyi lui na Mumuyo chu, ili luwode mbetesa iya ya Ruwa lutano wana ipfo matalayonyi ha mbihu fodu.
Kyamba ikiṟo nyi lomekiṟo kya owedi. Indi kyeweda kikamboneka iweda lyahenda isia; kyamba mndu kindo kilya akiwonyi nyi akiweda-se ki?
Indi lukamba mowedya ikyo lulawonyi nyi lokiwedya lochikutirisia.
Na wudo na Mumuyo akeri iludara keluwikya ngaya hando lufafaa; kyamba so lulaichi chandu kiluwaṟi iterewa hando kiwuṟie isumhantso, kya indi Mumuyo amonyi ailuikayaho na masumukyo halechiwa ihamba.
Indi msa motichya ngoo tsa wandu nyio sa aichi chuṟe tsa Mumuyo ai moterewya wandu wa Ruwa akundi.
Na luichi kya shindo shose Ruwa nekyeṟunda hamu na walya, wamkundi na iwaonyisha wucha wose, nawo nyiwo wai-walahe kui kyama kilya kyake.
Kitewe nyi kipfa iwo alesonguo iwamanya kawesonguo na iwasambuṟa wawe wefanana na mfananye fo Mana-chu oke, kundu o nawe wawae o wana wa wee limu wafoi.
Na iwo alesonguo iwasambuṟa nyiwo alewalaha, na iwo o nyiwo alewatana wahoṟotsu; oshangunyi lokye; indi iwo alemaa iwatana wahoṟotsu wadi nawo nyiwo alewasumba wuitoṟi.
Aka luhambe-se luda kya iki? Komkoya Ruwa ailuikaya aka ichu alufoye nyi wu?
Ruwa Amda alanunya ma Mana-chu oke kimumu mfi katana amdambika kipfa kyadu so lose, nyi wuda echida alaluinenga shicha shose, nalusumbe nasho ngesa?
Ichu echianduya iwa wai-wasambuṟe nyi Ruwa nyi wu? Ruwa aiho awa mletsi!
Ichu echihutsya owingo nyi wu? Kwipfo-pfo? Kristo Yesu aiho, nyio sa alepfa na kya ngoseṟa nyi aleṟutso, awuka ko wapfu, o akukerye ipfo ko kulyo ko Ruwa Kawa moluterewya-ho so!
Ichu echiluletsana na ikunda lya Kristo nyi wu ngesa? Ngesa kiwe nyi shiwira ang'u ikisokiso, ang'u iterengyo, ang'u nyi njaa ang'u nyi iwuṟa nguo, ang'u nyi ndenga; ang'u ifunyo oshu?
Kihendekye chando kii-kiṟehye, “Nyi kitewe kyapfo loanga mowoho taṟaraa puti; lukatano cha ili lui machondi heshinja.”
Kya indi kya shindo sho kose shindo-shi shiluwode nyi lokia-ho lui wawinzi lukuwawie na ichu alukundi adi.
Kyamba njikusihye kye ma opfu ma moo ma wamalaika ma waitoṟi ma isho shiiho wulalu ma isho shekaa shiwe ili numa ma maapfinya mawe.
Ma kilya kikuilikishye ngine-hu ma kilya kisokye ipfo shi ma mbika ingi njiwe shilechiidima iluletsana na mkundana fo Ruwa alukundi nafo furianyi na Kristo Yesu Mndumii odu.
Njiideda kya lohi njii Kristo-hu, njihamba wongopfo, na ngo tsa mrimenyi foko tsii-njiwanze nyi Mumuyo Mwele tso tsanjiikanya ihoṟotsa kiṟingishyo ki.
Ke njiwodo mnu mfowa na mawawio ipfo ngoonyi na wukiwa wochitochatocha kitsitsi kipfa kya wandu wako lui samu imu.
Kyamba njiwekundi ke inyi njimonyi njitano msese kyewa lyenenga wanawawama wako wa mkambo fumu na inyi wawehenda ikiṟo.
Wo nyiwo wai Waisraeli sa Ruwa alewasambuṟa wawe wana wakye, kawasumba wuitoṟi na mkundana fulya na wuwawaso wulya na wuindi woindya Ruwa na shyasa shilya.
Na waku walya na wawo, na ipfo kowo Kristo achee apaṟikye kowo ili amefeo mndu, nyio Ruwa mokaa huya-shose moichimbiṟo mlungana. Amenyi.
Manya chi cha ili idedo lya Ruwa lilachikiepfo. Kyamba chi wandu wose iwo wapaṟikye ko Israeli wai wambuṟe wa Ruwapfo.
Cha kipfa chi iwa wai luwa lya Abrahamu wakeri wana wosepfo, Chando Madedo Maele hahambye “Luwa lyapfo nyi lyechiuka ko Isaki.”
Lyo likeri lile; ke wana wawafee kimbihu chiwo wai wana wa Ruwapfo chila nyi wana wawafee kui kyaasenyi nyiwo sa waitalo ke wai luwa.
Kyamba kyaasa kilya nyi, “Alya cha wulalu njechiicha-se njikoye Sara awode mana.”
Kya indi chi ikyo kyake tupupfo, na kya Rebeka ili awekupfungye wamboṟa awuta ko ichu umu nyio ndeyadu so Isaki.
Kyamba kyawo ma indi wana walawendefeo ma walawendewuta kiwe kii kicha kiwe kii kiporu kashika iwio kyewadumbuya, kundu kyama kya Ruwa kyesambuṟa kikae-ho kechitoṟya.
Kilahendeke kyechiwa na mweke fo ngaata tsa mndu kya indi kiwukye ko Ruwa ichu modika ndaho kikyenyi, nakyo kiwei kiile, ke wawae nyi echisingya manawo.
Na wudo ku-kuṟehie ke, “Yakobo nyio njilemkunda indi Esau nyio njilemleha.”
Aka luhambe luda? Kulako Ruwa nyi aledeko? Manya-le
kyamba nyi awie Mose, “Njechisaṟia ichu njechikunda imsaṟia.”
Alewo koka na wudo kii kindo-kyo kyawa ikundo nyi mndu ang'u iidikyo nyiopfo kya indi kii kya Ruwa mosaṟya amonyi.
Kyamba Maṟehyo Maele hahambye kya Farao, “ Kitewe ngakuwika mangi nyi kundu njimanyishye kopfo pfinya yako mbode na rina lyako liweongoya ipfo orukenyi kose.”
Kyasia ng'u Ruwa nekesaṟia icho ose akunda imsaria; ichu amdumbuya kyemumiṟa nyi aimumiṟa.
Kulako nyi ochireeka na inyi nonjiwie, “Nyi kiili Ruwa awonya-se mndu owingo? Kyamba nyi o ku awehodana na kyama kyake?”
Hoo iyo ui mndu o wandu; nyi ukeri o ku koanduyana na Ruwa? Aka kindo kiwumbe kitane kyawia mokiwumba, “Nyi kiili untanye kudi?”
Mowumba chi awode pfinya na wumba nakuwutye chando akundi kumu kakuwumbya kihia kyechia kumu kakuwumbya-ho sa kyefana.
Indi Ruwa narie imanyishya shihia shilya shimpfulutsya nyashi tuuke yake, na iloṟa-ho kilya akuidimye nyi ashilelye na wuleeli wung'anyi ma shishitsye ihenda rumatso.
Nyi kundu nawemanyishya-ho mfoe fo wuitoṟi wokye alya shihie-hu shirio nyi wutonga wokye isho alesonguo ishiteseheṟya wuitoṟi wulya.
Nawo nyiso so alelulaha lupaṟikye chi ko Wayuda tupupfo kya indi na ipfo mkambonyi ya wahenu.
Kiidikyanyi na kilya ahambye kui dumbu lya Hosea; “Njechilaha fulawei mkambo fuwe mkambo foko. Na ichu alawei mkunde nawe Mkunde oko.
Na mwikimbi ipfo kundo wawekewio, Nyo mukeri wandu wakopfo mpfondo wechikaa wasendo wana wa Ruwa menyi-moo.”
Na Yesaya apoṟohoṟya Israeli, “Kukoye mfoye fo wana wa Israeli wueshikya cha mbuṟusanga tsa mbai ya ipalipali lya wuyana sa wechikiṟo-ho nyi waangu tupu.
Kyamba Mndumii nyi echimarisa iwika kitanyo na limu na idumbwo teṟe ipfo sangenyi lyoose.”
Kiwe chando Yesaya alewesonguo ihamba, “Kima Mndumii Menyi-Matoṟito alawelutsuhaṟya luwa nyi luwewa cha Wasodomu na ifanana na Wagomora.”
Aka luhambe luda? Nyi kikeri kiile wa mkambo mhenu walawewingya wuhoṟotsu, oshangunyi lo Ruwa wo wakawada wuhoṟotsu, oshangunyi lo Ruwa, kui wuidiki.
Indi Israeli ili iweiwingya wuhoṟotsu oshangonyi lo Ruwa ikusirye na wuwawaso ileshika ikoya wuwawasopfo.
Nyi ki kyaduma? Nyi kipfa ilawekuwode kiwanje-hu kya wuidiki indi iwekuwode kiwanje-hu kya mawuta ikakapa mtuulya alya iho-hu lya mtuulya.
Chando Madedo Maele hahambie, “Ambuya a ulya ngaleṟya iho lyekapya mtuulya kulya Sionyi na piita ya iho yedekesha. Mdu moidikia ichu ai iho lyo echisukapfo.”
Ee-wo wanawawama, macha ha mrima hanjiwodye kyawo njiwaterewya ko Ruwa wahende wonyo okiio.
Kyamba nyi ngawawikya kiṟingishyo kye nyi wekekapa mtambakira wechipfula Ruwa, indi chi kya osaṟefo.
Kyamba ili walaweichi wuhoṟotsu wo Ruwa wakawetambahanya ikulikisha-ho wowo wawenyi nkyo kiletewa walakutambe na wuhoṟotsu wu wo Ruwa.
Kyamba mtsitsyonyi fo wuwawaso nao Kristo moendie oryo mwidiki wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
Kyamba kilya Mose ahambye kya wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo wuwewonyo kui mweeke fo wuwawaso kikeri kiile ke, “Nyi mtanyi mowutana chandu mawawaso hahambie nyio mndu echiwada moo na mweeke fowo.”
Kya indi wuhoṟotsu-wu oshangunyi lo Ruwa wuṟukye wuidikinyi wo wuhambye wudi, “Kulawone koihamba, mrimenyi fopfo, nyi o ku echidoya ruvehu?” (Lyo liwewa isotsa Kristo na wanda.)
“Ang'u nyi o ku echisoka na kulya ko wapfu.” (Lyo liwewa idosa Kristo ipfo ko wapfu naendo na huye.)
Madedo Maele hahambye. “Idedo lyo lya Ruwa lii afui, naiyo nyi likukerye ipfo dumbunyi lyapfo na ipfo ngoonyi yapfo.”
Kipfa komkooya kohamba na dumbu lyapfo kye Yesu nyio Mndumii na iidikya koidikya ipfo ngoonyi yapfo ke Ruwa nyi alemṟutsa ipfo wapfunyi nyi ochikiṟo.
Kyamba lumwidikya kui mrima liende wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa; na imhamba kui dumbu liwonye mndu okiio.
Kyamba Madedo Maele hahambie, “Oryo mndu ose echimwidikya o echikaa nahoyo nyi sonupfo.”
Nyiko wandu wose; kwiho mletsano foletsana Wayuda na Wagrikipfo. Kyamba ichu umu nyio Mndumii owo wose nyi aisuṟia iwo wechimterewa wose.
Kyamba Madedo Maele hahambie “Oryo mndu echiterewa kui rina lya Mndumii nyi echikiṟo.”
Aka wechiidima imlaha wada walamwidikye ngesa? Indi wamwidikye wada walandeshikio mmbonyinyi tsake ngesa? Indi washikio wada mmbonyi tsake kulaiho mowaongoya ngesa?
A wandu waongwo wada walaiwadume ngesa? Chando kiikiṟehye ke, “Apa ndifo tsa waende ndumi ya Sia chando tsaona.”
Kya indi chi wose waleambia Ndumi ya Siapfo. Kyamba Yesaya ahambye, “Hoi Mndumii, nyio-wu aleidikya ndumi yadu?”
Kyasia wuidiki nyi wokeamtso nyi ndumi, indi ndumi nyi ikurye na idedo lya Kristo.
Ang'u njiwesenyi njihambe, Ngesa nyi waleleicho ndumi-yo? Ee-ko. Waleicho Kuwukye mangelele hawo hakadung'ana wanda ii kose, na madedo hawo hakatana hashika kulyando mtsitsio fo wuyana.
Ang'u njiwese-se, Kulako Waisraeli walaweichi ngesa? Nao nyi Mose alemhamba, “Inyi njechimutewa muhende inyeng'a wandu walai mkambo, mhenu inenga mukunyashe kya mkambo-fu fulaweimpfunde.”
Na Yesaya kawekaria kehamba, “Nyi njilekunda ikoyo nyi walya walawekenjipfula, ngawewonekya walya walawewesie mbonyi tsako.”
Indi Israeli kaiwia, “Njiwetsinda mkonu fose njechileshia mkambo hako mawoko fulanjidikye fukawewa mlemeshi.”
Ili nyi wudi kii ngahamba, Aka Ruwa nyi alekufunya wandu wake ngesa? Ote ko. Kyamba na inyi njii Mwisraeli njipaṟikye ipfo luwenyi lya Abrahamu njii o kishari kya Benyamin.
Ruwa afunye mkambo foke alemsambuṟa kachapfo. Ang'u mulaichi kilya Madedo Maele hahambia kya Elia ili alenunuwia Ruwa kechianduya Israeli kehamba.
“Hoi Mndumii, wamewaha waikimbi wapfo wakawesanya marasyo hapfo; na inyi mmonyi njitsihee-ho; nawo nyi injiṟinjawia moo fu wakeri.”
Ruwa nalemhaluo ada? “Na njikutsiheṟye-ho wasoṟo shiku mfungade sa welalepfirya Baali ndi.”
Nyi wudo kuwei na wulalu, kutsuhe mtsuharo sa Ruwa afusamburie njia ya wutonga.
Indi nyi njia ya wutonga wokye chi kui mawuto ha mndupfo. Kima shila wudo wutonga wuwekaa wui wutongapfo.
Kikuwukye-ho ki kyemanya ngesa? Waisraeli walekoya kilya waweikipfula-pfo mtsuhaṟo fulya nyi fulekikoya. Indi walya wengi wakakuumiṟa.
Chando kuu-kuṟehye, “Ruwa nyi alewaenengya mumuyo fo ihombya na meso halaambwo na madu halaicho shika mkonu fo inu.”
Na Dawidi nyi ahambye, “Kidembo kyawo kyelya kando kiwawiie mshihodi na mdeho, kiwahalukie hando hewalahutsa watayoho kiṟaache.
Meso hawo hahutsyo meema walawone kindo, na mhongo yawo uileme mlungana.”

Akale Kulako Wayuda nyi walekapa mtuulya itane warumara ngesa? Oo manya-le. Kya indi ipfo kundu warendemkye mpfondo na mkambo iya mhenu ilewonyo-ho okiio, nalo luhende iwamtsya Wayuda nawo wanyenyi wowanyenyia.
Indi komkoya iteremka lyawo lyamesuṟisha lidi wuyana na iho lyawo likawesuṟisha mkambo iya mhenu, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa Wuholotsu wowo wochisurisha wengi mnu.
Nyi ngadeda nanyo mui wa mkambo mhenu. Ma ili nji-mdume njiwe msu ko mkambo mhenu na njiiwikya wupfuṟukanyi wu woko mng'ano.
Njechitambahanya yamtsa macha ha wa orukyenyi loko wamunyenyie kulako njechikiṟa-ho maata wawo.
Kyamba kokoya ipfo kundu wamhenda ileho-wo kukuwukye-ho kisanza wuyana na Ruwa, nyi-ki kyechiwuka ipfo kundo wehenda yambyo nyi Ruwa? Wapfu wechiṟuka!
Komkoya kipeṟengu kya mkate kii kiele, na mkate fo foose mso fo mruwe fui mwele na komkoya mri fo ikidi fumcha na maṟamba ho naho hamecha.
Indi komkoya maṟamba halya maata-ho ha msinepfu mcha halepahuo handu halya kukadongio ho iṟamba lya msinepfu fongeṟenyi. Kowa malungyo-ho na mru fo na malenda ha msinepfu,
kulapiṟe Ma kulakushelye oo maṟambenyi; indi kokunda ikushela manya chi iyo urie mru fo pfo nyifo sa fukurie iyo.
Kyasia nyi ochikuhambya-ng'u, “Maṟamba nyi ha-mapahwo-ng'u kundu njiodongyo-ho inyi.”
Na kicha; ho halemepahwo nyi kipfa halaweidikye, indi iyo uhoṟoki-ho kui pfinya ya mwidikye. Ma ulakung'anyishe, indi owuo.
Kyamba kokoya Ruwa amekeda alalindya Wayuda walya wai cha maṟamba halya ha kikaya, echikulindya iyopfo.
Kyasia keweringang'u woloru wo Ruwa na wunesi wokye. Wunesi nyi wuhoye walya warendemkye, indi wuoluṟu wo Ruwa wokukaya iyo kiwe ochikutamba na wuoloru-wu; shile nyi wudo na iyo na ochipahwo-ho.
Na Wayuda da wakada wupiṟi wowo wakaidikia Ruwa na wechikaa wadongyo-ho; Kyamba Ruwa nawode pfinya echiidima-se iwadongya-ho nawo.

Kyamba komkoya iyo ulepahwo ipfo msinepfunyi fui fo ngeṟenyi kowewuya idongyo ipfo msinepfunyi fulya mcha kulasumhana kikaya kyafo, nyi wuda kya wueṟa Wayuda wo wai wa kikya kyafo wechiwuya idongyo ipfo msinepfunyi fui fowo wawenyi.

Kyasia, wanawawama, njikundi mukae mulaichi kyama kyikoomepfo, mulawone mokusirya na wuṟango wonu wuwenyi kipfa wumi wokuumiṟa wo Wayuda waweny wo wulemhoya Israeli nyi wo oweṟe, kyayo itane wandu wa mkambo mhenu washikia Ruwa na menu yamhenda ishika iwonyo okiio.
Kikamewa kido na Israeli yose yechihenda ikiṟo, chando kuu-kuṟehye, “Nyi kulya Sionyi kochiwuka-ho mkira. Nyio sa echiletsa Yakobo wulemeshi wulya.
Nyifo mkundano foko njiwada nawo ilindi njechiwuta-ho manyamaṟo hawo.”
Kipfa kya ili waileha Ndumi ya Sia. Wayuda wai wakituwa wa Ruwa kui kiira kyanu, mkambo ingi lyo limanyikya konu, indi sumuhana na msambuṟye fulya wai wakunde wa Ruwa, lyo limanyikye ko waku wawo.
Kyamba shisumbo sha wutonga wo Ruwa na ndaho yake, sho sheteṟeshukasho.
Kyamba chando nyo muwelemye Ruwa ili kacha, indi wulalu momeenengo osaṟyo lokye iliindi wo wakaa welema.
Nyi wudo nawo nyi walemba walemeshi wulalu kipfa mohenda isaṟyo nyo, kundu wahende isaṟyo nawo wokya wulalu.
Kyamba Ruwa nyi asunguwanye wose ipfo kundo walemanye nao kundu nawawonye wose osaṟyo loke.
Apa wuleshe wo wusuṟi wo Ruwa na wo wuṟango woke na wulaanyi. Mdumbuye yake yedumbwo mondu chando shilechiwa isonjokoṟa chando tsilechiwa ihesho chandu kuikurehye.
Nyi o ku alememanya mahio ha Mndumii? Ang'u nyi wu awei mnjama oke?
Ang'u nyi o ku alesongwo imnenga kindo nawede echiwihiṟyo?
Kipfa nyio ai kimaenyi kya shindo shose, nao ai moshiwanzya mkaenyi, na kokye shechikaa shiinukye shose. Wuitoṟi nyi woke wokaa mlungana. Amenyi.
Ngashika aa ngamtutuma-ng'u, wanawawama, njiimwitike nyi osaṟyo lu lo Ruwa, kye mudambike mbihu yo yanu iwe kidaso kyele kii na moo kichihianyi na Ruwa; kiwe wuindi wonu wusumhanyi.
Ma mulawone mokuwakisha na wuyana-wu wo kiwulalu, kya indi muhende kuhalwo mochikulawukya mhie, kundu muidime iidikyana na kilya Ruwa akundi, kilya kii kicha kichihiṟye, kyawukye swai.

Kisumbo njii-msumbe nakyo kyanjienenga njiwie oryo mndu ose akeri ipfo konu, ke nalahie kyake kyekung'anyisha kyeng'anya kilya kimsuhananye, kya indi nahie-ho kyeidikya kidembo kyake chando Ruwa ahawye oryo mndu kiheo kya mwidikye.
Kyamba chando so lui na mbihu fuwode shiwungo shifoi, indi shiwungosho shilai shiwawasye iṟunda lya mbaṟi imu shose.
Nyi wudo naso lufoi ludi nyi lukeri mbihu fumu fuu-msanze Kristo-hu, indi kyadu so luikayana shiwungo.
Na shisumbo so lui-wasumbe shirianyi na wutonga wulya, sho shii shingi na shingi. Msa amsumbe wuikimbi naikimbe kisumhanye wuidiki.
Msa amsumbe waṟundi narunde. Msa amsumbe wuloshi naloshe.

Msa amsumbe chila yewhiria wengi moo nawewuta ado. Kwipfo ai motutuma, nawekaa echitutuma; kwipfo Sa ai mohawia wengi shindo awode nahawe ai msalari, kwipfo ai mosaṟya, nakae-ho echiṟamka. Na mosaria nasarie na sia.
Mkundie fukae fulawode wulembetseṟi. Tangaluonying'u kilya kii kiwicho, mukuwawe na kilya kii kicha.
Mkundana fonu fokundana fuwe fo wakanyi kamu, ngapano moira iwe yewikyana wuindi.
Mulalehele ihidya siṟi, mwakye-akye mrimenyi yanu mochisingya Mndumii.
Ipfo kikusihyonyi kyanu mbechihio, ipfo shiwirenyi mukuhode, ipfo wuindinyi woiterewa mukae-pfo kiheri kyose.
Mudaṟane na wandu wa Ruwa kya shindo wawuṟye, mukukambiṟe ihida wahenu kui wulalutsa.
Walya waimterengya muwawikye ona. Ee-wo iwawikya ona, ma mulawasese.
Kewechihionyi kimu na iwo wawachihie, muwelia na iwo welia.
Muwe mochikayana kui mhie fumu koorio mndu, mulawone mochihia kya shidembo shesonguo, kya indi muchumie muwodanyi na walya watutu. Mulakutane waṟango nyo muwenyi.
Kiwicho mndu aimbutia mulawone mochimtaa na kiwicho kingi; muwe mochikusaṟa isho shii shicha ipfo sumuhana na wandu wose.
Kokoya kyewa-ho kui pfinya yo nyo murie, kewadyenying'u wandu wose ofoṟo.
Wana wa wama, Ma mulatae kiṟaache deyenyi Ruwa, kyamba kui kurehye kiraache nyi kyako inyi, nyio inyi njechitaa. Nyi wudo Mndumii ahambye.
Kya indi iyo mkituwa opfo kawado nyi njaa kewemnenge shelya, kawado n nyoda kewemrutse mṟinga; kowika kudo nyi ochimsanya okaa lwakye oo mdo-hu foke.
Ulakunde iwinzo nyi kilya kii kiwicho, kya indi kilya kii kiwicho ukiwinze ochiwuta kii kicha.
Oryo mndu nawe moanguya wanene wo waitoṟie oruka madu, kyamba kulaiho wuitoṟi shile na iwo wuwukye ko Ruwa; waitoṟi-wo wakeri-ho m wawawikye-ho nyi Ruwa.
Nkyo kimaduma mndu molemana na mawawaso ha waitoṟi wo, nyi alemanyi na kilya Ruwa akiwikye. Indi walemanyi-wo nyi wechikuwonya wudeheli wawenyi.
Kyamba wanene wa mengenyi wo walaendye mndu wuowu kya ko wandu wecha, kya indi nyi waende wuowu kya ko wandu wawicho Kokoya ulakundi iowuo waitoṟi wuta mecha nao nechikuṟumisha.

Kyamba nyi wukukerye-ho mpfruṟukanyi mokupfuṟukanya iyo kya wucha. Indi komkoya owuta kii kiwicho owuo, kyamba walakupfungye oshu kya wulya; kyamba nyi wukeri mpfuṟukanyi o Ruwa mowonya mndu awutye owicho wudeheli wurio nyi tuuke iya ya Ruwa.
Ko ikyo kiwaṟi iindia wanene wadu, chi kipfa kya tuuke iya ya Ruwa tupupfo, kya indi na kipfa kya ngo tsa mrima.
Nkyo kimaduma mokyetaa na okamba, wasongoru wo kyamba wakukerye wechiṟundya Ruwa iawutsia iṟunda lyawo.
Kewenengenyi wose kiwasumhanye, mowesa okamba, mtaenyi okamba, sa ai mosuhuṟa, muwemsuhuṟya, sa aoweshye muvemowuo, moindyo kewemwindyenyi.
Mulakae na sile ya mndu ma iwe ya iki, shile na iya ya ikundana; kyamba icho mokunda odoe nyio aawutsye wuwawaso.
Kyamba ili lihambye; ulaṟuhuye, ulawaahe, ulaiwe, ulalange, ma kokooya kwipfo iwawaso lingi ma likawa lihya, nyi hamawunge-wunge na idedo-li, kye kunda odoo chandu ukukundi iyo kumonyi.
Mndu akundi odoe ekembutia kiwichopfo. Nahong'u ikunda odoya lyo lyekeawutsya wuwawaso.
Wikyenyi mudo mui wandu waichi heri kye saa yamshika yekure-ng'u madonyi; kyamba oletso lodu wulalu nyi lui afui na kota lyandi lulewoka iidikya.
Kio kyaitika ihenda mfiri nyi icha fukeri. Ili kii kido lukuatwo mawuto hose ha meema luṟae shisha sha sa.
Luchumie lui na sonu njicha tsisumhanye mfiri, lulawone lokaa na tsilya mbicho tsa ringinyi ma tsa wunanzinyi ma tsa wumeluki ma tsa sheeṟe ma tsa isohuo mondu ma tsa idosa nyashi.
Kya indi kuṟaaenyi Mndumii Yesu Kristo, mfo mṟaae fonu, mukuṟise kundu iwetesya moo lilawone lyechiamtsa lango mbicho.
Msa afafae wuidiki kewemambyenyi mulawone mochimitika hando akangashia.
Wandu wailachikanyi: Ichu umu nyi akusirye kyelya shindo shose na ichu ungi afafae adi kui wuidiki nyi ekelya mboha tupu.
Ichu ekelya shelya shose nalawone kechimina ichu alalya shose. Ma ichu ekyelya mboha tupu nalawone kechihutsya ichu ekelya shelya shose owingo; kyamba Ruwa nyi awemwambye nao.
A iyo nyi o wu notane oanduya mṟundi o mndu ungi? Nyi Mndumii okye amonyi ekembanza mafuo hakye ang'u imwolotsa wanda; indi nyi echihoṟoka kyamba Mndumii ai na pfinya yemhoṟotsa.
Mndu nekeidima iwona mfiri mliwe fumcha kota ingi, ichu ungi ekeindya mfiri yoose chando yambanyi: Oryo mndu nakuwangye necha mhionyi foke fumenyi.

Ichu ekyeindia mkonu mliwe nyi ekefuwiluya iindia Mndumii; na ichu molya shelya nyi awelia Mndumii oke, kyamba nyi aidapfuma-ho Ruwa. Na ichu ekekuotoya ilya nyi awekuotoya ichihiṟa Mndumii na idapfuma kaidafuma Ruwa.
Kyamba kodu kulaipfo mokulisiṟa na moo foke amonyi, ma kulaipfo mokupfia opfu loke amonyi.
Kyamba ili mandi lui-ho na moo nyio Mndumii luimpfuṟukanya nafo, ili mandi loshika ihenda ipfa, nyio Mndumii lohenda impfia. Kyasia lukaa-ho na moo ang'u lukapfa na luwei wa Mndumii.
Kimaduma kya ikyo Kristo alepfa kawuya kaṟuka, nyi kundu nawe Mwitoṟi o iwo wapfie na iwo wai na moo.
A iyo nyi kiili oanduya manomayo? Ang'u iyo, nyi kiili uminye manomayo? Kyamba so lose nyi lochikaa lushike ihoṟoka alya mbai ya loṟika lo ianduyo lo Ruwa.
Kyamba kuu-kuṟehye; Mndumii ahambye, so inyi njii na moo, orio mndu nechinjipfiria ndi na oryo olimi lochichika ke inyi nyi Ruwa.
Kikawa kido oryo mndu odu nyi echikaa nahoṟokye kii kyake o amonyi ipfo oshungunyi lo Ruwa.
Nahong'u kya indi muitike ideda kya iki, ke kulakae-ho echiendie manomae tewe ang'u paṟi lya mrima ang'u imtewa nawute wunyamaṟi.
Inyi njiichi njikusihye Mndumii Yesu kye kwipfo kindo kirie tewepfo.
Kyamba kokoya manomayo ahenda iwichuṟo nyi mlie fopfo okichumia mhendo furio nyi ikundapfo. Manya kulawone kochidekesha kui mlie fu fopfo ichu alepfio nyi Kristo.
Kilya kyanu kii kicha mulalekye kiisalucho.
Kyamba Wumangi wo Ruwa chi wukeri mlie na mnyoepfo, kya indi nyi wukeri wuhoṟotsu na ofoṟo na wukesi wokuṟamkya-ho kui Mumuyo Mwele.
Kyamba ichu akuwodye na ikyo awa mopfuṟukanya-ho Kristo nyio sa achihiṟye Ruwa kawekundo nyi wandu.
Ili nyi wudo kii luwingye isho shiende ofoṟo na isho shepfungana so luwenyi na wenyi.
Ma kulawone kochifurunja irunda lya Ruwa kui marekyano ha mlie fo shelya. Shelya shoose shii shiheṟemtsu kya indi ko ichu echilya kindo kepfio nyi mdo, ipfo kokye kyechiwa nyi wunyamaṟi.
Kiwe kicha-ho nyi koda kulalya nyama; ma inyo mpfinyo; ma ilya kyelya kingi kyekeendye manomayo ikapya-ho mtuulya.
Nyi mwidikye uifukaya wocho? Ufukaye kya ora lo-kopfo ukeri oshangunyi Ruwa. Nanga icho alakuendye owingo amonyi lo Ruwa. Nanga icho alakuendye owingo amonyi ipfo kundo akudumbuya kya kindo kiwe.
Indi ichu echilya kepfiopfio mdo o nyi ai mbonye owingo, kipfa awuta kilai-kiamtse nyi mwidikye. Na oryo kindo kilechiwuto na mweke fo mwidikye kyo kii wunyamaṟi.
Indi so luwangi wuidikinyi kiluwaṟi idaṟana na waleheshi walya hando wafafae, lulawone lochikulisiṟa luwenyi.
Oryo mndu odu nawe molisiṟa odoe na kilya kii kicha kiwe kyechimira.
Kyamba nao Kristo alalekulisiṟa amonyi, kya indi kiwehendekye kuu-kuṟehye, “Shiisalucho sha walya walekuisalucha iyo nyio inyi shikanjihoya.”
Kyamba shilya shileṟehyo mbooko nyi shilemmaa iṟehyo shelulosha-so, kundu lukuwutye ikaa lochikusihya ipfo kundo mṟeho-yo ihambye ikukarishya lya waidiki wa kacha yechiluwihiṟya nalyo moo.
Nao Ruwa chu ai mokarisha na iwihiṟya moo namuenenge muwe mochikusaṟa kimu nyo muwenyi na weny, kiwe kyechihiana na Yesu Kristo.
Kundu muwe mochiwikya Ruwa mng'ano, ichu ai Nde o Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo, fuwe fochiwikyo-ho kui mrima ii msanze cha ili kui-ho modeda umu mfi.
Nkyo kimwitike muhende yambyana nyo muwenyi na wenyi chando na Kristo alewemuambya nyo kyewikya Ruwa mng'ano.
Kyamba ngamuwia Kristo nyi alewa mopfuṟukanya Wayuda kemanyisha-ho kiwulohi kya Ruwa nainutsye-ho shaasa Ruwa shilya waku walya walewikyo,
kundu mkambo iya mhenu waṟumishe Ruwa kipfa kya osaṟio loke lowasaṟya. Chando kuu-kuṟehye, Nkyo kyaenenga njechikuṟumisha ipfo mkambonyi mhenu na iimbya kiṟumi kya rina lyapfo.
Kukawuya kukahambo-se; Nyo mkambo mhenu ke chihionyi kimu na mkambo fu foke.
Na lingi-se, “Keichikenyi Mndumii nyo yoose mbaṟi tsa wandu, mkambo yo iwe yechimwichika yose.”
Na lingi-se Yesaya ahambye, “Kochicha mndu kuwuka kisharinyi kya Yese, msa echiikolonya mkambo ya wandu, nao nyio wa mkambo-ii wechimwidikia.”
Nao Ruwa-chu mokusihyo adi nawe mombonya nyo mfeṟa fo oryo msiha fose na ofoṟo shirianyi na mwidikye fomwidikya kundu mukusuṟye necha mui na mkusihye kui pfinya ya Mumuyo Mwele.
Na inyi mmonyi, wanawawama, njikusirya kyanu nyo ke muwelukye wutechi welu mukaichuo wulaanyi wose mukatana moidima iloshana muwenyi.
Indi njilawode wuowu ngaṟehya mbonyi kui shinengele cha ili njimtamra njiimchihie nyi wutonga njimsumbe nyi Ruwa.

Mumanye ke inyi njii mwongoi o Kristo Yesu a-mdume ko mkambo ya wandu mhenu njiwe mowoongoya Ndumi ya Sia ya Ruwa ya okiio, kundu wa mbaṟi tsingi tsa wandu wawe odambiko luchihianyi na Ruwa lui-uheṟemtse nyi Mumuyo Mwele.
Mpfo kundo kiṟumi kya wusongoṟu woko kiwukye iki njiwode ipfo Kristo-hu Yesu wopfuṟukanya shilya shii sha Ruwa.
Kyamba njilakarya ihamba kindo shile nyi shilya Kristo aletana anjiwode kihia kyake kyeangushya mkambo mhenu madu kui ideda na iwuta.
Kikawa kui pfinya ya shichano na maṟiho shiweiwiko nyi Mumuyo Mwele, fo Ruwa. Kui ichumia lyako orio handu, wokya Yerusalemu ngashika Iliriko, ngaonguo Ndumi ya Sia ya Kristo kui Wusalari.
Indi ngakunyasha njidi kye njechiongoya Ndumi ii ya Sia kundo kulandesendyo rina lya Kristo, njilawone njechihenda iwika mba ipfo kundo ungi awehye-ho otende.
Kya indi kihendekye chando kuukuṟehye, “Iwo walandeongoyo mbonyi tsake wahende imbona, na iwo welandeicho kyake wahende immanya.”
Nakyo nyikyo kiwenjishingye njia kafoi yeshika konu.
Indi wulalu ngamemarisa iṟunda kunu; na kyamba kafoi mbewodo nyi macha heshika konu; njiicha wulalu.
Mbekundi iwonana nanyo njechiida ihenda Hispanyia njiwoneho na kyentarama ipfo kyaṟonyi ngamaa isuṟa nanyo macha.
Indi wulalu njiihenda Yerusalemu itarama wandu wa Ruwa walya ngaya.
Siṟi tsa Makedonyia na Akaaya waleteṟia ilekia kitarama ketarama wandu wa Ruwa wai wakiwa ipfo Yerusalemu.

Nyi kiwachihiṟye kihendeke kidi, na wakerye-ho na wasile wawo; kyamba ili wa mkabo mhenu wamesanzyo iambia mboṟa tsa kimrima sha Wayuda nyi kiwewawaṟi wawewaikanya Wayuda wo na shichoṟe shawo sha kimbihu.
Nahong'u ngamemarisa iki na iwikya osano luwewatowokye ludi mhuri foko ipfo kowo njechiira kyaṟo kyehenda Hispanyia njiide konu.
Na njichi ngacha na konu njechicha njirie mofoeṟa fo ona luwukye ko Kristo.
Nanyo wanawawama, ngamterewa mnu njikuwode na Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo na ikunda lya Mumuyo ke muwe mochikusanza na inyi ngapanonyi monjiterewya ko Ruwa.
Kundu njihendeletso walemeshi walya wa ipfo Yudaya na osano loko loendye Yerusalemu luhende ichihiana na wandu walya wa Ruwa.
Kundu njishike konu njiwodo nyi sia njechiwihiṟyo moo hamu nanyo chandu Ruwa akundi.
Na Ruwa-chu menyi ofoṟo nakae nanyo mose. Amenyi.
Ngakunda imumanyisha Foibe mshiki odu, ai mrundi siṟinyi ya Kenkirea.
Kundenyi imwambya mui-wasanze na Mndumii chandu kiwaṟi wandu wa Ruwa mumtarame oryo hando awuṟie-ho nahende ihoṟokyo; cha kipfa nao nyi awei motarama sa wafoi kawenjitarama na inyi.
Njiiṟikiṟyenyi Pirisika na Akila iwa wai wakyando wako wa Kristo-hu Yesu.
Nyiwo sa werekye moo yawo wawenyi kyeletsa moo foko, ma chi inyi njimwaana mmonyi tupupfo sile nyiso na siṟi tsa mkambo iya mhenu tsose.
Njiiṟikiṟyenyi na siṟi iya wekyekusanza mbenyi tsawo. Kewenjiiṟikyṟienyi Epaineto mkunde oko, nyio sa aleasa ihalukya Kristo ipfo Asia.
Munjiiṟikiṟye Maria icho alekuwinyisha mnu kelupfuṟukanya.
Muwenjiiṟikiṟya-wo Andironyiko na Yunyia washari wako waweei wapfunge kipfungonyi hamu na inyi, nyiwo wandu wamanyikie wa kiidi kya wasu wakawenjisongoya na iwa wandu wa Kristo.
Njiiṟikiṟyenyi Ampiliato mkunde oko o Mndumii-hu.
Njiiṟikiṟyenyi Uribano mokyando oko o Kristo-hu na Stakisi mkunde oko.
Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Apele icho na mtaanye mndu mkristo, kewenjiiṟikiṟyenyi walya wai kanyi ko Aristobulo.
Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Herodion mshari oko. Muwenjiiṟikiṟya iwo wa mba ya Narikiso wai wa Mndumii.
Kenjiiṟikiṟyenyi Trufaina na Trifosa wawei wapfurukanyi wa Mndumii. Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Peri mkunde ichu awewinye mnu kya Mndumii.
Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Rufo ichu ngohoda inganyi mnu a-msambuṟye Mndumii na mae cho ai mae na wama.
Kewenjiṟikiṟienyi Asinyikrito na Filegonyi na Herime na Patiroba na Herima na wanawamadu wai hamu nawo.
Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Filologo na Yulia na Neri na mshiki oke na Olimpa na wandu wose wa Ruwa wai handu hamu nawo.
Muiṟikiṟane nyo muwenyi na wenyi mochihekyana momu kui mhekye mwele. Siṟi tsa Kristo tsose tsamwiṟikiṟa.
Lanye wanawawama, ngamtutuma muringe mnu weitsaho mpaṟakano weitsa shipaṟatsana na shilahutsa shilya shikapanyi na opfundo lulya mui-wapfunde, mukushowe mnu kyawo.
Kyamba iwo wai wadichi, Mndumii odu Kristo waimṟundyapfo, kya indi nyi wekeṟundya ndewu tsawo wakalemba ngoo tsa wandu wai malala wechideda madedo mecha na sumu tseloda.
Kyamba nyi mumanyikye kose kya wuhendeli wonu; nkyo kyanjienenga ngachihio kyanu. Njikundi muwe waṟango ko mbonyi njicha; mulawode paṟi ko mbonyi njiwicho.
Na Ruwa-cho menyi ofoṟo nyi echikaa natseneheṟye Satan ipfo shiya madende hanu owinyi. Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu wukae nanyo.
Timoteo mokyando oko nyi wamwiṟikiṟa na Lukio na Yason na Sosipatro nyiwo washari wako.
Nao inyi Tertio moṟehya baruo ii kui Mndumii na ngamwiṟikiṟa.
Gayo ichu akeri oṟicho loko na lo siṟi yose na amwiṟikiṟa. Erasto-chu mheki o mṟi wamwiṟikiṟa na Kwarto monowama. [
Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo wukae nanyo mose. Amenyi.]
Ruwa nyio aidima imukapya owanzo kechimteteṟa na Ndumi ya Sia ya Okiio yehamba Yesu Kristo nyiyo ii njikeri iiongoya na otambahaluo lo kyaama kilya kiwekaa kiweikikoome maheri halya halunganyi.
Indi kikahenda imanyisho kiheri kya wulalu na mweeke fo Mṟeho iya ya waikimbi, kui iwawasa lya Ruwa-chu o mlungana lyewawusa yanguya wuidiki madu, iwu wuu-wuṟingishye mkambo mhenu yose.
Nyio Ruwa ai mṟango o amonyi nakae echiwikyo mng'ano kui Yesu Kristo maheri hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
Inyi Paulo njii msu o Kristo Yesu njiimsambuṟe njido kui kyama kya Ruwa, so na Sostene manowama.
Loiṟikiṟa siṟi ya Ruwa ikeri ipfo Korinto luweiṟikiṟa iwa wai-waheṟemtse kui Kristo Yesu, wai wa kikale wasambuṟe wo na wengi wose welaha rina lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo oryo handu ha kowo na kodu.
Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo shiwukye ko Ruwa Wande odu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Njiiana Ruwa oko kitsitsi kimaduma kyanu kipfa kya osaṟyo lo Ruwa mui-waenenge ipfo kundo mukuwode na Kristo Yesu.
Kyamba musuṟie kya oryo kindo mukuwode nao kiwe kya oryo idedo kiwewa kya oryo mtambahalukye.
Kikatanyika kui kiṟingishyo kyehamba Kristo ili kilembanzyo kido ipfo konu.
Nakyo kikaenenga mulatiyo nyi kisumbo ma kida ma kida mukakaa mochiwedya ikuloṟa lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
Nao nyio echiwa momkapya owanzo itane masiiyonyi mulawonyo tewe mkonu fulya fo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
Ruwa ai mhendeli, nao nyio amemlahya kilunganyonyi kyelungana na Manoke Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu.
Indi ngamututuma lanye wanawawama kui rina lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo ke muwe mochideda kimu mose, ipfo konu kulakae-pfo ndutsano kya indi mukae-ho mui-waṟeheṟye mhie fumu na mdumbuye fumu.
Kyamba njii-mmanyishye nyi walya wai wa mba ya Kloe kyanu wanawawama wako, ke ipfo konu kuipfo wuṟingi.
Indi hando ngahongya-ho na ha-le; ke oryo mndu o konu ekehamba kiwungi, umu, inyi njii o Paulo, na ungi, inyi njii o Apolo, na ungi, inyi njii o Kefa na ungi, inyi njii o Kristo.
Alae! Kristo nyi ahawukanyi? Paulo nyi ambambye msalabenyi kimaduma kyanu? Ang'u nyi muiwapatisie rina lya Paulo ko?
Njiiana Ruwa kipfa ndapatisye mndu ipfo konu shile Krispo na Gayo.
Kulashike ihamba ke momepatisyo rina lyako inyi.
Indi ipatisa njilempatisase na wa mba ya Stefano. Ngoseṟa ya iwo njiichi kokoya njipatisye mndu ungipfo.
Kyamba Kristo alanjitanye msu nyi kundu njipatise, kya indi nyi kundu njiongwo ndumi ya sia yo okiio. Nalyo lilawe kui madedo ha wuṟango kundu msalaba fo Kristo fulahendewiro.
Kyamba ndumi ya msalaba ikerye iwo wehenda deka wutambashi, kya indi kyadu so wehenda kiṟo ikulukerye finya ya Ruwa.
Kyamba kii-kiṟehye kii-le; Njechirumatsa wuṟango wo iwo wai waṟango na ikombetsa wulaanyi wo iwo welaya shindo.
Mndu mṟango nyi ku aya? Mndu mlaanyi o shitabu nyi ku aya? Mndu mwiichi motambahanya njo-pfundo tsa maindi ha nyi ku-aya?
Cha kipfa ipfo kundo wuyana wu wulawemanya Ruwa kui wuṟango wowo nyi kuwewode wuṟango wo Ruwa kikachihiana na Ruwa ikiṟa waidiki kui mwongoye fusolongi.
Cha kipfa Wayuda wekewesa shichano na Wagriki waipfula wuṟango.
Kya indi so luionguo Kristo ambambie msalabe-hu. Lyo lyaenenga Wayuda wekapa tuulya likawia wa mkambo mhenu wutondo.
Kya indi iwo wai-walahe ma wai Wayuda ma wai Wagriki kowo Kristo aiwawiia pfinya ya Ruwa na wuṟango wo Ruwa.
Kipfa kilya kii kya wutondo kichee ko Ruwa kyo ki na wuṟango wukaida wo wandu na kilya kii kya wufafa kirianyi na Ruwa kyo kii na pfinya ikaida ya wandu.
Keambuyenyi ndaho yanu, wanawawama wako, nyi kuwode waṟango wa kiwandu wafoipfo ma wenyi pfinya ma wai wasongoru.
Kya indi shilya shii-shitane sha wutondo nyi wuyana wu nyisho Ruwa ameshisambuṟa shesonusha waṟango, na shilya shifafa sha iya wuyana nyi sho Ruwa alesanga nahutsye nasho shilya shiapfinya sonu.
Na shilya shilawei na kiṟumi kunu wuyana na shilya siwei shipiṟe nyisho Ruwa kashisanga shilawei kindo kundu nahaluo shilya shii kindo maai.
Kikahendeka kido kundu kulakae-ho mndu ai nyama echikushela ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa.
Na ipfo koke kwenyi kimaenyi kyanu kikeri ili mui Kristo-hu Yesu, nyio amelutaanyo nyi Ruwa wuṟango na wuhoṟotsu na wuiilisho na oletso.
Kihendeke chandu kii-kiṟehye ke; Mokushela nakushele kui Mndumii.
Na inyi lyandi ndecha na konu-le wanawawama, njechimwongoya kiṟingishyo kii-kiwike nyi Ruwa njilalecha na mtandawuko fo madedo na fo wuṟango.
Kyamba njilalehamba njiichi kindo ipfo konu shile nyi Yesu Kristo nao nyi ili ambambye adi msalabenyi.
Njiwekukerye konu na mkao fo wufafa na wuowu na mdedema.
Na ili njiweideda na yonguo ma njileidimaidima na wuṟango woitika iwinapfo kya indi njiwemanyishya-ho Mumuyo na pfinya.
Kundu mwidikye fonu fulakae wuṟango-hu wo ki-wandu kya indi wuwe fu-mbike kui pfinya ya Ruwa.
Sha wuṟango na lushiwode sheongoya walya wai waholoki, indi wuṟango wu wulai wo maindi ha ki-wulalu manya wo waitoṟi wa ki-wulalu ki kyerumara.
Kya indi luihamba wuṟango wo Ruwa wo kisenyi wui wukoome wusa Ruwa aweteṟye. Maheri halawendewiko woluwonya so wuitoṟi.
Kyawo waitoṟi wa maindi ha ki-wulalu walawewuichi ma umu-ho. Cha kipfa nokoe wawewuichi wawechiwambya Mndumii menyi wuitori msalabenyipfo.
Kyakyo kikeri chando kiikiṟehye, “Shilya riso lya mndu lilawewona ma kudu kulaweicho, manya shilaweida na ngoonyi ya mndu o wandu, nyisho Ruwa aweshiṟeheṟye walya wamkundi.”
Natso nyio Ruwa alelutaṟa-mbuya kui Mumuyo. Kyamba mumuyo asumye shose na shiṟike sha kisenyi kya Ruwa.
Kyamba ipfo wandunyi nyi o ku aichi shilya shiwode mndu shile nyi mumuyo fo mndu fui nao? Nyi wudo na shilya sha Ruwa kulaipfo msa aichi shile Mumuyo o Ruwa.
Natso lulaleambya mumuyo fo wuyana, kya indi nyi Mumuyo awukye ko Ruwa kundu lukuwutye-ho imanya shilya luiwasumbe nyi Ruwa chando shii.
Nasho nyisho luideda kyasho chi kui madedo ha-masungusie na wuṟango wo kiwandu, kya indi ha-mawike nyi Mumuyo, lochilinganyisha shilya sha Mumuyo na mweke fo Mumuyo.
Indi mndu o mhendeshye fo kiwandu ekeambyana na shilya shii sha Mumuyo o Ruwapfo, kyamba shembiia wutondo nalaidime ishimanya, kipfa shekewa itichyo kui njia ya Mumuyo tupu.
Indi mndu msumbe Mumuyo eketichya shose nao amonyi alawa itichio nyi mndu.
Kyamba nyi o ku aichi mhie ya Mndumii awechimloṟa njia. Indi so lui na mhie fo Kristo.
Na inji le, wanawawama wako, njileidima ideda nanyo cha wa kimumuyopfo kya indi cha wa kimbihu, cha wanangu wa kikristo.
Njilemurutsa maruwa njilalemwinenga kyelya kyumu kipfa mulawemekiidime. Ee ma wulalu moekiidima-pfo.
Kyamba ma wulalu da mukeri-se wa-kimbihu. Kyamba ili ipfo konu kuwode wunyenyi na wuṟingi chi mui wa-kimbihu mochikuhendeshya mbaṟi ya kiwandu?
Nyi kokoya kwipfo ehamba, inyi njii o Paulo, na ungi ehaba, inyi njii o Apolo, chi ideda mbaṟi ya kiwandu mui?
Alewo Apolo nyi ai ki, na Paulo nyi ai ki? Nyi wakeri wapfuṟu-kanyi mulemidikisho nyiwo na oryo ose aweiṟunda kiheo kilya Mndumii alemnenga.
Inyi ndewaya Apolo kanosa, kya indi moalutsa shose nyio Ruwa.
Kokoya nyi wudo kii mowaya chi kindopfo ma ichu monosa chila Ruwa moalutsa nyio.
Kya indi mowaya na monosa wahianyi, na oryo owo echiwona woṟunda woke wumsumhanye o wuidikyanyi na mawina hake.
Kyamba so luiṟunda kimu na Ruwa, nyo mui ndonga ya Ruwa, mui wiko lya Ruwa.
Kui kiheo kya wutonga wo Ruwa njii-msumbe nyi ngamewika kiwanja cha mpfuru mṟango na ungi kawika-ho mba. Kya indi oryo ose moiwika-ho naṟunde na osaṟe.
Kyamba kulaipfo mndu aidima iwika kiwanja kingi shie nyi kilya kilemmaa iwiko, nyikyo Yesu Kristo.
Na kokoya mndu awika kiwanje-hu ki sahabu ang'u fesa ang'u maho maili pang'a ang'u shidi ang'u nyatsi ang'u mamwahiṟo.

Kyasia kiṟundyo kya oryo mndu kyechiwoneka na pata, kyamba mkonu fulya fulya fochikimanyisha kipfa nyi fochikuwonekya furie modo, na modo fu fumenyi nyi fochihamba kiṟundyo kya oryo mndu ke nyi kiwei kya mbaṟi nki.
Kiṟundyo kya mndu awikye-ho kikakaa-ho kiwangi echiambya woṟunda woke.
Kiṟundyo kya mdu kikasenekya echiwudetsyo, indi o amonyi echiletso likawa cha lya mndu mokiia modo.
Mulaichi ke, nyo nyi hekalu lya Ruwa na ke, Mumuyo mwele ai mokaa nanyo sho?
Kokoya mndu anyamaṟa hekalu lya Ruwa, na Ruwa echinyamaṟa mdu cho. Kyamba hekalu lya Ruwa lii yele, nalyo nyi nyo.
Kulakae-pfo echikulemba amonyi. Kokoya kwiipfo konu akuwona amonyi ke aa mṟango na maindi ha kiwulalu, nakuwiie tondo nakuwutie-ho ihenda ṟanguo.
Kyamba wuṟango wo wuyana wu nyi wutondo ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa. Kyamba kii-kiṟehye kii-le, “O nyio mochawilia waṟango ipfo mlemekonyi yawo.”
Na lingi-se lyehamba, “Mndumii aichi makusaṟo ha waṟango ke nyi hai ha maai.”
Kokoya nyi wudo kii kulakae-pfo echiku-shela na mndu o wandu kyamba nyi hanu hose.
Liwe nyi Paulo, liwe nyi Apolo, liwe nyi Kefa, liwe nyi wuyana wu, liwe nyi moo, liwe nyi opfu liwe nyi shindo shi-ho liwe nyi shilya shekaa shiwe, shose nyi shanu.
Nanyo nyi mui wa Kristo, na Kristo nyi o Ruwa.
Na wudo so oryo mndu nalutane waṟundi wa Kristo na waheki wa kyama ki-koome kya Ruwa.
Kikawa kido kitsuhae kyeringa waheki nyi nashike iwono ai mteechi.
Kokoya ngahenda idumbuyo n-nyo mdumbuye mliwe ang'u nyi ngadumbuyo nyi menge ya kiwandu kiwe lyo likerye inyi kindo sa kitutu. Ma inyi ngakudumbuya mdumbuye njimonyipfo.
Kyamba njilaichi kitewe. Kya indi ki kyansumhantsakyo, modumbuo kyako nyi Mndumii.

Nkyo kimaduma mulahende idumbuo kiheri kilandewiṟa itane Mndumii ache ichu echiendie senyi shindo shii-shiṟikishe meemenyi na itambaṟuya necha patehu chila tsikuwode ngoonyi Mandi na halya oryo mndu ose kiṟumi kilya kimsumhanye nyi echiwikyo nyi Ruwa.

Nasho wanawawama, ngameshihalutsya ora lo kodu so na Apolo kimaduma kyanu, kundu mukuwutye kodu imanya ke kulatole shilya shii-shiṟehye, kundu ichu umu nalakushelye-ho kya ichu umu kechilehana na wengi kya ichu ungi.
Kyamba nyi o ku akuwika iyo mdonyi. Nyi kiki ukiwode ulakiambye? Na kiwe nyi ukiambye nyi kyaki ukushela cha nyi kulakiambye?
Mulemmaa ihuda mulemmaa ikusuṟia mulemmaa iwada wumangi tare so? Na kiwechiwa nanga mukawewona wumangi wu kundu naso lukae wumanginyi wu handu hamu nanyo.
Kyamba ngahamba ke Ruwa alutanye so wasu luwe wandu wakinga numa luwe wepfa lukamewiia wuyana ṟiho lyeṟihisha wamalaika na wandu.
So lui matondo kimaduma kya Kristo, indi nyo mui waṟango kui Kristo. So nyi wafafa indi nyo nyi wawanzi. Nyo mui na kiṟumi kicha so lui na wusutsu.
Luwodo nyi njaa na nyoda shika saa ii lui nayo wulalu tichi lu wakuye maṟao lukapo ngapo lulawode kanyi kokaa.
Luiwina lochiluya moo kui maṟunda ha mawoko hadu luwenyi. Hando lohenda irumo nyi lowika-ho ona, hando lohenda iterengyo nyi lokutirisia.
Hando lohenda iiryo kui wongo nyi lokededa kya wucha. Lui-watane maseheṟo ha wuyana luwembiia wose kindo kya manyeena shika inu.
Ishi chi ngashiṟehya kundu njimhutsye sonupfo, kya indi kundu njimtutume nasho mui wana wako wakunde.
Ma muwei na waichi wemwichia Kristo shiku na shiku chi muwode mudi na wemfee wafoipfo, kyamba nyio inyi njilemfee njii Kristo-hu kui ndumi ya sia ya okiio.
Nkyo kyantewa ngamtutuma ke muwe mokuwakisha na inyi.
Nkyo kimaduma ndeduma Timoteo ipfo konu ai mana oko mkunde ai na mhendeli o Mndumii-hu, nyio echimkumbuṟa mhendeshye yako ya Kristo-hu iya njekeilosha oryo siṟinyi hando hose.
Kwipfo wakuṟumbashie cha ili ndaicha na konu.
Indi njechicha na konu owinyi Mndumii kamkunda njechikaa njitichie kilya wakuidimye chi kilya wakudedye.
Kyamba wumangi wo Ruwa wukukerye kundo kudedopfo kya indi nyi ipfo kundo kuwuto.
Kilya mukundi nyi kiki? Njiche konu njirie iṟiiga ang'u njiche njirio nyi mkundye na mumuyo mwoloṟu?
Koichyo kundo kose ke konu kuwode wuṟuhui, na wuṟuhui wu nyi wo mbaṟi ileewa isenda ma ipfo ko wandu walaidikye wai, mndu nakae na mka o ndee.
Nanyo mokutumbashya mulakunda ikuinadya kundo nahende iwuto ipfo kiidi kyanu icho atanye kindo kyo.
Na inyi ma ndakeri-ho kui mbihu indi njikukerye-ho kui mumuyo njilemmaa idumbuya mndu-chu aletana kindo kiwicho kido mdumbuye cha ili njiweiho.
Ngadeda kui rina lya mndumii Yesu luwodanyi nyo na mumuyo foko hamu na pfinya ya Mndumii odu Yesu.
Kyedambikya Satan mndu cho mbihu fohoṟuo kundu mrima fukiṟo mkonu fulya fo Mndumii.
Ili mukutumbashye mudi chi kichapfo. Mulaichi ke kitarang'asha sa kitutu kidutsye mbumba fo mso fose mtarang'ao?
Kyasia muahye kitarang'asha kilya kiku na nja kundu muwe mbumba mhya chando mui mulaiwawike kitarang'asha. Cha kipfa na pasaka yadu ilemmaa ishinjo, nyio Kristo.
Nakyo kyaenenga luachikie mkonu mnene iya yadu, chi kui kitarang'asha kilya kiku manya kui kitarang'asha kya wuporu na wuwicho kya indi kui shilaishitarang'ashe sha wusalari na wulohi.
Njilemṟehya na baruo iya ke ma mulasangane na waṟuhui.
Chi ngamhamba nayo waṟuhui wakeri na wuyana wu ang'u manyinyi ang'u wasoki ang'u weindya maruwa ha wongo wai nawo. Kiwei kido kiwemwitika muwuke iya wuyana.

Kya indi wulalu kilya njilemṟehya kiwei kii-le, ke mulasangane na mndu a mlahe manowama nao awa mṟuhui ang'u inyinyi ang'u moindya maruwa ha wongo ang'u mokiruma ang'u makinango ang'u msoki. Mndu o mbaṟi ii ma ilya mulaidikye ilya nao.
Kipfa nyi kiki kimbode njidumbuye wa ora lo nya mdumbuye? Chi kyanu kyewonaya wa ora lo kya mba mdumbuye sho?
Indi iwo wakeri ora lo nja nyi Ruwa echiwawonya mdumbuye. Funenyimbafu ulya ipfo kiidi kyanu.
Alae. Mndu o konu awode kindo kededa na odoe nawo ekarya imwanduya ipfo ko wa mkika nalache oshangunyi lo walya wai waele?
Ma mulaichi ke walya wai waele wechiwonya wuyana wu mdumbuye fowo? Na kokoya wuyana wu woshika iwonyo mdumbuye ipfo kundo nyo muwode menge akashika mulasumhanye yadanya mondu ii mangu idi?
Mulaichi ke nyi lochiwonya wamalika mdumbuye, denyi ishi sheluya moo!
Akawo nyo ili muwode kyeanduyana kya shindo sheluya moo nyi mokedamiṟa-ho walya walawode kiṟumi ipfo siṟinyi?
Ngahamba njido njimhutsye sonu. Na wudi muwuṟye mndu ai mṟango o ipfo kiidi kyanu awechiidima iletsana mndu na manomae.
Kya indi mndu manowama ekeanduyana na manomae nakyo nyi ipfo patenyilya walaidikye.
Nalyo ili muwodianyi mudi mondu muwenyi na wenyi nalyo liyenyi limwendie kihutsa. Kimaduma nyiki mulakunda iwutyo sha wukika? Kimaduma nyi ki mulakunda isoko?
Kya indi nyo muwenyi mokewuta sha wukika na isoka mokesoka. Na wandu walya mokewawutia mudo nyi wanawamanu.

A mulaichi ke wewuta sha wukika nyi walechioṟa wumangi wo Ruwa? Ma mulakulembe. Makiṟuhuya na mkiṟuhuyo wechioṟa wumangi wo Ruwapfo, manya weindya maruwa ha wongo; manya wetahachia wali, manya wesutsa wukika ang'u wumi.
Manya waiwi, manya wenyi-wuehi, manya makinango, manya makiruma, manya wasoki.
Na wa mbaṟi itsi muwekeri maata wanu. Kya indi momesanjo. Kya indi momeilisho. Kya indi momesumhantso kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo na kui Mumuyo o Ruwa odu.
Shindo shose njikuwodie kyasho momu, kya indi chi shose shanjiwiia kya wuchapfo. Shose njikuwodei kyasho momu, kya indi njilawone njehenda ilimbo nyi kiliwe.

Shindo shelya nyi sha ndewu nayo ndewu nyi ya shindo shelya. Nao Ruwa echishikombetsa shi shiwi, ndewu na shelya. Indi mbihu fo mndu fuu-mbike fuwe fo wuṟuhuipfo kya indi nyi fo Mndumii, nao Mndumii nyi menyi mbihu fu.
Na Ruwa kashika iṟutsa Mndumii nyi echishika iṟutsa naso kui pfinya yake.
Mulaichi ke mbihu yanu nyi yo shiwungo sha Kristo? Akashika shiwungo sho sha Kristo wulalu njishiire njihende ishihaluo shiwungo sha makiṟuhuyo? Manya!
Mulaichi ke ichu alungana na makiṟuhuyo nyi amewa mbihu fumu nao? Cha kipfa ahambye, walya wawi wechiwa mbihu fumu.
Kya indi ichu alunganyi na Mndumii nyi amba mumuyo fumu nao.
Dichenyi wuṟuhui. Oryo wunyamaṟi mndu awuta na wukeri kya nja ya mbihu foke. Kya indi ichu aṟuhuya nyi atanya mbihu foke amonyi wunyamaṟi.
Ang'u mulaichi ke mbihu fonu nyi fomba hekalu lya Mumuyo Mwele aikaa nanyo, ichu muleinengo nyi Ruwa. Nanyo chi mukeri wanu muwenyipfo.
Cha kipfa muiwahuṟe na mtalo fo kisale. Kyo kimwitike muhende iṟumisha Ruwa chu kui mbihu fonu.
Kyasia kya shindo shilya mulenjiṟehya ngamhaluo ke nyi nanga msoṟo nalakuwashe na mndu mka.
Kya indi kyeringa wuṟuhui oryo mndu nawade mka oke amonyina oryo mka nakae na mii oke amonyi.
Mii nainenge mka oke kilya kimbaṟi, shiwudo nao mka naweinenga mii kilya kyake kimbaṟi.
Mka naitoṟye mbihu fokepfo kya indi nyi mii, shiwudo na mii naitoṟye mbihu fokepfo kya indi nyi mka.
Ma mulaimane shile nyi kui ikuteṟyana mwaanya kundu mukuwonye nafo suku tsetsinda kiterewonyi. Numa muwewuyanase kundu Satan nalashike imtewa kui iwuṟa lyanu lyewuṟa kiheo.
Indi ngahamba iki kyeikimba, chi ngakiwawasapfo.
Kyako inyi njikundi nyi kiile ke wandu wose wawe cha inyi njimonyi. Kya indi oryo mndu ose ai msumbe nyi Ruwa kii kyake amonyi ichu nyi wudi na ichu nyi wudi.
Indi ngawia iwo walamealika na iwo wapfie mii njiile, nyi kicha wakukaye chando inyi njikeri.
Kya indi kokoya walaidima ikuima wakualikye. Kyamba nyi kii kicha yalika kota yaaka.
Kya indi iwo walemmaa yalikana le ngawawasa, na iwawasa li chi lyakopfo indi nyi lya Mdumii, ke mka nalalekane na mii oke.
Indi komkoya amlekana nao na nakae ado alaaliko ang'u nahoṟyane na mii. Nao mii nalawone echisama mka oke.
Kya indi wandu wengi ngawawia inyi chi Mndumii-pfo ke kokoya mndu manowama awode mka oke alai mwidiki nao mka chu akundi kukaya nao nalamsame.
Na mka mliwe awode mii alai mwidiki na mii chu akundi ikukaya nao nalade msoṟo chu.
Kyamba msoṟo chu alai mwidiki nyi aimwilishe kui manowama chu. Shila wudo wana wanu wawei wa ngafu, indi wulalu wai waele.
Kya indi ichu alai mwidiki kalekana nakulekanye. Hando ho manowama mndumii ang'u mka nampfungiṟyepfo. Kilya Ruwa alulahye so nakyo nyi kiidikyano.
Cha kipfa nyi uichi kuda, iyo mka, koka ochikiṟa miopfo? Ang'u iyo mndumiinyi uichi kuda kokoya ochikiṟa mka opfo?
Maṟi oryo mndu ose nachumie chando Mndumii amteṟye; chando Ruwa amlahye nyi wudo nahendeke. Nkyo ikyo njekewawasya siṟi tsose.
Mndu kamelaho awei mdine nalakiṟike; mndu kamelaho alai mdine nalahende idino.
Kiende kiṟumi chi mkae fui mdinepfo ma chi mkae fulai mdinepfo, indi ihendelya mawawaso ha Ruwa.
Oryo mndu ose nakae mkae iya awei nayo iliindi amshike henda ilaho.
Komelaho ui isinga ma kulawone kosuo. Ma koshika iwonyo mwaanya fohenda lekio kukundye ikaa.
Kyamba ichu amhenda ilahyo Mndumii ai isinga nyi amba mtalae o Mndumii. Na wudo ichu amelaho ai makuachia nyi awewiia Kristo isinga.
Mui wahuṟe na wuhuṟu wo kisale, mulawone mochiwiia wandu masinga.
Oryo mndu le, wanawawama, mkae fulya awei nafo iliindi amshika ilaho nyifo nakae nafo ai na Ruwa.
Kya marokya kyo njiwode iwawaso lya Mndumii-pfo, indi ngahamba mhie yako njii mtane mhendeli kui isaṟya lya Mndumii.
Na iki ngahamba kii kicha kimaduma kya mafirita ha ki-wulalu kikeri kii-le ke kiwe kicha mndu nakae mkae ai nayo.
Nyi ui mpfungye mka? Ma kulakunde ipfunguo. Kumdeye kudi kulampfungye mka? Ma kulapfule mka.
Indi ma kokoya oalika uwode mtipfo. Na rokya likakualikyo liwode mtipfo. Kya indi wandu wo wai wado wechirohyo m mawina ha nyamenyi, na inyi ngakunda ihawaringa.
Kya indi ngahamba-le, wanawawama, mwaanya fo iheri li nyi itika inyia fukeri. Mandi hatsuhae walya wawode waka wawe cha ili nyi walawode.
Na walya wailia wawe cha ili walailia, na walya waichihio wawe cha ili walaichihio, na walya waihuṟa shindo cha ili walai wenyisho.
Na walya wailuya moo na mweke fo wuyana wu walawone wechiwulia ngula. Kyamba mbikye fo wuyana wu nyi isia fukeri.
Na inyi njikundi mukae mulakurohye. Ichu alaalikye ekekuwinyisha kya Mndumii ke nyi wuda echichihiṟa Mndumii.
