Ili ochicha unjiendie ikoti lilya njileda ipfo Troa ko Karipo keweende na shitabu shilya na masaṟa halya heṟehya, nyiho njilangie mnu.
Aleksandria mpfuru ulya alenjiwutia mawicho hafoi Mndumii echimtaa kisumhanye mawuto hake.
Ukuṟise na iyo kyake, kyamba alelemana mnu na madedo hadu.
Ipfo mwanduyenyi fo kuwoka fo mondu foko kuwei-pfo ma umu alenjihoṟokyapfo kya indi walenjida wose. Ruwa nalawaitalie ideko-lyo.
Indi Mndumii alenjikaya-ho kanjikapya owanzo. Iki kileenenga ngaidima ionguo mwongoye fuhende imariso necha wamkambo wakafuicho wose, na inyi ngaashuka ianduyo lya opfu.
Mndumii nechinletsa echinjiwuta mawuto mawicho hoose, nenjikiṟa enjiduo kipuo Wumanginyi woke wo ipfo ruwehu. Nyio ai mokaa echiichiko maheri hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
Iṟikiṟa Pirisika na Akila, hamu na wa mba ya Onesiforo.
Erasto alekaa ipfo Korinto, indi Tirofimo njilemda ipfo Mileto aluo.
Kambiṟa icha kisie kilamaasa. Eubulo wakauiṟikiṟa na Pudensi na Lino na Klaudio na wanawawama wose.
Mndumii nakae mrimenyi fopfo. Wutonga wukae nanyo.
Inyi Paulo njii singa lya Ruwa na msu o Yesu Kristo moṟundya mwidikye fo wasambuṟe wa Ruwa na mmanyishie fo wu-kilohi wusumhanye wuindi.
Njikuwode na owedo loiweda moo fo mlungana ifu Ruwa chu alai mowongo alemteseheṟya matsika halya maheri halunganyi halawemche.
Kya indi matika halya haweshikie nyi alemanyisha idedo lyake kui mwongoye njiimdambikye inyi na wuitiki wo iwawasa lya mletsi odu Ruwa.
Ngaiṟikiṟa Tito mana ichu oko o lohi kui wuidiki luwode wumu luwawi. Wutonga wuwe wopfo na ofoṟo lowuka ko Ruwa Wande na Kristo Yesu mkiṟi odu.
Kitewe kilennenga ngakuda kulya Kreta nyi kundu umarise isungusia shilya shiwetsuhae shesungusia nohende iwika-pfo wameku oryo mṟinyi yose njia iya njilekuwawasya.
Kokoya kuwode ai mteechi, mii o mka umu, awode wana waidikye walaende mondu fo wuṟahi ma walawode okuchu.
Kyamba moambuya siṟi kimbari nawe mndu mteechi akerye Ruwa cha mwiṟichi alawode tumbe, alai mlang'a ma makinango ma manzina ma mongula.
Kya indi nawe mokunda wahenu, achihianyi na hai mecha, mndu o osaaṟe mhoṟotsu, menyi wuindi, mndu msanze.
Nawe mokuwada na idedo liidikyanyi necha na kiloshyo kilya, kundu naidime iikimba na mweke fo wupfundi wochiṟa mrima na iwinga walya wekefurunja mbonyi.
Kyamba kwipfo wafoi wawode okuchu wenyi madedo ha melemele wai walembi, mnu nyi walya wa mkambo mdine.
Kyawo na kikaki wahende ifunjo olimi. Nyiwo wandu wekepihisa nja tsa wandu tsii nsanze ili wailosha shindo shilasumhanyi wai watewe nyi ngula tsawo.
Umu owo, mwikimbi owo wa wenyi awehambie wai; Wakreta wai wawongo na kamu, mando malang'a, mandeu madoko.
Kiṟingishyo ki kikeri lohi. Nkyo kitewe uwadedye kyumu kundu wahendechia wuidikinyi.
Walahendekuwada na mhambo ya Kiyuda na mawawaso ha wandu iwa weindukya kiwulohi mhongo.
Shose shiharamie iwo waharami, indi kya walya wafanyi walaidikye kwipfo kiwaharamie ma kimupfo, kya indi wai wafanyitse na mhie ya mdo na ngo tsa mrima.
Wekehamba ke waichi Ruwa wai, indi nyi imkana wakeri kui mawuto halya. Wada owicho, wandu walehi walawa iṟunda kindo ki kicha ma kimu.
Kake iyo udede kiidikyanyi na wupfundi wulya wochiṟa mrima.
Ke wameku wakuachie, wawe wasanze wenyi osaṟe wachia kui wuidiki na kui mkundanyie na kui mkutirisie.
Na wudo wakeku wakae na orie lusumhanye waele, walahende iduo mndu sumu, walahende iṟahishyo nyi wukuwu wo wari, wawe wechilosha shindo shii shicha.
Kundu wapfudishe waka walya wakoho wakunde wamii wawo wawekunda wana.
Wakae na osaaṟe wenyi sonu njicha, wahidi wa kanyi, waleki, waidikie necha wamii wawo, kundu dedo lya Ruwa lilahende irumo.
Na wudo ututumye womi walya wakoho wakae na chile tsa shindo shose.
Henda ikuwika-ho kumonyi kichano kya mawuto mecha ui na wusalari wo ipfo wupfundinyi, na mkuachie,
na idedo liwe lyechiṟa mrima lilechiwa iwingo kundu ichu ai o ohambenyi lungi napfie sonu ili alakuwonya kii kiwicho kyadu kyeanduya kyakyo.
Masinga hakuwike shi ya wanene waho hakuwakundishye na shindo shose, halaambiṟane nawo.
Walaṟoṟokuo, kya indi wamanyishieho wuhendeli wucha wose, kundu wawikye wupfundi wo mkiṟi odu Ruwa kiṟumi kicha kui shindo shose.
Kyamba kulemboneka-ho wutonga wo Ruwa wuendie wandu wose okiio.
Wolutoṟisha so, kundu lulehane na mbaṟi ii ya imina Ruwa na lango tsilya tsa ki-wuyana, lupfudie lui na moo fo chile na wuhoṟotsu na wuindi mandi ha kiwulalu.
Lochiweda kiwedyo kilya kiende macha ngesa kya iwoneka lya wuitoṟi wo Ruwa ichu mnene amonyi nyio mkiṟi odu Kristo Yesu.
Nyio alekudambika amonyi hando hadu, kundu naluletse na msefu fo mrima fose nakuhaṟamishie mkambo fui foke amonyi fuiaaka iwuta mawuto mecha.
Kya ishi udede, uikimbe, ututume na wuitiki wose. Kulakae-pfo ekumina.
Uwatamuṟye ke wakae wakuwike shi ya wanene wai wenyi-menge wechiwaidikya. Wakae wakuteseheṟye orio ṟunda icha lyose.
Walarumane na mndu, wakae walawode mondu, wawiṟie mndu owinyi, wawonesye wandu wose wuhoo wuwenyi.
Kyamba naso ili kacha luwei watahi, wandu wataicho wadetse, luweisingya wulang'a na lango tsa mbaṟi nliwe na nliwe luwehendekye lui na wumbafu na wunyenyi luwesukie lochisuana luwenyi na wenyi.
Matika na halya kulembonekaho woloṟu wo mkiṟi odu Ruwa na mkundie foke akundye nafo wandu aleluwonya okio.
Lulauwike na mawuto ha wuhoṟotsu so luwewuta, indi nyi lo osaṟio lulya loke kui kisambyo kya ifeo lya kawi na ilawuo nyi Mumuyo mwele.
Ichu alemlusumba echimfeṟa na mweke fo Yesu Kristo mkiṟi odu.
Kundu luwe waoṟi wa moo fo mlungana fuiwedyo lui wasumhantse kui wutonga woke.
Idedo lyeidikya lyo ilyo. Na njikundi utambahanye iṟingishya kyalyo shose, kundu iwa wai waidikishye Ruwa wawinye iwika-ho mawuto mecha. Ishi shachia wandu shiwaendie ngaya.
Kya indi mawesoweso ha wutondo na maitumano ha marika na mandeda na maloyo ha kiwuwawaso, ho uhadiche. Cha kipfa halai na mbucha, nyi ha maai.
Mndu mtindili, komaa imdedya limu na lya kawi, wuta-ho mdo.
Nomanye mndu ai adi amekuṟuka echinyamaṟa amekuwonya owingo amonyi.
Mandi njechikudumya Aritemanyi ang'u Tikiko uitike icha na koko ipfo Nikopoli, kyamba na hondo njilesambuṟa itsinda-ho kiheri kya kisie.
Senanyi, mlaanyi o wuwawaso, na Apolo, uwasame owinyi newasungusia walawuṟie kindo.
Na iwa wai wadu wakupfunde iwika-ho maṟunda mecha hewinya-ho shilya shilechiwa iwuṟo kundu walakae-ho wawakye ikidi ilaikumbia.
Iwa wai kunu koko wakuiṟikiṟa wose. Iṟikiṟya walya walukundi kui wuidiki. Wutonga wukae nanyo mose.
Inyi Paulo njii-mpfunge kya Kristo Yesu, so na Timoteo manowama lokuiṟikiṟa iyo Filemonyi mkunde ui mṟundi kyimu naso.
Lokuiṟikiṟa na iyo Apifia ui mshiki lowekuiṟikiṟa na Arikipo mondaro odu, hamu na siṟi iya ikeri ya mba yapfo.
Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo shiwukie ko Ruwa Ndeyadu na Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Njikeri iana Ruwa oko mandi hose njekukumbuo iyo Filemonyi shiterewonyi shako.
Ili ngaicho kya ikunda lyapfo ko wandu wose wa Ruwa na kya wuidiki uwode wo iwadana na Mndumii Yesu.
Ngaterewa kundu mawadano ha wuidiki wopfo hawe hechiṟunda heitsa wuṟangonyi woimanya orio kicha kyose kii nanyo kyeṟundya Kristo.
Kyamba njiwewodo mnu nyi sia na iwihiṟyo moo kipfa kya ikunda lyapfo uleloṟa wandu walya wa Ruwa iyo manowama!
Nkyo kyatewa ma ili njii na wutumbe wa Kristo-hu wonnenga mwaanya fokuwawasa iki kyakukoya, nyi kinjichihiṟye kota.
Kye njikuterewe kimaduma kya ikunda inyi Paulo njii meku wulalu na mfunge o Kristo Yesu.
Ili njii njido ngakuterewa kya Onesmo (Mchihiri) mana ichu oko njilemfee njii kipfungonyi.
Nao nyio Onesmo ulya ili kuwoka alawekuchihiṟie, indi wulalu ai mchihiṟi opfo na oko, achihiṟye necha.
Nyio amonyi ngamkuwihiṟya wulalu, nao kimu cha ngoo yako iinjenyi.
Njiwekundi nakae na inyi kundu nanjipfuṟukanye handu hapfo ili njiimfunge na mshe kimaduma kya Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio.
Indi njilekunda iwuta kindopfo chila onnenga momu, kundu iki kicha kyapfo kilawe cha kya mkoromu kya indi kiwe kui mweke fo ikunda. Njilakundi ikuitikya untarame.
Kyamba ili alewuka kopfo lya oweṟe kulako nyi kilemwutika kundu umbade se nakae na iyo mlungana.
Alakeri-se cha isinga, kya indi nawe cha kota isinga, nyi manowama odu mkunde. Kanjiwia kiira king'anyi mnu ado inyi; kopfo iyo nechikuwiia mcha ngoseṟa cha isinga kui mbihu na kui Mndumii-hu.
Kyasia kokoya unjiwode njii mokyando opfo kye-mwambye-wo cha ili nyio inyi.
Indi kokoya alekudetsya kindo ang'u nyi sile alelya kopfo, ikyo unjiitalie inyi.
Inyi Paulo ngamṟehia iki kui owoko loko. Inyi Paulo njechikitaa, (ipfo kundo njekiṟa ihamba, italenyi lyapfo, kipfa na iyo kumonyi ui mosile oko.)
Ee manowama oko, kyekunjiwutia kudo kui rina lya Mndumii. Kewihiṟya-wo ngoo yako moo ui manowama kui Kristo.
Ngamṟehya njido njikusirie na wuadanyi wopfo njichi nyi ochiwuta king'anye ishi ngakuterewa.
Handu hamu na isho njiteseherya kiṟiha mbenyi ya wahenu, kyamba njikusirie icha na konu. Kui shiterewo shanu cha ili Ruwa kakunda njechicha imuiṟikiṟa.
Kwipfo wakuiṟikiṟa, nyi Epafra ichu ai mfunge na inyi kya Kristo Yesu.
Na woko Marko, na Aristariko, na Demasi na Luka, wakyando wako wakuiṟikiṟa.
Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo wukae na Mumuyo fonu.
Mbaṟi tsiweipfo tsifoi na njia natso Ruwa alemdeda na waku wadu kui waikimbi walya.
Ili lyefurumia lya suku tsi alededa naso kui Mana, chu alembika mokyoṟya echioṟa shose. Nao nyio alembika nao na mandi halya.

Nyio ngela ya wuitoṟi woke na otambahalukio lo orie loke akamadie shose kui dedo lya pfinya yake; ili alemaa iwikaho kidaso kyeoloṟa mondu fo manyamaṟo kakudamiṟa owokonyi lo kulyo lo mng'ano ipfo huye.
Finya alewa moidya nayo wasu walya waele isumhanye rina aledumbuyo kui kyoṟa ling'anye hawo.
Kyamba nyi o ku o wasu walya waele alehenda imbia ma indi ke, “Iyo ui manoko, nyi inu ngamekufee.” Na lingi ke; “Inyi njechimbia Wande nao echinjiwiia Mana.”
Na iliindi aitsa ichu oke o wee ipfo mkambonyi fo wuyana ahambie, “Na wasu wa Ruwa wapfirie ndi oshangunyi loke wose.”
Kya wasu walya nyi ahambie, “Atana wasu wake mkuma na waṟundi wake awatana olewo lo modo.”
Indi kya Mana nyi kii-le, “Loṟika lopfo, hoi Ruwa, luikaa maheri halunganyi, na msenge fo wuhoṟotsu mfo msenge fo wumangi wopfo.
Ulekunda wuhoṟotsu kowesuo wumbafu. Nkyo kimarete Ruwa alekushimbuo, nyio Ruwa opfo kakushimbuo na mafuda hekapyo ngoru tsiidye waodoya wapfo.”
Lingi ke, “Hoi Mndumii, mandi ha mawokyonyi nyi iyo ulemwaala wanda ii, na maruwehu halya hai mawike nyi mawoko hapfo.
Ho hechisia, indi iyo ochikaa. Hechikuo hose cha nguwo ii nṟae.
Na cha nguwo ya ikonya ochihaoṟowya. Nyi hechilachika fana. Kya indi iyo ui ulya ulya na maka yapfo yechisenedapfo.”
Nyi alembie o ku o wasu walya waele ke, “Kudamiṟye owokonyi loko lo kulyo itane ngalaṟa wakituwa wapfo shi ya madende hapfo?”
Chi wai mumuyo yaṟunda wose iii-mme yeekyana na walya wai wateṟie okiio kyoṟa kyawo?
Nkyo kyaluitika kya ngoseṟa ke luchunguṟie shilya lomeicho kundu lulahende yeeko ma indi.
Kyamba kokoya idedo lilya liwee-lidede nyi wasu liwewangi lido na orio wutahachi na orio wulehi wo okuchu wuleambya wudeheli wowo wuhoṟotsu.
Nyi wuda lochituruchukia-ho so ili loilaala okiio lung'anyi ludi? Nalo kimaenyi kyalo nyi ipfo kundo luleongoyo nyi Mndumii lukaweluwanzio so nyi walya walemwicho.
Luwerianyi na kiṟingishyo kii kiwike nyi Ruwa kui shichano na maṟiho na pfinya tsa mbaṟi tsifoi na mahawio ha Mumuyo Mwele shisumhanye mkundie foke.
Kyamba mkambo fo wuyana ifu lodeda kyafo ke nyi icha fui chi alefuwika shi ya wasu walyapfo.
Kya indi kwipfo kundo mndu mliwe aleṟingishia ahambye, “Mndu nyi o ki ili uimkumbuo. Ang'u mana o mndu ili uimwambuya?
Omemnyiṟya wasu kheri kyangu. Komruwa mdohu foke wuitoṟi na kiichiko.
Kombika shose shi ya madende hake.” Kyamba imbikya shose shi yake lyo lyahamba ke kutolyo-ho ma kimu kilawewikyo shi yakepfo. Indi wulalu lulandewona shilya shose shii-shiwike shi yake.
Indi ichu awemnyiṟye wasu kiheri kyangu lumbonyi nyio Yesu ai mruwie mdohu foke wuitoṟi na kiichiko kimaduma kya mawawio ha opfu, ili esonja opfu akaya-ho wose kui wutonga wo Ruwa.
Kyamba ichu awikye shose shiwe shake awewikye shose kui pfinya yake nyio kiwemsumhanye ili arie iduo wana wafoi wuitoṟinyi naitse msongoru o okiio lowo kiawutsyonyi kui mawawyo.
Kyamba ichu mwilishi na iwa weilisha wapaṟikye ko ichu wose. Nkyo kimarete alapfia sonu yewalaha wanawawama.
Ili ahambie, “Njechiongoya wanawawama wako rina lyapfo. Njechikuimbya makiidi hawi ha siṟi.”
Na lingi, “Inyi njechiwa mokusirya na iyo.” Na lingi, “Ambuya, lui-ho so na wana wa, Ruwa alenjienenga.”
Cha kipfa ili wana wakuwode na samu na nyama, na wudo alekuwada natso kimu nawo kundu nawute wuitoṟinyi kui opfu ichu aitoṟie opfu, nyio mkumbi ulya.
Na iletsa naletse iwa wawedekie wusingenyi kui wuowu woowuo opfu kiheri wawei na moo kyose.
Alewo chi wasu waele awawinyiepfo, kya indi nyi mbeu ya Abrahamu nyiyo aiwinyie.
Kipfa kya iki kiwembaṟi ifanana na wanawawama kui shindo shose kundu nawe mowaichio wukiwa nawewiia na Ruwa mkohanyi ang'anyi sa mhendeli mowonya manyamaṟo ha mkambo mhoṟie.
Kyamba ipfo kundo alekurohya adi amonyi echihesho, nyi hondo aidima yekya walya waihesho.
Nkyo kimaduma nyo wanawawama waele mui waodoya wa ndaho ya kiruwehu, ringenyi mdume ulya na mkohanyi ang'anyi luimhamba nyio Yesu.
O awei mhendeli mohendelya ichu mombika-ho kimu chando Mose awei o ipfo mba yake yose.
Nao aambikie wuitoṟi kota Mose kimu cha ili mowika mba awode wunene kota mba iya.
Kyamba orio mba yekewiko nyi mndu indi mowika shose nyio Ruwa.
Na Mose nyi awei mhendeli o ipfo mba ya ichu, kawa mtarami moṟingishia shilya shiwerie ihambo.
Indi Kristo nyi Mana sumuhana na mba ii yake. Mba ii yake nyiso, kokoya lokaa luṟamkie luikuwada tsee na iṟumisha owedo lulya itane lochiawutsio.
Kihendekye chando Mumuyo Mwele ahambie, “Ili moicho inu ṟu lyake.
Ma mulaumiṟe ngoo tsanu cha ili mandi ha mapusenyi mkonu fulya fo kihesho fo ipfo olelenyi.
Hondo waku wo wanu walenjihesha kui kiseengo.
Nawo walemewona mawuto hako maka makumi haana. Nkyo kimaduma njilelulia rika lyo lyose ngahamba, Suku tsose wakeri tangatanga na ngoo tsawo. Indi njia tso tsako wo watsiichipfo.
Kyo kilenenga njilelya nyamu kui rihima lyako, ke walashike yangya hawode olele loko.”
Kuṟisenyi wanawawama, kulawone mndu ai kiidi kyanu menyi ngoo njiporu ilaidikye, nayo yechilekana na Ruwa menyi moo.
Kya indi ke kuikimbyanenyi orio mkonu mandi haihambo inu hose, kundu ipfo konu kulaumiṟyo mndu mrima echilembo nyi wunyamaṟi.
Kyamba so lomba wenyi-kita na Kristo lukakaa lochikuwada tsee na kiwanja kilya handu luwokye itane maawutsyonyi.
Ili kohambo, Ili moicho inu ṟu lyake ma mulaumiṟe ngoo tsanu cha ili mandi ha mapusenyi.
Nyi wa ku weadanya wakapusa? Chi iwa walewuka ipfo Misiri wakadao nyi Mose wose?
Nyi wa ku alewa mowalulia maka makumi haana? Chi iwa wawenyamaṟie, na shiwungo shawo shikalekana ipfo kundo kuwode sehusa?
Nyi wa ku alewalia nyamu kehamba, walashike yangya hawode olele loke? Chi iwa walelema iidikya?
Natso na lowona walalekuidimya yangya-ho kipfa kya wulemi wulya.
Iki kiluhoye fowa tseowuo kundu kulawone ipfo konu kuwoneke-pfo echiasha yanga lilya, ili indi kiteṟyo kilya kyekuangya ipfo kundo kuwode olele loke kii-kideye-se.
Kyamba naso luiwaongoye ndumi ya sia chawo. Indi idedo lilya waleliicho lilewaekya kindopfo kipfa yadanya lyawo lilawelungyo mwidikye.

Kyamba yanga loangya ipfo hando kuwode olele kokoya lomeidikya, kisumhanye kilya ahambie, “Njilelya nyamu kui rihima lyako, ke Walashike yangya hawode olele loko.” Na lya heri mawiko halemba iwiko hamu na kiwanja kya wuyana.
Kipfa kuwode hando Ruwa ahambie, “Kya mkonu fo mfungade mawiko hake hose.”
Na iya kiwungi ke, Walashike yangya hawode olele loko.
Ikyo kimanyishye ke kodeo maanya fo wandu wechikuangya-ho indi walya walesonguo yongoyo ndumi ya sia wo walawekuangya-ho kitewe nyi wulemi wulya.
Nkyo kyanenga ateseheṟa lingi mkonu kui inu echideda kui Dawidi maheri hamsia mengi chando kulesonguo ihamba, “Ili moicho inu ṟu lyake, ma mulaumiṟe ngoo tsanu.”
Kyamba kima Yosua alembaangishia olelenylulya awechideda-se kiheri kya numa kya mkonu fungipfo.
Kikuwukye-ho kyehamba ke kwipfo-se maanya foonyonya fumtsuhaṟye mkambo fo Ruwa.
Kyamba moangya ipfo kundu kuwode olele loke nyio aonyonya kya mawuto hake chando Ruwa aleonyonya kya halya hai hake.
Nakyo kiluitike luwinye ikuangya ipfo hando kuwode olele lulya, kundu ma kulakae-ho echihutso nyi kitewe kya wulemi wulya.
Kipfa dedo lya Ruwa lirie moo lii na pfinya lii liohi kota oryo oshu lulie kuwi, lii soka itana lyapaṟa mrima na mumuyo na mawungo na moongo liileelia mahio na macha hakeri ngoonyi.
Ma kuipfo kindo kii kiwike kiwode kundo kulawono odatsinyi lokepfo; indi shii kitaṟe shii shialie na pata mesonyi hake shose. Nyio amonyi luimhamba.
Kyasia ili lui na mkohanyi ang'anyi ichu alekuidya maruwehu halya nyio Yesu Mana chu o Ruwa lukuwade na imhamba.
Kipfa lulawode mkohanyi mnene alawechiidima iluichio wukiwa kya wufafa wodu indi ai mheshe kui shindo shose awehianyi naso wuta-pfo wunyamaṟi.
Ikyo kiluenenge luitikirie kidembo kilya kya wutonga lui na wutumbe, kundu luambye-ho osaṟio luweshika ikoya-pfo wutonga woluendie ngaya yetambachuo liwe lya heri.
Kyamba oryo mkohanyi aimtunge kiidi kya wandu awiko-ho mokaya wandu kya kiheo kyeṟundia Ruwa, kundu namdambikye njooko na shidaso sheoloṟa manyamaṟo.
Echiidima ikapa na itsitsa walya walaichi kindo wechitangatanga, ili nao amonyi arie wufafa.
Na kimaduma kyawo kimbaṟi nawike-ho kidaso kyeoloṟa manyamaṟo, kiwe kido kipfa kya wandu kiwewa kido na kipfa kyake amonyi.
Ma kwipfo awada wunene wu kui pfinya yake amonyipfo, kya indi ashika ilaho nyi Ruwa cha Aron.
Na wudo Kristo chi o amonyi alekuwikya wuitoṟi wu nawe mkohanyi mnenepfo, kya indi ichu alembia, “Mana chu oko nyio iyo, nyi inu ngakufee.”
Na wudo ahambie handu hengi, “Iyo ukeri mkohanyi o mlungana o kamba lya Melkisedeki.”

Nao mafiri halya awei nyiamenyi tsake nyi aledasya ichu aleidima imletsa opfu shiterewo na sheeṟeṟo na shifuhio echimlilia malilio ha pfinya na imtonyitsya mchenyeṟe kashika iidikyo na iletso wuowu wuwembode.
Manya ai Mana na ipfo kundo aweiwawyo hakuwutia-ho ikulosha iidikya.
Ili alemaa yawutsio adi, lyo likamtana moendie iwa wamwidikye okiio lo mlungana wose.
Kaichimbiṟo nyi Ruwa mkohanyi o kamba lya Melkisedeki.
Kyake o kuweipfo shifoi shededa indi shirohie idambuya cha kipfa nyo muhombie mnu maadanyionyi.
Kyamba na kiheri kilemkuidya kiwemtana walosha, na muwuṟie-se lingi muhende losho shichano sha mbonyi tsa Ruwa sha kuwoka, mukawemba wandu wawuṟie oseṟi chi shelya shumu.
Kyamba oryo mndu monyo oseṟi aichiwie mbonyi tsa wuhoṟotsupfo, nyi akeri ndaka.
Indi shelya shumu shisumhanye wandu watimie, nyiwo wandu wawode pfinya tsetichia shindo tsii njiohishe kui mwichiwie tsewa iletsa kicha na kiwicho.

Nkyo kitewe luleke isenda mbonyi tsa Kristo hando tsiasie, luhende itambahanya tsilya tseawutsia; lulakiwike-se kiwanja lya kawi kii kya mdumbuye fowuta-ho macha ipfo mawutonyi haende opfu, kii kya mwidikye foyalukya Ruwa.
Kii kya wupatiso na kya ihekya mawoko, na kya iṟuka lya wapfu na kya mwanduye of mlungana.
Na ikyo lochiwuta kokoya Ruwa aluikaya.
Cha kipfa iwa waleimikyo limu wakasonja kisumbo kilya kiiruwehu wakawehawyo Mumuyo Mwele.
Wakawesonja dedo lya Ruwa lilya icha na pfinya tsilya tsa mandi halya hechicha.
Kokoya iwo wawuka kambenyi nyi kyalema iwalawuya mdumbuye lya kawi ili wai wandu wamewuya ikukapya Mana chu o Ruwa msalabenyi wakawemselya mnyeri.
Kyamba teri iya yechionga mvuo yekeikapa kafoi ikadosa mboha yechihiṟa iwa ikeri idemyo kyawo nyiyo yaonyisho nyi Ruwa.
Indi iya ingi yekeende msha na maduo iwode kiweṟepfo, ikeri afui iseso yechifurumia ikumbyo modo.
Indi nyo wakunde, kyanu lokusirya kii kiwungi kii kicha kirianyi na okiio ma ili lodeda ludi.
Kyamba Ruwa alai mlemeshi awechihadima wina lyanu na kunda lyanu muwewonye rina lyake ili indi muweipfuṟukanya waele walya, na iwapfuṟukanya mui.
Na lulalakye mnu ke oryo mndu onu ose nawe momanyishya-ho wuitiki wu wumu wo mfeṟa fo owedo lulya shika mawutsyonyi.
Kundu mulahombye kya indi mukuwaakishane na walya waoṟa shiteṟio shilya kui mwidikye na mkutirisie.
Kyamba Ruwa alewikya Abrahamu kyasa, nao ili alawewode ungi awechiidama ilya nyamu kui ilya lyake kahenda kulia nyamu koke amonyi.
Kehamba, “Nyi lohi yonyisha njechikuonyisha, ipfumbutsa njechikupfumbutsa pfumbu.”
Nao kakutirisia ado kashika ikoya kyasa kilya kyaawutsyo.
Kyamba wandu wekelya nyamu kui ichu awang'anye, na nyamu nyi mṟasa fo oryo nganu ipfo kowo yechiwanza dedo.
Na wudo Ruwa ili alekunda iloṟa weoṟa kyasa kilya wutumuhari wo kyama kyake kui wuitiki wung'anyi kasanzia-ho ilya nyamu.
Kundu lukae wakarishe kui pfinya lukuwode na njowiko tsiwi tsihoṟoki tsilawewa iwiko nyi Ruwa tsa wongo lochiwingya ikuwada na owedo lulya lui wasumbe.
Lo lulukerye kipfunga mrima kiwangi kitumuhaa kikeri ikuhendya ora lo kya mba ipfo kundu kiṟikishya kilya kiishingya-ho.
Nyi hondo Yesu alekuidya-ho molusongoya-ho so kawa mkohanyi mnene kui kamba lya Melkisedeki.
Na Melkisedeki cho awei mangi ya Salemu mkohanyi o Ruwa ichu o huyashose. Nao kahenda yambya Abrahamu ili indi alewuka ngapanonyi iya yewinza wamangi walya, kamkumbuhana kembikya ona.
Nyio Abrahamu kahenda imlekia kilya kyeshitsa ikumi kya shindo shilya shose. Nao asonguo ihambo mangi menyi wuhoṟotsu kawehambo lingi mangi ya Salemu lyo lihambye mangi menyi ofoṟo.
Alaimsende ma kui wande ma kui wama ma kui kiriterite kya waku, alawode ma kiheri mkonu yake iwokye-ho ma kiheri moo foke fuinukye nakyo. Aimbaakishye Mana chu o Ruwa akaa mkohanyi o kitsitsi.
Keambuyenyi-wo ichu chando ang'anyi Abrahamu mku chu mnene kamnengya kilya keshitsa ikumi kya madambiko halya.

Lohi na walya wa wana wa Lewi waiwadambikye wukohanyi wulya, wo wawode iwawaso lyewesa mkambo shilya shishitsye ikumi shiidikyanyi na wuwawaso. Nafo nyi fui fo wanawawama wawo wapaṟikye kitsi-hu kya Abrahamu.
Kya indi ichu alawa isendo na kiriterite kya waku ipfo kowo, o aleambya kilya kishitsye ikumi kya shilya sha Abrahamu kawikya ichu awembikye shiteṟyo shilya ona.
Indi kii-ho kilechiwa iteshuo nyi kikeri kidi, ke kilya kii kitutu kyo kyechiwikyo ona nyi kilya king'anyi.
Na iya nyi wakukerye wadi wandu wepfa waambya shilya sheshitsa ikumi, indi ulya handu akukerye aimṟingishye ke nyi ai na moo.
Ngahamba kyehambika ke nao Lewi chu moambya sheshitsa ikumi alembeso kishitsye kya ikumi kui Abrahamu.
Kipfa awei-se kitsinyi kya mku oke mandi akumbuhananye Melkisedeki.

Mkambo fo wandu fomewawasyo wukohanyi-hu wo ki-Lewi, kya indi kima nyiwo wuweawutsya wuawutsi nyi ki kilekiitika-se iwika-ho mkohanyi ungi arianyi na kamba lya Melkisedeki, alasendo na kamba lya Aron?
Kyamba ipfo kundo wukohanyi wolacho kokuwukya-ho na wuitiki woilacha wuwawaso.
Kyamba ichu aihambo na isho nyi apaṟikye osharinyi lungi hondo kulawewukie echiṟunda rasionyi.
Kumanyikye na pata ke hando Mndumii odu apaṟikye ipfo ko Yuda, na oshari lu Mose alelusendya wukohanyipfo.
Na iki kyakishika itambahaluka-se kya ngoseṟa ili kowiko-ho mkohanyi ungi ai-mbaakishye Melkisedeki.
Alawewa adi kui owiko loliwawasya na njia ya kii-nyama, kya indi kawewa adi kui pfinya ya moo fulechipaṟakana.
Kyamba aṟingishyo, ke iyo ui mkohanyi o mlungana kui kamba lya Melkisedeki.
Lyo nyi lyawuta-ho iwawaso lisongoe-ho cha kipfa liweifafaa lilawewa. Kyamba wuwawaso wulaleawutsia ma kindo kiawukiepfo.
Kukaitso-ho owedo lu ucha kota, lyo lyaluduo oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
Kinene-ho nyi nyamu iya. Wo wawekewa wukohanyi tare nyamu.
Indi ichu kawiko-ho kui nyamu ya mohenda imbia; “Mndumii alelya nyamu, ma alechieweṟo kyayo kehamba, Iyo ui mkohanyi o mlungana.”
Ipfo kundo alawewiko-ho tare nyamu nyi hondo Yesu kawa mwiṟichi moiṟicha owiko lochia kota lulya lungi.
Nawo wai wafoi wawewa wakohanyi cha kipfa nyi walechikaa wai wadumbuo nyi opfu.
Indi ichu ili ekaa mlungana awode wukohanyi wulechiteshuka.
Ikyo kyaenenga aidima iwonya iwa waichea Ruwa wakuwawie nao okiio lo mlungana, kipfa ekaa na moo maheri hose mowaterewya-ho.
Na mkohanyi mnene ai ado nyio alusumhanye kawa menyi wuindi mkeha ose, alawode huya maruwehu.

O alamwitike mfiri yose cha wakohanyi wanene walya wesonguo iwika-ho shidaso sheoloṟa manyamaṟo hawo waweny wechifurumia na shilya sha ha mkambo, Kyamba ikyo amaa ikiwuta limu echikudambika-ho amonyi.
Kyamba wuwawaso wulya wotana wandu wakohanyi wanene wawode wunyonge, indi dedo lya nyamu iya iitumanyi wuwawaso lyawika-ho Mana mokaa mlungana aawukie kose.
Indi kilya kikeri mdo-hu kiidye ishi lomaa ihamba shose kikeri kidi; ke luwode mkohanyi ai mnene adi akudamiṟye ora lo kulyo lo kidembo kya wuitoṟi wo Ipfo maruwehu.
Aiipfo moiṟicha shilya shii sheele na hema lilya lya lohi Mndumii aleliwika-ho amonyi, chi mndu o wandupfo.
Kyamba oryo mkohanyi mnene ekewiko kundu nadambikye-ho njodambiko na shidaso. Na ichu nawudo kimbaṟi nakae awode kyedasya-ho.
Kima aweiya sangenyi chi awewa mkohanyipfo kimaduma kuwode wekedambkya-ho njodambiko tsilya tsiinjiwawase nyi wuwawaso.

Nyiwo wekeṟundya mfano na mangeṟingesha ha shilya shikeri ruwehu, chando Mose aleshika itutumyo ili indi awerie isungusia hema lilya. Kyamba ahambie ke, “Ambuya mnu ochitana shose kui mfano fulya uleloṟo ipfo fumvu-hu lilya.”
Indi wulalu amkoya wuiṟichi wung'anyi wo ngoseṟa wuwukye ipfo kundo akukerie-ho mombele o owiko lochia kya ngoseṟa ilu luiilikishye mengenyi ya shiteṟio shicha kota shilya.
Kyamba kima lulya lo kuwoka luwechia lulawewa idedya kuwechipfulo-ho otende lungipfo.
Kyamba awadedya kehamba, “Mndumii ahambie, Ambuya, mkonu ikeri icha njechiwikya mba ya Israeli na mba ya Yuda owiko luhya.

Nalo lulawaakye owiko lulya njilewikya wande yawo mkonu fulya ngamewateteṟa na owoko njewashuo ipfo orukenyi lo Misiri, kyamba wo walawekaa owikonyi lo loko na inyi ngamewaseheṟa. Nyi wudo Mndumii ahambie.

Na owiko, Mndumii ahambie, ilu njechiwikya mba ii ya Israeli ili indi mkonu iya yamesia lukeriludi; ke njechihomoya njowawaso tsako ipfo mhienyi yawo njechitsiṟehya ipfo ngoonyi tsawo. Na inyi njechiwawiia Ruwa nawo wechinjiwia mkambo.
Ma kochikaa-pfo echilosha odoya ma ihenda iwia odoya manya Mndumii-pfo. Kipfa wechinjimanya wose wokya ichu ai mtutu owo shika ichu ang'nyi.
Kyamba njechiwa mowasaṟia madeko hawo, na manyamaṟo hawo njechihakumbuo-sepfo.”
Ili indi ahambye, luhya, nyi alekuṟa lulya lo kuwoka. Indi kilya kii kikuṟe kiikifoye wuku kyo kiitikirie afui na ihenda saramaya.
Owiko lu lo kuwoka na luwewode sungusihu tsalo tsa wuindi sanza na yele lilya lya wanda ii.
Kyamba hema lilealyo-ho lilya lya kuwoka. Napfondo kuwei kiwawa njolewo kilya na mesa na mkate iya iwei-maalye Ruwa. Nalyo lii idumbuye rina, Lyo yele.
Indi mbele ya isulya lyeshikya mongo lilya lya kawi kuweei-pfo hema lilya lihambo maele.

Lyo liwewode rasio lya sahabu lyedasya-ho shidaso sha opfamo na isanduku lya owiko lulya liwei ikapye mawala ha sahabu nyora tsose, lyo liwei na nungu ya sahabu liwode manna iya na olio lo Aron ilululembuya yoṟa, na maho halya ha kipala ha owiko lulya.
Indi huyalyo kuwewode Wakerubimu wenyi-ngeela weruwya kiaala mhoṟie iria. Kuiho kyededa kyasho kimu kimu wulalupfo.
Ishi shikamesungusio shido wakohanyi wawekehenda hemenyi lilya lya kuwoka mkonu yose wewuta shiheo sha wuindi.
Indi ihenda hemenyi lilya lingi nyi mkohanyi ulya mnene alekuhendya-pfo oryo maka limu o amonyi kulawode alarie samu aidambikye-ho iwe yemkaya o iwemkaya na mkambo fose kya madeko hawo.
Lyo nyi lya Mumuyo Mwele amanyishye nalyo ke njia yeduo wuelenyi ilandeshika ipfunguka, ili indi hema lya kuwoka likihoṟoki-seho.
Lyo lii mfanano fotungya maheri ha halemcha. Nafo fuwei na njodambiko na shidaso shiwekeendo ma shilaweidima iwanza sheko sha mrima fo mowika nasho wuindi.
Shiwekuwode na shelya na shenyo shiishenyi na maolyo ha mbaṟi ii na ii, sha sungusihu tsa shinyama tsiweindikye tseringa kiheri kya wusumhanzo itane kishike iwoneka.
Kya indi Kristo amekuchea ai mkohanyi ang'any o mecha hai-mateṟye kakuidya hemenyi lilya ling'anyi liawukye kota lilya li-itane na mawoko, lyo lihambie ke lilai lya mtsanye fo ki-wulalu.
Kakuidya-ho chi kui samu ya oṟo ang'u ya mahache, kya indi nyi kui samu yake ii njenyi kahenda hando halya haele ili limu kechiwika ndalai yekaa mlungana.
Alewo kokoya samu ya oṟo na ya chau sanza na mtsiri fo taho nkoṟe sheolya wawode paṟi shekeilisha mndu shimbonye-se wukeha wo kii-nyama.
Nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa samu ya Kristo ichu alekudambikya Ruwa amonyi ai mkeha kui mumuyo molungana echiilisha sheko shilya sha mrima yanu iletsano na matendo ha opfu, iwe yepfuṟukanya Ruwa menyi mo?

Ikyo kyanenga ai moitsa-ho owiko luhya kundu walya wai walahe wahendeambya kyoṟa kilya kiweikiteṟye kii kya mlungana, ipfa lilya likamewa lyechiwuta-ho matahachyo haweitano ipfo kiwanjehu kya owiko lo kuwoka.
Kyamba ipfo kundo kuwudo owiko lui lo kyoṟa nyi kiwaṟi ipfa lya mowika litane liṟingishyo.
Kipfa owiko loshika iwanga mandi ipfa lilya lyamhoya, indi lolaa wanda kiheri mowika aiho-se.
Nkyo kitewe manya lulya lo kuwoka lulehoṟotso-ho chila samu iwei-hopfo.

Cha kipfa mandi Mose alemaa iwia mkambo fulya mawawaso haitumananyi ipfo wuwawasonyi hose kawada samu ya mahache na oṟo sanza na mṟinga na pamba ya king'aring'ari na iṟa lyeola kaolya nasho kitabu kilya kiikyenyi na mkambo fulya fose.
Kahamba, “Aii samu ya owiko lu Ruwa amtutumye.”
Na wudo kaweolya na hema lilya na shihia sha wuindi shose samu.
Kala nyi kufui shindo shose shekeilisho na samu woidikya wuwawaso; na shila samu yapusuo kowonyo mhoṟyepfo.
Nkyo kyaitika ke ili mfano iya ya shindo shii maruwehu yakunda iilisho idi, shilya sha maruwehu shii shenyi shikundi shidaso shiidimikye kota shilya.
Kyamba Kristo alawehenda hando haele hai-hawike na mawoko hahambie halya ha lohi kui mfano, kya indi kahenda ruwehu kwenyi nakuloṟe oshangunyi lo Ruwa wulalu echiluhoṟokya-ho so.
Manya alawehenda-ho kundu nakudambikie amonyi kafoi chando mkohanyi mnene ekehenda hando halya haele oryo maka arie samu ilawei yake.
Kima nao na wudo nyi aweitika iwawyo kafoi wokya mandi wuyana wulembiko. Indi wulalu alewoneka-ho limu mainutsyonyi ha maheri nawute-ho wunyamaṟi kui ikudasa amonyi.
Nakyo kirianyi na kya wandu ili kiwawaṟi wapfe limu. Likamewa washike yanduyo.
Na wudo na Kristo nyi aledambiko-ho limu lyewuta-ho manyamaṟo ha wandu wafoi; Ili lingi echikuloṟa na walya waimbedya kya okiio alawinye wunyamaṟi.
Kyamba wuwawaso wusongoṟye kiṟishe kya mecha hawerie icha wulaweende fana ya matendo. Na shidaso shilya shimu wekeshiende maka yose shilunganyi sho shaidima ishitsa wadambiki kikunyi ma indipfo.
Chila wudo chi shiwesia yendo kipfa wadambiki walawekitautau kya manyamaṟo kya indi wawei waharamishe na limu?
Kya wulalu nyisho shiwatamuṟye manyamaṟo maka na maka.
Kyamba samu ya chau na ya oṟo ilai na pfinya yewuta-ho manyamaṟo.
Nkyo kimaduma o ilindi achee wuyana ahambie, “Iyo uwekundi ma kidaso ma odambikopfo. Indi nyi mbihu ulefunjitanya.
Shiaalo shikoṟe na shidaso sheoloṟa wunyamaṟi shiwekuchihiṟyepfo.
Nkyo kyannenga ngahamba, Ambuya ngacha; ipfo kitabunyi kilya kinene nyi ku-kuṟehye kyako ke njiwe njiwute kyama kyapfo, hoi Ruwa.”
Hando heasa ideda nyi ahambye, Uwekundi ma shidaso ma njodambiko ma shiialo shikoṟe ma shidaso sheoloṟa wunyamaṟipfo ma shiwekuchihiṟyepfo, ishi shekedambikyo kui wuwawaso wulya.
Kashika oo kahamba, Ambuya, ngacha njiwe njewuta kyama kyapfo. Kawuta-ho lya kuwoka kundu nailikishye-ho lilya lya kawi.
Kui kyama ki luiwailishe na limu likawa na odambiko lo mbihu fo Yesu Kristo.
Na oryo mkohanyi ekehoṟoka-ho mkonu kawa mowika wuindi echidambikya-ho shidaso shilya shimu kafoi na kafoi, nasho shilai na pfinya yewutaho wunyamaṟi.
Indi ichu alemdambika kidaso kimu mfi kiwewa kimaduma kya manyamaṟo kikae-ho mlungana kakudamiṟa owokonyi lo kulyo lo Ruwa.
Kaitsa-ho mweke fo iweda itane wakituwa wake washika ilaṟo shi ya madende hake.
Kyamba iwa weilisha nyi alewashitsa kikunyi kui odambiko lumu mfi lochikaa mlungana.
Indi na Mumuyo Mwele aluṟingishie adi; kyamba ili amaa ihamba.
“Ilo nyilo owiko njechiwawikya mkonu iya iya yamsia”, nyi Mndumii ahambie, “Njechihomoya njowawaso tsako ipfo ngoon tsawo, na iṟehya njechitsiṟehya ipfo mhienyi yawo.
Na manyamaṟo hawo na njotahachi tsawo sho njechishitamuo-sepfo.”
Kya indi ipfo kundo sho shii shihoṟye mpfondo kukiwode-se odambiko lo kimaduma kya wunyamaṟipfo.
Kyasia wanawawama, lui na wutumbe kui samu ya Yesu wo kihendesha na ipfo kundo kwenyi wuele.
Nyi yo njia ameluipfunguya ikeri njihya iwode moo iitsye kiṟikishyenyi kilya nyinyitso nyama tsake.
Ili lui ludi na mkohanyi ang'anyi ai mbawasie kanyi ka Ruwa.
Luhendetikiria-ho luwode ngoo nlalutsu lui na welu ya mwidikye lui-waolye ngo tsa mrima tsilakikae makufaṟe lui-wasanje mbihu na mṟinga mharami.
Lutsinde lochiṟi ngishya kilya luiweda ma lulalemo, kyamba mokiteṟya nyio m mhendeli.
Na lukae lochiringana luwenyi na wenyi luhende yaaka kui makundano na mawuto mecha.
Lulalembeṟye shisanzyo shadu chando waliwe waichiwie, kya indi lulahane naho. Luitike iwuta ludi ili luwonyi ke mkonu fulya fulya fuitikiria icha.
Kyamba kokoya so ili lomma ipfunguyo kilya kii lohi lokedekyo hando luwonyi kochitsuhase kidaso kingi kyewuta-ho wunyamaṟipfo.
Shila yambya mndumbuye iya ioweshye na modo fulya foaka pala fochilya walemeshi walya.
Mndu afunja wuwawaso wo Mose koka wangochi wai-ho wawi ang'u waṟaṟu wewikya mndumbuye pfinya nyi ashikahenda iwoho alawa iichio wukiwa.
Chi mochihamba, A nyi wuda wo ngoseṟa wudeheli wuwe wochihoya ichu achuma-chuma Mana chu o Ruwa ekitana samu ya owiko lulya ya mpurya, nyi yo ametano nayo mwele kawa motaluo mumuyo moende wutonga.
Kyamba luichi ichu ahambie, “Idehelya mndu lyankoya inyi, nyio inyi njechitaa kiṟache.” Kukawehambo lingi, “Mndumii echidedya mkambo foke.”
Nyi koweshye munu yolokya mawokonyi ha Ruwa menyi moo.
Wuyenyi ikumbuo mkonu iya mulekutirisia ngapanonyi njumu ya mawawyo.
Ili limu muwei walahe patehu mochipiṟo na ituro, ili lingi muwedaṟanyi na walya waweiwutyo wado.
Kyamba nanyo muleichio wapfunge walya wukiwa, na iliindi mulesoko masaa hanu nyi mulekukarishya muwekaa na sia, kipfa muweichi ke nyi muwode mkae fungi fui mcha fochikaa.
Ma mulawone mokumba wutumbe wu wonu wanda wui na wuṟundi wung'anyi wudi.
Nyi muwuṟie ikaa na mrima msanze kundu muhende iduo kilya kii kiteṟye mukamaa iwuta kilya Ruwa akundi.
Kyamba oweṟe luipfo sa lutung'tu. Mocha echicha alechikeleo.
“Na mosumhana oko echiwada moo fuṟukye wuidikinyi. Indi kokoya awuya numa mrima foko fochihio kyakepfo.”
Indi so lulai wandu wewuya numa lochihenda ideka, kya indi lui waidiki lochiletsa-ho mrima.
Wuidiki nyii wukeri ikuwada na shilya shiiedyo, wo nyiwo mhomoye fohomoya shindo shilawono.
Na walya wa mboko ili wawei nawo wukeri wudi nyihondo walekuwutya-ho ihenda iwikyo kiṟingishyo.
Nyi wuidiki woluenenga imanya ke wuyana wu wometano nyi idedo lya Ruwa, na kilya kiwono chi ipfo handu heambuya kipaṟikyepfo.

Nyi wuidiki wuleenenga Abeli adambikye Ruwa kidaso kichihianyi nao kota kya Kain, kashika ihenda iṟingishyo ke nyi ai mndu asumhana kimaduma kyawo. Kiṟingishyo ki nyi Ruwa aweṟingishye kikuwode na njodambiko tsake. Nawo (wuidiki wo) womenenga aideda-se mandi alemshikahenda ipfa.

Nyi wuidiki wuleenenga Enoki ametakuwo alawona opfu. Nyi alekiwonose ma handopfo kipfa nyi Ruwa alemtakuo. Kyamba mandi itakuo lilya lilandehenda iwa kashika iwikyo kiṟinghishyo ke nyi awechihianyi na Ruwa.
Indi kundo kulawode wuidiki koidima ichihianapfo. Kyamba kiwaṟi mndu motikirya Ruwa nawe mwidiki moidikya ke o aiho na walya waimpfula nyi echiwasumba.

Nyi wuidiki wuleenenga Noe amepeesuyo shindo shilawendewoneka kawa mwikimbe esungusia sanduku lilya ling'anyi liwe kyekiṟa wa mba yake kawewonya na mweke fowo wuyana wu owingo kaweioṟa wusumhanyi wuoshanyi na wuidiki.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Abrahamu ilindi amshikahenda ilaho aleleshyaho madu kesamya hando hawei hateṟie hembia kyoṟa, kahenda isama kulawode aweichi handu halya heshika-ho.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga alekapa pata ipfo sangenyi lya kiteṟyo kilya cha ili liwei lihenu kahenda ilaa mahemenyi. Na Isaki na Yakobo na wudo wawerianyi nao iduo kyoṟa kya kiteṟyo kilya kilya.
Kyamba aweiwedya mṟi fulya mikare fushike iwiko kiwanje-hu kya maho ha ngina, mtsanyi ofo nao Ruwa mofusungusia.
Nyi wuidiki nawo wukaenenga Sara alewada pfinya yeembeṟa mbeu amekuo wuku wulakiwona-se katana moteṟya kiteṟyo kilya mokusirio.
Nkyo kimaduma ko ichu umu kuwepaṟikye luwa lifoi cha nyenyeri tsa ngine-hu na cha mbuṟusanga fo ohambehu lo nduwa ya wuyana fulawa italo, nao alepfa kui ifee.

Iwa wose walemhenda wekaa na wuidiki ma walawekudaya shiteṟyo shilya, indi waleshiwona shikeri kundo ko isonguo wakashiindya wekuhambya na pata ke wakeri wahenu, wandu wekuidya-ho tupu ipfo teri-hu-ii.
Kyamba iwa waideda wadi nyi wamanyishye ke nyi kiku kyawo waikipfula.
Kima wawekumbuo-ho kilya walekisama naa wawewode mwaanya foiwuya napfo.
Indi wulalu nyi kilya kicha kota walekikuleshya, nakyo nyi kya ruwehu. Nkyo kimaduma Ruwa alawepfia sonu isendo Ruwa owo, kyamba nyi alewawikya mṟi.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Abrahamu aleshika idasa Isaki ilindi aweihesho kadambikya-ho ichu oke kimumu mfi. Nao nyi awei mteṟye shiteṟyo shilya.
Nyio amewio; ke nyi Isaki echiwa msendo fo mbeu yapfo.
Nao nyio kahamba ke Ruwa ai na pfinya yeṟutsa mndu na ipfo wapfunyi. Nakyo kyamnenga alembihiṟyo nawe mfano.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga isaki alewikya Yakobo na Esau ona kawasendya shindo shewoneka.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Yakobo ilindi aweihenda ipfa alewikya oryo ose o wana wa Yosefu ona keindya akulemye mdo-hu fo ndichi yake.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Yosefu ipfo mainukyonyi hake alehenda ikumbuo kya isama lya wana wa Israeli kawawasya kya mafuo hake.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Mose kafeo kaṟiko nyi wafee wake meri iṟaṟu kipfa nyi walewona kimana kiwewode lole, nkyo kiletewa walaweowuo iwawaso lilya lya mangi.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Mose ili amtoṟika kaleha isendo mana o mpfu o Farao.
Kasambuṟa ihenda ituro hamu na mkambo fo Ruwa, kyo kiwemchihiṟye kota ikaa na seko tsa oweṟe tsiwukye wunyamaṟinyi.
Nyi alehamba isutso kimaduma kya Kristo lyo liende wusuṟi kota shisa sha Wamisiri, kyamba nyi aleringa wuṟundi wulya.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga aleda Misiri alechiowuo rihima ya mangi kyamba alekukarisha na ichu alawono cha ili ambonyi.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga alewika Pasaka (nyi mwidio fulya) na yoola lilya lya samu, kundu mkombetsi ulya nalahende ipaya wawee wawo.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga waleambadya ipalipali lya king'aring'ari cha ili nyi kundu kuhadutsu mpfondo Wamisiri, ilindi walehesha iwika chawo, walekuwutya-ho ihenda imeṟo.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga njomombo tsa Yeriko tsilewunduka tsiwei mtengetie mfiri mfungade.
Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Rahabu mka ulya o njia alawesanzo irumatso kimu na walemeshi walya kipfa nyi aleambya wa lokitala walya kui ofoṟo.
Na iki njihambe-se kingi ngesa? Kyamba nyi saa tsiwenjiwuṟye tsehamba sha Gedeon na Barakia na Samson na Yefita na Dawidi na Samueli na waikimbi walya.
Wonyiwo walelaṟa maumangi kui wuidiki wakaende wusumhanyi, wakashika ikoya shilya shileteṟyo wakapfunga madumbu ha miso.
Wakaṟumisha modo furie pfinya ing'anyi wakaturuchuka madumbu ha oshu wakahomoyo pfinya ili wawei wufafenyi, wakawa wawahanyi ipfo shidenyi, wakadichiṟa siṟi tsa mesa.
Waka wakaambya wawo walepfa wamshika iṟuka, indi womi wengi wakahenda ifunjo-funjo mafuo walaweleshya ndalai iya mawoko kundu washike ikoya iṟuka lingi lii icha.
Indi wengi wakawonyo italwo na ikapo na shiteecho wesanzyo ihenda ipfungo na ikumbo kipfungyonyi.
Wakakumbyo maho, wakaitso wudenyi wakapaṟopaṟo, wakapfa wewooho na oshu, wakaṟahaṟaha waṟee masaṟa ha machondi na ha mburu, wawei wandu wadee, wapotse, waṟohye.
Nyiwo wuyana wu wulawewasumhanye. Wawekeṟahaṟaha weowa ko olele na ipfo mafumvunyi na ipfo njopangenyi na mṟeshenyi ya wanda ii.
Na iwo wose ma ili waleṟingishyo wadi kui wuidiki wulya ma walemkudaya kilya kiwei-kiteṟyepfo.
Kipfa kilya Ruwa alesonguo iluwonya kiwe kicha kota, ke walashike yawutsyo chila hamu naso.

Nkyo kimaduma naso ili lui na ipuchi lya waṟingishi lilutengetie lidi luleṟye wanda oryo wulami na wunyamaṟi wu wokiṟa iluoṟowya owinyi, lochiengeṟa ihenda ira ngapano iii njiwawasye yadu lukuhode-ho necha.

Lochifunya Yesu meso ichu ai mboki na moawutsi o wuidiki wu. O handu ha sia iwei mbiike oshangunyi loke kahenda ikuwada na msalaba nalaṟise wusutsu kashika ikudamiṟa ora lo kulyo lo loṟikehu lo wusuṟi wo Ruwa.
Keringenyi-ng'u wo ichu alekukarishia wulemi wulya wo wanyamaṟi walya wolemana nao amonyi, kundu mulahende ilemo, mrima yanu ilalolome.
Ipfo ngapanonyi yelehana na wunyamaṟi mulemekuhode itane moewa samupfo.
Nanyo mulemaa ihadima wukarishi wulya, ipfondo modedyo mui wana, “Manoko, ma kulamine ihenda itsano nyi Mndumii. Ma kulalolome ili odedyo nyio.
Kyamba ichu Mndumii amkundi nyi ekemtsana. Kechikapa oryo mana aimwambya.”
Kutirisienyi mochitsano. Ruwa aimkumbuhananya-ho mui wana. Kyamba nyi mana uhya wande alaimtsana?
Alewo kokoya mulahenda itsano wutsanyi wuwei kita kya wose nyi mukeri wenyi pari mulai wana.
Kyasia ili luwewode wande yadu wa kui nyama wechilutsana lukawewahoya chi kiluwaṟi mnu kya ngoseṟa luhende ikulaṟya Wande chu ai menyi mamumuyo lukuwutie-ho iwonyo moo?
Kyamba wo walelutsana kiheri kyangu wutsanyi wurianyi na mhie yawo, indi o ailutsana awode kitewe kilya kicha kyeluwonya kita nao kya wuele woke.
Oweṟe lu oryo wutsanyi wuiho wufanyi siapfo, kya indi nyi wukiwa, ili lya numa-le woenenga iwa waiwatoṟishe nyiwo wusumuhanyi wuwikye-ho ofoṟo.
Nkyo kimwenenge muhende ikarisha mawoko halya hai-masotse owaa na ndi tsilya mulakae marehe.
Mutanye madende hanu osenge luhoṟotsu, kundu kilya kiirichahia kilarendemke, indi kikunde henda chia.
Wingyenyi hamu na wose ikaa na ofoṟo na wuilisho, kipfa kulaipfo echiwona Mndumii alai mwilishe.
Muwe mochiambuya mnu, kundu kulawoneke-ho echiwuka wutongehu wo Ruwa, manya kulaalukye-ho mri fuipusa fochirohya fuweshika ifanyitsa wafoi.
Kulakae-pfo ai mndu o melumelu ang'u mndu mtaicho cha Esau alekumba wuwee woke kya kilayo kimu.
Kyamba muichi ke nyi ili lya numa alewuya ilanga iduo ona lulya kyoṟa kyake kashika ileho. Kyamba alawekoya kundo mdo fomelacho ma kawekipfula echitonyitsya machenyeṟe.
Kyamba nyo mulaweshika itikiria hando hepaya kuwei na modo foaaka na nruwe na meema na otanu.
Na irunduma lya ombe na ṟu lya modeda, kyalyo weliicho waleterewa ke, Ma walakihendewio dedo.
Kyamba walaweidimana na iwawaso liwe lyehamba, “Ma indo liwe likakuwasha na fumvu li lyechikumbyo maho lipfe.”
Ma Mose kahamba, Ngawuko m madima njidedema. Kilya kilewonyo-ho nyi wudo kiweioweshye.
Kya indi nyo momshika itikiria fumvu lya Sionyi na mṟi fo Ruwa menyi moo, nyifo Yerusalemu ya kiruwehu na matorito ha wasu waele halawa italo.
Na renge na siṟi ya wawee waiwaṟehie ipfo ruwehu na Ruwa moanduya wandu wose na mumuyo ya wasumhanyi walya wai-waawutsie.
Na Yesu moende owiko lulya luhya na samu iya ya maolya ikeri ideda kuichyo kota iya ya Abeli.

Keringenyi-ng'u-wo mulawone mochilekana na ichu ai-pfo modeda. Kyamba kokoya walya walaweikia wechilehana na ichu modeda kyake ipfo sangenyi, nyi hanga kawi so, kokoya lokumbya ichu mhongo aideda akeri ruwehu.
Nyio ṟu lyake lilemdedemesha wanda ii mandi halya, indi wulalu amemanyisha kehamba, “Nyi limu-se njechidihinyisha lingi chi wanda ii tupupfo, indi na ipfo ruwehu.”
Idedo ili; limu-se lingi, lyahamba necha ke shilya shii shidedemeshe shehenda ilachika cha kipfa shiwei-shiwumbe, kundu kukae-pfo shilawa idedemesho.
Nakyo kienenge so ili luiambya wumangi wulechiteshuka luwike-pfo mwaano lochipfuṟukanya nafo Ruwa kyemchihiṟa luwodo nyi wuindi na wuowu.
Kyamba Ruwa odu ai modo fuilya fochimaa.
Kaenyi mochikundana na wanawawama.
Mulahadime iambya wahenu na kanyi konu. Kyamba ili kuweipfo wewika wadi nyi waleambya wasu waele ma walawichi.
Muwe mochikumbuo walya wai wapfunge cha ili mompfungo hamu nawo, muwekumbuo waiwature muwode mbihu chawo.
Wasangi wo wasanze wali wumu wuhendelyo nyi wose na kisima kyawo kilahendesutso. Kyamba wamelumelu na waṟuhui nyio Ruwa echiwaanduya.
Mbuka yanu ilafane wueehi, kilya kyanu kii-ho kyo kimshikye. Kyamba o amonyi awehambie, “Njechikuda manya-lepfo, njechiwuta macha ipfo kofo ma indipfo.”
Nkyo kyalukarisha luihamba, “Iricha oko nao Mndumii, njechiowuo kindopfo Mndu o wandu anjiidima ki?”
Kaenyi mochikumbuo wasongoru wanu iwo walembia idedo lya Ruwa. Muwe mochikapya mainukyo ha ohendo lowo meso mukuwaakishye wuidiki iwu.
Yesu kristo awei adi wukowu ai adi na inu echikaa adi mlungana.
Mulahende patsyo nyi mapfundo maliwe hai ha kihenu. Kyamba kilya kii kicha kyechiwanza ngoo nyi wutonga chi chonga; tso tsiweendie walya wawekekurohya natso mbuchapfo.
So luwode rasio, kyayo walya waisingya hema lilya wawode momu foilya kilya kii-hopfo.
Kyamba nyama tsa mando halya, samu yaho yekeendo nyi mkohanyi mnene ipfo hando halya haele yeoloṟa wunyamaṟi, tso tsahenda ikoṟo ora lo kya nja lo otiṟiwe lulya.
Nkyo kitewe na Yesu alewawiṟo ora lo nja lo kichumi kya mṟi fulya kundu nailishe mkambo foke kui samu yake.
Hondo lukuwutie tewe so luwuke otiṟiwenyi lulya lusangane nao nja iya lochikudika na wusutsu wulya awei-mwendie o.
Kyamba lulawode iya mṟi fokukaya-ho, kya indi nyi lukeri iwingya fulya fungi fochikuwiia-ho.
Lutsinde lochidambikya Ruwa odambiko lo mwano fochiwa lui nao fui momu-hu yechiichika rina lyake.
Indi mulahadime ilekia na ihawya wengi, kyamba njodambiko tsa mbaṟi ii tsichihiṟye Ruwa.

Muhendelye wasongoru wanu na iwahoya, kyamba wo walaa chowe wechiwinya mrima yanu wai wandu warie ihenda weso kyayo, kundu wahendehaluo-ho wawodo n sia walawone wechisumukya. Kikamba kido kiwemfurunjikia.
Ke luterewyenyi-ng'u-wo. Kyamba so lukusirie ke ngo tsadu tsa mrimenyi tsii nhoṟotsu loitika ihendekya wose kui wusumhanyi.
Kyanjiitika kawi njimtutumye iwuta iki nyi kundu njihede iwihiṟo konu owinyi.
Indi Ruwa ai menyi-ofoṟo nyi aletambachuo mlisi o machondi ipfo ko wapfu ichu ang'anyi kuisamu yewika-ho owiko lo mlungana, Mndumii odu Yesu.

Ruwa chu namsumbe pfinya ya oryo kii kicha kyose muwe mowuta shilya akundi. Nao nyio ai-msanze nanyo echiwa mowuta kilya kichihianyi nao kikawa kui Yesu Kristo. Nyio nawe mowikyo mng'ano maheri hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
Indi ngamtutuma nyo wana wa wama ke ambyenyi necha idedo li lya wuikimbi, kyamba njilemṟehya nyo njido ngamdumbuo owinyi.
Manyenyi ke manowama odu Timoteo amelekio; kokoya acha owinyi njishike iwonana nanyo njirianyi nao.
Munjiiṟikiṟye wasongoru wanu wose na waele wose. Walya wai ipfo Italia wamudikye shiṟikiṟo shawo.
Wutonga wukae nanyo mose.
Inyi Yakobo njii singa lya Ruwa na lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo ngaiṟikiṟa njoshari tsilya ikumi na tsiwi tsilee wahenunyi.
Wanawawama wako, kokoya moshika ihoyo shihesho shiwe na shiwe, iki mukitane sia ii njenyi.
Mochimanya ke kilya kiihesha wuidiki wonu kiende wukuhodi.
Indi wukuhodi wu wumarisie iṟunda lyawo ipfo kundo nyo mochiawukya muhendechia wyoo mulapfuwae ma kya iki ma kya iki.
Indi kokoya ipfo konu kwipfo atoṟowae wuṟango, o naterewe Ruwa chu ekenengya wose alasambuṟa alechideda mndu na echienengo.
Indi naterewe ai mwidiki nalawone apfio nyi mdo; kyamba mopfio nyi mdo afananyi na isinanu lya ipalipali likeri isingitso-singitso nyi otanu lyechipongaikapongika.
Mndu amba adi ma nalahambe ke nyi echienengo kindo nyi Mndumii.
Ai mndu o mrima iwi awa motangatanga njiehu tsake tsose.
Indi manowama chu mtutu nakuṟumishe kya mng'ano foke.
Indi ichu msuṟi nawekuṟumisha kya wututu woke kipfa echisia cha kiwaṟo kya maṟenyi.
Kyamba manengeṟi fodo fuiwaa na mbaṟi fukanaṟa maṟa, na shiwaṟo shaho shikaanama na lole yasho ikadeka. Na wudo mndu msuṟi echikoṟosoka njohendonyi tsake.
Nanga mndu msoṟo aikuhoda kiheshyonyi, kipfa ili ambangohoda echiambya oṟo iya nchope, nyiyo moo fu Ruwa alemteṟya walya wamkundi.
Mndu aihesho ma nalahambe, ke nyi Ruwa anjihesha. Kyamba Ruwa alahesheka na shindo shiwicho, nao amonyi ahesha mndupfo.
Indi oryo mndu ose ahenda ihesho nyi lango tsake tsi njenyi tsechimkuruo-kuruo na imhomuo-homuo.
Ilindi lango yamaa yambya yafee wunyamaṟi, indi wunyamaṟi wukamaa itano woende opfu.
Wanawawama wako wakunde, ma muladekesho.
Oryo kisumbo kyose kii kicha, oryo kinego kyose kii kya sungusihu kichee huye, kisokie kyechiwuka ko Wande mowika sa tsose. Na ipfo koke kuwode ma mhaluye mliwe manya mṟishe mangu fo masehyanopfo.
Nyio alekunda kalufee so kui idedo lya kii-lohi kundu lukae-pfo lui odambiko lulya lo wuwee lusongoe mawumbe hake.
Iki mukiichi, wanawawama wako wakunde. Indi oryo mndu nawe mwangu kui yadanya na mlemeri kui ideda na mlemeri kui idosa nyashi.
Kyamba nyashi ya mndu ilekeṟundya wusumhanyi wo Ruwa.
Nkyo kimwenenge muhende kuatuo oryo ngafu yose na wumbafu wufo wudo.
Na idedo lyo lii iwaye konyu lyo muliwade mui muwe watanyi wa idedo, mulakae weliadanya tupu mochikulemba muwenyi.
Kipfa kokoya mndu aadanya idedo alawa mtanyi nyio ai cha kilolenyi.
Kyamba o ili amekuambuya alewuka-ho kahenda ihadima na limu fana iya awefanyi.

Indi ichu alekulemya wuwawaso-hu wu wusumhanye njora tsose iwu wo ikuachia, o awa mokaika kechiwuambuya, alai moadanya kya ihadima indi ai mtanyi motana kindo lohi-nyio echiwa mosumbo sia ipfo mbutienyi yake.
Kokoya mndu ahamba ke ai menyi-wuindi nao alaapfinya olimi loke indi alemba ngoo yake, wuindi wu woke wukeri wo wulya.
Wuindi wuharami wulafanyi oshangunyi lo Ruwa Wande wukeri wule, isenguda wana wangoeda na waka wa kusu iwa wai walise wukiwa na ikuṟisa ihenda fanytso nyi wuyana wu.
Wanawawama wako, na mulasanze wuidiki woidikya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo menyi wuitoṟi na ikundya wandu.
Kyamba kokoya ipfo kisanzyonyi kyanu kukawecha napfo mndu msoṟo aṟee rachi tsa sahabu na nguo njiili pang'a, indi kuwecha napfo na mndu mkiwa aṟee nguo tsiteṟe-fukye.
Nanyo muwechiringa ulya aṟee nguwo njiili pang'a muwembia, damya aa kundo kuu kucha; na ichu mkiwa muwembia, iyo hoṟoka ipfo, ang'u damya tsindenyi ya kitima kyako kyehekya-ho madende.
Mukawika mudo chi mowiluo ipfo kiidi kyanu mochiwa modumbuya mndu na mahio mawicho?
Wanawawama wako wakunde, kundenyi yadanya. Ruwa chi alesambuṟa iwa wai wakiwa na wa iya wuyana kawatana wasuṟi wenyi-wuidiki na waoṟi wa wumangi wu alewuteṟya walya wamkundi?
Indi nyo momleha iindya ichu mkiwa. Chi wasuṟi wekemwapfinya, chiwo wekemduo mengenyi?
Chi iwo wekeruma rina li icha mui-wasende nalyo?
E-wo kokoya moawutsia necha iwawaso lilya lya kiwumangi lii-iṟehye bibilienyi lyehamba, “Kunda odoo cha ili okukunda kumonyi,” nyihondo mowuta kya wusumhanyi.
Indi kokoya mokekundia wandu, nyi mowika-ho wunyamaṟi mohenda iwonyo owingo nyi wuwawaso ke mui watahachi.
Kyamba ili mndu akuwode na wuwawaso wose indi kafunja ili limu nyi mtahachi motahachya hose.
Kyamba ichu ahambie, “Ma kulaṟuhuye,” nao nyio awehambie, “Ma kulawahe.” Indi kokoya odumbuya kya iṟuhuya, indi kohenda iwaha nyi hondo omba mtahachi motahachia wuwawaso.
Ikyo muideda na wudo kiwe na ikyo muiwuta na wudo kiwewa mui wandu wakunda idumbuyo na meke fo wuwawaso wo ikuachia.
Kyamba mndu alekesaṟya, mdumbuye ii yechimhoya inletsane na isaṟya. Isaṟia lyashika iwikyo kiṟumi na ipfo mdumbuyenyi.
Wanawawama wako, kiira nyi kiki kechiwuka ipfo kundo mndu ahambye wai ke ai na wuidiki, indi mawuto alahawode? Alewo wuidiki wu wochiidima imletsa ko?
Kokoya mndu manowama ang'u mshiki waipfo wai kitaṟe wawuṟie na mlie fo inu.
Na umu o kiidi kyanu kawawia, Kuhendyenyi na ofoṟo muhende ioda modo muweihuda indi alawaenengya shelela mbihu iki nyi kiwataramie ki ngesa?
Na wudo wuidiki wukeri, kokoya wulai na mwatuo nyi wukeri wupfu kowo wuwenyi.
Kulako kwipfo ehamba, Iyo ui na wuidiki na inyi njii na mawuto halya. Njiloṟa wuidiki wu wopfo wuta-ho mawuto halya na inyi njekuloṟa wuidiki wulya ipfo kundo mawuto hako hai.
Iyo uidikye ke Ruwa nyio umu. Kowika kudo kyachia. Na waṟufu waidikye iki wechidedema.
A iyo mndu mohuukya, kokunda imanya ke wuidiki wulai na matendo nyi wukeri kitendo?
Abrahamu mku odu chi alesumhanzo kui mawuto kechiaala mana chu oke Isaki ipfo rasionyi-hu?
Nyi owona wuidiki wuiṟunda ipfo kundo mawuto hake haiwuto, na wuidiki wuleshika yawukia ipfo mawutonyi halya.
Kukashika iinutsyo-ho kilya ki-kiṟehye kyehamba, Abrahamu aweidikye Ruwa nakyo kilemsendyo kya wusumhanyi kalaho mbuya ya Ruwa.
Muwonyi ke mndu ahenda isumuhanzo kui mawuto chi kui wuidiki wuwenyi.
Na wudo na Rahabu mka ulya o njia chi aleshika itano asumhanyi kui mawuto ili aleambya wasu walya na iwasama na njia ingi?
Kyamba chando mbihu fulai na mumuyo fukeri mpfu na wudo wuidiki wuwuṟye mawuto nyi wui wupfu.
Wanawawama wako, mulafo mudi mochiwa walosha, ili muichi ke mdumbuye lochidumbuyo so nyi yechiwa ya wutichi kawi.
Kyamba so lose piu lokedeko kafoi. Kokoya kwipfo aladeko ili echideda ichu awei msoṟo msanze na kamu aidima yaapfinya na mbihu fose.
Kokoya lowika ngowa madumbunyi ha frasi kundu tsiluhoye, nyi mbihu fotso luifuduo fose.
Ambuya merikebu tsing'anyi tsidi tsikeri ihendesho-hendesho nyi njotanu tsa owira nyi tsekehaluyo nyi mlo mwangu ora lulya moichilia akunda kui wulami wo owoko.
Olimi na wudo lukeri kiwungo kitutu, na shilya luikusenda nasho sa shing'anyi. Ambuya kimodo kitutu nyi kyahenda ikoṟa ingeṟa chando ling'anyi.
Nalo olimi nyi modo, nyi lui wumangi wuichuo wumbafu. Olimi lukukerye kiidi kya shiwungo shadu kifanyitsa mbihu fose kiweatsa kidung'anyitso kya mbuka lui-waatse nyi Gehena.
Kyamba mbika ya mando ha nja yose na ya sherunduka huye na ya sheafuo wanda anda na ya shikuṟembye ipalipalinyi yahooro wanda na ikamaa ihooṟo nyi mbika ya mndu o wandu.
Indi kwipfo ma umu o wandu aidima ihooṟa olimipfo. Lo kiwicho kilya kilatsia loichuo uṟoi loende opfu.
Na mweke folo lokeṟumisha mndumii na Wande, na mweke folo lokeruma wandu wai-wawike kui ofano lo Ruwa.
Nyi ipfo dumbunyi ili limu-ho kukuwukye-ho ona na oseso. Wanawawama wako, isho chi kisumhanyi shihendeke shidopfo.
Alewo kuwode soka kuweṟukye mṟinga foloda na fopusa ipfo kiṟukyonyi kyayo ki kimu?
Ma mkuyu foidima iwika ndunda tsa msinepfupfo, manya msabibu fowika tsi tsa mkuyupfo. Na wudo kundo ko mbalenyi koende mringa folodafo.
Nyi wu o konu ai mṟango amba mndu mṟeheṟi? O nawike-ho mawuta hechiwa na mbaye fusumhanyi kui wuṟango wo ipfudia.
Indi kokoya muwode wunyeng'i wuwawa na wulang'a wo ndeda ipfo ngoonyi tsanyu ma mulakuṟumishe mowongisha kilya kii-lohi.
Iwu wukeri wudi chi wuṟango wuwukye ipfo huyepfo, indi wukeri wo shi, wo ki-wandu, wo ki-waṟupfu.
Kyamba ipfo kwipfo wupirisi na wumbafu wose.

Indi wuṟango wu wowuka ipfo huye, wo wosonguo imanyika wui wukeha wukaengeṟa imanyisha ikunda ofoṟo na isehyana wanawawama wochikaa na wuindi wuwelukie welu masaṟia na mawiko mecha wulahenda iira mndu ma wulakulembetseṟye.
Indi mbeu yende ofoṟo yekeolyo kundo kuwode ofoṟonyi walya weitsa-ho ofoṟo.
Ngapano na maanduyano shikeri ipfo konu nyi hanga shikuchee ngesa? Chi ipfo kundo lango tsanu tsikuwode tsechiamtsa shida ipfo shiwungonyi shanu?
Mukeri ilalakia, indi moshika iwadapfo. Muiwahana na ilang'aa indi moidima ikoyapfo. Moira ngapano na ikumba-pfo moo. Indi mowona kindopfo kipfa muleketerewa.
Moterewa mulaambya nyi kipfa moketerewa owicho kundu mushifole-fole mochilisiṟa nasho lango tsanu.
Nyo wafunji wa wusangi, mulaichi ko, ke iwada mbuya na wuyana wu lyo liende kituwa na Ruwa? Kyasia ichu akunda iwa mbuya ya wuyana nyi akutana mkutuwa o Ruwa.
Ang'u mohamba biblia yadeda kya wulya kehamba, “Mumuyo alefusamiṟya konu nyi folalakya na iṟisaṟisa?
Indi aenenga wutonga wo mwengeṟia.” Nkyo kimaduma ihambie, “Ruwa alemana na walya wekutimbisha wawenyi, indi walya wakusotsa, awawonya wutonga.”
Nkyo kimitike muhoye Ruwa. Lemanenyi na Satana nao echimdicha.
Mutikirie Ruwa nao echimtikiria nanyo. Haramishenyi mawoko, nyo wanyamaṟi, ketanenyi-ng'u wo ngoo tsanu ngeha, nyo wenyi mrima iwi.
Hendenyi mukuwiṟishe, mukuinadye na ilia. Seko tsanu tsihaluke tsiwe shilio, na sia ihaluke iwe ṟenze.
Kunyiṟyenyi Mndumii nao echimwira.
Muladedane, wanawawama. Ichu aideda manowama ang'u aidumbuo manomae nyi ekededa wuwawaso na idumbuo wuwawaso. Indi kokoya odumbuo wuwawaso nyi ukeri mtanyi motana wuwawasopfo indi nyi ui modumbuo.
Ichu ai umu nyio mowika wuwawaso na mowudumbuo. Nao nyio menyi pfinya yekiṟa na yerumatsa indiiyo nyi o wu kodumbuo mokingana na iyo?
Akawo nyo mokehamba, Inu ang'u ngama lochihenda mṟinyi mliwe lutsinde ipfo maka lochiṟimiṟya-ho na ifeṟa mbucha.
Nanyo mui wandu mulamanya kilya kyewutika ngama. Moo fonu nyi fo kiki? Nyi mui mtsu fukeri iwono-ho oweṟe fa ili lingi fualakiwono-se.
Nyi hondo hawemsumhanya ihamba, Mndumii kakunda nyi lochikaa-ho lushike iwuta kiwe na kiwe.
Na wulalu mokekushela na maseṟeṟi hanu. Oryo ikushela lya mbaṟi ii lii liwicho.
Kyasia mndu kamanya kilya kii kicha kyewuta nao ada aleekiwuta, nakyo kyechimbiia wunyamaṟi.
Kendeng'u-wo wulalu nyo mui wasuṟi, muhende lia na ifuha kya marohyo hanu hechimhoya.
Wusuṟi wu wonu womepuo na maṟaye hanu ha-malie nyi kase.
Sahabu na fesa yanu yamekapa ngama na ngama ii yechimbiia kiṟingishyo yahenda ilya nyama tsanu cha modo. Mukamaa ikuwumbya kisa kya masaa mfiri ifurumi.
Ambuya, wuṟundi wo waṟundi walya walemnyo nyiwo wuifuha, na shifuha sha wawehi walya shamaa ishika henda madunyi ha Mndumii menyi matoṟito.
Nyo momepfokya ipfo orukenyi na ikusetsa owicho na wusuṟi wose mukawelisiṟa ngoo tsanu mkonu fo kishinjo.
Nyi momewonya mti ichu asumhanyi mukawehenda imbaha alawehodana nanyo.
Tsindenyi mochikukarishya itane Mndumii echikuloṟa. Ambuya, mndu mdemi akeri iwedya kilimu kicha kya sanga echikukarishya kyakyo itane kyaambya mvuo yesonguo na mvuo yainutsya.
Nanyo kekukarishyenyi-ng'u mudo mochidamiṟa madima hanu, kyamba nyi kufui Mndumii echikuloṟa.
Wanawawama, mulanunuwiane muwenyi-na wenyi, kundu mulahende yanduyo. Ambuya, moanduo aakya ipfo shichuminyi.
Wanawawama, mukuwade na waikimbi walya walededa kui rina lya Mndumii, wawe mtaato fonu mpfunge, fo ihenda iwawiṟo owicho na fo ikukarishya-ho.
Ambuya lokesendya nanga iwa walemkutirisia. Mukameicho ikutirisia lya Yobu na ipfo kundo Mndumii aleliinutysa mukamkuwona. Kipfa Mndumii ekesaṟya wandu saṟi ewaichio wukiwa.

Indi kisongoe shingi shose, wanawawama wako, kikeri ki-le, ke mulalye nyamu, manya so ruwehu manya so sanga manya so ki. Indi mukahamba, e, iwe ee lohi mukahamba, ote, iwe ote lohi, kundu mulahendewonyo mti ipfo kyanduyonyi kilya.
Kokoya konu kuwode ai na sia, o nawe moimba.
Kokoya konu kwipfo aluo, o nalahe wameku wa siṟi, wahende imterewya-ho na imshia mafuda kui rina lya Mndumii.
Na kiterewo kilya kii-kiwike kui wuidiki kyechichiṟa moluo ulya, na Mndumii echimheluo. Kawuta wunyamaṟi nyi echihoṟyo.
Kyasia tochianenyi njonyamaṟo muwenyi-na wenyi mochiterewiana kundu muhende ichia. Iterewa lya mndu asumhanyi lyaidima kindo king'anyi liwe li-iwike na mrima msanze.
Elia awei mndu o wandu o mbika imu naso. Nao aleterewa kundu kulakapeho mvuo. Na mvuo ikada ilawekapa maka iṟaṟu na meri iṟandaṟu.
Kawuya katerewa-se na ngina ikawelekia mvuo na teri ii ikawealutsia-se maalutsio hayo.
Wanawawama wako, kokoya o konu umu-ho adekyo kilya kiilohi na ungi amhaluya-se naapfo.
Kemanyenyi mowihiṟa mnyamaṟi njienyi ya odeko loke nyi echiletsa mrima foke opfu na ishikya mfeṟa fo manyamaṟo.
Inyi Petro njii msu o Yesu Kristo ngamwiṟikiṟa nyo wasambure wa Ruwa wande mulee mataṟataṟa ipfo Ponto na Galatia na Kapadokia na Asia na Bitinia muipfo mui cha wahenu.
Kui kyama kya Ruwa Wande kiwesongoe kilemnenga kamusambuṟa moilisho nyi Mumuyo Mwele kyemwidikishya Yesu Kristo na imwolya samu yake. Wutonga na ofoṟo shimuwelukie welu.
Kuichiko Ruwa ichu ai Nde o Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo! Ili amelusaṟya osaṟio lung'anyi kalufee feo lya kawi luwedye owedi luende moo kui iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo lya ipfo ko wafu.
Koikyo kuiiwedia iwona mboṟa tsilya Ruwa ateseheṟie wandu wakye ipfo Ruwehu tsilesia tsilai na mbaka tsilechiuma tsinjikoome ipfo ruwehu.
Mui-waringe muwodo nyi pfinya ya Ruwa kui wuidiki, muhendewonyo okiio luiluteseheṟe iwoneka kiheri kyefurumya.
Chihionyi kya ikyo mochikapa ngululu, ma ili muiliso wukiwa kui shiheshyo shiwe na shiwe kipfa kimuwaṟi kiheri ki kyangu.

Kitewe nyi kundu kihesha mwidikye fonu kiende kiṟumi kicha kota kilya kyehesha sahabu iya yechisia nayo yekyemanyisho modonyi, kishikye iwono kyechiende kiichiko na wuitoṟi na kiṟumi mandi halya Yesu Kristo echiwonekya.
Nao nyio mumkundi mulalemembone, mumwidikye mulambonyi, nyi mochikapa ngululu muwodo nyi sia ilechiwa ihambo ii-njilishe idi.
Kipfa mochikudaya kilya wuidiki wonu wuṟungye na ipfo nyilo okiio lo mrima yo yanu.
Okiio na ilu waikimbi wawe ipfulapfula na ihana-hana kyalo wechideda kui Mumuyo wehongia wutonga wu mleinengo nyo.
Nyi waweihana-hana kye kiheri nyi ikyi na lya iindi Mumuyo ichu o Kristo awei nawo alimanyishye-ho ilindi awesonguo iṟingishya mawawyo halya hehoya Kristo na mawusuṟi kirumi kilya kechiitumana naho.

Wakashika iwonesyo kye shindo shi weshikuwinya wo wa wenyipfo indi kitewe n nyo. Nashonyisho muleshiongoyo wulalu nyi walya walemwendie nyo Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio kui Mumuyo Mwele aa-mdume awuka ruwehu, sho sheamtsya na wasu wa ruwehu macha hemehya-ho.
Nkyo kitewe mukae na mhie yanu msanze cha wandu wakufungye kitsinyi na ilaa dembo. Mukuotoye mochikuwedya na macha wutonga wu mochiendyo ilindi Yesu Kristo echowenekya.
Mui wana wa Ruwa wawode wuindi, mlakioshe-se manyale lango njiwicho tsilya muwewode kacha lyilya muwei watondo.
Kya indi chando ichu alemlaha ai mwele na wudo nanyo muwe waele kui mhendekie fonu fose.
Kipfa kii-kiṟehie, “Muwe waele kipfa nyio inyi njii mwele.”
Nanyo ili muisenda Ruwa nyio Wande ichu ai modumbuya oryo mndu ose mdumbuye isumhanye mawuto hakye alechiambuya oshangu; Chumienyi ohendo lonu kiheri kyi kitsuhacho mui wahenu mochiindia Ruwa.
Kyamba muichi mochimanya kye chi kui shindo shesia ma fesa ma sahabu mulemhenda italao nasho mhendekienyi fonu fo shindo sha mai furianyi na shido sha waku walya wanupfo.
Kya indi nyi muiwatalae kui samu iya njiele ya wuhuru ikeri ya ichondi lilafanyi lilai na kitendo, nyio Kristo.
Nyio awemsambuṟe nyi Ruwa matika wuyana-wu wulawendewiko, indi nyi alemanyishio iheri li lifurumi lya maheri hose kimaduma kyanu.
Nyo mui-waenengye nyio mochiidikya Ruwa chu alemṟutsa wapfunyi kamsumba wuitoṟi. Nkyo kyatewa wuidiki wu wonu wurie na owedi lowedya Ruwa.
Mukamaa isanjika mrimenyi yanu kui wuhoyi wo ihoya kilya kii lohi kyemwinenga ikundana na wanawawama lilakulembetseṟye muwe mochikundana mnu necha nyo muwenyi na wenyi kui mrima fose.
Kyamba mui-wafee lya kawi feo lilawukie ndeo echikaa napfe kya indi ipfo ko ndeo elechipfa, nyi kui dedo lya Ruwa lii na moo lyechikaa mlungana.
Chando kukuṟehye: Oryo mndu ai cha maṟa. Na oryo kiṟumi kyakye kyose kikeri cha kiwaṟo kya ngeṟenyi. Maṟa hakameuma na kiwaṟo kikaweoloka.
Indi idedo lya Mndumii lyekaa mlungana. Nalyo nyilyo dedo lilemwongoyo konu lyemwendie Ndumi ya Sia.
Kuatuonyi oryo mawicho hose wongo, na oryo maokya mtambo; na makulembetseṟi; na mawunyeng'a masutsa hose.
Ili mui cha wanangu wai wafee wulalu mulalakie oseṟi lu lo kimumuyo, lulalulongye wongo, kundu mushike ikoya kui pfinya yalo mkura ya okiio.
Mukoye mulemshika isonjyo wucha wo Mndumii.
Nyio Mdumii muimchea ai iho lii na moo lii-lyimine nyi wandu; indi lii-isambuṟe nyi Ruwa, lii-iwikye wuindi ipfo koke.
Na wudo nanyo mui maho hai na moo muhende iwiko mba ikeri Mumuyo ya wukohanyi wuele wodambikya-ho shidaso sha kimumuyo shichihiṟie Ruwa kui Yesu Kristo.
Nkyo kiikiṟehye ipfo Biblienyi kyehamba, “Ambuya. Ngawika ipfo Sionyi iho liwanzi yose; iho lii-isale lii-iwikye wuindi. Na mndu moidikya-ho akuwode nalyo echihoyo sonupfo.”
Wulalu kyanu nyo mui waidiki nyi lya wuhuri wunganyi, nyi wuindi, indi walya walaidikye kyawo, “Nyi lyo iho wewika mba walelileha nalyo lyammba iho lisonguo ipfo ndumbenyi.
Kiṟehio kyahambase: Nyilo iho lya mtulia na piita ya yeolotsa wandu.” Nyi wakukapaho kipfa walaidikia idedo lyo. Nakyo nyi kyawo wai-wateṟye wokya mawokionyi.

Indi nyo mukeri oshari luu-usambuṟe wamangi wadasi, Wakohanyi wa Mangi wa mkambo fui mwele, wandu wa Ruwa amonyi msanzie fo watale wandu wa Ruwa; kundu muwe mochionguo mawuto mecha ha Ruwa ichu alemlaha ipfo meemenyi kamduo senyi yake iṟihishye idi.
Ili kacha muwei wandu walai mkambo fo Ruwa, indi wulalu mui mkambo fo Ruwa. Ili kacha mulawesaṟyo nyi Ruwa, indi wulalu momemaa isaṟyo.
Wanawawama, ngamtutuma mui cha wahenu wakuidya-iya wuyana kye mukuotoye lango tsa nyamenyi tsikeri ikapana na mrima.

Mochichumia ipfo kiidi kya wandu walaichi Ruwa ohendo lucha lusumhanyi kundu wo, ipfondo waimsutsa cha ili mui wambafu nyi hondo wakuwutie-ho iṟumisha Ruwa mkonu fo yanduo wechiambuya mawuto halya hanu mecha.
Kuwikenyi shi ya sungusihu yose ikeri ya kiwandu kimaduma kya Mndumii.
Ma ili nyi mangi ya mkambo ma kokoya nyi wachili wai wadume nyio ianduya wewuta shiwicho na kyeana walya wewuta shii shicha.
Kipfa nkyo kindo Ruwa akundi kye muwe mochiwuta sha wusumhanyi mutoṟomishe nasho wutondo wo wandu walaichi kindo.
Mui wekuachia muwenyi. Ma mulawone mochiwada ikuachia lyo liwe lyeṟikya-ho wumbafu, indi mukae nalyo mui masinga ha Ruwa.
Wikyenyi wandu wose wuindi, mukunde wanawawama wa siṟi, muhende iindia na yowuo Ruwa, muindye mangi.
Nyo mui waṟundi wa kanyi ko wandu, mukuwikye shi ya waitoṟi wanu kui wuowu wose wowaowuo chi iwa wai wecha wenunyia tupupfo indi na walya wepfulutsa nyashi.
Kyamba kichihianyi na Ruwa nyi kokoya mndu akukarishya ngaponyi tsilya ekapo tsilawode mti kimamduma kya ngo tsa mrima tsii-njiwike nyi Ruwa.

Kyamba kiṟumi kyanu kyawa kya ikyiwo kokoya mokukarishya mochikapo nzina kipfa momnyamaṟa? Indi kokoya mokukarishya mandi moterengyo kipfa kya iwuta wusumuhanyi, ikyo kichihianyi na Ruwa, Ruwa nechimusaṟia kipfa kya ikyo.
Isho nsho muiwalahie; kipfa nao Kristo alewawiṟo kipfa kyanu kamdea mtaato mpfunge kundu muoshe njayo tsake.
O nyio alawetahachie kindo, alekoyo atambie kindona dumbu yakepfo.
Nao ili arumo aletaa erumapfo kawawiṟo alasese; kakidea Ruwa ichu modumbuo kya wusumhanyi.
O amonyi kasanzya mbihu-hu foke manyamaṟo hadu kahadosya msalabehu hamu nafo, kundu so lukae lui waletsane na manyamaṟo lukapye moo foṟundya wuhoṟotsu. Nyi ichenje lyake lilemchiṟa.
Kyamba muwei waṟahi-ṟahi indi wulalu momekuhalukya Mlisi chu ai moambuya mrima yanu.
Nyo waka kuwikyenyi shi ya wamii wanu. Ma kokoya waipfo wasoṟo walasoṟa idedo lya Ruwa, wahende iliidikia kipfa kya mkao yo yanu mcha. Ma chi kui madedo-pfo.
Wechiambuya mchumie fonu mkeha mui na wuowuo woowu Ruwa.
Wuchopi wonu wulawe wo ora lo nja cha wo yokya njui na iṟaa sahabu na ikuṟaya manguo.
Kya indi wuwe wo mndu o mrima achia ora lo kya mba aṟee wuchopi wu wulechisia wo mumuyo mhoo fupfudie, nyifo fui na kiweṟe oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
Kyamba na wudo waka walya wawekyeṟundia Ruwa wawekyekuchopa ili kacha wekusirya na Ruwa wakahooya wamii wawo.
Chando Sara awehendelye Abrahamu kamsenda mndumii. Nanyo momba wana wake wa nguwo yake mukambuta kilya kii kicha mulaweowuo shiende fowa ma kimu-ho.

Na wudo, nyo womi mukae na waka wanu kui imanya kye mka ai msangi mfafa kota mii mochiwawikya wuindi kyamba nawo wechiduo kyoṟa kya moo fuu-mbike-ho nyi Ruwa kui wutonga. Kundu shiterewo shanu shilakoye-pfo tunja.
Lya inutsya ngahamba, mukae mochihia kimu mose, muwe mochiichio wengi wukiwa mukundane, muwe mosaṟya, mukunyiṟe muwenyi.
Shiwicho mowutyo nyo, ma mulataaye na shiwicho shingi. Ma mularume ili momrumo nyo. Indi kaenyi ora lungi muwe mowikya ona, kipfa kilya mui-walahie nyi Ruwa kundu muhendeduo ona luwe kyoṟa kyanu.
Madedo maele hahambie, “Kyamba mndu akunda moo fuchihiane nao, nawone mkonu ihende imchihia, o naringe olimi loke mawicho naweringa momu yake kundu iladede mtambo.
Nadiche mawicho nahende iwuta kii kicha. Nawe mopfula ofoṟo na iluwingya.
Kipfa meso ha Mndumii nyi haiambuya walya wasumhanyi na madu hake haiadanyia shiterewo shawo. Indi oshangu lo Mndumii luichihie ko walya wewuta mawicho-pfo.”
Nyi wu echimbutya kindo kiwicho ili mowa mokapanya kilya kii kicha?
Kya indi kokoya mohenda iwawiṟo kipfa mowuta kya wusumhanyi, nanga nyo. Ma mulaowuo mndu oose, ma iwuko m madima.
Indi Mndumii Kristo nyio mumtane mwele ipfo ngonyi tsanu. Mukae mochikuṟeheṟya itambahaluya oryo mndu mowesana nanyo kya owedi ilu lumbode.
Indi mumhaluo muwodo nyi wuhoo na wuowu. Ngoo tsa mrima yanu tsii njicha, kundu na ipfo kundo waimsutsa washike ipfia sonu walya waideda owicho kya, ohendo lonu lochia ludi kui Yesu Kristo.
Kyamba nanga iwawiṟo kipfa kya iwuta mecha kui kyama kya Ruwa, kota hando iwawiṟo kipfa kya iwuta mawicho.
Kipfa nao Kristo alepfa limu kipfa kya manyamaṟo hadu. Ichu asumhanyi alekaya walasumhanyi kundu naluduo ko Ruwa alewoho kui nyama indi kawewanzio moo kui mumuyo.
Ili awei adi kahenda ko mumuyo iya ikeri kipfungyonyi kawaongoya ndumi.

Nawo nyiwo wawelemye iidikya mandi halya wuleeli wo Ruwa wuweilelya mfiri iya ya Noe matika isanduku ilya liwekeri itano. Na ipfo kiidi kyalyo nyi wandu sa waangu, wandu nyanya walekiṟo kulya mṟingenyi.
Fui mfano fo ifu fuimletsa nanyo wulalu fui wupatiso. Wo wulakeri iwuta-ho oko lui nyame-hu, kya indi wukeri iterewa Ruwa owanzo lohoṟotsa necha ngo tsa mrima kui pfinya ya iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo.
Nyio akukerye ipfo owokonyi lo kulyo lo Ruwa ili amaa idoya ruwehu ipfondo amshika ilaṟyo wasu wa ruwehu na waitoṟi na waapfinya.
Wulalu ili Kristo amaa iwawyo kimbihu nanyo kimuwaṟi muṟae shisha muhie kimu nao. Kipfa mndu amerohyo nyamenyi awodese kita na wanyamaṟi-pfo.
Nkyo kimwenenge mulakikapye-se moo kui wuitiki wo lango tsa ki-wandu, kya indi muwe mofukapya kui wuitiki wo kilya Ruwa akundi matika-ha hamtsuhae.

Kyamba kiheri kyashika na kamu iki kilemsia mandi muweiwuta shindo shilya wandu walaichi Ruwa wakundi. Muwehendekye kui wulala, na wumeluki, na wunanzi na wukuwu wo mlie na wo mnyoe na wuindi woindya maruwa ha wongo wutahachie wudi.
Lyo liwaṟihishye wandu wo Walaichi Ruwa wechimruma-ruma ili mulaichumia-se nawo ipfo wumelukinyi wowo.
Wo wechianduyo nyi Ruwa-chu akuṟeheṟye idumbuo kya walya wai na moo na walya wapfie.
Kyamba ikyi kyamenenga na wapfu waleongoyo Ndumi ya Sia nyi kundu wakae wai wahoṟuo nyame-hu chandu kiwaṟi orio mndu, indi wahende iwada moo kui Mumuyo kui njia ya Ruwa.
Mainutsyo ha shindo shose hamcha afui. Ko ikyo kaenyi na osaaṟe mochikuotoya kundu muidime iterewa.
Ngoseṟa ya shingi shose kundanenyi nyo muwenyi na wenyi kui mrima foose. Mukuwade tsee kipfa ikunda li lishikye na mfeṟa fo manyamaṟo.
Muambyane necha kanyi konu kulaipfo mununuwo.
Muwe mochipfuṟukanyana muwenyi na wenyi oryo mndu ose kui kisumbo kya wutonga ameinengo nyi Ruwa, mui waiṟichi wecha weiṟichya-ho wutonga wo Ruwa wui-wuhawie-ho wo mbaṟi ii na ii.

Kuwode modeda lyo liwe lya mbiia tsa Ruwa, kuwode mopfuṟukanya lyo liwe lyechiwutika kui pfinya ii injiende nyi Ruwa, kundu Ruwa nakuwutie-ho iṟumisho na ishi shose kui Yesu Kristo. O ai menyi wuitoṟi na wukolonyi wochikaa mlungana! Amenyi.
Nyo mui wakunde, ma mulaṟihisho nyi wuhyu wulya woaka konu wochimhesha cha ili wombiia wuhenu.
Kya indi ili muisanzyo Kristo mawawio hakye ikyo kimwenenge muhende ichihio kya sia yanu ya ipfo mawonesyonyi ha wuitoṟi woke lyondi mochikapa ngululu.
Nanga nyo kokoya moilo kipfa kya rina lya Kristo, kipfa Mumuyo fo wuitoṟi, nyifo fo Ruwa fuimsokya.
Mndu onu manya nalaliso wukiwa kipfa ai mbahi ang'u mwiwi ang'u mbafu ang'u mṟiingi.
Indi kokoya ailiso wukiwa kipfa ai mkristo nalaṟeenze indi nawikye Ruwa kiṟumi kui rina lyo.
Kyamba heri lyamshika lyewokya yanduo mondu liwookie ipfo na wana wa Ruwa. Indi kokoya fuwokye kodu so nyi kyechiwa kida ko walya walaidikye Ndumi ya Sia ya Ruwa?
Na kokoya ichu asumhanyi aumiṟyo ikiṟo, ichu mlemeshi ai mnyamaṟi nyi hanga echikuloṟa ngesa?
Nkyo kimaduma iwo waiwawiṟo kui wuitiki wo Ruwa wadambikye mrima yawo mtsanyi chu mhendeli wechiwuta kilya kii kicha.
Wulalu wameku walya wakeri ipfo konu wo ngawatutuma njii meku chawo na moriso o mawawyo ha Kristo na mokita o wuitoṟi wulya wurie ihenda itambaṟukyo.
Ngawatutuma, kye lisiṟenyi poo lilya lya Ruwa lii konu chi cha ili mui-waitike-pfo kya indi kui macha ha Ruwa, mulapfule-ho mbucha indi muliwade na kuimbeṟe.
Mulachilie iwa wai wawikye kui wulang'a indi muwe mlodo ya poo.
Mukamba mudo nyi mochikudaya oṟo ilechinaa yehamba wuitoṟi matika na halya mlisi chu ang'anyi ewonekya.

Na wudo nyo mui wakoho kyekuhooyenyi wameku. Indi nyo mose mupfungane nguwo muwenyi na wenyi nyi yo mkunyiiṟye yanu. Kipfa Ruwa awikye walya wekyekung'nyisha tunja indi walya wekyekunyiiṟa wo nyi awawonye wutonga.
Ikyo kimwenenge mukae shi ya owoko lo Ruwa lui na pfinya kundu namwire heri lilya.
Mumdambikye mawina hanu hose kipfa nyi kimbode o kipfa kyanu.
Kuotoyenyi, mulae chowe. Mkituwa onu Satana aitengetatengeta cha miiso yerunduma ai mopfula mndu aidima immeṟa.
O mumleme mochikuhoda ipfo wuidiki-hu ili muichi necha kye mawawyo iha na iha hakeri iinutsyo ipfo dembonyi lya wanawawama wanu lya iya wuyana.
Indi o Ruwa menyi wutonga wose ichu alemlahya wuitoṟi woke wulunganyi kui Kristo nyio echimlumbisha nyo muiwawyo kiheri kyangu echiwa moṟihika na ikahaṟa.
Woke nyi wukolonyi wu wokaa mlungana. Amenyi.
Ngamṟehya baruo ii ngahamba ikeri mfui ngamdikya kui owoko lo Silwano manowama ichu mhendeli njetutuma na iṟingishya kye ipfo kundo muhoṟoki kuwode na wutonga wo Ruwa iwu wo lohi.
Siṟi ya iya Babilon ii-nsambuṟe nyi Ruwa kimu na yanu yo yamdikya shiiṟikiṟo, na Marko manoko na wudo.
Keiṟikiṟanenyi muwenyi na wenyi kui omimindo lo makunda. Ofoṟo lukae nanyo mui Kristo-hu mose.
Inyi Simeon Petro njii isinga lya Yesu Kristo na msu oke ngaiṟikiṟa iwa wai-watomokye wudiki wumu na iwu wodu wuitikisi nawo tichi kui wusumhanyi wo Ruwa chu odu na mkiṟa Yesu Kristo.
Wutonga na ofoṟo shimuwelukye welu kui imanya Ruwa na Mndumii odu Yesu.
Chando pfinya yake ya ki-Ruwa, Ruwa ammaa iluwonya shiende moo na wupfudi shose kui imanya ichu alelulaha na mweke fo wuitoṟi na wucha woke o amonyi.
Sho shatewa luinengo shasa sa shing'ianyi shiwode macha, kundu shimtane muwe wa-kita kimu mbika ya ki-Ruwa muweturuchukye odetso luwukye ipfo wulangenyi wo wuyana.
Nakyo nyikyo kimwenenge muitike-ho na kamu yende mbuka ncha ipfo wuidikinyi wonu; indi na ipfo mbukenyi ncha muende-ho wulaanyi.
Na ipfo wulanyi muendeho ikutumhaṟa, na ipfo kikutumhaṟyonyi muendeho ikutirisia na ipfo kikutirisionyi muende-ho wu-pfundi.
Na ipfo wupfundinyi muende-ho ikundana na wawawama, na ipfo ikundanenyi na wanawawama muende-ho ikunda lilya ling'anyi.
Kyamba kokoya ishi shikeri konu shechiengeṟeka, shechimwinenga muwe watanyii na iwonaho kiira kya imanya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
Kyamba ulya alawode isho o ai mpfu meso eidima iwonapfo na nahadimie imanya mandi kye alemsanjo manyamaṟo hake ha kacha.
Ili nyi wudo kii, nyo wanawawam, kimwamtse kawi muitike iwanza nadaho na msambuṟye iya mulelahio nyi Ruwa iwe ya kiheri kyoose. Kyamba kokoya mochiwa wewuta shilya shilya mochiho ma indi-pfo.
Mukamba mudo nyi mochiengeṟyo necha kimwitsa wumanginyi wo Mndumii na Mkiṟa odu Yesu Kristo wokaa mlungana.
Nkyo kimaduma njechiwa momkumbuṟa kya shila shilya mfiri yose ma ili mushiichi mui-waṟihike nyi kii-lohi iki muleambia.
Indi ngahamba nyi kisumhanyi njiwe njechimwamtsa-amtsa kui imkumbuṟya ilindi njikeri iya wuyana.
Kipfa njichi kye nyi kufui njileṟie mmbihu fu fooepfa mbai chando Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo alenjimanyishya.
Indi njechipfuṟukana imuloṟa muidime ikukumbuṟya isho na oryo kiheri kyose, ilindi njemaa ipfa.
Kyamba so lulawerianyi na shihano shii-shihanehane ilindi lulemwongoya pfinya ya icha lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo na mkae fokye fui nao. Kya indi lulewona na meso hadu wunene woke.
Kyamba o aleambya wuindi na wuitoṟi wuwukye ko Ruwa Wande, matika halya ṟu lilemchea liche ipfo wuitoṟinyi wo huya shose likadeda lidi, “Ichu ai Manoko sa mkunde, achihianyi na inyi.”
Na ṟu-lyo luleliicho lichee ruwehu mandi luwei handu hamu nao ipfo kitonyohu kya fumvu lilya yeele.
Na lukuwode tapu na idedo lya wuikimi. Mowuta kicha mochiliwada likeri kimui kyewaa ipfo kundo kukiwa itane kukye na nyenyeṟi ya hera idoe ipfo ngoonyi tsanu.
Ngoseṟa ya isho, manyenyi ikyi kya kuwoka, kye oryo Wuikimbi wo Biblia wochiwa idambuyo kui njia ya ki-wandupfo.
Kyamba kuipfo wuikimbi wulemendo kui kyama kya wandu manya-lepfo. Kya indi wandu waweipfo walededa kiwukye ko Ruwa wawewodo nyi Mumuyo Mwele.

Indi kuweipfo na waikimbi wa wongo ipfo kiidi kya wandu. Chando na ipfo konu kochiwa wai walosha wa wongo. Wechilosha moshie mbicho fonyamaṟa na ikana Ruwa-alewakiṟa. Na Mnene ichu alewatalaa nyi wechimkana wekutumukishya wadi kiwadetsa owinyi.
Na wandu wafoi wechiwingya njia-tso tsawo njiwicho. Nyiwo wechitewa njia ya kii-lohi ihende irumo.
Ili wawodo nyi wuehi wechikapa nanyo mbucha kui sumu tsawo tsa wongo. Indi kui kiheri kileshe Moanduya owo nakuṟeheṟie, na Morumatsa owo nawonyi.
Kyamba ma Wasu walya wa ruwehu walemdekyo Ruwa alewahoria-pfo. Kya indi kawakumbalya modonyi fo Gehena hando hadekye wanda na kamu hashingikye meema puti wakae-pfo wai wapfunge itane weshika yanduyo.

Manya Ruwa alesaṟia wuyana wulya wo mboko-pfo, indi naleende mfu fung'anyi kulya orukyenyi lo wandu walempiṟa. Indi nyi Noe mwongoyi o wusumuhanyi na walya wake mfungade Ruwa nalewakiṟa kechiendye wuyana wo walemeshi mfu fulya fowarumatsa.
Na mṟi ya Sodoma na Gomora Ruwa kaikombetsa kombi kaikoṟa na modo kiwe kicharo kya shindo shechihoya wandu wechikaa wapiṟe Ruwa.
Ruwa nalekiṟa na Loti ulya asumhanyi awei-mrohie adi nyi mhendekye fo walemeshi walya fuwei fo melu-melu.
Kyamba Loti nawei kiidi kyawo, na kafoi mrima fokye fukasukio mnu kya mawuto halya hawo mawicho, halachihianyi na Ruwa. Sho shiwekeri itura mrima foke fusumhanyi.
Mndumii aichi iletsa wandu wamwidikie kiheshionyi kyawo, indi iwa walasumhanyi nyi aichi iwasuṟumya ngapo mfiri foanduo waipfo wechidehelyo.
Ngoseṟa mnu nyi walya wewingya seko tsa mbihu wawodo nyi wulangi wuteṟefutsie wakapiṟa wunene. Wo wandu waami, wakahakaha walaowuo iruma waapfinya wa ipfo huye na iwaisalucha.
Napfo kundo wamalaika wa ruwehu wenyi pfinya na wuumi kota walosha wo wa wongo walaendeho mdumbuye yewaruma oshangunyi lo Mndumii.
Indi wanduwo wai cha mando halai na wurango, hekeshao na lyefurumia hekyeshinjo, nyi wekeruma ishi walaichi. Wo wechirumatso kipfa kya wuwicho wowo wawenyi.

Wuṟundi wechikudaya nyi wusumhanye wumbafu wowo. Sia yawo nyi iwuta napata tena mfiri kui na sa ikyo kyoose kya wuseṟeṟi wo wo kimbihu. Wo nyi walaala na wusutsu konu ili wechikaa nanyo ili wakeri ilya nanyo.
Meso hawo haichuo wuṟuhui, walaida wunyamaṟi. Wekyetuusa mrima ya wafafa ilai-mdamiṟe. Mrima yawo iichwo lango tsa masaa, wai wana wa oseso lo Ruwa.
Waleda njia njihoṟotsu wakaṟahaṟaha wewingya njia ya Beleamu mana o Beori alelanga wuṟundi wo wumbafu wulya.
Indi nyi alewonyo-ho owingo lo wutahachi woke wuwenyi. Nzoi ilekyededa lilededa na ṟu lya mndu o wandu, likakanga mhie fo mwikimbi ulya fuwei-mpfuluye fudi.
Nawo nyiwo wakeri cha soka tsilaṟukie mṟinga na cha mapuchi hamawiwite nyi otanu. Kilya kii-kiṟeheṟye-ho kyawo nyi kulya ṟungunyi lya meema.
Kyamba wo wekyekushela na madedo ha maai; wechituusa na lango njiwicho tsa nyamenyi kui mamelukameluka wandu, walya wamelekana msanzie fo wechumia kipfuṟi.
Wekewateṟya ikuachia, nawo mwawenyi wai masinga ha wunyamari. Kyamba mndu nai isinga lya ikyo kyoose kimchilie.

Kyamba kokoya iwa waledicha ngafu tsa wuyana kui imanya Mndumii na Mkiṟi odu Yesu Kristo, na numa wakaidikia iwingo na ichilia nyi wechioṟowyo nyitso lingi kyawo kifurumi kyechiwichuo ngoseṟa kota kya kuwoka.
Kyamba kyawo kiwechia kima walawemanya njia yo ya wusumhanyinyi, kota hando wameimanya wakaikumba mhongo wakaleha iwawaso lilya yele waleliambia.
Kikawewahoya kya mfanano fulya fohamba, “Kite kyekewuya-madaiko hakyo kimenyi na kila kingi kyehamba,” “Nguwe nsanje yekusinga kundo kupochikye.” Nyi wudo kii kowo.
Nyo mui wakunde wako, baruo ii ngamṟehya nyo nyi ya kawi. Njimwamtsie natso mhie fulya msalari njechimtamuṟya-ho mbonyi tsi.
Muwe mochikumbuo madedo halya halehambo nyi waikimbi walya waele na iwawaso lilya lya Ndumi Mkiṟi lii-yende nyi wasu walya wanu.

Kisongoye shoose manyenyi kiheri kyefurumia kochicha wandu wetaluo, mchumie yawo inchilie nyi lango tawo njiwicho. Kochicha-pfo wetaluo wai wapirisi wenyi-wupiṟi wechichumia waiwaṟaishe nyi lango tsawo wawenyi.
Wekehamba, “Kyasa kya iwuya lyake kilemawutsyo hanga ngesa?” Wokya mandi waku wamepfa, shindo shose shii chando shiwei lyilya shilewiko iya wuyanenyi.
Ili wandu wa wakutimbishye, wakahadima imanya kye Ruwa nalededa, ruwehu na wuyana shikawumbo. Wuyana wulewiko mṟingenyi kui mṟinga mṟingenyi kui dedo lya Ruwa iwewangiho na mweke fo mṟinga.
Na kui mṟinga, mfu fulya funganyi fo mṟinga, wuyana wo kiheri kilya natso tsikakusanza tsekombetsa mkambo fo wandu fose wakarumatso nyi mṟinga.
